[\[22a.1\]]pa ni shes par dka'o/_/de snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/don gyi dbang de gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du chos bstan [#]te/_gang zag gis gang zag gi [#]tshod gzung [#]bar mi bya'o/_/[#]gang zag gis gang zag la tshod bzung na/_rma
[\[22a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur te/_nga'am gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba dag gis gang zag la tshod bzung [#]ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu su bdag bsrung bar 'dod pa des gzhan su'i spyod pa la [#]yang brtag par mi bya'o/_/de dag la 'di ni 'di 'dra'o[#]/_/'di ni 'di 'dra'o zhes dpya bar mi bya'o/_/nyin mtshan
[\[22a.3\]]du sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos la bsgom [#]pa'i yid kyis bsam pa thag pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la dpya bar brtson par mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
[\[22a.4\]]gyi khams na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/_chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang chos thams cad
[\[22a.5\]]tshul gcig par yid ches shing /_tha na chung ngu na 'dri ba'am/_dpyad pa'am/_lung 'bogs pa'am/_kha ton bya ba'i phyir gnas na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu tshul 'di khong du chud pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[22a.6\]]las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad la chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral bar gyur to/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas spong ba'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[22a.7\]]kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tshab med pa la gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcu po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni sangs rgyas spong bar byas so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]rgyas spong pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa sum cu 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'jig rten gyi khams smig rgyu can du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa'i nga ro can zhes bya ba byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_de bzhin
[\[22b.2\]]gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nur gyur to/_/de'i tshe rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag thams cad kyis gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du bcug go/_/gtsug lag khang re rer [#]yang
[\[22b.3\]]dge slong stong stong gnas par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba gzungs thob pa zhig chos ston no/_/rigs kyi bu chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa de chos kyi stan la 'dug pa la sangs rgyas lnga stong spobs pa grub par mdzad de/_lha dung phyur
[\[22b.4\]]phrag brgyad kyang /_lus yongs su sbyang ba'i [#]phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de'i chos bshad pa gcig gis srog chags bdun khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/srog chags khri ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/rigs
[\[22b.5\]]kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po zla bas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/des chos la gus pas chos smra ba de la mchod pa'i phyir bud med lnga brgya dang /_glu dbyangs dang rol mo byas so/_/dge slong de la rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis kyang mngon par gtor te/_tsan+dan gyi [#]byug pas kyang
[\[22b.6\]]byugs so/_/ras bcos bu lnga brgyas kyang bkab bo/_/bde ba'i rim gro thams cad kyis mchod pa 'di lta ste/_chos smra ba la mchod pa'i mchog gis zhag bdun du rim gro byas so/_/de nas dge slong de la khyim bdag gi bu de dag gis 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis glengs so/_/
[\[22b.7\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag lo dgu khrir sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/_/tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni mi rnams kyi nang du za ma dang kla klo dang /_log par lta ba'i khyim rnams su skyes so/_/tshe rabs drug brgyar ni dmus long dang /_lce med par gyur to/_/tshe
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]rabs bdun brgyar ni rab tu byung nas/_ji srid 'tsho'i mthar thug gi bar du gzungs ma thob par 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de dag bsgribs so/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis [#]khong du chud par bya'o/_
[\[23a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_chos smra ba la mngon sum du mthong yang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis [#]brjod par mi bya na thos pas lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed pa bas ni/_gang zhig chos smra ba la gshe ba'i bsam pas
[\[23a.3\]]lta bar byed na/_de ni de bas ches kha na ma tho ba'i las che ba yin no/_/gang zhig sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed la/_gang zhig chos smra ba mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs te/_'dug par byed na bsod nams ma yin pa 'di la bsod nams ma yin pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang
[\[23a.4\]]nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang chos smra ba la skur pa 'debs pa des ni sangs rgyas la skur pa btab par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya
[\[23a.5\]]bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la mchod par 'dod pas/_chos smra ba la mchod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la phyag bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung
[\[23a.6\]]ba'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni [#]byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gang la brten te byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de la brten nas/_de ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas par brjod par mi
[\[23a.7\]]bya/_de ni nam du yang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par brjod par mi bya/_de ni gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang gzugs med par [#]nye bar 'gro bar brjod par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de ni byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las grol ba'i phyir/_gang byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa [#]rnams ston par 'dod pa des ni/_nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs bstan par 'dod du zad do/_/rigs kyi
[\[23b.2\]]bu 'di lta ste/_dper na klu thams cad klu nyid du spyir [#]song ba yin pas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa ni klu'i bgrang bar yang 'gro la/_klu'i nyes pa gsum gyis [#]kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsum gang zhe na/_mgo la bye tshan mi 'bab pa dang /_skye ba po'i lus dang lhan cig tu
[\[23b.3\]]kun tu mi gnas pa dang /_de la nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs [#]pa mi 'byung ba ste/_rigs kyi bu klu'i skyon gsum po 'di dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsed mo dang /_dga' ba thams cad nyams su
[\[23b.4\]]myong bar byed kyang srid pa gsum du 'dod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnams kyis zil gyis mi non par brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can gyi rigs nya [#]zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni chu la spyod chu la lta yang /_der 'chi ba'i dus byed
[\[23b.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na spyod kyang /_de nyid du byis pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyang [#]/_ye shes kyi spyod pa 'tshol lo/_/chos yang dag par blangs pas [#]kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/byis pa dang lhan
[\[23b.6\]]cig tu gnas pas/_srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar yang mi 'gyur te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag [#]bsrung bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo las kyang /_mi pham pa sngon byung
[\[23b.7\]]ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro las byung ba'i grags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_des lo khrag khrig brgyad
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]cur sems can rnams la chos bstan to/_/de'i gsung rab la dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba chos smra ba/_gtam sna tshogs smra ba/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan pa/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_skye bo
[\[24a.2\]]mang po la [#]yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/_skye bo mang po la [#]yang dag par dga' bar byed pa byung nas/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro las byung ba'i grags pa des/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/_dam pa'i chos bsdu bar bcol te/_des de bzhin
[\[24a.3\]]gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo bye bar dam bcas pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ste/_de rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs nas chos ston te/_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/des
[\[24a.4\]]grong khyer stong phrag brgyad cur smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du/_sems can rnams rab tu dga' bar byas nas/_de grong khyer chen po bzang po zhes bya bar song ste/_khyim pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu la mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan nas/_grong khyer de nas srog chags bye ba phrag
[\[24a.5\]]brgyad cu rab tu dad par byas so/_/de'i nang nas bye ba phrag gcig ni byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems can bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa dgu ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la rab tu bkod de btul lo[#]/_/de nas dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa de dge slong khri dang lhan cig tu byang chub
[\[24a.6\]]kyi snying po ga la ba der yul rgyu zhing song ngo /_/mi pham pa dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa song nas ring po ma lon par grong khyer chen po bzang po der/_dge slong chos zhes bya ba phyin te/_des rnam par 'thag pa'i mdo stong bzung ngo /_/[#]bsam gtan bzhi yang thob par gyur to/_/
[\[24a.7\]]dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas ni mdo sde bye ba phrag bcu dang /_rnam par 'thag pa'i [#]mdo drug khri [#]bzung bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong chos des grong khyer chen po bzang po der tshul gcig gi chos bstan pas/_skye bo mang po rab tu dga' bar byas kyang /_de mos pa ji lta ba bzhin
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]du chos bstan pa la mkhas pa ma yin te/_skye bo de [#]dag la chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes stong pa nyid kyis 'doms [#]shing stong pa nyid kyis [#]rjes su ston te/_gang ngas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kho na yin no/_/gang 'tsho
[\[24b.2\]]ba yongs su dag pa des bshad pa/_de ni skyon chags pa ste/_dge slong de 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ma yin na/_ci'i phyir dge slong de'i ming 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya/_de ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_me tog yongs su len cing blangs nas yongs
[\[24b.3\]]su spyod do/_/spos dang byug pa yongs su len cing blangs nas yongs su spyod do/_/de ni shes pa ma yin te byis pa'o/_/nga ni tshangs par spyad nas yun ring ba yin gyi de ni gsar bu ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring por ma lon pa yin gyis/_de ltar yid ches par ma byed
[\[24b.4\]]cig ces zer ro/_/dge slong de ni bag yod pa yin te/_dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa de la skye bo de dag rab tu dad pas de ltar des skye bo de dag la dbye na [#]byas kyang dbye bar ma [#]nus so/_/de nas dge slong chos de 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur te/_'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_'di ltar
[\[24b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba btab pa dang /_'di ltar chos spangs pas/_bskal pa bdun cur sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/de bskal pa bdun cu po de dag 'das nas/_bskal pa drug cur byang chub kyi sems brjod de/_bskal pa drug cu po de dag 'das nas/_de
[\[24b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos rin po che'i 'od kyi gsung rab la/_de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub kyi sems bskyed du bcug nas/_des byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/tshe rabs dgu khrir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes so/_/tshe rabs drug khrir mi dbul po rnams
[\[24b.7\]]kyi nang du skyes te/_thams cad du yang lce med par gyur to/_/de sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag lnga'i gan na chos smra bar gyur te/_thams cad du yang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bod [#]par 'os par gyur to/_/chos thams
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]cad la yongs su dag par [#]chos ston par yang gyur to/_/mi pham pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa [#]snyam du khyod sems na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta [#]ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
[\[25a.2\]]med ces bya ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos smra ba 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/mi pham pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos zhes [#]bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_khyod kyis [#]de ltar mi blta [#]ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos
[\[25a.3\]]zhes [#]bya bar gyur te/_nga nyid las de lta bu'i mi 'tshal [#]ba byung ngo /_/mi pham pa chos kyis [#]phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni de ltar shes par dka' ste/_las de'i rnam par smin pas nga snyigs ma lnga'i dus na/_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mi
[\[25a.4\]]pham pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnyis su 'byed cing chos ston pa de dag ni/_las de'i rnam par smin pas dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub par bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa la bdud dang
[\[25a.5\]]bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de mchi ma blags te dus nas/_tshig 'di skad ces deng phan chad dge slong chos kyis [#]ji skad smras pa ltar su yang chos ston par ma gyur cig ces 'dzer to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[25a.6\]]po 'khor der 'dus pa dag kyang stan las langs te/_sa la 'khod do/_/sa la 'khod nas [#]ngus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i phyir sa la 'khod cing ngu /_de dag gis
[\[25a.7\]#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni las kyi sgrib pa de dang ldan par bdag cag nyid kyis mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de'i gsung
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]rab la shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung ba la khyed kyis [#]smad de/_de phyin chad khyed kyis [#]nam yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ngo /_/nam yang byang chub kyi sems ma rnyed do/_/gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin ma rnyed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed nga'i byang chub la yang dag par
[\[25b.2\]]zhugs kyang /_bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba tha ma'i tshe/_khyed kyis [#]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob [#]par 'gyur ro/_/de phyin chad bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [#]mngon par rdzogs
[\[25b.3\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/_sems kyis [#]gzhan bsam par mi bya ste/_bdag cag gis mchod rten nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/bdag cag gi [#]mdun na sangs
[\[25b.4\]]rgyas bzhugs so snyam du bsam mo/_/rigs kyi bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpas/_byang chub sems dpa' mthong na mchod rten gyi 'du shes sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa ma gtogs par 'du shes gzhan bskyed par mi bya'o/_/gzhan du gyur na byang chub
[\[25b.5\]]sems dpas [#]bdag nyid la rma phyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas thugs dam bzhes pa/_gal te bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ma bskyed na/_ngas 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[25b.6\]]dpag tu med pa rnams na/_gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bslus par gyur cig ces bya ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus [#]lnga brgya pa tha ma [#]la gang su dag gzungs thob pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni
[\[25b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thob par gyur [#]te/_rigs kyi bu [#]de lta bas na 'di la su yang chos smra ba la mi snyan par brjod pa des ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa spangs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag [#]gang su zhig sems can dag ji ltar mos pa'i [#]mos pa bzhin du/[ #]chos ston pa de thams
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/_/'khor gang du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa [#]dag lan 'ga' zhig spu zing zhes byed dam/_mchi ma lan 'ga' zhig klog [#]pa de thams cad kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur shes par bya ba yin na/_de la
[\[26a.2\]]mi blun po byang chub sems dpa' ma yin par byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin par gyur pa[#]/_chos rku ba/_tshul 'chos pa/_cho ga ngan pa la spyod pa de dag kha cig 'di skad ces 'di lta zhig ci shes zhes zer ro/_/byams pa ngas byang chub kyi phyir
[\[26a.3\]]spyod pa na/_bdag nyid kyis [#]gang tshigs su bcad pa nyos pa ni rang gi lus yongs su btang ba dang /_chung ma yongs su btang ba dang /_bu dang bu mo yongs su btang ba dang /_rgyal srid yongs su btang bas [#]nyos shing /_byams pa legs par bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad
[\[26a.4\]#]pa gcig gi phyir 'dzam bu'i gling byin te/_nyos par ngas mngon par dran na/_de dag ni rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti bsrung zhing sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba'i gnas su [#]'gro bar mi sems so/_/mi pham pa dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di bzung ba yang 'byor pa dang ldan pas nus kyi mi ldan
[\[26a.5\]]pas ma yin no/_/mi pham pa ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis [#]chos gang bstan pa de la de dag 'di skad du/_de ni lung ma nod par bya ba ma yin no zhes zer te/_sems can de dag 'byung ba ma yin te nyes pa chen po ji tsam dang ldan
[\[26a.6\]]pa la ltos/_mi pham pa dge slong chos des rnam par 'thag pa'i mdo stong bstan te/_bsam gtan bzhi bskyed kyang de lta bu'i gnas su gyur na/_gang phyogs tsam mam cha tsam la reg pa rnam par 'thag pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la mngon par mi dga' zhing /_rnam
[\[26a.7\]]par 'thag pa la skyon 'dogs pa lta ci smos te/_de dag ni chos smra ba'i dge slong la skur [#]pa 'debs pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos spong ba yin/_rlom sems chen pos skur pa 'debs pa yin te/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba [#]de dag la ni legs par byas zhes nga mi smra'o/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang dag chos smra ba la rnam par smod pa de dag ni/_sangs rgyas la rnam par smod pa yin/_chos la rnam par smod pa yin no/_/gang dag chos smra ba la rim gro med pa de dag ni sangs rgyas la rim gro med pa yin no/_/gang dag chos smra ba la mi snyan par brjod pa de dag
[\[26b.2\]]ni/_sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/_sangs rgyas la mi snyan par brjod pa yin no/_/gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis ni/_sangs rgyas yongs su btang ba yin te/_ji snyed du khong khro ba'i sems skyed par
[\[26b.3\]]byed pa de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal bar gnas par go cha bgos [#]so/_/ji tsam du khong khro ba'i mig gis lta ba de srid du long ba'i skye mched thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam du mi snyan par brjod pa de srid du lce'i skye mched med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi pham pa ji ltar byang chub
[\[26b.4\]]sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa'i sems bskyed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' ngan song du log par lhung [#]bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu gzhan ni ngas ma mthong ngo /_/mi pham pa sems can gyi 'du shes dang /_chos kyi 'du shes la gnas pa rnams la ni/_las mngon par 'du
[\[26b.5\]]byas pa [#]yod de/_mi dmigs pa la ni med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos tha dad du 'byed [#]cing ston pa de dag ni [#]spros pa la gnas pa yin no/_/mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]drug yang dag par grub [#]pa ni/_byang chub kyi phyir yin na/_de la yang
[\[26b.6\]]mi blun po de dag 'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya'o zhes zer zhing [#]pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams sun 'byin to/_/mi pham pa 'di ji [#]snyam du sems/_ka shi ka'i rgyal po gang yin pas mgo byin [#]par gyur pa de 'chal ba'i
[\[26b.7\]]shes rab yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyang 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas/_dog sa'i sgo phye ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen por
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]ltung ngo /_/de sug las kyi sgrib pa des/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sdug bsngal tsha [#]zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba mi bzad pa myong bar gyur to/_/tshe rabs brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhir mi snyan
[\[27a.2\]]par brjod pa thob par gyur to/_/bskal pa brgya stong mang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tsam yang ma thos par gyur to/_/de de nas slad kyi [#]de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mjal te/_de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas mngon par mos par ma gyur te/_tshe rabs
[\[27a.3\]]stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug tu rab tu byung ba las slar babs par gyur to/_/sug las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyi lhag mas/_tshe rabs stong phrag mang por dbang po rtul bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge slong chos smra ba rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po zhes bgyi ba
[\[27a.4\]]byung bas ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes chos kyang ston to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[27a.5\]]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid sdug [#]cing dri ma med la nyi zla zil gyis gnon pa bzhugs shing /_'tsho gzhes chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gang gyur pa de ni/_bdag nyid de'i
[\[27a.6\]]tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de lta bu'i tshul 'di ma 'tshal bas/_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de 'dra ba'i gnas su gyur te/_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal [#]ma mchis pa'i sdug
[\[27a.7\]]bsngal/_yongs su brtags [#]pa'i sdug bsngal/_phyin ci log gi sdug bsngal rnam pa de lta bu myong bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa gang yang rung ste/_de lta bu'i sug
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]las kyi sgrib pa mi 'tshal zhing /_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi 'tshal na/_des dam pa'i chos spang bar mi bgyi'o/_/dam pa'i chos la dpya bar mi bgyi'o/_/chos gang la yang khong khro bar mi bgyi'o zhes gsungs so/_/chos spong ba la dgongs [#]pa bstan pa snying rje chen po la 'jug
[\[27b.2\]]pa'i mdo las kyang /_'jig rten 'bras bu'i 'du shes can/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag dgra bcom pa yi zas/_/zos nas sangs rgyas spong bar byed/_/gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir ni/_/[#]mchod rten thams cad bshig byed pas/_/gang zhig mdo sde
[\[27b.3\]]spong byed pa'i/_/sdig pa 'di ni ches khyad 'phags/_/gang gis [#]gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/dgra bcom bsad par gyur pa bas/_/gang zhig mdo sde spong byed pa'i/_/sdig pa 'di ni ches khyad 'phags/_/zhes gsungs so/_/[#]rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus [#]pa'i mdo las
[\[27b.4\]]kyang /_'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni phra'o/_/'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i bka' la la ni bzang bar 'du shes la/_la la ni ngan par 'du shes pa de ni chos spong ba'o/_/gang chos spong ba [#]des chos spangs pas/_de bzhin
[\[27b.5\]]gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa yin/_dge 'dun la ngan du brjod pa yin no/_/'di ni rigs pa'o[#]/_/'di ni mi rigs pa'o zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ched du gsungs pa'o/_/'di ni nyan thos rnams [#]kyi ched du gsungs pa'o
[\[27b.6\]]zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ched du gsungs pa'o zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ma yin no zhes zer na dam pa'i [#]chos spong ba yin no/_/chos smra ba spobs
[\[27b.7\]]pa yod do zhe'am/_spobs pa med do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos ni chos ma yin par ston to zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med par yang gzungs thob ces zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/gzungs [#]thob pa ni yongs su dag pa ma yin [#]zhes zer na
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]chos spong ba yin no/_/chos smra ba'i spyod pa nyes par [#]byas pa dang ldan no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos smra ba sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/spyod lam gyi [#]bag med pas gleng na chos spong ba yin no/_/spyod
[\[28a.2\]]lam gyis gleng na chos spong ba yin no/_/spyod pa dang tshul khrims nyams pas gleng na chos spong ba yin no/_/spobs pa go bar mi byed do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/snang ba legs par ma bshad do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/khong du ma chud pas tshig dang tshig tu
[\[28a.3\]]'gal bar byas so zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/yi ge'i ming gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la 'jug go zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/mdo sde dang mdo sder 'gal bar byas so zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/tshigs su bcad pa dang tshigs su bcad [#]par
[\[28a.4\]]'gal bar byas so zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/don la la la mos shing don la la la mi mos na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos 'chad pa'i tshe gtam gzhan du bsgyur [#]na chos spong ba yin no/_/dkrugs ma byed na chos spong ba yin no/_/kun du rtog pas smra na chos spong ba yin
[\[28a.5\]]no/_/'di la spyad 'di la mi spyad ces zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni legs par smras pa 'di ni legs par ma smras zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dam tshig go/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dam tshig ma yin no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin
[\[28a.6\]]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa gang ji snyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa gang [#]ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/_/'jam dpal ngas ni nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa gang ji snyed pa dang /_byang
[\[28a.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu las byung bar smon lam legs par btab pa yin/_'jam dpal ngas ni byang chub tu yang smon lam legs par btab pa yin na/_'di ltar mi blun po de dag ngan song du 'gro
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/_de la yang skyon 'dogs par sems so zhes bya ba nas[#]/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te la la zhig sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis chos spong ba
[\[28b.2\]]'di lta bu 'di bgyis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gal te lo bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig cing /_
[\[28b.3\]]dus gsum du nyes pa la nyes par bshags na/_de'i 'og tu byang bar 'gyur te/_de phyin chad nyung na bskal pa bcus bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bzung /_ma bklags
[\[28b.4\]]par smra [#]na/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba las ma smas [#]par shin tu thar bar dka'o/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' 'di la bslabs nas/_phyis chos ston par bya ste/_de ltar na de smos [#]par mi [#]'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las
[\[28b.5\]]kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu lcags kyi rang bzhin mtshon rnon pos lce bcad pa ni bla'i/_'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/_dben pa na 'dug gam/_bdag nyid zla dang bcas par 'dug kyang rung ste/_yongs su ma dag pa'i chos ston pa ni ma yin pa nyid do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir rnam grangs
[\[28b.6\]]'dis de ltar rig [#]par bya ste/_sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na[#]/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba [#]nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bkod pa
[\[28b.7\]]chen po zhes bya ba de'i tshe tshad ni lo bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad du gyur to zhes bya ba nas/_sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na/_chos 'dul ba rnam pa lngar gyur te/_'di ltar kun du dngos po [#]zhes bya ba dang /_brtson 'grus
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]len zhes bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi gsong por smra ba zhes bya ba dang /_ngag shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_nye bar bcings pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de la de'i tshe na/_kun du zhes bya ba dang /_brtson len zhes bya ba
[\[29a.2\]]dang /_gsong por smra ba zhes bya ba dang /_ngag shes zhes bya ba dang /_nye bar bcings pa zhes bya ba dang /_dge slong lnga po de dag 'khor dang ldan par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de la gang kun dngos ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de dag ni/_sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'di kun nas shes shing /_stong pa nyid smra ba dang /_dmigs
[\[29a.3\]]pa med par gyur to/_/yang dge slong bzhi po 'khor dang bcas pa [#]gang zag tu smra ba de dag ni phal cher lam gol ba 'dzin par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de la gang dag kun dngos po [#]ldan zhes bya ba'i dge slong du gyur pa de ni/_bzhi po de dag gis zil gyis mnan par gyur cing ldang par ma nus
[\[29a.4\]]so/_/bzhi po de dag kyang skye bo mang pos bkur bar bya bar gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de ltar sdig pa'i dge slong de dag gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po log par lta ba yang dag par len du bcug par gyur to/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab de/_gzhan dang gzhan gyis ma gus pa
[\[29a.5\]]dang /_gzhan dang gzhan gyis spangs pa nyid kyis bsnubs [#]par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu gang dag kun du dngos po zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa kun du shes shing khong du chud la/_lhag par mos pa bye ba khrag khrig drug cu rtsa brgyad po de dag ni/_sangs rgyas lnga stong dag gi nyan thos su gyur
[\[29a.6\]]cing /_de nyid du mya ngan las 'das pa ngas shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de ltar 'gyur te/_dmigs pa med par spyod pa dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de la gang brtson len zhes bya ba'i dge
[\[29a.7\]]slong dang /_kun shes zhes bya ba dang /_ngag shes zhes bya ba dang /_nye bar bcings pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad dmigs pa can du gyur/_bdag tu smra ba la brten pa dang /_gang zag tu smra bar gyur[#]/_gang zag tu [#]smra ba la mngon par zhen pa dang /_skye bo mang po'i
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]'khor dang ldan par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de ltar dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis/_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams log par lta ba la bkod par gyur to/_/don dam pa spangs par gyur/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_smon
[\[29b.2\]]pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la gcer bu pa'i tshig tu 'du shes par gyur to/_/de dag gi log par lta ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de la gang dge slong bzhi po 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa bzhi po de dag gi rjes su
[\[29b.3\]]'brang ba/_de'i smra ba smra ba/_de dag gi smra ba la gus par nyan par gyur pa de rnams kyis/_de med pas gsung rab bsnubs par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de la gang dag dam pa'i chos ma yin no zhes bzung [#]nas/_sbyor zhing 'bad la rnal 'byor du byed pa de dag gis ni nam yang zas yongs su
[\[29b.4\]]sbyor ba'i las byas pa ma yin no/_/de dag gis [#]nam du yang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang ma skyed na/_'bras bu 'thob [#]pa lta ga la yod de/_de ni gnas med do/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de ltar na khyim par gyur pa dang /_khyim pa [#]rab tu byung bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag ces bya ba nas/_
[\[29b.5\]]dam pa'i chos thams cad nas thams cad du dam pa'i chos nub pa'i rgyus slar yang ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/_bde 'gror 'gro ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de ltar skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub de dag kyang bsnubs shing
[\[29b.6\]]sems can rnams la don ma yin pa chen po byas so/_/skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kyang dus byas nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung [#]ngo /_/de la lo bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcur gan rkyal dang kha sbub tu btsos so/_/lo bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcur
[\[29b.7\]]ngos g.yas g.yon du phab ste btsos so/_/de dag de nas shi 'phos te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_thig nag dang /_yang sos rnams su rab tu ltung ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba chen po
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]re rer de snyed cig dus de snyed du btsos so/_/de dag slar yang sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos las thig nag dang /_bsdus [#]'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba
[\[30a.2\]]chen por rab tu lhung [#]ngo /_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis/_de dag dang 'brel pa khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba grogs po'i tshogs dang /_slong [#]mo ster ba'i tshogs su gyur pa de dag kyang /_de dag dang lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su shi 'phos shing skyes nas/_
[\[30a.3\]]tshor ba yid du mi 'ong ba'ang myong bar gyur to[#]/_/gang dag de dag gi [#]yin par gyur pa srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po sngon med cing phyis byung ba de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu shi 'phos shing skyes so/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu gang dag gis yin par gyur pa
[\[30a.4\]]grogs po'i tshogs dang /_slong [#]mo ster ba'i tshogs dang /_nye gnas kyi tshogs dang /_dge slong dang /_slob dpon dang /_de'i slob dpon dang /_thad na 'khod pa dang /_nye bar 'khod pa ji snyed pa dang /_de dag gi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed pa gang dag
[\[30a.5\]]'dzin pa des log par 'gro bar gyur pa sdig pa'i dge slong de dag dang lhan cig sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu shi 'phos shing skyes pa de rnams bgrang bar yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes pa ltar khyed kyis [#]shes par mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu rnam grangs
[\[30a.6\]]'dis srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de rnams bskal pa tshang bar ngan song du skyes par gyur to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe bskal pa bsregs [#]par gyur pa de'i tshe mi blun po de dag de bzhin du rab tu ltung [#]bar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu
[\[30a.7\]]gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la rab tu spong ba'i las de ni mi bzad [#]pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/[#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe 'khor de nas gud du 'dod bar 'gyur te/_lus dang
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]sems kyis [#]mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las [#]sogs pa yin te/_de dag shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe spong bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis shes
[\[30b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs pas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur te/_de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas shing
[\[30b.3\]]bsags pa dang /_chos kyis phongs [#]par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal bar sreg par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems can
[\[30b.4\]]dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te[#]/_de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por [#]'dod pa'i tshe mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[30b.5\]]de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi [#]sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phangs par [#]'gyur te/_de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_de dag tu bsreg par 'gyur
[\[30b.6\]]ro/_/der 'phangs te/_der skyes nas kyang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba [#]chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad [#]sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong ba'i tshe/_mes yongs su 'jig pa'am[#]/_chus yongs
[\[30b.7\]]su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ste/_de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang /[# ]shar phyogs kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phangs par 'gyur/_lho
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phangs par [#]'gyur ro/_/de dag tu yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can
[\[31a.2\]]dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/_der yang mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ste/_de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa
[\[31a.3\]]'byung ba'i tshe/_de nas shi 'phos nas chos 'jig par 'byung ba'i las de ma zad pas yang 'dir skyes te[#]/_de dag yang [#]sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag der skyes nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag
[\[31a.4\]]tu sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de dag tu yang mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa ma byung gi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag
[\[31a.5\]]mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/_chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/_rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa byung nas kyang /_de dag de nas shi 'phos nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu byol song gi skye gnas rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lho dang /_nub
[\[31a.6\]]dang /_byang dang /_byang [#]shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu [#]byol song gi [#]skye gnas pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag tu yang phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[31a.7\]]kyi bar du gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag der skyes nas sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad nas/_ji ste brgya la mir skye ba thob na yang chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa dang bsags pa dang /_bsgrubs [#]pa dang /_tshang ba dang /_rdzogs
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]pa'i rnam par smin pa des de dag la gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der dmus long gi rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_phyag dar ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_gdol pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_smyig [#]ma mkhan gyi rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_de dag der skyes nas kyang dmus long du skye bar 'gyur
[\[31b.2\]]ba yin/_zhar bar 'gyur ba yin/_sna med par 'gyur ba yin/_lce med par 'gyur ba yin/_lag pa med par 'gyur ba yin/_rkang pa med par 'gyur ba yin/_mdze can du 'gyur ba yin/_sha bkra can du 'gyur ba yin/_sgur por 'gyur ba yin/_gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra med pa
[\[31b.3\]]dang /_chos kyi sgra med pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra [#]med pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba nas/_rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol ba/_bzhi gang dang gang zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[31b.4\]]pa/_skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong ba de dag ni bdud kyis [#]byin gyis brlabs [#]pa yin te/_rab 'byor rgyu dang po des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos zab mo rnams la yid ches pa dang dad cing mos pa med pa yin
[\[31b.5\]]te/_rgyu gnyis pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni brtson 'grus med cing /_phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas/_rgyu gsum pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor
[\[31b.6\]]skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas zhe sdang gi spyod pa can yin te/_de dag bdag la bstod cing gzhan smod par gyur pas/_rgyu bzhi pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir spong bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis [#]skyes bu glen
[\[31b.7\]]pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/[#]rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /_kun dga' bo da [#]ltar skyes bu glen pa rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i zil gyis non pa/_mi gtsang par bying pa/_rim gro'i
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]zil gyis non pa/_ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul spong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/_de lta bu'i mdo
[\[32a.2\]]sde bzang po la yang spong zhing mi snyan par [#]brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag 'byung lags pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de dag ni mdo sde 'di lta bu spong zhing mi snyan par brjod par ma zad de/_sdig pa rnam pa du ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed cing /_
[\[32a.3\]]dge sbyong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_tshe rabs 'phos nas ji lta bu zhig tu mchi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de
[\[32a.4\]]dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par byas te/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur ba btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spu g.yos nas sangs
[\[32a.5\]]rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di thos nas bdag ni brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de dag gi spyod pa ni
[\[32a.6\]]mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing /_sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de dag ni tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des/_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/_dge slong
[\[32a.7\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing yid mi ches pa dang /_spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ni tshad du ma byed cig ces gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi sde snod kyi mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu dge slong ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub/_don zab mo/_dmigs pa med pa/_don dam pa/_stong pa nyid khong du ma chud par/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
[\[32b.2\]]mdo sde de lta bu'i ngo bo 'di thos nas/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes spong zhing /_skye bo rnams de ltar shes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang chos spangs nas/_dge sbyong du mi 'gyur/_shAkya'i sras por mi 'gyur ba
[\[32b.3\]]'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos spong bar gsungs so/_/skyes bu blun po de ni srid pa na bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams la brlag par 'os pa'i rma chen po 'byin par byed do/_/don ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi dge slong rnams la/_
[\[32b.4\]]gal te sangs rgyas stong phrag gam/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya stong gis cho 'phrul gsum gyis chos ston par byed kyang /_de dag gis chos ma shes shing /_de dag gis 'bras bu thob par mi nus pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag ni lam 'gog
[\[32b.5\]]pa/_dad pa dang bral ba/_zas dang gos lhur len pa/_'jig rten gyi zang zing la brkam pa/_sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro ba yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/_chos dkon mchog 'di spangs nas bde 'grol re bar
[\[32b.6\]]'gyur bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang ngan 'gro la re bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/dmus long du re bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las kyang /_shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de
[\[32b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i [#]sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur [#]ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i gsung rab la sdig pa'i dge slong drug 'di lta ste/_shin tu mthong ba zhes bya ba dang /_rnyed sla dang /_dga' byed dang /_dge byed dang [#]/_grags pa dang /_mes byin zhes bya ba rnams byung ste/_bdag tu smra ba/_gang zag tu smra ba/_
[\[33a.2\]]chad par smra ba/_rtag par smra ba rnams 'grogs ldang [#]zhing phan tshun du yid rton cing gnas pa de dag gis/_khrims 'di lta bu zhig byas te/_bdag cag re res kyang khyim lnga brgya lnga brgya gzung [#]bar bya'o/_/khyim brgya yongs su rdzogs pa na der 'ongs te gcig [#]la gcig bsnyad par bya'o/_/
[\[33a.3\]]khyim nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_brgyar ma grub pa la bsnyad par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i khrims byas nas/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang /_pho brang 'khor du dong nas/_de dag thams cad khyim gcig [#]tu dong
[\[33a.4\]]ngo /_/khyim du dong nas gcig la gcig thog ma nyid du sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa zer ro/_/sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa ji skad ces zer zhe na/_khyim der phyin nas 'di skad ces smras te/_bdag yod do/_/sems can yod do/_/srog yod do/_/gang zag yod do/_/gal te bdag med
[\[33a.5\]]du zin na 'ong ba su/_'gro ba su/_'greng ba su/_'dug pa su/_nyal ba su/_smra ba su/_mi smra bar 'gyur ba su/_sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa su/_len pa su/_za ba [#]su/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba so sor yang dag par myong ba [#]su/_gang khyed la 'di skad du/_bdag med/_sems can
[\[33a.6\]]med/_srog med/_gang zag med ces smra ba de ni khyed kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no zhes zer ba dang /_de la shA ri'i bu bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dag na re gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin pa de ni sdig pa'o/_/de'i
[\[33a.7\]]phyir sdig pa'i grogs por gyur pa de dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no zhes de skad [#]smras pa dang /_de dag gis de dag la/_khyed de ltar shes pa ni mkhas pa yin te/_sdig pa'i grogs po gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no/_/de'i phyir gang khyed la 'di skad du/_bdag med/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]sems can med/_srog med/_gang zag med ces zer ba la brten par mi bya/_'grogs par mi bya/_bsnyen bkur bar mi bya'o zhes smras te/_dge slong de dag re res kyang zla ba phyed kyis khyim lnga brgya lnga brgya log par 'dzin du bcug go/_/shA ri'i bu de nas [#]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[\[33b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan thos [#]dge slong dgra bcom pa dri ma dang nyon mongs pa bsal ba dag grong du dong ste phyin pa dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dag gshe zhing mi snyan pa zer/_tshig ngan pa rtsub
[\[33b.3\]]pos spyo ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad zer ro/_/khyed ni [#]lam la rmongs pa ste/_/chos shes pa ni khyed ma yin/_/khyed ni chos las nyams pas na/_/thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/de ltar dge slong de dag la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gshe zhing mi snyan
[\[33b.4\]]par smras pa dang /_sangs rgyas nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod cing slar [#]tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing /_/chos kun la ni bdag med de/_/rtag med ther zug med do zhes/_/sangs rgyas kyis na [#]chos bshad do/_/gsob dang gsog dang stong pa ste/_/
[\[33b.5\]]'dus byas thams cad snying po med/_/brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can te/_/byis pa rtag tu 'drid pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag med sems can med/_/srog med gang zag med par chos bstan to/_/tshigs su bcad [#]de smras pa/_bdag med gang yin de dag ni/_/sbyin dang za dang
[\[33b.6\]]len pa dang /_/tshor ba rgya cher myong 'gyur dang /_/smra [#]dang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de la sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu gang skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa de dag las/_srog chags drug khri brgya stong de nas shi 'phos nas mnar med pa'i
[\[33b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so/_/de na de dag gi lus gzugs 'di lta ste/_nya lta bu mngon par grub bo/_/mgo ni 'di lta bu [#]'di lta ste/_mi'i lta bur gyur to/_/'di lta bu'i lce mngon par grub pa ni/_'di lta ste/_dper na chang tshong [#]gi re sde chen po lta bu ste/_de dag gi lce de la [#]
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]lcags kyi gshol mang pos rab tu rmos so/_/de dag gi lus re re la yang mdud thung brgya brgyas dmyal to/_/steng gi bar snang las kyang lcags kyi thu lum kun du 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/_'bar ba dang bcas par gyur
[\[34a.2\]]pa/_'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa lus kyi steng du 'bab po/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/glog lce rab tu 'bar ba'i mda'/_/brgya phrag mang po stong rnams ni/_/rtag tu lus la rab 'bar te/_/de [#]dag na tsha myong bar byed/_/thams cad
[\[34a.3\]]lus ni kun du 'bar/_/me lce 'bar ba bsnyen par dka'/_/dpag tshad brgya snyed gang ba yi/_/lus la me lce rab tu 'byung /_/re re [#]dag gi lce la yang /_/de snyed gshol gyis [#]rmo bar byed/_/kun gyi [#]lce ni dral bas na/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i
[\[34a.4\]]grogs po bsten byas pas/_/de dag phyi phyir 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ldan pa rnam [#]spangs pas/_/myur du ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/yang shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa drug po de dag de nas shi 'phos te mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/_
[\[34a.5\]]de dag re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad brgya brgya par mngon par grub par gyur te/_lus re re la yang kha stong stong mngon par grub par gyur to/_/kha re re la yang lce gnyis gnyis chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi tsam yod pa mngon par grub par gyur te/_lce re re la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgya
[\[34a.6\]]mngon par grub par gyur te/_de la [#]lcags kyi thu lum dang /_lcags kyi gshol gyis rmos nas/_de dag gi lce gshegs nas[#]/_a na zhes zer [#]kyang mi nus so/_/de dag re re'i mgo la yang sems can dmyal ba'i srung [#]ma bye ba phrag stong gnas shing ma gul pa [#]gcod par byed
[\[34a.7\]]do/_/de nas de dag gcig gi [#]tshe'i tshad kyang lo bye ba phrag stong du gyur to/_/de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan dag tu tshor ba rnam pa mang po yang myong bar gyur to/_/[#]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi bsngags [#]pa brjod par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]gsungs so/_/[#]byang chub sems dpa' la rma 'byin pa spang ba dang de'i gnyen po dgongs pa [#]bstan pa/_tshangs pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas par bya ste/_bcu po gang dag ce na/_'di lta ste/_legs par smras pa dang
[\[34b.2\]]nyes par smras pa dag la khong khro ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /_legs par thos pa dang nyes par thos pa dag la byams pa'i sems nyid dang /_dus thams cad du snying brtse ba nyid dang /_sems can dman pa dang 'bring [#]dang mchog rnams la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_rim
[\[34b.3\]]gro dang brnyas [#]pa la rab tu mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang /_gzhan gyi [#]nyes pa dang ltung ba thams cad skyon du mi lta ba nyid dang /_theg pa sna tshogs pa [#]la ro gcig pa dang /_ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyi sgra dag la mi skrag pa nyid [#]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad [#]
[\[34b.4\]]la ston pa'i 'du shes dang /_snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la ngo mtshar ba'i 'du shes te/_tshangs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bcu po 'di dag gis [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/[#]byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las kyang /_byams pa byang chub sems
[\[34b.5\]]dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad lnga [#]brgyar 'byor [#]bar bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_'du 'dzi'i gnas dang /_gnas gang na gnas pa na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa [#]pa'i gang
[\[34b.6\]]zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/_gal te de dang lhan cig tu mgu ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyes la/_'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtsod pa med par ldan par gnas pa ni/_des der gnas par bya'i/_gal te de la tha na tha ba dang /_zhe sdang gi sems
[\[34b.7\]]gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed na yang /_de nas dpag tshad lnga [#]brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' la tha ba dang /_zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]can du bsdu bas [#]bsdus pa'i sems can gang [#]ji snyed pa de dag thams cad spyos sam/_brgyad dam/_dbyig pas brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab par gyur na/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' des sems can ji snyed cig la spyos pa
[\[35a.2\]]'am/_brgyad pa'am/_dbyig pas brdegs pa'am/_mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa'am/_smas [#]pa dang nyams pa mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam/_byams pas gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig la gcig spyos sam/_brgyad dam/_
[\[35a.3\]]dbyig pas brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab na yang bsod nams ma lags pa [#]mang du bskyed lags na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub
[\[35a.4\]]sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' tsam la yang tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gnod sems bskyed par mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa
[\[35a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad spyos sam/_brgyad dam/_dbyig pas brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la/_tha na
[\[35a.6\]]tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur ba de tsam du/_byang chub sems dpa' de smas [#]pa dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpas byang chub [#]sems dpa' cig shos de la tha ba dang /_zhe sdang gi sems skyed [#]par byed na/_gal te byang
[\[35a.7\]]chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba zhig yin na/_sems ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na'i bskal par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha bgo bar bya dgos so/_/byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/_lcags ni lcags nyid [#]kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par/_bong
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]ba'am/_shing ngam/_rtswas gcod [#]par mi nus pa de bzhin du/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang /_byang chub sems dpa' cig shos la tha ba dang /_zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis [#]zad par mi 'gyur te[#]/_byams pa de
[\[35b.2\]]lta bas na/_khyed cag gis gcig la gcig zhes dang bcas pa dang /_gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya zhing /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes gsungs so/[ #]
[\[35b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las kyang /_kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi khyed ni ma yin no zhes zer na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du
[\[35b.4\]]sems te/_kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'thab mo dang /_'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'dru ba ste[#]/_'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad
[\[35b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/_de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/_/de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/_/de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo/_/de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan
[\[35b.6\]]yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /_gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa [#]can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/_/
[\[35b.7\]]'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam par [#]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam la brtsams so zhes nas[#]/_dga' zhing spro ba dang /_tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te/_byang chub sems dpa' [#]lung ma
[\[36a.2\]]bstan pas[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/_gal te de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na/_ji tsam [#]du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /_'thab cing rtsod pa dang
[\[36a.3\]]'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/_'on te ma lags kyi bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo bar 'tshal[#]/_bcom ldan
[\[36a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg [#]pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/_kun dga' bo de la gang zag de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub
[\[36a.5\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan par [#]brjod pa dang /_'thab cing [#]rtsod de gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par [#]brjod par byas nas phyir mi 'chags [#]par mdud par 'dzin 'khon du bzung ste [#]gnas na kun dga' bo gang zag de ni nges par 'byung ba rang mi smra ste/_
[\[36a.6\]]gang zag des [#]gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [#]yongs su mi gtang [#]zhe na/_gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing [#]rtsod de gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur na yang mdud par
[\[36a.7\]]mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba [#]nyes par thob ste/_bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang /_bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na de ltar bdag
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlog [#]pa ni mi tshul gyis [#]bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o/_/bdag gis glen pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o/_/bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug [#]pa med par bya'o/_/sems can de dag ni bdag gis [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[36b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na/_de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang /_de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/_bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o/_/bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi
[\[36b.3\]]bya'o snyam na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges par 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de[#]/_de la bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol [#]bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang
[\[36b.4\]]zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/_/de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o/_/'dug par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'dug na [#]yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya/_'khrug [#]par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su
[\[36b.5\]]bya ba dang /_'khrug [#]par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o/_/kun dga'
[\[36b.6\]]bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/_
[\[36b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/_/'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/_/'dis sbyin
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/dad pa'i stobs bskyed [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
[\[37a.2\]]rang rgyal ba rnams la/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshe bar byed/_mi snyan par brjod/_rnyog par byed la/_'gran par byed/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yud tsam zhig [#]kyang gshe bar byed/_mi
[\[37a.3\]]snyan par brjod/_rnyog par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa ches grangs med par [#]skyed par byed de[#]/_'di'i tshad ni brjod par sla ba ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad zla ba gcig [#]dang nyi ma gcig [#]par gyur cing /_de dag kyang rang rgyal bas yongs su gang
[\[37a.4\]]bar gyur la/_rang rgyal ba re re la yang sbyin bdag lha'i gos dang /_zas dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad la sogs pa'i sbyin bdag chen po gzhal du med cing grangs med par gyur to/_/rang rgyal ba de dag gi sbyin bdag de dag thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs par
[\[37a.5\]]gyur pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba gyur la/_de nas gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bas/_rang rgyal ba de dag dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig [#]phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba de dag
[\[37a.6\]]gi bdog pa thams cad 'phrog par byed/_yo byad thams cad rgyun gcad [#]par bya ba'i phyir/_nyi ma dang zla ba snub par byed la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis [#]theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khros par gyur te/_zas gcod par byed[#]/_
[\[37a.7\]]zas gcod du 'jug par byed/_yo byad thams cad rgyun du gcad [#]par bya ba'i phyir/_de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i bde ba dang /_brgya byin gyi bde
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ba dang ldan par gyur cing [#]/_de nas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/_de dag thams cad 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i bde ba las nyams pas [#]ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed [#]do/_/dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyed du 'jug la/_gzhan [#]gang
[\[37b.2\]]zhig khros pas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/_theg pa chen po la lhag par mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gcod par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches [#]sdig pa ches grangs med par rab tu skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad rang rgyal bar gyur cing /_de nas
[\[37b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'ga' zhig gis yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_rang rgyal ba de dag thams cad tshul khrims las nyams par byas nas dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du bskyed du bcug la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo [#]gzhan zhig gis
[\[37b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/_theg pa chen po la mos pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang /_shes rab kyi las gcig la yang slob pa zhig_/gdug pa'i sems dang /_drag shul gyi sems kyis [#]tshangs par spyod pa las nyams par byed na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par
[\[37b.5\]]skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal gal te theg pa chen po la mos pa zhig gis/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams rang rgyal ba la dgod par byed cing /_de la [#]rang rgyal ba de dag la bskal pa [#]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_lha'i gos dang /_zas dang /_mal stan dang /_
[\[37b.6\]]na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad sbyin pa byin par 'gyur [#]la/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba gcig [#]byed du bcug na/_'di ni de
[\[37b.7\]]bas tshes bsod nams [#]grangs med pa bskyed na/_mar me'am/_bdug pa'am/_me tog sbyin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas su bskrun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan la 'god pa lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed de[#]/_de'i tshad ni bskal
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong phrag gis kyang brjod par sla [#]ba ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/[#]nam mkha' can gyi mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu de la chos gang la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du pha rol
[\[38a.2\]]tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa/_snying rje chen po la gnas par 'dod pa sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par [#]byang chub par 'dod pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa/_sems can thams cad
[\[38a.3\]]srid pa'i chu bo las bsgral bar 'dod pa/_bdud bzhi 'dul bar 'dod pa/_phung po'i [#]lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su/_'khor grangs med pa gzung [#]bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_mthar gyis sa'i [#]rim gyis tshangs
[\[38a.4\]]pa'i gnas bzhi la rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shar gyi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du sems can rnams la [#]byams pas khyab par byed pa yin zhe [#]na/_sems can rnams bde bar gyur cig [#]ces
[\[38a.5\]]yid la byed/_bde bar gyur cig ces yang dag par shes/_bde bar gyur cig ces rab tu sbyor/_bde bar gyur cig ces byin gyis rlob [#]par byed do/_/pha'am ma'am [#]ji srid du rang sangs rgyas sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du bde ba nyid du yid la byed pas na/_bde bar
[\[38a.6\]]gyur cig ces byin gyis rlob pa'i bar du byed do/_/gang gi tshe sems can gang yang rung bas 'di la sngar don ma yin pa byas par gyur pa'i dus yod la/_de la 'di'i sems sdang zhing mi dad/_yang dag par mi gnas/_khro ba mi 'dor ro/_/de ltar yin dang las dang po pa'i byang chub
[\[38a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' [#]chen pos 'di ltar rab tu bslab par bya ste/_sems can 'dis sngon don ma yin pa 'di byas mod kyi/_gal te bdag gis 'di la kun nas mnar sems par byed cing /_yid ma rangs par byed na/_de ltar na bdag nyid la [#]don ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]phyogs bcu thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs par mdzad cing /_'di ltar smod par mdzad par 'gyur te/_sems can 'di ni sems can rnams la sdang zhing /_rgyal ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams
[\[38b.2\]]dang thun mong ma yin pa/_bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol bar 'dod pa la ltos/_'di lta ste dper na/_mi grum po rkang pa gnyis dang bral ba 'di nas byang gi gling du 'gro bar 'dod pa'am/_mig nyams pa [#]yi ge bri bar 'dod pa'am/_lag pa nyams pa [#]g.yul sprod par 'dod pa'am/_
[\[38b.3\]]me dang bral ba [#]ri'i rgyal po ri rab sreg par 'dod pa'am/_chu dang bral ba sems can bkru bar 'dod pa de bzhin du skyes bu blun po de yang khro ba'i stobs kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol bar 'dod do/_/gang sems can thams cad la khro ba mi spong ba des [#]ni/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang
[\[38b.4\]]bsgrub [#]par mi nus na/_theg pa chen po lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la smod par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang rgyal ba rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_drang srong lha'i
[\[38b.5\]]mig dang ldan pa rnams dang /_lha rnams kyis kyang [#]smod par byed do/_/bdag spyod pa ngan pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang /_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bdag ni bdag la mthong ba'i chos dang phyi
[\[38b.6\]]ma la don ma yin pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems rab tu spong bar byed do/_/sems can rnams bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed do zhes bya ba nas/_byin gyis rlob par byed do zhes bya ba'i
[\[38b.7\]]bar du byed do/_/gang gi tshe sems can gang yang rung bas sngon don ma [#]yin pa byas shing don ma yin pa byed pa'i dus yod la/_de la sems spang zhing mi dad/_yang dag par mi gnas/_khro ba mi 'dor ro/_/de ltar yin kyang [#]'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu bslab par bya ste zhes bya ba nas/_ji skad sngar bshad pa mnar sems pa rab tu 'dor ro zhes bya ba dang /_ji srid du sems can rnams bde bar gyur cig ces byin gyis rlob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang gi tshe
[\[39a.2\]]sems can gang yang rung bas sngar don ma yin pa [#]byas shing don ma yin pa [#]byed mod kyi/_don ma yin pa [#]byed par 'dod pa'i dus de ni yod pa [#]zhes bya ba dang /_ji srid du gang bdag gi mdza' bo yid du 'ong ba de la sngon don ma yin pa byas so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_ji srid du don ma yin pa
[\[39a.3\]]byed do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_ji srid du don ma yin pa byed par 'dod do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /[# ]ji srid du gang bdag dang mi mdza' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba de'i don byas so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_don byed do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_'di'i don byed par 'dod do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_sems can
[\[39a.4\]]rnams bde bar gyur cig ces yid la byed do/_/bde bar gyur cig ces rab tu shes/_bde bar gyur cig ces rab tu sbyor/_bde bar gyur cig ces byin gyis rlob par byed do/_/pha'am ma'am [#]zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_rang sangs rgyas sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]bde bar gyur cig
[\[39a.5\]]ces byin gyis rlob par byed cing /_de la chags pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_gnas ma yin par yongs su rtogs pas/_sems can gang yang rung ba la sems rab tu sdang zhing ma dad pa/_yang dag par mi gnas/_khro ba mi 'dor ba'i dus yod la/_de ltar
[\[39a.6\]]yin dang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sems can 'dis bdag la don ma yin pa byas so zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gi mi mdza' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_'di la don byed par 'dod do zhes bya ba'i bar
[\[39a.7\]]dang /[# ]gang bdag gis de la rkyen med par mnar sems bskyed par byed/_rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis gnas par byed na/_de lta na ni bdag nyid la bdag nyid don ma yin pa chen po skyed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs par mdzad cing zhes bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na bdag ni bdag nyid la mthong ba'i chos dang phyi ma la don ma yin pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar
[\[39b.2\]]de la [#]las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnar sems pa spong bar byed do/_/de ltar de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems/_'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_spangs [#]pa
[\[39b.3\]]chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa la legs par bsgoms [#]pas phyogs gcig [#]tu mos par byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_'og dang steng du byams pa dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_legs par bsgoms pas mos par byas te rdzogs par byas nas
[\[39b.4\]]gnas kyi [#]chags pa dang ldan pas ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa/_nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba [#]thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/[#]
[\[39b.5\]]rin po che'i [#]phung po'i mdo las kyang /_gang byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la [#]mnar sems pa'i [#]sems bskyed pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mnar sems pa'i sems [#]bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga po las mtshams
[\[39b.6\]]med pa gang yang rung ba zhig byas pa ni bla'i[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' la mnar sems pa'i sems bskyed pa ni ma yin pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ngo /_/gal te byang chub sems
[\[39b.7\]]dpa' sems can rnams la mnar sems pa'i sems bskyed na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na byang chub kyi sems las byang chub sems dpa' byung zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dpas[#]/_byang chub sems dpa' la mnar sems pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya zhing /_byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/[#]snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /_dge slong mkhas pas [#]tshul
[\[40a.2\]]khrims ldan mthong nas/_/g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya/_/zhe sdang tha ba dag kyang rnam spangs te/_/dge slong chos smra rtag tu bsnyen par gyis/_/gnod sems khro ba dag kyang rnam spongs la/_/nga yi sras po chos skyong mchod par gyis/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por long ba dang /_/
[\[40a.3\]]log par ltung zhing sdug bsngal gyur ta re/_/gcig la gcig kyang gnod sems byas na ni/_/de la tshul khrims thos pas skyob mi nus/_/bsam gtan mi skyob dgon [#]gnas skyob mi nus/_/sbyin pas mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pas [#]min/_/zhes gsungs so/_/[#]nges pa dang ma
[\[40a.4\]]nges pa la 'jug pa rtogs pa phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi [#]zas dang gos bcad la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/_
[\[40a.5\]]khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis [#]theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i zan gcig phrogs sam/_zan gcod du bcug na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par [#]bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan
[\[40a.6\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas/_yang dag par bsgrubs [#]pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi rgyud las
[\[40a.7\]]skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes [#]pa'i sems can la/_kham gcig tsam yongs su btang [#]ba yang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]yongs su brtag pa bzung ste [#]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi [#]tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i
[\[40b.2\]]phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po med par byas la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis [#]ni/_sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig blangs pa tsam yang med par byas na/_
[\[40b.3\]]'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
[\[40b.4\]]phung po ni/_rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni/_tha na nyi ma gcig gi bslab pa gcig las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung
[\[40b.5\]]po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad ni/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal
[\[40b.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis [#]khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' la khros te gnod sems
[\[40b.7\]]kyi sems kyis 'di dang phrad par ma gyur cig [#]ces rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do[#]/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]kyi mig phyung la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/_khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa bzung ste nan gyis [#]dper
[\[41a.2\]]byas na/_gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur la/_de nas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_byams pa'i sems kyis mig bskyed la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa
[\[41a.3\]]chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis bltas na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de [#]nyid las kyang 'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis/_
[\[41a.4\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzas med par tshigs su bcad pa gcig
[\[41a.5\]]tsam 'don du bcug na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa bzung ste nan gyis dper byas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
[\[41a.6\]]kyi sems can [#]rnams/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas rnams su skyes [#]par byas la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub kyi sems las [#]mos pa bzlog na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs
[\[41a.7\]]med pa skyed [#]do zhes gsungs so/_/[#]dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can dag la
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi brten pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig la/_'di ni sangs
[\[41b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa yin no snyam nas/_nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston
[\[41b.3\]]pa gzhan la mi brten pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis/_dge
[\[41b.4\]]slong gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag
[\[41b.5\]]la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa [#]bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_dad pas rjes su 'brang [#]ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig [#]byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
[\[41b.6\]]med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dad pas rjes su 'brang [#]ba dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[41b.7\]]du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis/_chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba [#]gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi chos kyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal
