[\[42a.2\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis brgyad pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[42a.3\]]thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brgyad pa la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_'di
[\[42a.4\]]ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang
[\[42a.5\]]ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_lan cig [#]phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal
[\[42a.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig [#]bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_
[\[42a.7\]]'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig [#]zan gcig [#]byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi [#]rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag [#]la nyin gcig [#]bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_dgra bcom
[\[42b.2\]]pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag
[\[42b.3\]]la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod
[\[42b.4\]]nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang [#]sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_
[\[42b.5\]]de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa'am gzugs su byas pa mthong na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed de[#]/_thal mo sbyar ba'am/_me tog
[\[42b.6\]]gam/_bdug pa'am/_spos sam/_mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan
[\[42b.7\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang /_de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul ba bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan [#]gang zhig gis/_tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la/_sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ba yongs su 'dzin te/_tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na yang /_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs
[\[43a.2\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i
[\[43a.3\]]gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/_sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ba yongs su 'dzin te/_tha na nyin gcig za[#]na gcig byin na yang /_
[\[43a.4\]]'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag
[\[43a.5\]]la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan [#]gang zhig gis/_zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/_sangs rgyas
[\[43a.6\]]la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ba yongs su 'dzin te/_tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na yang /_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
[\[43a.7\]]snyed du/_zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]kyi bu mo [#]gang la la [#]zhig gis/_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bskal pa gang
[\[43b.2\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi
[\[43b.3\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang [#]zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/_nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
[\[43b.4\]]gis/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa
[\[43b.5\]]bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/bzlog ste/_bsti stang ma byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang
[\[43b.6\]]de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs
[\[43b.7\]]kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi/_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis [#]'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_de bzhin
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing /_khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems skyed [#]na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam
[\[44a.2\]]dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi [#]mig phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci
[\[44a.3\]]yang rung bas brnyas pa'i sems skyed [#]de/_gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par smra ba dang /_rnyog [#]par byed pa na/_de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa skyed [#]de spyos na[#]/_de
[\[44a.4\]]mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/_de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/_/de'i mgo re re la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/_de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/_lce re re la yang
[\[44a.5\]]gshol lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyig pa dang mtshon gyis bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_rigs
[\[44a.6\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/_byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas[#]/_khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang khros pa'i sems skyed [#]na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
[\[44a.7\]]zhig gis/_sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/_'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re na[#]/_dgra bcom pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcad [#]pa dang /_rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]stegs bus yongs su bskor cing /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan [#]btsugs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bshig [#]pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po
[\[44b.2\]]nyid la sgro btags te/_brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/_rkyen [#]cis kyang rung bas/_khro ba dang /_gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par zer ba dang /_khyad du gsod par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin
[\[44b.3\]]gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spangs pa [#]yin no/_/chos kyang gzhan la/_chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/_byang chub
[\[44b.4\]]sems dpa' nyid chos so/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun nag dag tu [#]btsud pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/_byang chub
[\[44b.5\]]sems dpa' la rgyab kyis [#]phyogs shing 'dug nas/_ma rungs pa 'di ni mi blta'o zhes zer na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed [#]do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams
[\[44b.6\]]cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed [#]do zhes gsungs so/_/[#]zhal ta byed pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la
[\[44b.7\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhal ta ba zhes bgyi ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na zhal ta bar gdags par mdzad pa lags[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dge slong gnyis zhal
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]ta bar ngas gnang ngo /_/gnyis [#]gang zhe na/_gang yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsgom [#]pa'i dgra bcom pa dang /_gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin te/_rgyal po chen po dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta byed pa'i las byed par ngas gnang ngo zhes
[\[45a.2\]]gsungs so/_/[#]'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong ji lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs ngas [#]zhal ta
[\[45a.3\]]bya bar gnang ba'i dge slong gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_dge slong yongs su dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams pha rol du kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton [#]pas/_'dzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang yang zag pa zad pa/_dgra bcom
[\[45a.4\]]par gyur pa ste/_'od srungs dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srungs legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la/_rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba/_sems kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa spong pa'i phyir rnal 'byor
[\[45a.5\]]sna tshogs la gnas pa/_kha cig ni dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/_kha cig ni bsod snyoms pa/_kha cig ni grong 'dab na gnas pa/_kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/_kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/_kha cig ni chos smra ba/_kha cig
[\[45a.6\]]ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa/_kha cig ni ma mo 'dzin pa/_kha cig ni grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste/_sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnams bsrung dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/'od srungs de la dge
[\[45a.7\]]slong [#]zhal ta byed pas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong zhal ta byed pas las su bsgo [#]bar mi bya'o/_/zhal ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa pa de dag bsrung bar bya ste/
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dus ma yin par gsol bar mi bya/_dus ma yin par gtang [#]bar mi bya'o/_/'od srungs gal te dge slong dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi bya bar gtogs pa slob [#]pa'i las res bab na/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa des las bdag nyid kyis bya'o/_/yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos pa [#]
[\[45b.2\]]la las de [#]byed du gzhug ste/_dge slong dgon pa pa la gnod par mi bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo bsha' bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa gang yin pa de dag
[\[45b.3\]]la dge slong zhal ta byed pas [#]mthun pa'i 'tshog chas dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa de sa [#]phyogs gang la gnas pa'i sa phyogs der/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sgra chen po dang skad drag po mi dbyung zhing byed du yang mi gzhug
[\[45b.4\]]go/_/dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor [#]spyod pa de bsrung zhing mal cha yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/kha zas bsod pa dang /_yi gar 'ong ba dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin
[\[45b.5\]]gshegs pa'i bstan pa ston pa'i phyir gnas pa yin te/_de la bdag gis [#]rjes su mthun pa'i yo byad thams cad mang du sbyar bar bya'o snyam du shin tu phangs [#]pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge
[\[45b.6\]]slong zhal ta byed pas lung nos [#]shig_/lhogs shig_/kha ton gyis shig_/kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis/_khyod ji lta ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur/_dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar [#]gyis shig_/'dul ba brjod pas mdzes par gyis
[\[45b.7\]]shig_/bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par btang bar mi bya/_las su bsgo bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong zhal ta byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa de dag
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bsrung bar bya'o/_/'od srungs de la chos smra ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas las su bsgo bar mi [#]bya'o/_/grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu bcug la chos 'chad du
[\[46a.2\]]gzhug go/_/chos nyan pa dag bsgo bar bya'o/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o/_/'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/_/chos smra ba'i dge slong la dge slong gang dag gnod par byed pa'i dge slong de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas
[\[46a.3\]]bzlog par bya'o/_/dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya[#]/_legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa de dag gi gan du dge slong zhal ta byed pa de [#]song la/_ji ltar na
[\[46a.4\]]bdag rma med cing ma nyams pa dang [#]/_ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i chos kyi zhal ta bya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o/_/de nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhal ta byed pa'i bsam pa rig nas de'i bya ba dang /_'byung ba gang yin pa dang /_byed
[\[46a.5\]]pa gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong zhal ta byed pas/_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la phangs par bya ba dang /_dad pa dang gus pa dang /_zhes rab tu bskyed par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas/_dus
[\[46a.6\]]dus su dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul [#]bar bya'i/_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsags shing sba bar mi bya ste/_ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/_ma bskul bar sbyin par bya/_gnod pa med par sbyin par bya'o/_/des 'dun pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'jigs pas
[\[46a.7\]]'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'i[#]/_khyim pa'i phyogs la rton par mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi bya ba la rton par bya'i/_bdag dga' bar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o/_/dngos po gang la yang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'i/_bya ba ji tsam du chung ba
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]yang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin du [#]bya zhing /_rang dgar mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi'am/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi'am/_mchod rten gyi yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag [#]par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[46b.2\]]phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yang [#]dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang [#]bsre bar mi bya'o/_/mchod rten gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa [#]bsre bar mi bya'o/_/gal
[\[46b.3\]]te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la brel phongs su gyur la/_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/_dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus la gros mthun par bgyis [#]te/_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa las/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshug [#]par bya'o/_/gal te de bzhin
[\[46b.4\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ral du gyur la/_dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/_dge slong zhal ta byed pas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad bsdus la/_gros mthun par bgyis te/_'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[46b.5\]]mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/_dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ni che bar gyur na/_gal te tshe dang ldan pa rnams gnod pa med cing dad pa dang ldan la bzod cing gnang na/_bdag gis [#]dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'di
[\[46b.6\]]las dngos po cung zad cig khyer te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bcos par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyis [#]gnang na/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa des de bzhin du bya'o/_/ji ste dge 'dun gyis [#]ma gnang na/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sbyin pa po
[\[46b.7\]]dang /_sbyin bdag la gsol ba thob la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gso bar bya'o/_/'od srungs gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar mang du gyur du zin kyang dge slong [#]zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshug par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]na/_dad cing dang ba mang po dag gis mchod rten la phul ba ni/_tha na ras kyi kha tshar gcig [#]tsam gang yin pa de yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin na/_rin po che'am/_rin po cher smos pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_mchod rten la gos phul
[\[47a.2\]]ba gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_char pas [#]dengs kyang bla'i[#]/_mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyig gam/_dbyig gi rin du bsgyur bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mchod rten gyi ni rin thang du cung zad kyang med la/_mchod rten
[\[47a.3\]]ni cis kyang brel [#]ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pas de ltar yongs su dag par bya ste/_des dkon mchog gsum gyi dang ma 'bags par bya'o/_/bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes par bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs [#]pa'i dngos po rnams
[\[47a.4\]]la bdag gir 'du shes mi bya'o/_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_sbyin gnas rnams la sems khros sam/_dbang byed cing bsgo blag byed na/_de mi dge ba'i las des
[\[47a.5\]]sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'ongs [#]na yang bran dang gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur ba dang /_khu tshur dang /_thal lcag dang /_lag cha bsnyems pas brdegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs gzhan yang gal te dge slong zhal ta byed pa dge
[\[47a.6\]]'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/_rang dgar dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing bsgo ba dang /_chad pas gcod pa dang /_'jigs par byed pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_dus ma yin par brdeg [#]pa dang /_dus ma yin par bsgo [#]bar byed na/_de mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe ba'i sems
[\[47a.7\]]can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/_der skyes nas lus la lcags phur brgya stong zug cing de dag 'bar/_rab tu 'bar la/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba mched cing 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa'i gnas
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]rnams la bsdigs shing /_ngag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa gang yin pa des der skyes nas/_lce'i dbang po'i khyon dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing /_de'i lce'i dbang po de la lcags phur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing /_de dag kyang 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar la/_kun du
[\[47b.2\]]rab tu mched cing 'bar te/_mer 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des bsdigs shing ngag gi las gdug par smra bar gyur [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'dus shing 'dus pa gzhag [#]ste/_dus dus su mi sbyin zhing /_mtho [#]
[\[47b.3\]]btsams la gtses nas sbyin pa dang /_kha cig byin[#]/_kha cig ma byin/_kha cig la byin la[#]/_kha cig la ma byin na/_de [#]mi dge ba'i las nges yi dgas kyi skye gnas rkyag [#]'jim byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de der skyes nas yi dgas gzhan gyi [#]kha zas blangs te/_de la bstan
[\[47b.4\]]na de bstan pa'i tshe mig mi 'dzums par zas de [#]blta zhing bkres pa dang /_skom [#]pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi_/lo brgya stong du yang zas de thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ste brgyal brgya lam na zas de thob kyang /_ngan skyugs dang rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[47b.5\]]'di ltar des [#]tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_sbyin gnas rnams mgu bar ma byas shing /_rang gi rnyed pas chog mi shes par gyur [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi'am/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi'am/_mchod rten
[\[47b.6\]]gyi 'tshol bar byas na/_de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal par bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/_khro ba'am/_gshe ba'am[#]/_gnod par sems shing /_khong khro ba
[\[47b.7\]]skyed na/_de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do/_/'od srungs de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu [#]thos nas/_dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus dang ngag dang /_yid yongs su dag par bya'o/_/bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o/_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]gi sha la za yang bla'i/_dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam/_chos [#]gos sam/_na ba'i gsos sman nam/_yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces
[\[48a.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]lhod pa rnams kyi [#]lhod pa'i chos dang /_'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyi [#]'dzem dog gi [#]chos rnams bka' stsal to zhes gsungs so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[48a.3\]]dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas/_las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing /_shes rab kyis [#]dman par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_
[\[48a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/[# ]byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis [#]chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa/_
[\[48a.5\]]de dag ni/_shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis [#]dman par 'gyur ba yin no/_/byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis [#]khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing /_bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa
[\[48a.6\]]dang /_mang du thos pa yongs su tshol [#]ba med pa de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no/_/byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye [#]ba dang /_ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang /_ye shes kyis mnyam par gzhag [#]pa dang /_
[\[48a.7\]]brtson pas phye ba yin gyis/_khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te/_'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs [#]pa la sbyor ba rnams dang /_'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste/_byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed [#]
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]par mi bya'o/_/byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na [#]des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/_ri mor byas pa ma yin/_bkur stir
[\[48b.2\]]byas pa ma yin gyi[#]/_byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam 'chad pa de ni nga la bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor
[\[48b.3\]]byas/_mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi[#]/_dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta
[\[48b.4\]]byed pa la brtson pas/_byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i sbags pas sbags par byed na/_bsod nams 'dod pa des ni[#]/_bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te/_las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su
[\[48b.5\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi [#]gsum po gang yin pa de dag ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/byams pa de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas/_byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa [#]dang /_kha ton byed pa
[\[48b.6\]]la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o/_/'dzam [#]bu'i gling 'di [#]zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' [#]lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la/_rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/bden
[\[48b.7\]]pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang /_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i zhal ta gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon rnams la snyom [#]las med pa dang /_ltos [#]pa med pas zhal ta byed pa'i bya ba la bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]gang la las tha na legs so zhes bya ba yang re bas zhal ta de mi bya/_de lta bu'i ngo bos zhal ta mi bya ste/_'di ni zhal ta shes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/yongs su 'dzin pa la dgongs [#]pa bstan pa/_ji lta bu zhig gi mdo las kyang /_maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun
[\[49a.2\]]pa dge slong gang la la zhig skyes bu gang zag brgyad kyi zhing la phul ba dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun chen po'i dkor gyis [#]dor ba dang /_rgyal po'i khol po dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_mdun na 'don [#]dang /_blon po dang /_smad 'tshong ma mchog dang /_rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dam pa la
[\[49a.3\]]brten nas/_bsod nams [#]brgya phrag stong la dbang byed pa [#]dang 'dra [#]ba'i las gsar pa [#]rtsom pa chen pos byed pa dang /_thabs log pa de nyid kyis [#]phyis ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba des[#]/_bsod nams ma yin pa ci 'dra ba zhig bskyed par bgyi[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge
[\[49a.4\]]sbyong dor ba/_gdug pa la brten pa srid pa'i khol po/_/'khor ba rgyas par byed pa/_nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dri mas sbags pa[#]/_slob dpon ltar snang bas dbang bskur ba/_byis pa mchil snabs 'phyag cing kha 'phro za ba rnams kyis [#]bskor ba de ni/_rma bya'i 'bag lta bus
[\[49a.5\]]srin bu'i [#]ras kha bsgyur ba'i gos dang /_rams kyis kha bsgyur ba'i sha [#]'gag dang /_bkra ba dang nye bar bkra ba'i lham gyon nas/_bal mchog gi 'bol stan la gnas gnas [#]te/_dge slong des pa [#]la smod cing 'dri/_gshe ba dang /_spyo ba dang sdigs mdzub dag gis gnas nas 'byin par
[\[49a.6\]]byed/_de dag la sngon du 'ong ba dang /_rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba'i las 'dud pa'i phyag gis bka' bsgo zhing /_chu mchog dang zas mchog dang /_mal stan mchog yongs su longs spyod pas/[ #]mtshams med pa dang nye bar 'dra ba'i sdig pa ches shin tu
[\[49a.7\]]sogs [#]par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis [#]bdag gi lus dang /_gos brlag par ma gyur cig snyam nas/_bshang gci [#]ring du spong bar byed la/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sras po zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang /_de lta bu'i gang zag mthong
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]nas/_lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi longs spyod gnyis las ring du byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyud ma lta bur gyur pa [#]rtag par mi dge ba byed pa/_shing dang lteng ka bskams pa dang 'dra ba/_dam pa'i chos kyi ljon shing gi bcud zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims 'joms pa/_lus zangs kyi gos kyis g.yogs
[\[49b.2\]]pa/_lcags kyi gong bu 'bar ba za ba/_bdag nyid kyi khrag khol ma 'thung ba/_mi ma rabs lo ma rul ba lta bu sgra snyan pa nyams pa'i dung gi skad ltar kun du spyod pa/_bdag dang gzhan rnam par 'joms pa ni/_mthar gnas ltar rnal 'byor pas yongs su spong bar byed do/_/maud gal gyi bus
[\[49b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das des bskal pa brgyad cur mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar bya dgos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de de bzhin te/_bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cur bsdams [#]pa bskal pa chen po der dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrogs pa des [#]
[\[49b.4\]]der sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyi zas can du 'gyur zhing /_de'i lus bcu 'gyur dang /_de gzhon sha chags pas mar sar dang ras bal gyi 'da' ba [#]lta bu dang /_tshor ba bcu 'gyur du rnam par chad pa med par gnad thams cad gcod pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur
[\[49b.5\]]ro/_/las byas shing bsags pa de zhig cing bsal ba nyams par gyur pa/_yongs su zad par gyur gyi [#]bar du kun nas 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/_yang dag par rab tu 'bar ba/_rgya skyegs kyi kha dog lta bur 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par [#]'tshed do/_/de nas shi 'phos te [#]sdig pa'i
[\[49b.6\]]bag chags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus/_gung dang /_byi la dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki'i mngal du sdig to can 'tshed par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang sngar [#]sdig pa spyod cing des mun pa nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las
[\[49b.7\]]kyang /_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_nga'i bstan pa 'di dang /_dam pa'i chos sam/_dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par/_chos kyis [#]gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang kun dga' ra ba [#]dang /_zhing dang bran dang /_bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos [#]
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]pa de la/_sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang /_'bras bu gcig dang /_me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na/_de ni mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang /_phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_de la [#]gnod
[\[50a.2\]]pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen por [#]'gro ba yin/_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_rim gro pa dang sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/_nad tshabs chen
[\[50a.3\]]po [#]yun ring ba dag gis [#]thebs par 'gyur ba yin[#]/_de'i chos gos dang /_lhung bzed gang yod pa de yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur ba yin no/_/lnga gang dag gis she [#]na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_me dang chu dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa'i mi mdza' ba dang lnga po [#]de
[\[50a.4\]]dag gis so/_/de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te/_bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/_lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin te[#]/_gal te brgyal res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas/_
[\[50a.5\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas shi 'phos nas/_'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du/_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas kyi rigs su long ba dang /_rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang /_skom pas [#]yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal
[\[50a.6\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/_gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas/_lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sbrul gdug pa/_long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_de brgyal res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas/_gal te mi
[\[50a.7\]]rnams kyi nang du skyes na[#]/_'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu/_mi nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_mong rtul ba dang tshul 'di mi shes par 'gyur ba dang /_mig ma tshang ba dang /_lag pa ma tshang ba dang /_rkang pa ma tshang ba dang /_khyi'i [#]longs spyod kyi kha
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]zas la gdu zhing /_rkyag khung pa'i [#]kha zas la za ba dang /_'dam rdzab dang /_phyag dar khrod na gnas pa dang /_'brog dgon pa dang /_lam po che rnams na 'tsho bar 'gyur la/_de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i 'bras bu
[\[50b.2\]]'dod pa ma yin te/_de ltar lci bar 'byung zhe na/_'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni/_'di ltar chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams la khyim dang zhing dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_bran dang bran mo dang /_phyugs dag gi bar [#]dag phrogs nas/_gang zag rang gi yongs su spyod pa la longs
[\[50b.3\]]spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/_sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni/_de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi [#]tshul med par bya ba dang /_rnam par gzhig pa dang /_rgyun gcad [#]pa dang /_nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/_/de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum
[\[50b.4\]]gyi gdung med par bya ba nas/_nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin la/_chos kyi tshul dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te/_de'i phyir [#]nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu
[\[50b.5\]]rnam par smin pa [#]lci ba mngon par 'grub pa yin no/_/de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srungs kyis [#]mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma thob [#]kyang bla'i/_rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags
[\[50b.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ga ya 'od srungs chen po de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gong du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa [#]dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i/_'di na [#]gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/'on kyang skyes bu
[\[50b.7\]]blun po kha cig mi nyid 'thob par dka' ba rnyed de/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang /_zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]thob nas/_'on kyang skyes bu blun po gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur la/_mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsal nas rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs [#]dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dad pa
[\[51a.2\]]can dag gis [#]khyim dang zhing dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_bran dang bran mo dang rkang bzhi pa dag gi [#]bar dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phug pa dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsngos pa la/_sdig pa spyod
[\[51a.3\]]pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu'am/_khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas/_bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis [#]yongs su spyod par byed de/_skyes bu blun po de'i log par sgrub pa de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/yang
[\[51a.4\]]mdo de nyid las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis [#]spobs pa legs so/_/rgyal po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gang dag rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dag chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams la/_
[\[51a.5\]]khyim gyi gzhi dang /_zhing gi gzhi dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_bran dang bran mo dang /_mal cha dang stan dang /_na ba'i gso [#]sman dang /_yo byad dag de lta de ltar bsngos pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa'i bar bsngos pa yang /_'phrog par byed pa'am/_rku bar byed pa dag 'byung
[\[51a.6\]]bar 'gyur te/_rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de dag thams cad ni mthong ba'i chos la 'byung bar [#]'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu gang dag ce [#]na/_lha rnams kyis [#]yongs su btang ba yin/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu yang de'i mi snyan pa
[\[51a.7\]]grags par 'gyur ba yin/_mdza' bshes dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang de [#]yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i dgra bo dag kyang mang bar 'gyur ba yin/_nor dang nor gyi yo byad dag kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin/_rnam par g.yeng ba [#]mang ba yang yin/_yan
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba yang yin/[# ]de gnyid med par 'gyur ba [#]yin/_rtag tu [#]sred pas gnod par 'gyur ba yang yin/_de'i bza' ba dang btung ba yang dug gi bya ba byed pa yin/_sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral ba 'thob pa yin/_rtag tu gzhan dag dang 'thab mo 'byung ba yin/_
[\[51b.2\]]pha dang ma dang spun dang /_chung ma dang bu dang [#]bu mo dang /_bran dang bran mo dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin mi byed pa yin/_de'i gsang sngags gsang ba dag dang /_nor gsang ba dang /_slas gsang ba dang /_de'i dngos po gsang ba rnams kyang thams cad gsang [#]shor ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_bgo [#]skal la spyod
[\[51b.3\]]pa mi mdza' ba la sogs pa lngas longs spyod dag chud za bar 'gyur ba yin/_nad tshabs chen po dag gis kyang myur du thebs par 'gyur ba yin/_sman dang rim gro ba dag dang 'bral ba yin/_sha dang khrag bskams nas/_sdug bsngal nyams su myongs ba yin/_rang gi bshang gci dag gi nang du 'chi
[\[51b.4\]]ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba yin te/_rgyal po chen po 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu po de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa [#]dang /_nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed cing /_bdag nyid kyang yongs su
[\[51b.5\]]longs [#]spyod par byed pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de der yang tshe bskal par lcags dang zangs bzhun 'thung bar 'gyur zhing /_lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur la/_me'i gos dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod par byed cing /_
[\[51b.6\]]gnod pa mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe bskal pa zad pa nas de nas shi 'phos nas kyang /_'brog dgon pa ro skam dag gi nang du lam du skyes pa'i yi dgas rnams dang skal ba mnyam par/_rkang pa dang lag pa dang /_mig ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur
[\[51b.7\]]ro/_/der yang phyogs bzhi nas langs pa'i rlung kun du tsha ba dag gis kun du gdung bar byed do[#]/_/sa spu gri dang 'dra ba'i steng du bsnyal [#]bar byed/_yongs su bsnyal [#]bar byed de zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi [#]mtshan ma gang dag gis/_dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa/_dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams kyi nang du slan chad kyang gnas pa dang /_longs spyod dang nye bar spyod par [#]bgyi bar mi 'os
[\[52a.2\]]pa 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rnam pa 'di lta bus tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gang gis kyang myur du rnam par shes par mi nus te/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni nang gi dang por sangs rgyas la ma gus pa yin no/_/chos dang
[\[52a.3\]]dge 'dun dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i gnas lta bu [#]rnams la ma gus pa yin/_'phags pa'i rigs btang ba yin/_rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la kun dga' ba ma yin no/_/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par spangs pa yin/_khyim na gnas pa dang 'dres pa yin/_tshig
[\[52a.4\]]'khyal [#]pa smra ba yin/_bdag la bstod pa yin/_gzhan la smod pa yin/_de lta bu dag la kun dga' ba yin/_sdig pa'i rnyi [#]la chags pa yin/_lam ngan par zhugs pa yin/_khengs pa yin/_kha drag pa yin/_'phral g.yar can yin/_'phyar po yin/_kha shing can yin/_g.yo
[\[52a.5\]]sgyu can yin/_sgyu byed pa yin/_dge sbyong g.yon [#]po yin/_dge sbyong g.yon can yin/_dge sbyong snyi long lta bu yin/_dge slong gi dge 'dun mi mthun par 'dod par [#]smra ba yin/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba yin/_'du 'dzi kun la dga' ba yin/_
[\[52a.6\]]sdig pa can gyi dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba de ni ji srid du de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo byung bar [#]ma gyur gyi bar du gang gis kyang mtshan ma de dag gis [#]myur du shes par mi nus so/_/sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gang gi tshe/_khyim gyi gzhi dang /_zhing gi gzhi dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi
[\[52a.7\]]dang /_bran dang bran mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_lug dag gang zag gis srel bar byed na/_de ni de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo byung ba yin te/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo des na sdig pa can gyi dge slong de[#]/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang nas dor
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ba yin/_gnas par bya ba ma yin/_longs spyod par bya ba ma yin/_dge slong gi dngos po las lhung ba yin/_pham par gyur pa yin te/_dge sbyong gi tshul las kyang phyis bslad [#]du med par 'gyur ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po mi gdol pa gnas na gnas par byed pa ni bla'i/_dge slong gdol pa
[\[52b.2\]]yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/_rgyud tshig pa don la mi lta ba/_'jig rten pha rol btang ba[#]/_snying rje'i bsam pa med pa/_phyi sa khung chen po dang 'dra ba/_bdud kyi lam du zhugs pa/_lha dang mi rnams la gnod par byed pa/_dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa rnams la slu bar byed pa/_
[\[52b.3\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung chos kyi mar me med par byed pa/_chos kyi rgya mtsho skems par byed pa/_chos smra ba'i dbyen byed pa/_sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag rnams la 'drid par byed pa dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams la tho 'tsham [#]par byed pa/_dge 'dun mthun par byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed pa ni de
[\[52b.4\]]lta ma yin no/_/sdig pa can gyi dge slong de ni/_yongs su 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyis mtho ris kyi lam las rgyal po ldog par byed pa yin no/_/rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo ldog par byed pa yin no/_/ngan song
[\[52b.5\]]gi lam gsum la rab tu gzhog par byed pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po sdig pa can gyi dge slong de yongs su 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyi rgyu mtshan gyis [#]lha dang mi ji snyed cig mi skyed par byed pa la ltos/_rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/_yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge slong dang dge slong chos kyis
[\[52b.6\]]gnas pa yon tan gyis [#]phyug pa dag dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba gcig dang /_gtsug lag khang gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o/_/gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de kha drag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa rnam par spangs te/_dge slong de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed na/_de'i phyir dge
[\[52b.7\]]slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis [#]byams pa dang ldan zhing chos dang mthun [#]pas dran par byas te/_gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gnas de nas 'gro ba lta na ni legs/_gal te 'gro bar mi byed na ni/_der dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa de dag dong la/_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]dang ljongs dang ri 'or [#]de dag na/_rgyal rigs sam/_bram ze'am/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o/_/gal te rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs
[\[53a.2\]]su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/_gnas de nas zlog [#]par byed na/_der ni dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa de dag gnas par bya'o/_/ji ste rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs de dag bza' ba dang btung ba dang rnyed pa'i rgyus/_sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa
[\[53a.3\]]dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na/_de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa de dag gis khro ba bstan par mi bya'o/_/chags pa ma yin/_nga rgyal ma yin te/_'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar bya zhing /_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_nags khrod dam/_ri'am/_ri 'or [#]gzhan gang
[\[53a.4\]]na sgra gcom [#]chung ba dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang mthun pa der gnas par bya'o/_/yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma dag phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_rnyed pa'i
[\[53a.5\]]slad du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing /_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis [#]phyug pa rnams kyang gnas nas mchi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs de dag ni nyams pa lags so/_/
[\[53a.6\]]btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu nyams pa lags so/_/de mi nyid rnyed pa ni rnyed par dka' lags te/_'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa de mi nyid rnyed pa'i tha ma ni de lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis
[\[53a.7\]]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas kyang /_gang dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams kyi tshig gus par mi nyan pa'i sems can de ni ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba'am/_mtho ris su gzhag [#]par mi spyod de/_de ni sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]ldan par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_la lar gang dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams la shin tu dad pa'i rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi don
[\[53b.2\]]du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang dang /_dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas/_zhing gi gzhi dang /_bran dang bran mo dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su gtong [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus
[\[53b.3\]]byas nas kyang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad [#]par
[\[53b.4\]]'gyur ba nas/_ring po mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du 'gyur te/_de dag ni nga'i bstan pa la dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no/_/rgyal
[\[53b.5\]]po chen po 'di lta ste/_gang khyod kyi bu'am spun nam/_bkrabs pa'am/_sna chen po la gtogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig nyes pa dang bcas pa yin na/_gang dang gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam/_dga' ston 'byung ba der/_rgyal po chen po [#]dga' ba dang /_bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs
[\[53b.6\]]nyams su myong bar byed na/_rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de khyod kyi mdun du 'dug cing /_skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa'am/_dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis [#]gnas par byed nus sam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags te/_
[\[53b.7\]]skyes bu de bdag gi mdun na mchis par yang rngo mi thogs lags na/_skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po [#]de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir [#]bran dang bran mo srel bar byed cing /_khyim gyi gzhi'am/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]zhing gi gzhi nas/_lug dag gi bar srel bar byed na/_nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la/_de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gnod par byed pa dang bcas pa yin te/_de ni chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams
[\[54a.2\]]kyi gnas de ltar bsngos pa dag tu/_chos dang mthun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no/_/rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i don byed pa dang /_de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal rigs
[\[54a.3\]]nas/_dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang gnod pa [#]byed pa dang bcas pa chen po yin no/_/sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi
[\[54a.4\]]nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/_bdag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas/_sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni lha dang mi thams cad la yang gnod pa dang /_phan pa
[\[54a.5\]]ma yin pa dang /_log par lhung [#]bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs sam/_bram ze'am/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs gang zhig dge slong chos kyis [#]gnas pa rnams
[\[54a.6\]]kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing /_sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na/_de sbyin pa ma byin [#]du zin kyang /_'on kyang de ni chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no/_/de ni
[\[54a.7\]]dam pa'i chos rjes su bsrung bar bya [#]ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta'o[#]/_/'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/_ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/_rgyal rigs 'tsham pa khyed kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang /_bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyis/_lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis [#]nga'i chos kyis gnas pa yang dag par zung shig dang /_de'i rkyen gyis nga'i
[\[54b.2\]]chos kyi tshul 'di dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_yang mdo sde de nyid las/_de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i [#]bu pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag sug
[\[54b.3\]]las gang gis [#]klu'i rigs su skyes nas/_gzugs mchog tu lham [#]me zhing lus kyi reg pa gang cung zad ci reg kyang kun du tshig cing 'bar ba lags/_bdag dus thams cad du mchil [#]lham bor nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/_bdag gi pha de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad
[\[54b.4\]]par du 'phags pa myong ste/_dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye lag [#]'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig 'das pa de'i [#]tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/_sangs
[\[54b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po me tog bral des kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang
[\[54b.6\]]po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la/_zla ba gsum yo byad thams cad phul nas/_rtag tu chos mnyan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so/_/rgyal po me tog
[\[54b.7\]]bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba [#]zhig yod de[#]/_de shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang /_de nas gang
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]dag bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha la longs spyod par byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nas dong ngo /_/de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag
[\[55a.2\]]nyid kyis kyang longs spyad par mi byed/_gzhan la yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas bcos
[\[55a.3\]]so/_/de nas shi 'phos nas yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_yi dgas rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcas zhes [#]bya ba rab
[\[55a.4\]]tu byung ste/_de nas shi 'phos nas de ltar yun ring por ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba [#]de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na gzhan yin par yang blta [#]bar mi bya ste/_de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos [#]zin pa yang khyod yin no/_/'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan
[\[55a.5\]]song gsum gyi nang du skyes so/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo /_/gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas
[\[55a.6\]]rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang /_myos pa ji lta bu
[\[55a.7\]]dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du [#]nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so/_/nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so/_/[#]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsam pas sdom pa gzung [#]bar bgyi'o/_/bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/_ji srid
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa [#]spang bar bgyi lags so/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongs
[\[55b.2\]]su zad do/_/'di [#]nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyis [#]byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te/_byams pa'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis [#]gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du
[\[55b.3\]]yo byad thams cad kyis [#]rim gro byas pa dang /_de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na de gzhan du yin par [#]mi blta ste/_de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no/_/'di ni bskal
[\[55b.4\]]pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes so/_/lha'i dpal dang skal [#]ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo /_/'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis [#]'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_'dir dpal dang skal ba bzang po de lta bu myong ngo /_/de skad
[\[55b.5\]]ces thos nas klu thams cad skyo zhing mchog tu yid mi dga' nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtogs pas gces par byed par gyur to zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spu gri rnon po dag gis su/_/rang
[\[55b.6\]]gi yan lag gtubs [#]pa bla'i/_/bsngos zin pa yi dngos po ni/_/khyim pa rnams la sbyin mi bya/_/me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/_/lcags kyi thu lum zos pa bla'i/_/dge 'dun dag las gar de ni/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]la longs mi spyad/_/lhun po dang mi 'dra ba'i me/_/blang bar byas te zos pa
[\[55b.7\]]bla'i/_/khyim par gyur pas [#]dge 'dun gyi/_/longs spyad par ni mi bya'o/_/thams cad 'byung bar byas pa dang /_/gsal shing steng du bteg pa bla'i/_/khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun gyi/_/longs spyad par ni mi bya'o/_/me ma dag gis ni gang ba yi/_/gnas khang der ni zhugs pa
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bla'i/_/khyim pas dge 'dun gnas khang du/_/mtshan mo gnas par mi bya'o/_/me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/_/lcags kyi thu lum blangs pa bla'i/_/rab tu byung bas khyim pa yi/_/dbyig ni blang bar [#]mi bya'o/_/'khor lo rnon pos bdag gi [#]lus/_/kun du gtub [#]par
[\[56a.2\]]byas pa bla'i/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams la/_/rgyags dang gshe ba bskyed mi bya/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyis/_/mig ni rang gis phyung ba [#]bla'i/_/sems can du ni bgrangs pa la/_/khros pas skye dgu mi mngag go/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyis[#]/_/
[\[56a.3\]]me yi gos ni gon pa bla'i/_/tshul 'chos pa dang mthu yis su/_/khyim pa las ni gos mi blang [#]/_/me 'dra bar ni bskol ba yi[#]/_/rtsub 'gyur chu ni 'thungs pa bla'i/_/rab tu byung bas [#]g.yo sgyu yis/_/bza' btung blang bar mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/[#]nam mkha'i spyan [#]gyi mdo las kyang /_
[\[56a.4\]]yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po dang /_yi dgas kyi dbang po dang /_sha za'i dbang po dang /_sa la
[\[56a.5\]]rgyu ba dang nam mkha' la rgyu ba [#]khyed rnams kyi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ngas yongs su gtad par bya'o/_/da lta [#]dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang zag don yid la byed pa/_chos la gnas pa/_chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa/_chos dang mthun pa'i chos spyod pa/_dben pa la mngon
[\[56a.6\]]par dga' ba rnams srungs shig_/yongs su skyongs shig_/de'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag kyang srungs shig_/yongs su skyongs shig_/gang dag de rnams kyi yo byad 'dzin pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba de dag kyang srungs shig_/yongs su skyongs shig_/de ni khyed cag la yun ring por
[\[56a.7\]]phan pa dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po de snyad thams cad nas/_sha za'i dbang po dang /_nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang sa la rgyu ba'i par thams cad kyis [#]mgrin gcig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]pa de ltar lags so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pas [#]byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar ba de srid du [#]kho bo cag gis [#]rang gi sug las dor nas de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang [#]bar bgyi'o/_/chos
[\[56b.2\]]pa gnas pa [#]tshul khrims kyis [#]phyug pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_dben pa la mngon par dga' ba/_chos kyi rjes su mthun par chos la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams chos gos dang /_zas dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams
[\[56b.3\]]kyis [#]bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang [#]bar bgyi'o/_/nad med pa dang stobs dang bde ba la reg par [#]gnas pa nyid kyis/_dge ba'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa nyid bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ji srid du de dag sangs rgyas kyis [#]bcas pa'i bslab pa la yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa brtson
[\[56b.4\]]'grus brtsams pa/_rab tu rnam par dben pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas shing /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_khyim dang zhing dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_grags pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su
[\[56b.5\]]bcad pa mchog dang /_tshul 'chos dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong [#]rnams dang thams cad du [#]ma 'dres par gnas pa de srid du/_kho bo cag gis gnod sbyin gdug pa nas/_lus srul po gdug pa'i bar du bzlog [#]par bgyi'o/_/bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bstan pa'i bstan pa la de
[\[56b.6\]]dag dad pa bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji srid du de dag zla ba dang nyi ma dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang /_lo dang dus tshigs yang dag par 'da' ba de srid du/_kho bo cag gis 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang g.yul ngo dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang mu ge dang g.yo dang slu ba dang brdzun du smra
[\[56b.7\]]ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char 'bab pa dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo ji snyed pa'i bar rnams mi dge ba'i chos rnams las bzlog par bgyi'o/_/
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o[#]/_/gang zag chos la gnas pa sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par bsdams [#]pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan gyis phyug [#]pa rnams kyis [#]spyad pa'i spyod pa la gzud par bgyi'o/_/ji srid du bcom ldan 'das
[\[57a.2\]]kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing chos kyi 'du shes kyis mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba de srid du/_bdag cag gis grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ri sul dang yul 'khor dang ljongs de dag dang /_sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang
[\[57a.3\]]bar bgyi'o/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_phan tshun du rab tu dga' bas tshogs pa dang /_tshe ring ba nyid ma tshang ba med par bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad mi 'dzin cing /_chos la gnas
[\[57a.4\]]pa chos kyi rjes su mthun pas [#]chos bsgrub par gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du 'di na yun ring por sa'i bcud dang sems can gyi gzi mdangs dang /_chos kyi gzi mdangs mi nub par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du yun ring por lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang mi'i 'jig rten na
[\[57a.5\]]mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de srid du yun ring por sems can rnams tshe'i dus byas nas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_de srid du yun ring por lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa [#]rnams kyis yongs
[\[57a.6\]]su gang bar 'gyur/_de srid du yun ring por chos la gnas pa'i byang chub [#]sems dpa' rnams gnas par 'gyur/_de srid du 'di ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag cag stobs dang brtson 'grus [#]dang pha rol gnon pas gnas par 'gyur/_de srid du yun ring por bdag
[\[57a.7\]]cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa'i sems can rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir nus par 'gyur/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir 'dir [#]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas par 'gyur bas/_rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang /
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]chos la gnas pa dang /_dgon pa dang /_nags khrod na gnas pa dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal spong bar 'gyur/_phrag dog gi ngang tshul can dang bsags pa mang bas gnas par 'gyur/_bslab pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spong bar 'gyur/_khyim na gnas pa dang 'dre [#]ba dang /_rnyed pa
[\[57b.2\]]dang bkur sti la dga' bar 'gyur/_de dag khyim pa'i stobs dang nor gyi phung po'i stobs kyis [#]phan tshun 'dzoms par byed/_'thab pa la dga' zhing khyim pa'i mdun du rtsod par [#]byed/_brdzun dang [#]tshig rtsub mo smra ba [#]mi srung bas/_khyim pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa theg pa chen po la dad pa skyed
[\[57b.3\]]par mi 'gyur/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_rgyal rigs khyed cag thams cad kyi lag tu nyan thos kyi bslab
[\[57b.4\]]pa khrims su bca' ba gtad par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la gang zag lam ngan pa gdul dka' ba ngo tsha ba dang khrel spangs pa spyod pa legs par ma byas pa rnams gnas par 'gyur/_gang dag gnyen bshes kyi stobs sam khyim pa'i stobs sam/_
[\[57b.5\]]mang du thos pa'i stobs sam/_'khor gyi stobs kyis bslab [#]pa dag la smas [#]par spyod cing /_khyim pa'i rtags dang khyim pa'i longs spyod dag la lta bar byed/_yongs su 'dzin pa yang len par byed/_dge slong nyung bar gnas pa rnams kyis [#]myur bar dge 'dun gyi nang nas dbyung ba dang /_ji ltar
[\[57b.6\]]bslab pa bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcad par mi nus pa de'i phyir bslab pa bca' ba'i bya ba rgyal rigs rnams kyi lag tu gtad par bya'o/_/rgyal rigs de dag de lta bu'i ngo bo'i gang zag rnams la ji ltar bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcod du 'jug par byed do/_/rgyal rigs gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs
[\[57b.7\]]pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar du de ltar brtson pa dang pha rol gnon pas nga'i bstan pa srung bar byed/_yongs su skyong [#]bar byed/_chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs de dag ni/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad [#]par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/sangs
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]rgyas kyi bstan pa yongs su skyong ba'i lha rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur/_yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs de dag yun ring por rgyal po nyid byed par 'gyur/_gang las bskal pa brgyar byang chub kyi phyir spyod par 'gyur ba bsod nams ches mang po bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[58a.2\]]yang gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_nga'i bstan pa la btang snyoms par gnas par 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs de dag ni/_lha thams cad kyis yongs su spong bar 'gyur/_nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis [#]spong bar 'gyur/_gang nga'i bstan pa la btang snyoms pa'i rgyal rigs de ni
[\[58a.3\]]'jig rten pha rol tu lha dang mir skye bar mi 'gyur/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rnam par bcad [#]pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/_chos kyis sgron ma yongs su bsnub pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/_chos kyi bcud bskam [#]pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig dbyung ba'i phyir
[\[58a.4\]]zhugs pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang zag gang sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed pa des/_bsod nams ma yin pa ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma blags te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom
[\[58a.5\]]ldan 'das mang lags so/_/gang zag des bsod nams ma yin pa gzhal du med grangs med pa rab tu bskyed pa [#]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal rigs gang zhig da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag gi bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
[\[58a.6\]]brlabs pa 'bar gyi bar du/_chos la gnas pa'i gang zag bsrung bar mi 'gyur/_gang zag lam [#]ngan pa pa rnams [#]chos ji lta ba bzhin du slob par mi byed pa'i rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du bskyed do/_/gang rgyal rigs de sngon bskal pa brgyar sbyin pa btang bar
[\[58a.7\]]gyur/_tshul khrims bsrungs pa nas shes rab bsgoms [#]pa'i bar du gyur pa dang /_theg pa gsum po gang yang rung ba'i theg pas yang dag par rab tu gnas par gyur pa de/_dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang rab tu brlag pa'i rgyus/_de'i sngon bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad yongs su zad
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i yul du chos ma yin pa gsum po mu ge dang 'thab mo dang g.yul 'gyed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lhas btang snyoms su byed/_lha rnams kyis [#]'dor/_de'i yul du bka' lung mi 'jug go[#]/_/de'i yul du g.yo dang slu ba dang brdzun smra ba sna
[\[58b.2\]]tshogs [#]'byung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis [#]chos kyi phung po 'phrog par 'gyur/_mes 'tshig [#]pa'am chus 'khyer bar 'gyur/_rgyal rigs de yun ring por mi thogs par nad mi bzad pas thebs par 'gyur/_myur du mdza' bo dang yid [#]du 'ong ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur/_
[\[58b.3\]]che'i [#]dus byas nas sems can [#]dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te brgya [#]lam na shin tu yun ring po nas yun ring po [#]zhig na mi nyid du skyes pa na[#]/_myur du mig nyams par 'gyur/_nye bar longs spyod pa dang /_yongs su longs spyod pa thams cad dang bral [#]zhing /_ljan ljin na gnas
[\[58b.4\]]par 'gyur/_yun ring por 'tsho zhing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_des sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_gnas ma yin pa yongs su rtog [#]par byed par 'gyur/_de sangs rgyas 'byung ba med par mi'i thob pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs ji lta ba [#]de bzhin du bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs
[\[58b.5\]]dang /_dmangs rigs la sogs pa grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams la yang 'gyur ro/_/yul gyi gtso bo dang /_grong gi gtso bo dang /_ri brags ba'i gtso bo dang /_grong rdal gyi gtso bo rnams la yang 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bag med pa'i rgyu'am/_nor gyi rgyus nga'i bstan pa la chos la gnas pa'i
[\[58b.6\]]gang zag rnams ci nus par mi srung zhing /_gang zag las [#]ngan pa pa ji lta bu'i chos kyis [#]mi 'dzin pa thams cad ni/_de lta bu'i ngo bo'i las kyi sgrib pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus
[\[58b.7\]]na/_rgyal rigs rnams kyis [#]mi'i thob pa ni rnyed par [#]dka'o/_/gang dag kun nas bag med pas mang du gnas shing /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan gyis phyug [#]pa chos la gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang rim gro [#]byed la/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir dang /_dkon
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir/_gang zag lam ngan pa pa ngo tsha ba dang khrel spangs pa chos kyis tshar gcod par mi byed pa de ni/_shin tu brlag pa dang /_rtag tu ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang /_bsam
[\[59a.2\]]gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/_/rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson/_/gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed/_/de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba/_/nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla'i[#]/_/bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/_/dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes mthun pa/_/
[\[59a.3\]]gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/_/gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/_/chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson pa/_/dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/_/de dag gnas ni sdud par mi byed do/_/'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste/_/'di ni nga dang lhan cig gnas pa [#]yin/_/_
[\[59a.4\]]'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin/_/khyed kyi [#]gnas 'di gang yang med kyis so[#]/_/'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/_/mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/_/'di ni rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/_/'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song /_/de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/_/nam
[\[59a.5\]]du [#]srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te[#]/_/de dag khyim pa lta bur sogs 'gyur zhing /_/'tshog chas [#]rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba
[\[59a.6\]]rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/_'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/_yul la rgyab kyis [#]phyogs pa rnams yin/_yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_yul gyi nyes pas mi gos pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[59a.7\]]tshul khrims bcas [#]pa la rim gro byed cing brtson pa shin tu bslabs [#]pa rnams yin/_gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha ngan ngon dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/_lhung bzed dang chos gos dang yo byad sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_rtag par
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams la skyo ba rnams yin/_dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no zhes gsungs so/_/mya ngan
[\[59b.2\]]las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang [#]dper na/_zhing ngam khyim du dug shing ngam/_snyi long skyes na/_rtsad [#]nas dbyung dgos pa de bzhin du/_tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar gcad [#]par ngas
[\[59b.3\]]gnang ngo /_/gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par mi byed pa de dag ni/_nga'i bstan pa las shin tu ring pa yin no/_/gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par byed pa de dag ni/_nga'i slob ma dang nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol ba/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[59b.4\]]de skad gsungs na ni/_sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa'ang ma lags/_ste'u dang tsan+dan lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang brlag par 'gyur na/_dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams ji ltar tshar gcad pa'i rigs lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas [#]de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i
[\[59b.5\]]mi rigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa[#]/_dper na khyim bdag gam/_tshong dpon nam/_ded dpon nam/_blon po'am[#]/_rgyal po yang rung ba zhig gis rang gi bu sdug cing phangs la/_mchog tu mdzes shing byad gzugs phun
[\[59b.6\]]sum tshogs pa rnams/_slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad nas/_slob dpon de la 'di skad ces smras te/_bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dul ba dang cho ga dang spyod yul dang /_rig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyis/_'di rnams khyod kyis [#]'dul ba dang /_cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_rig [#]pa
[\[59b.7\]]rnams slobs shig_/chos shig_/gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las gsum ni brdeg pa dang bsdigs pa dang /_tshar gcad [#]pa rnams kyis shi bar gyur la/_gcig ni gson por 'dug ste/_gcig lobs par gyur na/_gsum shi yang bla ste/_gsum ni shi gcig ni [#]lobs pa de la ci slob
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]dpon gyis [#]sdig pa'i las byas zhes bya'am/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te[#]/_de la ni gnyi ga la yang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de la ni khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te/_de ltar bgyis na bsod nams mang du 'phel
[\[60a.2\]]bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs te/_bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod pa bzhin du/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_
[\[60a.3\]]dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g.yel ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na/_ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya'am[#]/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_rgyal po dang /_
[\[60a.4\]]blon po dang /_dge bsnyen rnams la yang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa mi mnga' bar [#]lta la gos par ga la 'gyur/_de dag nyid kyi yon tan dang spyod pa bsrung ba'i slad du mi 'dod bzhin du tshar gcod par bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[60a.5\]]pa/_de ltar na bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom [#]pa yin te/_gang dag de ltar sgom [#]pa de dag gis [#]ni bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom [#]par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom [#]par bya'o/_/de ltar byas
[\[60a.6\]]nas sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin sgom pa bsgom [#]par 'gyur ro/_/de nas [#]mchog tu 'tshe ba med pa dag par 'gyur te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring ba dang /_mchog tu tshe [#]ring ba dang /_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_
[\[60a.7\]]sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta los kyang med do[#]/_/'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]'das dper gsol na/_gtam rgyud mkhan zhig gis ltad mo ba'i 'khor gyi nang du/_ma la phu [#]dud bya ba'i rigs pa'i gtam sna tshogs bgyis la/_rang gi khyim du mchis nas/_mchog tu dga' ba bgyid bgyid pa'i ma la/_dbyug pa dang /_phag dum dang /_bong ba dang /_rdo dag gis [#]gnod pa
[\[60b.2\]]bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms [#]na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring ba dang /_mchog tu tshe ring ba dang /_tshe rabs dran pa dang /_mi 'chi ba dang /_ther zug pa dang /_
[\[60b.3\]]brtan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid [#]sku tshe thung lags ci slu ba mdzad dam/_'on te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du [#]gzigs sam/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dka' [#]ba mdzad mdzad
[\[60b.4\]]do/_/mi'i ltar brtsi na lo brgya yang mi thub ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba lags [#]na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe/_re [#]snyed kyi srog cig bcad lags/_'di kho na ltar tshe thung ba las/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mchog
[\[60b.5\]]tu mi bzad pa'i las mdzad lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_'di kho na ltar ma brgyad shig ma brgyad [#]shig/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
[\[60b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu brtan pa'o/_/mchog tu zhi pa'o/_mchog tu ther zug pa'o/_/mchog tu rtag pa'o/_/'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas
[\[60b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/_dper na chu klung gang gA dang /_ya mu na dang /_sa ra yu dang /_hing ku la sogs pa chu klung chen po rnams dang /_chu
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho chen po kho na'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du/_'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa lha yul dang sa'i steng gi tshe'i chu klung yod do cog thams cad ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i [#]rgya mtsho kho nar 'bab pa ste/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[61a.2\]]mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo [#]de nyid las/_rdo rje lta bur mi shigs pa'i sku 'di ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur lags/_sku 'di lta bu rgyu cis 'grub lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga'i sku 'di lta bu ni dam pa'i chos bsrungs pa'i bsod nams kyi
[\[61a.3\]]rgyus 'grub pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i [#]dge bsnyen gyis ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blang bar mi bya'o/_/dge bsnyen gyi 'dul ba yang spyad par mi bya'o/_/tshul khrims dang /_cho ga dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/_mda' gzhu dang /_
[\[61a.4\]]ral gri dang /_mdung thung kha leb lag tu thogs par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_dge slong dag las srung [#]ma dang lhan cig mi 'khod par gcig pu shing drung du stan bting ba la mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni dge slong zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/srung [#]ma dang lhan cig 'khod pa gang lags pa de
[\[61a.5\]]dag ni khyim bdag mgo reg ces bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyim bdag mgo reg ces de skad ma zer cig_/'di ni dge slong la la mal stan sar pa la 'dug cing de zan zos nas gcig pu phyogs gcig na mi smra bar 'dug ste/_bsam gtan
[\[61a.6\]]byed la lus kyi rang bzhin la yang lta bar byed do/_/sems can 'ongs pa rnams la [#]sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_bsod nams kyi gtam dang /_bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i gtam dang /_chog shes pa dang /_smyung ba'i chos la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mi byed[#]/_
[\[61a.7\]]seng ge lta bu'i 'khor yang mi 'chang /_rtags can 'chal ba tshar bcad pa'i phyir yang ston par mi byed pa'i dge slong de ni skye bo thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yang ma yin/_bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yang ma yin te/_nyon mongs pa zhan pa yin pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]spyod pa tsam du yang zad do/_/dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos can gzhan zhig gnas gzhan zhig na mal stan sar pa la 'dug [#]cing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsung rab yan lag dgu/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad [#]
