[\[61b.2\]]pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan [#]pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde rnams ston te/_mdo sde 'a[#]di la dge slong bran dang bran mo dang /_ba lang dang ma he la
[\[61b.3\]]sogs pa rdzas ngan pa 'chang ba rnams chad pas bcad par [#]bshad pa ni/_bdag cag gi rkyen du 'tsham [#]pa yin te/_mdo che ge mo zhig las kyang rab tu byung ba/_rdzas ngan 'chang ba rnams/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]rgyal po che ge mo zhig la chad pas gcod du bcug ste/_tshul khrims 'chal pa [#]
[\[61b.4\]]rnams ni gos skye bo gyon du bcug go zhes ston cing /_de de [#]ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa la/_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyis dkrugs pa [#]ma byas te/_srog bcad du [#]zin kyang dge slong de la ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhes nga zer ro/_/
[\[61b.5\]]rgyu des na rgyal po dang blon po dang /_dge bsnyen rnams la dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir/_ngas dge slong rnams bsrung bar yang gnang khyim bdag mgo reg rnams chad pas gcod du yang gnang ngo /_/de la tshul khrims 'chal pa gang yin pa de dag ni khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya ste/_
[\[61b.6\]]de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i snga rol du grong khyer ku shI 'di [#]nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' skyed ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i
[\[61b.7\]]tshe 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bde ba can bzhin du yangs par gyur te/_de'i tshe sems can dag bde ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhin du/_bru bas nyam chung ba med do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de lo bye ba phrag du ma bzhugs bzhugs [#]nas grong khyer 'di nyid dang /_gnas 'di nyid
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]du mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas de'i bstan pa lo bye ba phrag du ma'i bar du gnas nas/_gang gi tshe bstan pa gnas pa de'i lhag ma lo bzhi bcu lus pa de'i tshe dam pa'i chos nub tu cha ba'i dus na/_dge slong sangs rgyas byin zhes bya ba g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa/_seng ge'i
[\[62a.2\]]sgra sgrogs pa/_gsung rab yan lag dgu'i chos ston pa zhig byung ste/_de bran dang bran mo dang /_ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa [#]rdzas ngan pa 'chang ba log pa'i chos ston pa/_tshul khrims 'chal pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis thos nas bsad [#]pa'i sems skyed de/_tshul khrims
[\[62a.3\]]'chal ba'i phyogs rnams gcig tu bsdongs nas/_mtshon cha sna tshogs lag na thogs te/_dge slong de'i thad du dong ngo /_/nga yang [#]de'i tshe rgyal po [#]srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur te/_rgyal po des gtam de thos nas/_dam pa'i chos bsrung [#]ba'i phyir/_dge slong de'i thad du song ste/_
[\[62a.4\]]de dag dang g.yul bkye'o/_/de nas chos smra ba de de dag gis ma tshugs so/_/rgyal po de ni ral gri dang /_mdung thung kha leb dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mda' rnams kyis [#]lus la ma gtsags [#]pa'i sa mtshams yungs 'bru tsam yang med par gyur to[#]/_/de nas dge slong
[\[62a.5\]]des rgyal po de de ltar gyur pa mthong nas/_legs so zhes smras te/_dam pa'i chos bsrung bas de ni de ltar bya dgos so/_/khyod ni chos dpag tu med pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes byas [#]so/_/de nas rgyal po des dge slong de'i tshig thos nas shi ba'i [#]'og tu de bzhin gshegs
[\[62a.6\]]pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes so/_/der sems can gang rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa rnams dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub thob par gyur to[#]/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon
[\[62a.7\]]par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo /_/dge slong sangs rgyas byin yang rgyal po de shi ba'i rjes la shi nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bstan pa la/_nyan thos kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]rgyal po de yang nyan thos gnyis par gyur to/_/de ltar na dam pa'i chos nub pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos dbyung bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal por gyur pa de ni nga yin no/_/dge slong de ni sangs rgyas 'od srungs yin te/_de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de ltar na dam pa'i chos bsrungs pa'i 'bras
[\[62b.2\]]bu ni dpag tu med de/_'bras bu rnam par dag pa des na/_nga yang rma bya mdongs ri mo can mang pos brgyan pa lta bur gyur te/_mi shigs pa'i sku dang /_chos kyi sku brnyes par gyur to/_/'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig [#]pas gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdol la brkos pa'i yi ge
[\[62b.3\]]bzhin du rtag pa'i sku dang ldan lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bas na/_dam pa'i chos bsrung bar 'dod pas ni/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang na yod pa der bsrung bar bya'o/_/dge bsnyen dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i 'bras bu ni rgya
[\[62b.4\]]che'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na dge slong rnams mtshon cha lag na thogs pa'i dge bsnyen dag gis mdun du bdar te rgyu bar bya'o/_/theg pa chen po 'di la ni dge bsnyen gyi bslab [#]pa'i gzhi lnga blang bar mi bya ste/_dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir lag na mtshon cha thogs shing /_dge slong rnams
[\[62b.5\]]bsrung bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_ci lags dge slong gang dag de lta bu'i dge bsnyen lag na mtshon cha thogs pa dang lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba de dag slob dpon lags sam/_'on te slob dpon ma lags/_tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bgyi'am/_'on te mi bgyi lags/_bcom
[\[62b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu nang 'khrug [#]'byung ba dang /_yul bcom pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dus ngan par gyur pa de'i tshe/_mu ge'i nyes pas phal cher rab tu 'byung zhing /_mgo reg tu 'gyur te
[\[62b.7\]]de dag gis dge slong tshul khrims dang /_cho ga dang yon tan dang /_spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dag skrod par 'gyur[#]/_gsod par 'gyur te/_der dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ri khrod kyi grong dag tu ji ltar rgyu bar bya ste/_de lta bu dag
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]gi dus na dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lam du 'gro ba dang /_rang gi srog bsrung ba'i phyir mtshon cha lag na thogs pa dag dang 'gro bar ngas gnang ngo /_/dge bsnyen rnams dang /_khyim bdag dang /_rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis/_dge slong
[\[63a.2\]]tshul khrims dang ldan pa bsrung [#]ba'i phyir/_mtshon cha 'chang ba de yang tshul khrims yin zhes nga zer te/_'on kyang gsad par ni [#]mi bya'o/_/bzlog pa'i phyir mtshon cha bcang bar bya ste/_de ni mchog tu mkhas pa'i tshul khrims yin no/_/slob dpon ni theg pa chen po'i gdams ngag ston pa dang /_
[\[63a.3\]]yang dag par lta ba dang /_rung ba ma yin pa'i gdugs dang /_'bru mar gyi snod [#]dang /_'bras bu'i rnam grangs rnams spangs pa dang /_rgyal po dang blon po rnams la mi brten pa dang /_rnyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa po rnams la dga' ba dang /_snyan par smra ba ma yin pa dang /_spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa
[\[63a.4\]]dang /_tshul 'chos [#]med pa'i dge sbyong gi dngos po sel ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i chos can dang /_rgyal po [#]dang 'dra ba'i blo gros 'chang ba dang /_byad gzugs dang /_cha byad dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti gzhan mi 'dod pa dang /_chog shes shing yo byad bsnyungs pa ston
[\[63a.5\]]pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o/_/de'i 'khor rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa'i rang gi 'khor gyi dge 'dun gang yin pa de dag ni zlog par byed do/_/de la dge 'dun yang rnam pa gsum ste/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang 'dres pa dang /_byis pa'i dge 'dun dang /_rang bzhin
[\[63a.6\]]gyi dge 'dun no/_/de la tshul khrims 'chal pa dang 'dres pa'i dge 'dun ni des zlog par byed de/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang 'dres pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni/_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams 'ba' zhig dang mthun par byed de/_de dag tshar gcod par mi byed cing /_zang zing gi
[\[63a.7\]]phyir de dag dang lhan cig tu spyod pa mthun par byed pa gang yin pa ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan du zin kyang de dag dang lhan cig gnas pas/_tshul khrims 'chal pa kho na yin pa'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa dang 'dres pa zhes bya ste/_de'i tshul med pa zlog
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]par byed [#]pa'i phyir slob dpon zhes bya'o/_/byis pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni dgon pa pa [#]dang /_bsod snyoms pa zhan pa dang /_rmugs pa rnams yin te/_dgag dbye dang /_gso sbyong rnams kyi dus su/_rang gi 'khor nyi tshe dag par byed kyi/_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams dag par mi
[\[63b.2\]]byed par/_de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dre [#]bar gnas pa de ni byis pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ste/_rmugs pa de dag ni [#]tshul ma yin pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir slob dpon zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin gyi dge 'dun ni/_bdud bye ba snyed kyis kyang mi shigs pa yin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge
[\[63b.3\]]'dun rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dge 'dun rnam pa gnyis zlog par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_slob dpon zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_de bzhin du deng ngas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gsang chen ma lus par
[\[63b.4\]]bstan kyang /_sems can snod [#]du ma gyur pa gang yin pa de dag gis mi thos so/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_gang dag la ni yongs bsags med/_/gang dag gis [#]ni zas mi rtogs/_/mkha' la bya rnams rjes 'dra bar/_/de dag rjes bcad dka' ba yin/_/bstan pa 'di'i don ji lta
[\[63b.5\]]bu zhe na/_su dag la ni yongs bsags med/_/su dag gis [#]ni zas mi rtogs/_/gang dag gis ni rjes bcad dka'/_/su song gang du song ba na/_/de dag rjes bcad dka' ba yin/_/de la rin po che la sogs pa bsags pa'o/_/yongs [#]zhes bya ba ni phrad de bye brag gi tshig go/_/
[\[63b.6\]]yongs zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don te/_'dir rdzas bzang po sgrub pa'i tha tshig go/_/bsags pa zhes bya ba dang /_nor zhes bya ba ni don gcig go/_/gang dag nor yongs su bsags par byed pa de ni/_de dag gi yongs su bsags pa zhes bya'o/_/de la yongs su bsags pa zhes bya ba de
[\[63b.7\]]ni rnam pa gnyis te/_'dus byas yongs su bsags pa dang /_'dus ma byas yongs su bsags pa'o/_/de la nyan thos ni [#]'dus byas yongs su bsags pa'i rnam pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas yongs su bsags pa'i rnam pa'o/_/dge 'dun ni rnam pa gnyis te/_'dus
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]byas kyi dge 'dun dang /_'dus ma byas kyi dge 'dun no/_/de la 'dus byas kyi dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yin no[#]/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la ni yongs su bsags pa yang [#]med na/_bran dang bran mo rnams [#]la sogs pa rdzas ngan pa rnams dang /_mdzod
[\[64a.2\]]dang bang ba yongs su 'dzin pa lta ga la yod de/_'ongs pa yin pas na de dag ni lan tshwa dang /_til tsam yang yongs su bsags par mi byed do/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis/_bdag cag la bran dang bran mo la sogs pa 'chang du gnang ngo zhes zer ba de dag gi lce ni lkugs [#]par 'gyur srid do/_/
[\[64a.3\]]nyan thos de dag ni yongs su bsags pa med pa'i rnam pa yin te/_de dag ni zas yongs su shes pa'o/_/gang zag zas la zhen pa med pa de dag ni zas yongs su shes pa yin te[#]/_de dag ni 'gro ba'i lam du rjes bcad par dka'o/_/de dag ni myur ba kho nar sangs rgyas nyid du nye bar gnas so/_/
[\[64a.4\]]de dag gi 'gro ba ni rjes bcad dka'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsung ngo /_/yang bka' stsal pa/_gal te 'dus byas kyi dge 'dun la yang bsags pa med na/_'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la lta ga la yod de/_'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_de bzhin
[\[64a.5\]]gshegs pa la gsang ba'i chos bstan pa ga la yod/_gsang ba gang yin pa de yongs su [#]bsags pa'o/_/rjes bcad du med pa ni mi g.yo ba'i bde ba ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i don ston to zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_rigs kyi bu dge 'dun gang dag gzhi chen
[\[64a.6\]]po brgyad shes bzhin du spyod par byed pa der/_gal te tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dag 'khod na/_de dag ni ji ltar ka ra ka'i tshal na/_tin tu ka'i shing 'dug pa de [#]bzhin du de dag ma [#]mthong na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin du zin kyang /_dge bsnyen shes rab can gyis de la
[\[64a.7\]]phyag mi bya zhing /_mchod pa'i gnas su mi bya'o/_/gal te de dag la phyag bya bar 'dod na/_ci khyed gzhi chen po brgyad len par byed dam/_'on te len par mi byed ces dris nas/_gdod phyag bya ste zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_yi ge ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chog
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]mi shes pa dang /_yo byad ma bsnyungs pa dang /_'dod chen dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag byed [#]par 'gyur ba'i rang bzo'i yi ge dang /_tshig sna tshogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin pa'i mdo sde rnams yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]bdag cag la thugs brtse bas [#]mu
[\[64b.2\]]ge byung [#]ba'i tshe/_nyid kyi [#]sras rnams nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bar mdzad pa'i phyir/_bran dang bran mo la sogs pa dang /_g.yos su byas pa rnam pa du ma gnang [#]ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi gsungs te/_bran dang bran mo la sogs pa dang /_gser dang [#]dngul la sogs pa dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_
[\[64b.3\]]'bru rnams bsdu ba dang /_nyo tshong dang /_zhing rmo [#]ba la sogs pa ngas gnang ngo zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ngas gnang ngo zhes bya ba de dag ni yi ge zhes bya ste/_de lta bu'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba ni tshad ma ma yin no/_/de bas [#]yi ge 'don pa'i gang zag de dag kyang tshad ma ma yin te/_de'i
[\[64b.4\]]phyir dge slong dag khyed kyi [#]rten ni don yin no zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i [#]mdo las kyang /_dung dang gser dang nor bu nor mang [#]dang /_/khyim dang gnyen bshes rnams spangs rab byung ste/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/_/sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par
[\[64b.5\]]byed/_/nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing /_/bzhon pa bong bu shing rta rnams la chags/_/gang la bslab pa'i nan tan med pa rnams/_/de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_bkur sti rnyed la brten nas ni/_/shes kyi khe
[\[64b.6\]]rnams tshol ba dag_/gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten byed/_/khyim mi mo la chags shing myos/_/dmigs pa dag la rten [#]byed cing /_/'dod pa'i sred la shin tu gnas/_/bdud kyi yul du gnas nas ni/_/khyim pa dag gi [#]las byed 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/las rab tu
[\[64b.7\]]'byed [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_de la mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams rgyud par mngon pa gang zhe na/_srog gcod pa'i rnam par smin pas ni gzi mdangs nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma byin par len pa'i rnam par smin pas ni thog dang
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]phye ma leb dang lo [#]tog rnams te srin bu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pas logs par g.yem pa'i rnam par smin pas ni ljan ljin dang rdul dang tshub ma dang ma rung [#]ba'i rlung dang char 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brdzun du smra ba'i rnam par smin pas ni kha dring ba 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[65a.2\]]ro/_/phra ma'i rnam par smin pas ni rtswa tshang tshing dang nags thibs po [#]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshig rtsub po'i rnam par smin pas ni gseg ma dang gyo mo dang reg na mi bde zhing rtsub pa'i dngos po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngag kyal [#]pa'i rnam par smin pas ni mtho dman gyi gnas dang tsher ma dang
[\[65a.3\]]ngam grog dang g.yang sa dang tshan can dang [#]byis sa khyab par 'gyur ro/_/brnab [#]sems kyi rnam par smin pas ni lo tog rnams 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pas ni lo tog 'bras bu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/log par lta ba'i rnam par smin pas ni lo
[\[65a.4\]]tog rnams 'bras bu kha ba dang tsha ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bcu po de dag yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams rgud par mngon no zhes gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi mdo las kyang /_gzhan yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong
[\[65a.5\]]de dag bdag tu smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can du smra ba dang /_srog tu smra ba dang /_gang zag tu smra ba dang /_chad par smra ba dang /_rtag par smra ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba dang /_gzhan la gnod pa dang 'tshe ba tshol ba dang /_tshul
[\[65a.6\]]khrims chad [#]pa dang /_rgyal mtshan gyis rku ba dang /_de dag pi wang dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga rigs kyi sgra dag la dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bro gar dang gar mkhan la lta ba dag las ldog par mi 'gyur/_rnyed pa 'dod pa dang sa le sbram dang dngul yongs su 'dzin pa las ldog par mi 'gyur/_
[\[65a.7\]]de bzhin du zhing gi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las dang /_tshong dus [#]kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las dang /_khyim gyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las ldog par mi 'gyur/_'bru rjen yongs su 'dzin pa las ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du khyim bya dang phag dang bong bu dang
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]lug yongs su 'dzin pa las ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gshol dang rmon lcags dang /_shing rta'i las kyi mtha' byed pa las ldog par mi 'gyur[#]/_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de lta bu'i dam pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di la 'jigs par mi [#]lta ba de rnams la/_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[65b.2\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i chos dag gis ci zhig bya zhes gsungs so/_/'tsho ba ya nga ba la dgongs pa bstan pa/_'dul ba las kyang /_'di na kha cig tshul 'chos sam/_kha gsag gam/_gzhogs slong ngam[#]/_thob kyis [#]'jal ba'am/_rnyed
[\[65b.3\]]pas rnyed pa tshol ba'am/_shing sbyin pa'am/_'o ma sbyin pa'am/_lo ma sbyin pa'am[#]/_me tog sbyin pa'am/_'bras bu sbyin pa'am/_phyi ma sbyin pa'am/_tshwa sbyin pa'am/_khrus spyad sbyin pa'am/_so shing sbyin pa'am/_'phrod pa'i chu sbyin pa'am/_ngor dga' ba'am/_yongs su gso
[\[65b.4\]]ba'am/_rdzas brtag [#]pa'am/_dud [#]'gro brtag pa'am/_yan lag rig pa'am/_rgyu skar rig [#]pa'am/_pho nyar 'gro ba'am/_mngag gzhug tu 'gro ba'am/_rtog [#]pas mngag pa'am/_dman pa'i las sam/_skyed gtong len nam/_sbyin pa'am lan du sbyin pa'am/_sangs rgyas
[\[65b.5\]]kyis smad pa [#]gzhan gang yang rung ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar rtog par byed do zhes gsungs so/_/'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs de la dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na/_'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na/_gdol pa ni rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul ba yin te/_shi ba la re
[\[65b.6\]]ba dang /_byams pa med pa'i mig gis 'gro ba la blta ba dang /_shi ba la dga' ba yin no/_/'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang rtag tu mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_slong ba ster ba'i khyim la gdu [#]ba yin te/_de nas rnyed pa dang [#]bkur stis nye bar 'tsho zhing /_khyim pa de dag
[\[65b.7\]]chos sam 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang /_de rnyed pa'i ched du 'dris [#]par byed kyi/_chos kyi ched du ma yin pa dang mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te/_'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o/_/'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na/_gdol pa ni tshong
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po dang /_khams kyi rgyal po dag dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis [#]rtag tu yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/_gdol pa rig [#]nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo /_/
[\[66a.2\]]'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang [#]dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis [#]yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/_dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod cing /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rig [#]
[\[66a.3\]]nas/_thag ring po nas [#]kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo /_/'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na/_gdol pa'i kha phyis sam/_gos sam/_yongs su spyad pa de thams cad la ni skye bo ya rabs rnams mi reg cing /_yongs su mi spyod do/_/'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzed dam/_
[\[66a.4\]]chos gos sam/_yongs su spyad pa de thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bas yongs su btsal ba/_lus dang sems smas pas yongs su btsal ba yin pas/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi reg cing mi spyod do/_/'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na/_gdol pa ni
[\[66a.5\]]kha phyis thogs te/_zhum zhum por byas nas gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o/_/'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang zhum zhum por byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhum zhum por byas nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o/_/zhum zhum por byas nas
[\[66a.6\]]gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas khang dang gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o/_/zhum zhum por byas te 'gro ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bar byed do/_/'od srungs de ltar na zhum zhum por byas pas/_sdig pa 'chab pa de'i spyod yul [#]gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rung ba [#]ma yin pa la yongs su brtag [#]
[\[66a.7\]]pa'o/_/'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na/_gdol pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye ba la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de rang gi las kyis [#]nyes pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sems kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing de'i
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhig [#]la/_de [#]ngan 'gro gsum du gnas par sgrib pa med de/_'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po'i mdo las kyang /_de'i phyir kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/kun dga' bo mya ngan
[\[66b.2\]]las 'das pa na byang phyogs kyi rgyud du rgyas ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_mi'i skye bo mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/der bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni nga'i bstan pa 'di la dad cing dang bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams ni nga'i sku dang nyan thos
[\[66b.3\]]rnams la bla mar bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang mchod par bya ba dang rjed par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro/_/der nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che zhing gzi brjid che ba rnams kyang kun nas mang du 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo der khyim pa mkhas pa/_shes rab che ba/_gsal ba/_dul ba 'jigs
[\[66b.4\]]pa med pa/_mang du thos shing thos pa bsags pa mang po dag kyang rgyas par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo yang rgyal po'i pho brang rgyas ldan der/_gang dag khyim pa 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang
[\[66b.5\]]dag rab tu byung ba 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_phal cher ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni yo byad bsnyungs pa la mi gnas shing /_sdom pa la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po'i pho brang rgyas ldan du dam pa'i chos ni gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[66b.6\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag 'di snyam du/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro zhes sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar kun dga' bo de'i tshe na dge slong mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_g.yel ba/_bsags pa mang ba/_spong ba [#]las nyams
[\[66b.7\]]pa bsu ba'i phyir sngar 'gro ba/_rab tu dben pa la brtson pa dor ba[#]/_'khor bzhi dang 'dres pa dang [#]/_spyod tshul dang bral ba/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang lhan cig spyod tshul nyams pa/_lugs dang bral ba/_phan tshun du mi gus pa/_me tog gam/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bza' ba'am/_bca' ba'am/_ster ba'am/_lan du sbyin pa bsten pa la dga' ba dang /_ma bsdams par 'gyur ro/_/de dag bu smad la spyod par 'gyur/_de dag mthong ba dang thos nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos nub par gyur ta re snyam pas
[\[67a.2\]]'jigs pa chen po [#]dang /_skrag pa dang /_skyo bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/'od srungs kyis [#]zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs [#]de la chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/_'od srungs [#]'di lta ste dper na/_mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can/_rtag tu brkam pa/_chags pa'i zil
[\[67a.3\]]gyis non pa bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa/_gzhan gyi nor la re ba/_drag shul can/_dbyug pa dang /_mtshon cha dang /_dgra cha thogs pa/_ngo tsha med pa/_snying rje med pa/_rtag tu gdug cing /_rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/_de gang gi tshe grong bar ram grong ngam/_
[\[67a.4\]]grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/_de 'di snyam du gzhan dag [#]gi nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de bdag gir gyur na re [#]stes snyam du sems shing /_de zin du 'ong zhes mkhyun bu mkhyun bur rgyu ba yin no/_/'od srungs de bzhin du chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong yang rtag
[\[67a.5\]]tu brkam pa[#]/_chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/_bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la re ba yin te/_de gang gi tshe grong bar ram/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/_de rnyed pa'i phyir 'jug gi/_chos kyi phyir ma yin te/_spyod
[\[67a.6\]]lam thams cad kyang chom rkun lta bur ston pa yin/_'chab cing sped pa lta bu yin te/_bdag dge slong gzhan gyis [#]tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/_shes par gyur na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_rtag tu skrag cing rtag tu 'jigs te/_spyod
[\[67a.7\]]lam thams cad kyang g.yos spyod pas/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dag gis [#]chom rkun 'ong ngo /_/chom rkun 'gro'o/_/chom rkun 'greng ngo /_/chom rkun 'chag go/_/chom rkun 'dug go/_/nyal lo/_/chos gos len to/_/chom rkun grong du 'gro'o/_/grong nas 'byung ngo /_/
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]chom rkun za'o/_/chom rkun 'thung ngo /_/chom rkun skra 'dreg go zhes rig [#]par 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs de ltar [#]na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyis de'i spyod lam [#]gang yin pa de thams cad rung ba ma yin la/_yongs su brtags pa yin par rig par 'gyur te/_rig nas kyang
[\[67b.2\]]de la snying rje chen po bskyed cing /_kye ma 'di re [#]mtshar cig_/sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta bu dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro zhes 'phya zhing mi snyan pa [#]zer ro/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la ni/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod
[\[67b.3\]]sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyang /_'di dag ni bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa cher skyed do/_/'od srungs chom rkun pa lta bu'i dge sbyong [#]bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba ni/_skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig [#]kyang mi bskyed na/_'bras bu thob pa [#]lta ci smos kyi/_de ni gnas
[\[67b.4\]]med de/_'od srungs 'di ni chom rkun lta bu'i dge slong zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]'tsho ba yongs su dag pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_byams pa seng ge'i [#]sgra'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs de dag dbugs 'byin pa brjod par bya ste/_de thos nas rnal 'byor pa/_rnal 'byor spyod pa
[\[67b.5\]]dag dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_gling chen po bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis [#]bkur stir
[\[67b.6\]]byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas pa bas ni/_yang dag par zhugs pa/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/_'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis/_sbyin pa po gang gi dad pas [#]byin pa/_tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir byas par gyur na/_de nyid de las bsod nams kyi phung
[\[67b.7\]]po ches rgya cher 'gyur kyi/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis [#]bkur stir byas/_bla mar [#]byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas pa de la ni de lta [#]ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/dkon
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag [#]gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams
[\[68a.2\]]yin/_gzhogs slong gi [#]rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_mi rigs par [#]btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/_rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/_rnyed pa la ma
[\[68a.3\]]chags pa rnams yin/_yongs su mi [#]chad pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/_chos nyid rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag [#]gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
[\[68a.4\]]sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir lus kyis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed/_ngag gis [#]tshul 'chos pa [#]mi byed/_sems kyis [#]tshul 'chos pa [#]mi byed do/_/ji ltar na lus kyis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong na/_spyod
[\[68a.5\]]lam mi 'chos so/_/ji ltar [#]spyod lam mi 'chos she na/_gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba dang /_skyo bar blta [#]ba dang /_sgrib pa med par blta [#]bas/_gom pa bags kyis dal ba dal bas [#]'dor zhing /_'degs pa ma yin te/_de ltar na lus kyis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/_/ji ltar na
[\[68a.6\]]ngag gis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce [#]na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir gcom bskyungs shing smra ba ma yin te/_'jam [#]por smra ba ma yin/_dga' bar smra ba ma yin/_rjes su 'brang [#]ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin te/_de ltar na ngag gis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/_/ji ltar na
[\[68a.7\]]sems kyis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa'am/_sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstabs na/_tshig gis [#]'dod pa chung bar ston cing /_sems kyis [#]'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_tshig gis [#]'dod pa chung la/_sems kyis [#]
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]rnyed pa 'dod pa ni/_nang gi gdung ba yin te[#]/_de ltar na sems kyis [#]tshul 'chos par mi byed do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag [#]gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_byang chub
[\[68b.2\]]sems dpa' [#]sbyin pa byed pa'am/_sbyin bdag mthong na/_bdag chos gos kyis phongs so/_/bdag [#]lhung bzed kyis phongs so/_/bdag nad kyi [#]rkyen rtsis phongs so zhes brda [#]mi byed cing /_sbyin pa byed pa'am[#]/_sbyin bdag la mi slong zhing tshig tu mi brjod do/_/de ltar na byang chub
[\[68b.3\]]sems dpa' brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhogs slong gi [#]rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin [#]pa byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag mthong na/_bdag la sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis/_dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/_de la
[\[68b.4\]]bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas so/_/des kyang bdag la 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan par rig ste [#]mang du thos pa'o/_/'dod pa chung ba'o zhes 'di dang 'di byin no/_/bdag gis kyang de la snying rje ba'i sems nye bar gzhag [#]ste/_blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod do/_/de ltar byang chub
[\[68b.5\]]sems dpa' gzhogs slong gi [#]rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byung ba dang /_sems la rma byung bas [#]rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin te/_de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[68b.6\]]rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug [#]pa dang /_kun du rgyug [#]pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa la [#]spyod pa'o/_/de la [#]sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/_rnyed pa la smon pa dang /_tshangs pa [#]mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyi rnyed pa la gnod sems mang ba ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal
[\[68b.7\]]ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu byed pa dang /_gzhal [#]ba la sgyu byed pa dang /_yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa dang /_g.yos rnyed pa [#]mi sku ba ste/_de ltar
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa'am/_chos kyi dang 'dres pa'am/_dge 'dun
[\[69a.2\]]gyi dang 'dres pa'am/_ma byin pa'am/_ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/_/chags pa'i sems mi skyed [#]de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang
[\[69a.3\]]chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang /_bdag gir mi byed/_nor mi brtsi/_tshogs su mi byed cing /_dus dus su dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_pha ma dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams [#]dag la gtong zhing /_dus dus su bdag kyang yongs su
[\[69a.4\]]spyod la/_yongs su spyod pa'i tshe/_chags pa med pa dang /_zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do/_/rnyed pa ma rnyed na yang /_skyo ba'i sems kyang mi skyed [#]cing /_yongs su yi mi 'chad de/_sbyin pa byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag rnams la ma dad par mi 'dzin pa yin te/_de chos dang mthun par rnyed
[\[69a.5\]]pa/_dge 'dun gyi ma gtogs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/_byang chub sems dpas ma smad pa/_lhas bstod [#]pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi 'phya bas [#]chog shes pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba
[\[69a.6\]]yongs su dag pa rnams yin no zhes gsungs so/_/tshangs pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_longs spyod rung ba dag la 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir tshig tu smra ba des na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros mi zad pa la bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /_de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/_
[\[69a.7\]]gang 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi 'dor ba nyid dang /_tshul 'chos pa ma yin pa nyid dang /_kha gsag [#]ma yin pa nyid dang /_gzhogs slong [#]ma yin pa nyid dang /_dgang sla ba nyid dang /_gso sla ba nyid dang /_cho ga dang tshul khrims mdzes pa nyid dang /_gzhan gyi rnyed
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]pa la phrag mi dog pa nyid dang /_rang gi rnyed pas [#]chog shes pa nyid dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang /_'phags pas rjes su gnang ba'i 'tsho ba ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sdom
[\[69b.2\]]pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa ni/_dge ba mi spyoms pa yin/_sdig pa mthol ba yin/_'dod pa chung ba dang [#]/_chog shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal bzod pa dang /_yongs su gdung [#]ba med pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_ma khengs pa dang /_mi brtan [#]pa ma yin pa dang /_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dang /_
[\[69b.3\]]tshul khrims 'chos pa la sogs pa log pa'i 'tsho ba thams cad byed pa'i chos spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs so//_//[#]gang gis [#]bstan pa nub par 'gyur ba rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dgongs pa bstan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sde snod kyi mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das 'od
[\[69b.4\]]srungs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab de ni lhag par rnyed pa dang bkur sti byed pas nub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos 'dul ba 'di ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis myur du nub par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu dper na mi dbul po zhig gis gter chen po rnyed nas
[\[69b.5\]]gzhi de las bde ba dang yid [#]bde ba nyams su myong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_dge slong dag 'di ltar khyim pa la brten pa dang /_phu dud byed pa dang /_bkur sti byed pa dag [#]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la khyim pa gang dag gis [#]dge slong gang dag kyang [#]'jig rten gyi zang
[\[69b.6\]]zing gis zang zing la mgron [#]du 'bod par 'gyur zhing /_mi dbul po gter la chags pa bzhin du/_dge ba ma mthong ba de dag 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yid bde bar bya ba'i phyir/_de dag gi las kyi mtha' rim bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na dge slong de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi zang
[\[69b.7\]]zing lhur len par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi zang zing gis [#]'khol bas chog mi shes pa dang /_nye du la 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid shes bzhin du khyim pas shes par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par sgrogs [#]par byed do/_/de dag de ltar shes par byed pa yongs su tshol
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ba na/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dor bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gzi brjid can gyi mdo las kyang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la brten pa'i dge slong gi [#]kun nas nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur te/_de dag gis mtshams med pa'i sa thob par
[\[70a.2\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa [#]bskul ba'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i skyon ji ltar mthong bar bgyi/_rnyed pa dang
[\[70a.3\]]bkur sti'i nongs dmigs ni gang lags/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags na/_'dod pa chung ngu la dga' zhing /_yongs su mi gdung bar 'gyur ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'dod chags bskyed [#]pa yin
[\[70a.4\]]par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bskur [#]sti ni dran pa 'joms par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa dang dud par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gti mug skyed par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdag gi don sgrub pas khyim la [#]
[\[70a.5\]]ser sna byed pa dang /_chags par byed par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni g.yo byed par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi yongs su spongs bas[#]/_ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa skyed par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sangs rgyas thams cad
[\[70a.6\]]kyis ma gnang bar brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa skyed par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bla ma rnams la khyad du gsod par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdud kyi phyogs su brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni
[\[70a.7\]]gcig tu bag med pa'i rtsa ba yin par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phrog par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni glog dang 'khor lo dang lce 'bab pa lta bur brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sbags pa mang por sbags par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]dang bkur sti ni mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang slong [#]mo ster ba'i khyim la brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni blo rnam par 'khrul pa byed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sdug pa'i dngos po 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir mya ngan skyed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa nye
[\[70b.2\]]bar gzhag pa gzhi [#]rjed par byed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dkar po'i chos nyam chung bar byed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol gyi dad pa'i bar chad byed par
[\[70b.3\]]brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sngar bkur sti byed la/_phyis bkur sti ni byed par brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mi mdza' [#]ba dang gnas par byed par brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[70b.4\]]rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bo spong bar brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol 'drid pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bsam gtan dang tshad med pa yongs su spong bar brtag par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[70b.5\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar byed par brtag [#]par bya'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni lha sbyin [#]dang lhag spyod kyi cho ga dang mthun par brtag par bya'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpas [#]rnyed pa dang bkur sti la nyes dmigs gang dag brtag par bya ba ni 'di lta bu 'di dag go/_/
[\[70b.6\]]brtags nas kyang 'dod pa chung bar bya'i yongs su gdung bar ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa chud pa la ni skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag med pa'i phyir te/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad med pa yin/_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag yid 'byung bar
[\[70b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba yin/_lha dang mi rnams yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir gnas pas [#]rjes su bsrung bar 'os pa yin/_ngan 'gro log par lhung ba thams cad kyis [#]skrag pa med pa yin/_sdig pa dang bral bas zil gyis mi non pa yin/_bdud kyi yul las yongs su grol bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin/_lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par 'dod par bya ba yin/_bsam gtan la goms par byed par [#]gnas pas gsal ba yin/_g.yo dang sgyu [#]spangs pa dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la skyon du lta [#]bas bag yod pa yin/_
[\[71a.2\]]'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin/_mkhas pa rnams dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis [#]'dod pa yin te/_byams pa phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mkhas pa rnyed pa dang [#]bkur sti yongs su
[\[71a.3\]]spangs pas/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dod pa chung ba la gnas par bya zhing /_'dod pa chung ba la kun du [#]bsten par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang /_yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/_/ma gus nga rgyal
[\[71a.4\]]ldan zhing chags shas che/_/nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs can/_/de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring /_/chags pas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel/_/le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams/_/dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams/_/tshul khrims 'chal par gyur na
[\[71a.5\]]bzang 'gro nyams/_/dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te/_/mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur[#]/_/de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su/_/gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/_/rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro/_/der song nas ni gos dang nye du tshol/_/mngon
[\[71a.6\]]shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs/_/bor nas de [#]ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/_/rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa/_/mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang /_/dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang /_/mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin/_/de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams
[\[71a.7\]]dngos/_/bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams/_/g.yang sa chen po mi bzad ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med/_/gal te 'dir ni 'thob par byang chub na/_/de'i phyir lha sbyin [#]gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/_/rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya lhung ltar/_/chags pas kyang ni
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de ltar mi rigs so/_/bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma [#]chags/_/tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/_/byang chub sems kyi ye shes gang ma thob/_/de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin/_/byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos 'tshol [#]ba/_/ji ltar thar pa de bzhin mi
[\[71b.2\]]gnas so/_/de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar/_/nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o/_/byang chub don du gnyer ba chos tshig phyir/_/nga yis rang gi srog ni phangs pa'ang btang /_/chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/_/don med gyur nas bstan las lhung bar 'gyur/_/nga ni sngon chad
[\[71b.3\]]legs par bshad don phyir/_/g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs[#]/_/de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/_/thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas/_/bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/_/de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skyo na/_/chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod/_/
[\[71b.4\]]dper na long ba lam gsal med dang mtshungs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /_shes kyi khe yis bslus pa dag_/nga yi bstan las shin tu 'khyams/_/'bras bur 'du shes gnas pa la/_/dge sbyong nor ni gsog
[\[71b.5\]]tu gyur/_/brtson 'grus nyams pa'i [#]le lo can/_/tshul khrims phung por mi gnas pa/_/kun nas langs pas smra ba ni/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bshad ma yin/_/la la dag ni 'di skad du/_/bdag cag byang chub zhugs zhes [#]zer/_/ma dul zhing ni ma byang ba[#]/_/gcig la gcig ni ri mo
[\[71b.6\]]byed/_/chos dag la yang mi gnas shing /_/sgra [#]'dod pa ni [#]'byung bar 'gyur/_/de lta bur ni de mos te/_/shes kyi khe ni tshol ba'i phyir/_/'dus pa dag la sems byed cing /_/rnyed pa 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyags dang bag med zil non pas/_/rnyed dang bkur sti don du gnyer/_/
[\[71b.7\]]zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_nga ni mya ngan 'das gyur phyi ma'i tshe/_/dam pa'i chos ni rnam par 'jig [#]pa na/_/dge slong mu stegs [#]blo la brtson pa dag_/de dag nga yi zhi ba'i chos la spong /_/khangs [#]shing rgod la gtum zhing spyi brtol che/_/sdig pa'i grogs po zas la
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]chags pa dag_/chos gos lhung bzed dag la chags shing brkam/_/rnyed la gnas shing de dag chos la spong /_/de dag yid gtum zhe sdang byas mi gzo/_/dma' ba'i rigs dang dbul ba'i rigs las ni/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/_/de dag zhi ba'i
[\[72a.2\]]chos 'di [#]spong bar byed/_/bdud kyi blo yis sems can mun pas gtibs/_/'dod chags dbang du song bas mngon par chags/_/gti mug dbang gis byis pa rmongs pas na/_/de dag stong pa zhi ba'i chos mi 'dod/_/dge slong dge slong ma dang khyim pa rnams/_/sdig pa'i blo yis 'dzin
[\[72a.3\]]bcug rmongs byas te/_/de dag dbang du rtag par song gyur pas/_/phyi ma'i dus la byang chub spong bar byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/byams pa seng ge [#]sgra'i mdo las kyang /_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rnyed pa dang /_
[\[72a.4\]]bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_'du 'dzi'i gnas dang /_gnas gang na gnas pa na [#]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/_gal te de [#]dang lhan cig tu mgu ba dang /_dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes la/_
[\[72a.5\]]'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas pa ni[#]/[ #]des der gnas par bya'i/_gal te de de la tha na tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed [#]na yang /_des de nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'byol bar bya ste zhes gsungs so/_/bdud kyi 'gying bag gi mdo
[\[72a.6\]]las kyang /_'phags pa'i rigs chog shes shing rung ba dag la tshod shes pa ni legs pa'o/_/chog mi shes shing 'dod pa che ba ni mi legs pa'o/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa dang [#]dad pas sbyin pa yongs su longs spyod pa ni mi legs so/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti
[\[72a.7\]]dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad ni legs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngor [#]bstod kyi tshig gi [#]rnyed pas nye bar 'tsho ba nyid ni mi legs pa'o/_/yang dag pa la gnas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rnyed pa ni legs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/shA ri'i bu'i gzungs kyi mdo las
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]kyang /_rnyed la chags la dran med shes rab med/_/dad dang tshul khrims chos sems pa yang med/_/de ni byang chub las ring gnam sa [#]bzhin/_/de phyir rnyed pa yongs su spang bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu
[\[72b.2\]]byung ba'i nam mkha' la yongs su chags pa ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'jig rten rgyang 'phen [#]pa'i gsang tshig yongs su tshol ba dang /_lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par 'chang ba ste/_'di gnyis so/_/de la 'di skad ces [#]bya ste/_'jig rten rgyang 'phen goms byed brtson pa dang /_lhung bzed
[\[72b.3\]]chos gos lhag par 'chang byed pa/_/'di gnyis nam mkha' la ni chags [#]pa ste/_/de dag byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya/_/'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam po ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/[# ]lta bar 'gyur ba'i 'ching ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su
[\[72b.4\]]bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste/_'di gnyis gang zhe na/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lta gyur [#]'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang /_/grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba'i tshe/_/'ching ba dam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs/_/de dag rtag tu rab tu byung bas spang /_/'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i
[\[72b.5\]]bar du gcod pa'i chos te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_khyim pa'i phyogs la brten pa dang /_/'phags pa'i phyogs la gnod par sems pa ste/_/'di gnyis so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_khyim pa'i phyogs la brten [#]par byed pa dang /_/'phags pa'i phyogs la rnam par smod byed pa/_/'di
[\[72b.6\]]gnyis rab byung bar chad gegs byed yin/_/byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang [#]/_/'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa la mi mjed pa dang /_mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster ba'i khyim yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_'di gnyis so/_/
[\[72b.7\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rab tu byung ba nyon mongs mi mjed dang /_/mdza' bo'i [#]khyim dang zas ster khyim brten [#]pa/_/de gnyis dri mar rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang [#]/_/zhes gsungs so/_/zla ba'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_ji ltar
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]chu shing 'od ma dang /_/'dam bu 'bras bus 'joms byed cing /_/dre'u mo mngal gyis 'joms pa ltar/_/rnyed dang bkur sti [#]mi ngan 'joms/_/ji ltar ser ba bab pa yis/_/lo tog thams cad rnam 'joms pa/_/de ltar rnyed dang bkur sti yis/_/byang
[\[73a.2\]]chub lam [#]ni 'joms byed do/_/ji ltar [#]me tog mes bsregs ltar/_/de bzhin rnyed dang bkur sti yis/_/byang chub lam dag 'joms byed do/_/dge slong gang gis [#]rnyed pa dang /_/bkur sti chen po rnyed 'gyur ba/_/bdud kyis [#]nyams par shes bya ste/_/mkhas pas de nas 'gro bar bya/_/
[\[73a.3\]]ji ltar rnyed dang bkur sti ni[#]/_/thob nas lam ni 'joms byed pa/_/thar pa'i lam 'joms byed pa yi[#]/_/sdig pa de 'dra yod ma yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rnam pa gzhan bcu yis/_byang chub sems
[\[73a.4\]]dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o/_/bcu po gang dag yin zhe na/_rung ba dag la tshod shes pa nyid kyis 'dod pa chung ba'i tshul khrims yin/_'dod pa rab tu spangs pa nyid kyis yang dag par rab tu [#]dga' ba'i tshul khrims yin/_lus dang sems rnam par dben pa nyid
[\[73a.5\]]kyis sgrub pa'i tshul khrims yin/_'du 'dzi la smod pa nyid kyis dgon par gnas pa'i tshul khrims yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rang dbang du sgrub [#]pa nyid kyis sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul khrims yin/_gzhan gyi ngor lta ba nyid kyis 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i tshul
[\[73a.6\]]khrims yin/_lha dang mi rnams mi slu ba nyid kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i tshul khrims yin/_rang gi sems la nges par dpyad pa nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi skyon la so sor rtog pa'i tshul khrims yin/_gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung [#]ba nyid kyis gzhan gyi nyes pa la skyon mi 'dogs pa'i
[\[73a.7\]]tshul khrims yin/_bsdu ba'i dngos po mi 'dor ba nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul khrims yin te/_shA ri'i bu rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/chos smra ba po'i le'u'i mdo las kyang /_shA
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]ri'i bu gzhan yang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang bral ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan pa'i chos ston par byed pa rnams kyi sgo nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshar bcad de ngas smra bar mi nus te/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[73b.2\]]rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags shing /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la brten pa rnams/_'di skad du bdag cag la de bzhin gshegs pas dgag pa mdzad do zhes smra bar ma gyur cig snyam pas so/_/de rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam las ldog par 'gyur te/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs
[\[73b.3\]]kyi bu mo de dag ngas bsrung bar bya/_ji ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam pas/_gdon mi za bar [#]de dag la tshar bcad nas chos ston par bya dgos na/_shA ri'i bu bar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nges par bzhugs par gzigs
[\[73b.4\]]shing /_ngas ji ltar bya snyam du dbugs ring du nang du rngub cing [#]brngub par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog za ma tog gi mdo las kyang /_kun dga' bo bdud kyi sprul pa'i dge slong 'di dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' [#]bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[73b.5\]]mthong ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' [#]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig [#]pa'i tshe/_nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher 'di bzhin du sham thabs legs par ma gyon pa/_
[\[73b.6\]]bla gos legs par [#]ma bgos pa/_gos hrul po gyon pa/_lhung bzed chag [#]pa/_shes bzhin med pa/_spyod lam mi sdug pa/_lag na 'khar ba thogs pa/_sna leb leb po dang /_zhar ba dang /_'theng po dang /_zha bo dang /_lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang /_nad sna tshogs kyis btab [#]
[\[73b.7\]]pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de'i tshe dge slong dag phal cher bsnyen bkur la ched che bar byed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la brten pa dang /_bya ba sna tshogs kyi mi khom pas brel ba dang /_'dul ba bor ba dang /_so sor thar pa 'dral ba dang /_mtshams
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]las 'da' ba dang /_tshe 'di ched che bar byed pa dang /_tshe rabs gzhan ched mi che bar byed par 'gyur te/_de dag 'di lta ste chos kyi phyir ma yin gyi/_bsnyen bkur gyi phyir/_zhar ba dang /_'theng bo dang /_zha bo dang /_lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang /_nad sna
[\[74a.2\]]tshogs kyis btab pa 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rab tu 'byin par byed de/_bsnyen par [#]rdzogs par byed do/_/kun dga' bo de ltar de'i tshe nga'i bstan pa 'di ba ltar [#]mi rung ba dang /_mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha [#]rnams kyang yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud rnams ni yi rang zhing dga'
[\[74a.3\]]ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//[#]bdud kyis [#]smras pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_gzi brjid can gyi mdo las kyang /_de nas bdud [#]sdig can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs
[\[74a.4\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/bdud sdig can gyis [#]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhad gad du 'os par 'dod par bdag [#]la gnong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na/_bdag cag gis [#]
[\[74a.5\]]de lta bu'i ngo bo'i mdo sde/_'di dag skye bo mang pos spong bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/skye bo mang pos yongs su 'dor bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nye bar sgrub pa de dag_/bdag cag gis [#]ji ltar de lta bu'i mdo sde [#]smod par 'gyur ba dang /_rab tu spong bar 'gyur ba
[\[74a.6\]]dang /_mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bus/_bdag cag yungs 'bru lta bu shin tu tshar bcad de gnas mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/_bdag cag gso sbyong gi las la 'jug pa na/_dge
[\[74a.7\]]'dun gyi [#]nang du dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis 'dug ste/_'dzin du 'jug par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de dag dang lhan cig mnyam la/_de rnams kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig mnyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das dus der bdag dge sbyong [#]gi gzugs
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]su sprul nas/_'khor dbye bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de lta bu'i mdo sde dri mas ma gos pa 'di dag mi len par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang gi phyir khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson
[\[74b.2\]]par 'gyur ba/_sdig pa can khyod kyis [#]bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du thob par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa de dag gi 'gro ba gang yin pa de nyid bdag gi 'gro ba yang yin par 'gyur ro/_/bka' stsal pa/_sdig can khyod gnas de la brtson par ma byed cig/_/sdig can gang khyod 'dzin par 'gyur
[\[74b.3\]]ba'i lam 'di ni ngan song gi lam mo/_/smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ngan song nyid du 'gyur mod/_bdag cag gi lus ngan song dang ldan par 'gyur mod/[# ]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan [#]yang dag par g.yos par gyur to[#]/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du/_dge sbyong gau ta ma nga la
[\[74b.4\]]'khrugs so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma nga la khros so zhes sems te/_'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang bcas shing mi bgyi'o mi bgyi'o zhes zer nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo bdud kyi las
[\[74b.5\]]'di dag 'khor bzhi po rnams la yang dang yang du shod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di de [#]ltar sems can mang po'i don 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag bdud kyi las rnams yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du shes pa de dag_/de lta bu'i ngo bo'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_de lta bu'i ngo bo'i
[\[74b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la yongs su slu bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo dge slong gang [#]dag mdo'i tshig 'di la mngon par brtson pa de la/_bdud sdig can gsum gyis [#]bar chad byed do/_/gsum gang zhe na/_lugs gzhan mang po nyid kyis the tshom skye ba nyid dang /_bdud kyi las kyis [#]
[\[74b.7\]]kun nas dkris pas tshig rtsub mor 'gyur ba'am/_slob dpon smod par 'gyur ba ste/_gnas gsum po 'di dag gis/_bdud sdig can bar chad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sngon gyi [#]rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag ni/_de lta bu'i ngo bo'i mdo sde
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]'di dag ston par 'gyur/_gzhan yang dngos pos phongs pa yongs su rtog [#]par yang 'gyur ro/_/de lta na yang [#]'di la mthar thug par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_shes rab 'phel ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_dran pa 'phel ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_mi 'jigs pa
[\[75a.2\]]'phel ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_lus kyi nges par 'byung ba 'phel ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_gtam 'dzin pa 'phel ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_lung bstan pa [#]'phel ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/_thos pa'i mthu rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/mya ngan las 'das
[\[75a.3\]]pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can gyis ni/_nga 'das pa'i 'og lo bdun brgya lon pa na/_nga'i bstan pa phye zhing phye zhing 'jig [#]par 'gyur te/_dam pa'i chos nub pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig can zag pa can gyis zag pa med pa lta bur [#]
[\[75a.4\]]bsgyur te/_bya ba'i rtags kyi [#]tshul sbed pa bzhin du/_dge slong gi gzugs dang /_dge slong ma'i gzugs dang /_dge bsnyen gyi gzugs dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
[\[75a.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'jig [#]par 'gyur te/_'di skad ces zer zhing sangs rgyas ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_btsun mo sgyu 'phrul phrad na/_zla mtshan gyi bye brag gis 'khrig pa'i chos las skyes so zhes zer ba/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[75a.6\]]pa ni 'khrig pa las skye mi srid do/_/de la ming tsam du skyes pa las/_sngon dka' thub spyad pa'i yon tan gyis [#]lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis [#]mchod cing rjed par 'gyur te/_bdag gi chung ma dang 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni[#]/_sangs rgyas
[\[75a.7\]]su 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de lta bu ni/_bdud kyis smras pa'i mdo sde dang /_'dul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gis skyes pa lta bur [#]bdag nyid kyis ston mod kyi/_'khrig pa las skyes
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]pa [#]ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yab yum gnyis yod pa lta bur bstan pa 'di ni/_'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad pa yin no zhes zer ba de lta bu ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang /_'dul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/bdud kyis [#]smras pa'i mdo sde dang /_
[\[75b.2\]]'dul ba tshad mar byed pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni/_bdud dang mthun par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang /_'dul ba tshad mar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[75b.3\]]pa 'jig rten du byung nas/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams [#]su gom pa bdun bdun gshegs par bstan to zhes bya ba 'di ni yid ches par byar mi rung ste/_de lta bu'i mdo sde dang /_'dul ba ni bdud kyis smras pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byung nas/_phyogs
[\[75b.4\]]dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gom pa bdun bdun gshegs par bstan pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi sku 'dzin pa yin no zhes zer ba lta bu ni/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/bdud kyis smras pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad
[\[75b.5\]]mar byed pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni/_bdud dang mthun par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha khang du gshegs
[\[75b.6\]]te byon nas/_lha rnams kyi zhabs la phyag bzhes te/_lha rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag mi 'tshal lo/_/lha rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs par gyur nas mngon par sangs rgyas te/_lha rnams ni snga/_'di ni 'phyi bas na/_de'i
[\[75b.7\]]phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdud kyis [#]smras pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha gang [#]du gshegs te byon nas dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis [#]
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]thal mo legs par sbyar te/_zhabs la spyi bos gtugs so zhes zer ba de lta bu ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/bdud kyis smras pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni/_
[\[76a.2\]]bdud dang mthun par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa [#]rgyal tshab tu gyur te/_nye 'dab kyi rgyal po'i bu mo dag dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa shin
[\[76a.3\]]tu bsten no zhes zer ba la sogs pa ni/_bdud kyis [#]smras pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha'i bu mo dam [#]pa lta bu'i bud med dag kyang mchil ma bzhin du bor nas/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes zer ba de lta bu'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba ni sangs
[\[76a.4\]]rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin par blta [#]bar bya'o/_/bdud kyis [#]smras pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni bdud dang mthun par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_byang chub
[\[76a.5\]]sems dpa' yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' bar/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_ba
[\[76a.6\]]lang dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_bya gag dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_byi la dang /_zangs dang /_lcags zangs dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_'tshog chas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_zhing sa dang /_tshong dus [#]dang /_
[\[76a.7\]]srang dang nyo tshong byed pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rnams bzhes so zhes zer ba de lta bu ni/_bdud kyis smras pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'dam bu dang /_e raN+Da'i tshal dang /_shing pi tshu marda'i drung na bzhugs pa'i tshe/
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bram ze lug [#]dpal dang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las brtsams te/_bka' stsal pa/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_bya gag dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_byi la dang /_sbrul dang /_ne'u le dang /_zangs dang /_lcags
[\[76b.2\]]zangs dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_nor dang /_'tshog chas rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba dang /_zhing sa dang /_tshong dus [#]dang /_srang dang nyo tshong byed pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba 'chang ba dang /_
[\[76b.3\]]rang lag dar te [#]g.yos byed pa dang /_'tshed pa dang /_'tshed du 'jug pa dang /_ltas [#]dang /_yan lag gi rig pa dang /_mo yig dang kha ton 'don pa dang /_bya ltas shes pa dang /_sgra gcan dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_pa ba sangs dang /_gza' lhag rgyu ba dang /_me tog gi shing rta dang /_
[\[76b.4\]]lag srubs [#]lta ba dang /_rmi [#]ltas dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning gi mtshan lta ba dang /_sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang /_mkhan bzo ba dang /_bzo'i las thams cad ston pa dang /_srung gtam byed pa dang /_spos kyi phye ma 'debs pa dang /_me tog
[\[76b.5\]]dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa 'chang ba dang mgo la 'o byed pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag byed pa dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_'dod chen can dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_smra 'dod pa dang /_nor dang 'bru dang /_sha dang nya sha dang /_dug sbyar [#]
[\[76b.6\]]ba dang /_spos kyi til mar dang /_sman gyi sbu gu dang /_gdugs dang /_lham dang /_ta [#]la'i lo ma'i bsil yab dang /_chu snod dang /_bu don dang /_beng bung [#]bya/_beng bud 'chang ba dang /_shing thog sdud pa dang /_so rtsi dang /_sman mar dang /_btso ba'i phye ma bzang po dang /_ka ko la dang /_'bras bu tsha ba bsten pa
[\[76b.7\]]dang /_rgyal po la brtan [#]pa dang /_gzhan la brten pa dang /_drod mi thub pa dang /_mi smra ba dang /_bud med lhar rtog pa shas che ba dang /_mang du smra ba dang /_ngu ba dang /_bzang ngan spyod pa dang /_sun 'byin pa dang /_'gros 'chos pa dang /_gos dkar po dang /_ar mo ni ga dang /_khang bzangs [#]dang /
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]gtsang khang phyur bu'i [#]las la sogs pa byed pa dang /_rung ba ma yin pa dang /_rdzas ngan pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sbyin pa po'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_chang bsten pa dang /_smad 'tshong ma'i khyim du 'gro ba rnams dang /_de lta bu byed pa dam pa ma yin pa/_tshul ngan
[\[77a.2\]]pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni gos dkar po dag sbyin la/_'jig rten pa'i las rnams byed du 'jug par ngas gnang ngo /_/yang na 'bras sA lu'i zhing gi ngo bsal [#]ba bzhin du/_yul phyogs nas bskrad par ngas gnang ngo zhes zer ba de lta bu'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba [#]ni/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa
[\[77a.3\]]yin par rig par bya'o/_/bdud kyis [#]smras pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni/_bdud dang mthun par [#]byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba tshad mar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' yin
[\[77a.4\]]par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las kyang /_'di lta ste/_rtsod byed ces bya ba'i bdud dang /_gnyis pa g.yeng byed ces bya ba'i bdud kyi ris ni/_gang sems can chos la spyod pa rnams sems rnam par g.yeng bar byed/_dam pa'i chos nyan pa
[\[77a.5\]]na [#]gnyid bro bar byed do/_/'dod pa lhag par rmongs byed ces bya ba ni gsum pa ste/_gang sbyin pa dag gtong ba ni sbyin pa po'i sbyin bdag rnams kyi sems la/_gal te bdag gis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs su gyur pa rnams la byin pa na/_nga'i bu dang bu mo ci zhig za ci zhig gyon
[\[77a.6\]]snyam du chags pa skyed par byed do[#]/_/'jig rten skyong ba bdud kyi rigs gsum po de ni/_sems can rnams rmongs par byed cing [#]'jig rten du rgyu'o[#]/_/bzhi pa rnam pa [#]sna tshogs 'du shes zhes bya ba bdud kyi rigs 'jig rten skyong ba 'jig rten na spyod de/_de rab tu byung ba rnams kyi rab tu byung
[\[77a.7\]]ba'i sems gzhan du byed de/_thog mar chags pa dang sbyor ba [#]dang grong du 'jug pa dang /_zong gi nyo tshong dang bud med la blta ba dang chang 'tshong ma'i khyim du 'jug pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_slu ba dang /_dge 'dun 'byed pa dang sems la gnod pa'i rmi lam skyed par byed do/_/bdud kyi ris
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po de dag ni/_gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ma yin pa smra ba'i skye bo yod pa'i tshe nus par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bdud kyi 'gying bag gi [#]mdo las kyang /_nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi [#]las lhag par gyur pa yin te/_nyi shu dag
[\[77b.2\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par grol ba 'dod pa nyid kyis [#]'khor bas skrag pa rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams la bsnyen pa dang /_bsten [#]pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/stong pa nyid la [#]so sor rtog cing sems can rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/'dus ma byas la [#]so sor
[\[77b.3\]]rtog cing /_'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la skyo ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/bsam gtan skyed par byed cing bsam gtan gyis 'tsho ba yongs su tshol ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/chos ston par byed cing chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje [#]mi 'jug pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/tshul khrims dang yon tan tshol bar
[\[77b.4\]]byed cing tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam rjod par byed cing /_theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab par byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/zab mo'i gtam 'chab par byed cing /_sna tshogs pa'i gtam rjod par byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/
[\[77b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lam la dam 'cha' zhing /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mi tshol ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/mngon par brtson pa'i bsngags pa smra bar 'gyur zhing /_mngon par mi brtson pa'i sems can rnams mngon par sbyor bar mi byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar gsog [#]
[\[77b.6\]]cing /_byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis [#]phyogs pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas shing /_sems can la lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/ma lus par zad par mi tshol [#]zhing /_'khor ba'i nyon
[\[77b.7\]]mongs pa'i rgyun dag la mi spyod pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/shes rab la rnam par spyod cing /_snying rje chen po'i dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/mkhan po dang mi ldan pa'i dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad ni bdud kyi las so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod don du mi gnyer
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]zhing /_rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa ni [#]bdud kyi las so/_/mang du thos pa'i chos kyi dpe mkhyud gzhan gyis shes pa [#]re snyam pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/'jig rten pa'i bya bas g.yengs shing /_mang du thos pa don du mi gnyer ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/byang chub
[\[78a.2\]]sems dpa' chos smra ba po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa mi bsten [#]mi bsnyen mi bkur cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa skal pa mi mnyam pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[78a.3\]]'jig rten skyong ba'am/_rgyal po'am/_tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag gi longs spyod dam/_nor dang rin po che dang /_dbang phyug gis [#]che ba nyid du gyur pa/_de'i tshe chos kyis [#]che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi bsten[#]/_mi bsnyen bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste/_lha'i bu nyi shu po 'di dag ni/_
[\[78a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las lhag pa yin no zhes gsungs so//_//[#]nyo tshong la dgongs pa bstan pa/_dgag dbye'i mdo las kyang /_tshong pa'i sbyor ba la dga' ba la dgag dbye yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang /_/'phags
[\[78a.5\]]pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la/_/de dag rtag tu gus pa med par 'gyur/_/de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yo can te/_/rtag tu kun du ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs/_/rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste/_/de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'/_/kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ci ltas [#]
[\[78a.6\]]kyang /_/'di na bdag dang [#]mtshungs pa med ces smra/_/de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa [#]ste/_/glags tshol [#]bya la rtag tu brtson pa yin/_/de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'/_/de dag dge sbyong dga' bstan [#]shin tu ring /_/phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i/_/dge slong
[\[78a.7\]]tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba/_/de dag mtshang 'dru [#]ba dang 'thab pa dang /_/phrag dog dbang gis da'i chos [#]nub par byed/_/byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring /_/'phags pa'i nor bu dag las [#]shin tu ring /_/'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas na/_/de dag 'gro ba ldar
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]ni 'khyam [#]par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /_rnal 'byor mi brtson mtshan nyid 'di yin te/_/gzhan gyi bud med rnams la rtag tu chags/_/gzugs kyis rgyags shing bcings pa med par 'gyur/_/grong dang grong rdal yul 'khor dag tu 'khyam[#]/_/
[\[78b.2\]]de dag bza' dang btung la rtag tu brtson/_/gar dang glu dang de bzhin rol mo dang /_/nyo dang tshong la rtag tu spro bar 'gyur/_/btung ba la yang chags shing ngo tsha nyams/_/tshul khrims de bzhin spyod lam dor nas ni/_/rnal 'byor mi brtson phrin [#]yig 'khyer bar byed/_/khyim pa dang ni lhan cig
[\[78b.3\]]lugs bcom nas/_/tshul nyams de dag yang dag min la gnas/_/las gang rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis smad pa/_/srang dang 'jal ba'i zol la rtag tu brtson/_/nyon mongs sdig pa'i las de dag byas nas/_/las nyams nas ni ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/spyod
[\[78b.4\]]yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las kyang /_'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi blta bar bya/_nyo tshong gi tha snyad las ldog par bya/_sman dpyad dang snyan dngags [#]dang gtam rgyud la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rgyal po la mngon par dga' ba dang /_khyim gyi las kyi mtha' la yang dag par brtson
[\[78b.5\]]par mi bya/_'dug pa dang ldang pa [#]dang /_'chag pa dang nyal ba la mkhas par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mtshan ma la dgongs pa bstan pa/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs [#]bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di
[\[78b.6\]]lta ste/_kha dog dang rtags [#]dang dbyibs kyi dge sbyong [#]dang /_cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong dang /_brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang /_yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo /_/'od srungs de la kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs kyi dge sbyong gang zhe na/_'od srungs
[\[78b.7\]]'di la dge sbyong kha cig kha dog dang /_rtags dang dbyibs dang ldan par gyur [#]te/_chos gos snam sbyar gyon cing /_mgo bregs [#]te lhung bzed thogs mod kyi/_de lus kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/_ngag gi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/_yid kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod cing /
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]ma dul ba ma zhi ba/_ma bsrungs pa ma byung ba/_'tsho ba yongs su ma dag par brkam pa/_le lo can tshul khrims 'chal ba/_sdig pa'i chos can yin te/_'od srungs de ni kha dog dang /_rtags dang dbyibs kyi dge sbyor zhes bya'o/_/'od srungs 'di la cho ga srung [#]zhing tshul
[\[79a.2\]]'chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/_'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing /_spyod lam bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la zas dang skom ngan pa za zhing 'thung [#]/_'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag gis chog par 'dzin pa bas mtha'i gnas mal la [#]
[\[79a.3\]]mngon par dga' zhing /_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre la/_tshig nyung zhing smra ba nyung mod kyi/_de'i spyod lam de dag kyang tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag [#]gis yongs su brtag pa yin te/_sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_nye bar zhi
[\[79a.4\]]bar bya ba'i tshul ma yin gyi dmigs par lta ba yin te/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas shing /_stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la g.yang sar yang 'du shes pa yin/_stong pa nyid smra ba'i dge slong rnams la yang dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/_'od srungs de ni cho ga
[\[79a.5\]]srung [#]zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/_/'od srungs de la brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/_'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis [#]shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas tshul khrims srung [#]/_ji ltar mang du thos par
[\[79a.6\]]gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags [#]nas thos pa 'dzin/_ji ltar bdag dgon pa par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags [#]nas 'dod pa nyung la chog shes pa dang /_rab tu dben par 'gyur te/_'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir yin gyi/_skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_'dod
[\[79a.7\]]chags dang bral ba'i phyir ma yin/_'gog par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_dge sbyong gi phyir ma yin/_tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin/_'od srungs de ni brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]dge sbyong zhes bya'o/_/'od srungs de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/_'od srungs gang lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin na[#]/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la lta ci smos/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos nas/_dga' zhing
[\[79b.2\]]de bzhin du zhugs pa yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod pa med par spyad pa spyod na/_khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos/_stong pa nyid du lta ba yang mi 'dod pa yin na/_bdag dang sems can dang /_srog dang skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu lta ba lta
[\[79b.3\]]ci smos/_don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin/_nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du tshol gyi/_phyi rol du rgyug [#]pa ma yin/_chos thams cad shin tu yongs su dag cing /_rang bzhin gyis [#]kun nas nyon mongs pa med par mthong bas bdag nyid skyabs yin te/_gzhan skyabs
[\[79b.4\]]ma yin/_de de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid du yang mi lta na/_gzugs kyi skur lta ci smos/_chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lta na/_smra ba'i tshig gi lam nas brjod par lta ci smos/_'phags pa 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la yang rnam par mi rtog na/_mang po 'dus par lta ci
[\[79b.5\]]smos/_chos gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/_bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_'khor bar yang mi skye/_mya ngan las 'das par yang mngon par dga' ba ma yin/_thar pa yang mi dmigs/_bcings pa la yang ma yin la/_chos thams cad rang
[\[79b.6\]]bzhin gyis [#]yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/_kun du mi 'khor/_yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin te/_'od srungs de ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/_/'od srungs yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar brtson par bya'i/_ming gis [#]gnod par mi bya ste/_'od
[\[79b.7\]]srungs dge sbyong ni bzhi po 'di dag go zhes gsungs so/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar bcad pa'i mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi spyod pa 'chal bas/_tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ste/_ngan pa'i tshig spyod pa dang /_mkhas pa ma yin pa'i tshig spyod pa dang /_kun nas
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]nyon mongs pa'i tshig spyod pa dang /_mi mthun par spyod pa dang /_chags par spyod pa dang /_kun du [#]chags par spyod pa dang /_/'dod chags la spyod pa dang /_kun nas 'dod chags la spyod pa dang /_zhe sdang la spyod pa dang /_rab tu zhe sdang la spyod pa dang /_gti mug la spyod pa dang /_
[\[80a.2\]]kun nas gti mug la spyod pa dang /_las kyi mtha' mang ba dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_gnyid la dga' ba dang /_gdu ba la dga' ba dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_spros pa la dga' ba dang /_rigs pa med pa'i gtam dang /_ma dag pa'i gtam dang /_bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_sems can du
[\[80a.3\]]'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_phar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_sman pa'i tha snyad dang khyim sun 'byin pa la dga' ba dang /_pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' byed du 'jug pa dang /_
[\[80a.4\]]khyim pa'i 'du 'dzi byed pa dang /_khyim pa'i go re long byed pa dang /_lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byin pas khyim 'jig [#]pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i sdom pa bdag gir byed pa dang /_gcer bu pa srel pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes spong ba dang /_lo nyi shu ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa
[\[80a.5\]]dang /_yan lag ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_'bru ma btsos pa byin len byed pa dang /_sha ma btsos pa byin len byed pa dang /_gser dang dngul len pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba la mi smod pa dang /_bdag shes pa ma yin pa dang /_gang zag gzhan dang gzhan shes par byed pa dang /_
[\[80a.6\]]brdzun du smra ba dang /_sdom pa lhod pa dang /_gya gyu byed pa dang /_dad pa med pa dang /_sran chung ba dang /_byas pa mi shes pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_le lo dang /_gnyid dang rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_chags pa dang /_sgyu dang g.yo dang
[\[80a.7\]]phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_khrel med pa dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_rgyags pa dang /_bag med pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_kun nas rtsom [#]pa dang /_dga' ba med pa dang /_sgyid lug pa dang /_glal ba dang /_zas kyis dregs [#]pa dang /_sems zhum pa dang /_nga rgyal dang mngon
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang [#]/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_chung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_tshul 'chos dang kha gsag dang gzhogs [#]slong dang /_thob kyis [#]'jal ba dang /_chos dang mi mthun pa dang /_rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang /_ting nge
[\[80b.2\]]'dzin gyi phung po nyams pa dang /_shes rab kyi phung po nyams pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po nyams pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po nyams pa dang /_sangs rgyas la ma dad pa dang /_chos la ma dad pa dang /_dge 'dun la ma dad pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid
