[\[80b.3\]]mi ches pa dang /_tshe 'di la gtso bor byed pa dang /_tshe phyi ma'i chos la gces par mi byed pa dang /_som nyi dang /_yid gnyis dang /_the tshom dang /_pho theg che ba dang /_'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin can yin te/_shA ri'i bu gang zag 'di dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la ngan skyugs dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/
[\[80b.4\]]mi gtsang ba'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa dang /_mi gtsang ba'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa dang /_mi gtsang ba'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa dang /_'tsho ba ma dag pa gang yin pa de dag ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni [#]sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[80b.5\]]nyan thos rnams dang /_de bzhin du gzhan yang dge ba don du gnyer ba rnams dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyis yongs su spong [#]ba'i 'os yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dper na tsan+dan dmar po de ngan skyugs blugs pa'i snod der bcug na/_de yang mi gtsang bar 'gyur zhing smad par
[\[80b.6\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo sde [#]de nyid las/_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag shes nas/_dga' ba'am [#]mgu ba mi 'thob [#]cing /_bdag nyid la lhag par yang gnod par
[\[80b.7\]]byed de/_rang gi spod lam ngan pa la kun du bltas nas/_rang nyid yid gnyis za bar 'gyur zhing /_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag ni bdag kho na'i ched du gsungs kyi/_gzhan la ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bdag kho na'i kun du snang ngo snyam mo/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni dge slong tshul khrims
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ral pa rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos yin te/_des de thos nas thog ma kho nar khro ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de khro ba'i zil gyis non nas dge slong chos smra ba la ma dad pa skyed par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di la 'di ni sangs rgyas
[\[81a.2\]]kyis [#]gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smod cing /_skye bo la 'du shes su byed do zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_shA ri'i bu khyod la go bar bya'o/_/khong du chud par bya'o/_/gang yang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de lta bu dang ldan pa'i mi de dag rtag [#]par rgyun du bar chad med pa [#]lo brgya'i bar
[\[81a.3\]]du bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po bsags pa bas/_dge slong tshul khrims ral pa gang zhig bstan pa 'di la drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyis g.yogs nas/_dad pas byin pa la zhag gcig longs spyod par byed na/_de bas ni [#]ches mang du 'di mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur
[\[81a.4\]]ro/_/gang tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong 'di ni nyin zhag gcig [#]dad pas byin pa la longs spyod na/_de nyid de dag las mi dge ba'i rtsa ba ches mang du mngon par 'du byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dge slong ni bre
[\[81a.5\]]mo'i [#]gtam la dga' ba dang /_bre mo'i [#]gtam la mngon par dga' ba phrag dog can yin no/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'khor can yin no/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa bsten pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam la mi dga' ba yin no/_/mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag dang mi mthun par byed pa
[\[81a.6\]]yin no/_/mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag smra ba la mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa dang /_bstan pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su lta bar byed pa dang /_lag pas gdong 'gebs pa dang /_bar snang la lta bar byed pa dang /_stan las langs te 'gro ba dang /_de
[\[81a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la smod pa dang /_chos smra ba [#]la khro bar byed pa yin no/_/de mi dge ba dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi [#]nyes par spyod pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i [#]'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon brgyad pa yin te/_ngan song
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]rab tu [#]rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du [#]zhugs pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa ni yon tan sgrogs pas slob dpon gtso bor byed pa yin/_grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bstod pas mkhan po gtso bor byed pa yin no/_/tshul khrims dang
[\[81b.2\]]ldan pa'i ming yongs su bsgrags pas 'tsho ba yongs su sgrub pa dang grims pa dang gtogs [#]'dod che ba yin no/_/dper na bya rog bzhin du dge 'dun gyi ming gis bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams yongs su sgrub par byed
[\[81b.3\]]pa yin no/_/mthu dang ldan pa dang lus kyi 'jo [#]sgeg la brtson pa yin no/_/ngo tsha med pa dang 'dzem [#]pa med pa yin no/_/tshig thun tshags su smra ba dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa rgod pa yin no/_/rigs nyams pa yin no/_/bud med la brten pa yin no/_/skyes pa la mi brten pa yin no/_/
[\[81b.4\]]shin tu yongs su 'dris par byed pas gus pa med pa yin no/_/de'i bsngags [#]pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang mi smra'o/_/de'i bsngags [#]pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'tshe ba la dpa' ba dang dge 'dun gyi tha snyad dang ldan pa kun byed pa yin no/_/shA ri'i
[\[81b.5\]]bu gang zag de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi dbang phyug 'dod pa yin no/_/gang ci la bsngags [#]kyang ma dris par smra ba yin no/_/chos gos tshol [#]ba yin no/_/gzhan tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la glags lta ba la brtson pa yin no/_/mtshungs par byed pa yin no/_/dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
[\[81b.6\]]'dzin pa dang /_dam pa ma yin pa'i chos len pa yin no/_/tshogs la dga' ba yin no/_/rtsod pa 'bar bar byed pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon dgu pa yin te/_ngan song rab tu rdzogs par bya bar kun du zhugs pa yin no/_/
[\[81b.7\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa ni rtsod [#]pa len pa yin no/_/'thab mos dga' ba 'thob pa dang /_chos gos la zhen pa yin no/_/'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba dang nyal ba'i bde ba la gzhol ba yin no/_/bsngags pa rnyed na dga' ba dang bshes pa'i khyim dang slong mo [#]ster
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pa'i khyim la 'chums pa yin no/_/khyim la phrag dog byed pa dang gnas la phrag dog byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye ma bdag gi [#]'di dge slong de dag gis ma shes kyang ci ma rung snyam pa sems pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims la sdang ba yin no/_/'chal pa'i tshul
[\[82a.2\]]khrims la kun du dga' ba dang /_sbyin pa'i bsngags [#]pa 'ba' zhig lhag par smra ba yin te/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_nye bar zhi ba rnams kyi ma yin no/_/dgon pa'i gnas dben pa chung zad don gyi sgo nas sam chung zad
[\[82a.3\]]yi ge'i sgo nas ni ma yin te/_dge slong ngo tsha shes pa rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa spyod pas mngon par brtson [#]par byed pa yin no/_/de dge slong sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la chung zad don gyi sgo nas sam/_chung zad yi ge'i sgo nas kyang bsngags pa ma yin pa smra zhing /_
[\[82a.4\]]ci nas kyang skyon 'dogs pa yin no/_/rigs rgyud smra ba la [#]zhugs pa yin no/_/sngon gyi nye du la smos pa dang /_ci'i rgyus [#]chos ston kyang 'di ltar bkren pa'i phyir yin pa dang /_bag tsha ba'i lce gnyis su smra ba dang /_rang gi skye bo mi spong ba dang /_skye bo mang pos myur du zil gyis mnan pa 'thob
[\[82a.5\]]pa dang yid du mi 'thad pa yin no/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la kha zer ba dang /_gdams ngag smra ba'i skyes pa dang /_bud med rnams la mi bsten pa dang /_de mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dang /_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang /_ston pa gang yin pa de dag yid la mi 'thad pa dang /_mdo
[\[82a.6\]]sde 'di lta bu 'di ston pa rnams la dga' ba dang mgu bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag la yang sdang zhing yid du mi 'ong bas/_tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa yin no/_/'di lta bu'i mdo sde ston pa rnams kyi drung du nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/nye bar song na yang slar myur du ldog pa dang /_ltos
[\[82a.7\]]pa med par ston pa yin no/_/byung rgyal du smra ba dang khyim pa nye du ma yin pa la nye dur smos pa yin no/_/dbang phyug gi phyir dbye bar byed pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs la smod par byed pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i [#]tshul
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]khrims kyi skyon bcu pa yin te/_ngan song yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du zhugs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu blun po de dag gi don du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di rab tu ston par mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i
[\[82b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu tshul khrims ral pa'i dge slong 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di thos nas [#]nyams par bya ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la dad pas byin pa rnams la longs spyod par byed pa dag ni chom rkun chen po
[\[82b.3\]]yin no/_/shA ri'i bu chos 'dul ba 'di thos nas/_dga' la [#]rangs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni lhag par dge slong sdig can yin par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la ni/_yang na tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/_yang na ting
[\[82b.4\]]nge 'dzin gyi gtam mam/_yang na shes rab kyi gtam mam/_yang na kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gtam de lta bu gang yang yid du mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di thos na gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag [#]gang zhe na/_tshul khrims
[\[82b.5\]]ral pa'i dge slong gang yin pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gang yin pa dang /_chos ma yin pa'i gtam chos kyi gtam ltar bcos pas yongs su [#]ma dag pa ston pa'i dge slong gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang gsum [#]yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_
[\[82b.6\]]bdag tu lta ba dang srog tu lta ba dang gang zag tu lta ba'o/_/gzhan yang gsum yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_phung por lta ba dang /_khams su lta ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_mdo de nyid las/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mdo sde de [#]ni/_
[\[82b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba dang mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu mdo sde 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyis [#]kun du bzung zhing tshul khrims 'chal pas yongs su spang bar [#]'gyur ro/_/
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan na/_byis pa rnams sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu gang dag gi yan lag dang /_gang dag gi rnam pa dang /_gang dag gi rtags dang /_gang dag gi mtshan mas tshul khrims 'chal pa
[\[83a.2\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di las gsungs te/_tshul khrims 'chal pa ni tshul khrims kyi gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni mnyam par gzhag [#]pa'i gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur/_ser
[\[83a.3\]]sna can ni gtong ba'i [#]gtam la dga' bar mi 'gyur/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi lhag par nga rgyal med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/_g.yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur zhing skrag pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi zang zing dang kha zas lhur len pa ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'i
[\[83a.4\]]bsngags pa smras na yid mi bde ba chen po skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/chos kyi phung po'i mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa 'chi ba'i tshe gdung bar 'gyur/_
[\[83a.5\]]mnar med par 'gyur ro snyam du tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dge slong phyir 'gyod par 'gyur/_'khor gyi nang du skrag par 'gyur/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bdag nyid smra bar 'gyur/_bdag [#]sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]spangs so/_/bdag nyan thos rnams kyis [#]spangs so/_/bdag
[\[83a.6\]]lha rnams kyis [#]spangs so zhes smra bar 'gyur/_de 'jigs [#]pa dang bcas pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang /_ngan song du 'gro ba dang /_mi'i 'thob [#]pa rnyed pa dka' bar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dge slong gi 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon dag go zhes
[\[83a.7\]]gsungs so//_//[#]tshul khrims dang ldan pa brnyas pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang /_phyi ma'i dus na nga yi [#]bu de dag_/kun du smad par gyur pa mthong [#]nas ni/_/de dag nga yi tshig ni dran 'gyur te/_/bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas/_/kyi
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]hud rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang [#]/_/dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dam pa yi [#]ni bstan pa dag_/ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig [#]par 'gyur/_/phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag_/rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/_/de dag grong dang yul 'khor
[\[83b.2\]]grong khyer rnams/_/spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur/_/'byed dang zug gzer [#]'thab mo dga' ba dang /_/yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed/_/de dag skye bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te/_/de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur/_/'dir ni nga yi [#]bstan pa
[\[83b.3\]]yon tan gter/_/yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/_/'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang /_/rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas brus pa dang /_/pad+ma'i rdzing bu yongs su bskams pa dang /_/rin chen mchod sdong chag [#]
[\[83b.4\]]par gnas pa ltar/_/phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos/_/rnam par 'jig [#]'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe/_/dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba/_/de dag nga yi bstan 'di [#]'jig pa yin/_/spyod pa 'di la brten par dga' ba rnams/_/de dag
[\[83b.5\]]bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring /_/'di nas shi 'phos yi dgas 'gro ba dang /_/dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas/_/lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/_/mi bzang drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang /_/rtag tu sdug
[\[83b.6\]]bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag brten pa/_/long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar [#]bar skye bar 'gyur/_/lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'jigs [#]pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur/_/gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa bsten [#]pa ni/_/de la su yang yid
[\[83b.7\]]rton mi 'gyur te/_/de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni rtag tu sma [#]'bab par yang 'gyur/_/de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs/_/mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun/_/bkres dang skom [#]pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs/_yang na de ni rtag par rab tu
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]brnyas/_sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/_/nges pa rnams kyis [#]sdig pa'i spyod bor la/_/legs pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten [#]par gyis/_/'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang /_/bslab [#]dang sbyangs
[\[84a.2\]]pa'i chos la dga' gyur pa/_/gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod spang [#]byos la[#]/_/de dag rtag tu mngon par brtson [#]par gyis/_/'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/'jig par gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang /_/sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral gyur [#]zhing /_/'di la rtag par gang yang med
[\[84a.3\]]rtogs [#]la/_/pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/_/rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis/_/ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa/_/de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams ma byas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_ngas 'khor los sgyur ba'i
[\[84a.4\]]rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste/_ka shi ba phra mo dang /_du gu la'i ras dang /_ko tam pa'i ras dang /_ngang ris can gyi [#]gos rnams spangs nas/_'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i phyir sha na'i ras kyi gos rnams lus la bgos so/_/'od srungs ngas khyod las dar gos ngan pa blangs
[\[84a.5\]]te/_ngas khyod la sha na'i ras byin pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir yin gyi chags pa'i phyir ma yin la lus brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/'od srungs 'di la mi gti mug pa kha cig khyod dang nga'i rjes su mi slob cing brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa chos gos
[\[84a.6\]]sogs par byed pa/_lhung bzed sogs par byed pa[#]/_'jig rten pa'i zang zing sogs par byed pa/_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_'bru sogs par byed pa/_ba lang dang /_lug dang /_bya gag dang /_phag dang /_bong bu dang /_rta dang /_thong [#]gshol dang /_shing rta 'dren pa dag
[\[84a.7\]]nye bar 'jog par byed pa/_khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa dag pas ni/_'od srungs khyim pa dag la khyad par du 'gyur ba yod kyi/_mi blun po rab tu byung ba'i mtshams las 'das pa de dag la ni khyad par du 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/'od srungs khyim pa rnams khyad par du 'gyur ba
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ni dge sbyong ma yin pa la de dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba/_gos ngur smrig bgos shing bya ba mang ba/_sbags pa sna tshogs kyis sbags pa/_zas dang gos lhur len pa de dag khyim pa dag gis gos [#]ngur smrig gyon par rig nas/_
[\[84b.2\]]zhe sa dang gus pa bskyed pa dang chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyis [#]sdud par byed pa dang /_gus par smra zhing /_phyag 'tshal ba dang ldang bar byed pa ste/_'od srungs 'di ni khyim bdag gi [#]khyad par du gyur pa'i chos yin gyi/_de dag rab tu byung ba de dag ni [#]med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar
[\[84b.3\]]de dag ni yongs su len pa la brtson pa ma yin zhing /_ci yang mi sogs pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srungs de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong phal cher lhung bzed dang /_chos gos mang zhing snod spyad mang ba dang /_rnyed pa mang bar 'gyur te/_de dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_btsun par byed par 'gyur/_
[\[84b.4\]]ri mo byed cing mchod pa [#]byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de sbyin pa dang /_phyir sbyin pa dus dus su byed cing /_bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos can zag pa rnams zad par byed pa la mngon par brtson
[\[84b.5\]]pa/_yid byung ba mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson pa/_don nyung ba [#]byed pa nyung ba/_rang gi don la brtson pa/_'dris [#]par byed pa yongs su spangs pa dag 'byung ba de dag gi gan du ni/_de'i tshe de'i dus na su yang mi 'gro mi bsten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i
[\[84b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar khyim pa dag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can tshe 'di lhur len gyi tshe rabs phyi ma lhur len pa ma yin pas de dag 'di snyam du/_dge slong de dag la ni bdag cag gi 'tshe ba med na/_bdag gis ci'i phyir bsten[#]/_ci'i phyir phyag bya ci'i phyir mchong /_ci'i phyir bsnyen
[\[84b.7\]]bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan du na gang dag [#]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de dag la bsten par byed/_bsnyen [#]par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo /_/'od
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]srungs chos 'di lta bu'i tshul dang mthun pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni/_gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_bden pa mthong zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta [#]ba dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa/_las kyi rnam
[\[85a.2\]]par smin pa la rton pa chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa'o/_/'od srungs mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba/_las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba/_'jig rten pha rol du [#]kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba/_tshe 'di lhur len pa/_tshe rabs phyi ma lhur mi len pa thams
[\[85a.3\]]cad kyi sgo ngas [#]bshad par bya'o/_/'od srungs gang dag tha na thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig [#]tsam yang mi bskyed [#]pa'i gti mug pa de dag la ni/_ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs mi 'byed kyi/_steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos nas/_bdag sgrub pa las nyams par rig nas/_smad
[\[85a.4\]]par bya bar sems te/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/_'di dag ni rang bzor sbyar ba'am/_bdud kyis mtho btsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing /_de dag 'di ltar skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni bdag kyang phung la/_gzhan dag
[\[85a.5\]]kyang phung bar byed par 'gyur/_bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la/_gzhan yang nyon mongs pa can du byed par 'gyur te/_de ltar mi [#]gti mug pa de dag ni bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las kyang /_
[\[85a.6\]]shA ri'i bu de la dge slong sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag ni/_phung por 'du shes pa/_khams su 'du shes pa/_skye mched du 'du shes pa/_gang zag tu lta ba/_rgan pas gnas brtan du gyur pa/_gti mug gis rnyogs [#]pa/_lam gol ba [#]
[\[85a.7\]]nas dong ba/_lhag par nga rgyal ba/_log par lta ba de dag gis smras pa/_de la mngon par mi dga' zhing rjes su yi mi rang nas stan las langs te 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe lha'i tshogs chen po yid rab tu dga' ba rnams/_da dung [#]yang shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos rnams gnas
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]so zhes phyogs bzhir sgra shin tu sgrogs [#]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu [#]gang dag 'di ni/_gang zag tu lta ba'o [#]zhes yongs su ma dag pa'i bzod pa 'di dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba nyang nyung dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/de dag gi bsam pa rig nas lha'i tshogs chen po
[\[85b.2\]]dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pa/_yid cher rangs pa de dag ched du brjod pa cher ched du brjod par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu yang dge slong de dag sangs rgyas kyi sras yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can/_mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can rnams la mi dga' bar 'gyur/_de dag der tshul gcig tu
[\[85b.3\]]sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de'i tshe tshogs nas bsdus te tshogs kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shin tu zil gyis mnan pa nyid kyis so/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar de'i tshe nga'i sras nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis yab kyi gnas dang yab kyi spyod yul la snyan par smra ba
[\[85b.4\]]yang rnyed par mi 'gyur na/_gtsug lag khang du gnas pa dang bkur sti lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba la ltos/_gang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa [#]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang dag_/legs
[\[85b.5\]]par thub pa legs par zhi ba/_legs par dul zhing mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can dag de'i shin tu zil gyis gnon cing yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i sras dag yab kyi spyod yul gang la bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur snyam du gang ngas de dag gi don gyi phyir bskal pa grangs med
[\[85b.6\]]par nye [#]bar blangs nas/_g.yul chen po [#]pham par byas pa dang /_rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/shA ri'i bu de la chos 'dul ba de ltar dang zhing de ltar rgya che ba 'di la chom rkun pa'i tshogs chen po dang dmu rgod kyi tshogs chen pos bsnub par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la ji ltar ngas chos kyis bla na med
[\[85b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am lha'am bdud dam tshangs pa'am sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ba/_chos ma yin pas ma yin pa nga'i gnas
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]'di la/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon sum du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang na de ltar mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu yod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di rgyas par byed
[\[86a.2\]]pa rnams kyis [#]chos dang mthun par [#]dbang po'ang dris pa na lan gdab pa'i phyir mi smra'o/_/de'i tshe nga'i sras de dag la yang [#]mi 'jigs pa yang mi ster ro/_/shA ri'i [#]bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig lam gyi bzhi [#]mdo chen por sbrang rtsi'i bum pa nye bar bzhag nas/_'di skad du [#]sbrang rtsi'i bum
[\[86a.3\]]pa rnam pa brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang yongs su zos na/_de rga ba [#]dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur zhing /_sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de la lag na mtshon cha thogs pa mang po ral gri dag gis bsrung bar 'gyur la/_shA ri'i [#]bu de'i tshe srung [#]ma rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
[\[86a.4\]]par 'di snyam du/_gang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam pa brgyar chag [#]pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang za na[#]/_de'i srog kyang med do zhes sems par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i [#]bu de la 'ga' zhig 'di snyam du gang zhig sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnam pa brgyar chag pa 'di las tha na skra'i rtse mo tsam zhig kyang zos na
[\[86a.5\]]bdag la rga ba [#]dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_gang bdag gi [#]srog kyang yongs su btang nas [#]sbrang rtsi'i bum pa 'di las bza' bar bya'o/_/gal te mtshon rnams bab par ma gyur pa na sbrang rtsi'i bum pa 'di las bza' bar nus na/_phyi nas mtshon gyis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur/_rga ba dang [#]'chi
[\[86a.6\]]ba med pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes sems par 'gyur ro/_/de srog yongs su btang nas srog la ltos [#]pa med par 'gyur te sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de las len par byed pa de la lag na mtshon cha thogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po lhags [#]par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshon cha ma lhung
[\[86a.7\]]ba [#]na sbrang rtsi'i bum pa de las [#]bza' bar nus na/_de de nas sdug bsngal chen po las grol bar 'gyur/_rga ba [#]dang 'chi ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i [#]bu de ltar dkar po'i chos mang po rnams bsnub pa'i phyir du bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gang bdud
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]kyis mngags [#]pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong [#]ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang [#]/_dge bsnyen ma [#]rnams 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /_gang zhig tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/_/byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod la mkhas/_/legs
[\[86b.2\]]bsdams 'jam zhing des pa 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ni de yi [#]dus na zil non 'gyur[#]/_/gang zhig slar yang gdug pa'i sems ldan zhing /_/shin tu ma rungs drag cing las nyams la/_/chos ma yin spyod rtsod la dga' 'byung ba/_/de ni de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[86b.3\]]zla ba'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_gzhan [#]yang chags pa de dag ni/_/sdig pa'i dge slong sten par byed/_/dge slong de dag mchod rten dang /_/dge 'dun [#]zas skom 'bras bu'i ro/_/khyim pa [#]rnams la sbyin byed cing /_/slar yang mchod pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de dag la ni yongs 'dzin pa/_/bran
[\[86b.4\]]dang bran mo khyim ster 'gyur/_/dge slong las gsum dang bral ba/_/thos pas [#]rlom zhing lhung [#]dang bcas/_/bsam gtan tshul khrims mi mthun pa/_/tshogs kyi nang du gtso bor 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ldan rnams dong ba na/_/nor gyi rgyu yis 'thab par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_/yang
[\[86b.5\]]mdo de nyid las/_dge slong 'di ni tshul 'chos [#]can/_/rkun po mchog tu ma rungs pa/_/gang zhig de la mchod byed pa/_/grags pa ma yin mang du 'thob/_/de la bsod nams 'thob mi 'gyur/_/de yis [#]bshad pa ma nyan zhes/_/khyim pa rnams la smra bar byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/
[\[86b.6\]]gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang /_yul 'khor du ni gdon [#]'jug cing /_/mi bzang pa yi nad kyang 'byung /_/de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang /_/chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/_/de yi 'khor dang blon [#]po yang /_/chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/_/chos dang mi ldan skye bo la/_/de yi 'og tu
[\[86b.7\]]mchod byed 'gyur/_/chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la/_/rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur/_/chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur/_/chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na/_/der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung /_/rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur/_/chos min skye bo bzung bas na/_/dam chos ro yi
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]snying po mdangs/_/sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud/_/dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig_/skye bo ngan pa rab bkur zhing [#]/_/skye bo dam pa smad pas na/_/'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang /_/rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/sa'i snying
[\[87a.2\]]po'i [#]mdo las kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to[#]/_/rigs kyi bu khyod phyi ma [#]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can dag nyon mongs pas yongs su gdungs nas sdig pa spyod cing /_byis pa gti
[\[87a.3\]]mug can gdul dka' bar gyur pa gang /_rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /_blon po gdol pa can dang /_khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /_tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /_dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /_bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang /_dad pa'i sems med pa/_g.yo
[\[87a.4\]]dang sgyus [#]'tsho ba/_gti mug dang /_shes pa snyems [#]pa can/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba/_smra ba'i tshig bden pa med pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang [#]/_brnyas shing dbang za ba/_tshig ngan pas rnam par 'thing ba/_dam pa'i chos la the tshom za zhing log par lta
[\[87a.5\]]ba/_'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bus mi 'jigs pa/_rtag tu ngang tshul ngan pa can dag dang bsten par dga' ba/_srog gcod pa nas legs [#]par lta ba'i bar du spyod pa la dga' zhing g.yo dang sgyus [#]'jig rten pa slu ba dang /_bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa
[\[87a.6\]]can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du/_nga'i chos 'jig par byed pa/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung na yang tshul khrims nyams shing 'jig rten gyi 'du 'dzi'i las byed par spro ba la/_rgyal rigs dang bram ze la sogs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa dang /_khe la brkam pas nor
[\[87a.7\]]gyi phyir tshig tsam du smra zhing spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/_phan tshun du 'phrin [#]gyi yi ge skyel [#]ba la dga' ba dang /_tshong dang khe spogs byed cing /_'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtsug lag slob pa dang /_zhing rmo ba'i las la dga' ba dang /_nor rin po che sogs shing sbed pa dang /_khang khyim dang chung
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]ma dang /_bu smad srung [#]ba dang /_'jig rten gyi sngags [#]dang /_phyag rgyas 'byung po 'khol ba dang /_ltas bzang ngan lta ba dang /_sman sbyar cing nad gso ba'i nor gyis 'tsho ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyan la chags shing /_khyim pa'i las byed pa la dga' ba dang /_
[\[87b.2\]]tshul khrims 'dral zhing sdig pa [#]spyod pa dang /_dung gi sgra la khyi'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba yod de/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas[#]/_bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du/_de dag la bsnyen bkur byed
[\[87b.3\]]cing /_bsti stang [#]dang bcas pas [#]mchod pa byed de/_de dag gi ngag kyang nyan to[#]/_/tshul khrims nyams pa de dag kyang /_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze [#]gdol pa can gyi bar du/_de dag la brten par dga' zhing /_bkur sti dang /_rim gro byed de de'i ngag nyan to/_/gal te gang zag 'ga'
[\[87b.4\]]zhig nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa nan tan byed pa nas/_'bras bu'i mthar phyin gyi bar du gyur pa la/_rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du/_de dag gis [#]de la phrag dog byed de/_bsnyen bkur dang /_
[\[87b.5\]]bsti stang dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod pa [#]mi byed cing /_slar ngag nyan par yang mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste mi la la zhig rin po che'i gling du phyin pa las/_rin po che in+d+ra nI la dang /_ma hA nI la dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_rin thang
[\[87b.6\]]med pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs bor nas/_nor bu mching bu len pa ltar/_de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du yang de dang 'dra ste/_ngas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos [#]kyi rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/_tshul khrims
[\[87b.7\]]dang /_yon tan gyis [#]phyug pa/_don dam pa'i bden pa la dga' ba dang /_'dzem pa dang /_ngo tsha bar ldan pa/_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i gang zag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug nan tan byed pa la brtson pa'i so so'i skye bo dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa/_'phags pa'i 'khor spangs nas/_tshul
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]khrims nyams pa/_sdig pa mang po spyod pa/_ngo tsha ba med pa/_'dzem pa med pa/_tshig brlang zhing rtsub pa/_lus dang sems nga rgyal gyis dregs pa/_rnam par dkar ba'i chos dang bral ba/_byams pa'i sems med pa/_snying rje med pa/_sdig pa'i dge slong dag
[\[88a.2\]]la [#]bsod nams kyi zhing du 'dzin cing /_bkur sti dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod pa byed de de'i ngag nyan to/_/de ltar sdig pa can de dag ni slob dpon dang /_slob mar bcas te gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//[#]rab tu byung
[\[88a.3\]]ba'i bsngags pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las kyang /_blo gros rgya mtsho de nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des/_rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis [#]yongs
[\[88a.4\]]su spyad pa'i phyir/_rgyal srid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la phul zin na/_rgyal po chen po khyod dad pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung shig[# ]/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni/_
[\[88a.5\]]don che ba/_phan yon che ba/_rgya che ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'thob pa chen po ni nyi shu po 'di dag ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dag go/_/nyi shu po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal srid dang /_longs
[\[88a.6\]]spyod dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_dbang phyug dag 'dor bas nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa 'thob pa dang /_khyim nas 'byung ba la gzhol bas nyon mongs pa las 'byung ba 'thob pa dang /_ngur smrig 'dzin pas rnyog pa med pa'i sems 'thob pa dang /_'phags pa'i rigs kyi [#]
[\[88a.7\]]chog shes pas dgong [#]sla ba dang /_gso sla ba 'thob pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa yang dag par len pas/_'dod pa che ba dang /_sdig pa 'dod pa spong ba 'thob pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas/_lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'dor bas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'thob pa dang /_dgon pa dben pa na gnas pas/_'du 'dzi dang mi 'dre ba 'thob pa dang /_gnod pa med pas chos sems pa'i bde ba 'thob [#]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par bsgrubs pas sems las su rung ba 'thob pa dang /_thos pa
[\[88b.2\]]yongs su tshol bas shes rab chen po 'thob pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas ye shes chen po 'thob pa dang /_don nyung zhing byed pa nyung bas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa 'thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid pas byams pa chen po 'thob pa dang /_sems can
[\[88b.3\]]thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po 'thob pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'thob [#]pa dang /_sems rab tu sbyangs pas mngon par shes pa chen po 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob pa dang /_
[\[88b.4\]]tshul bzhin gyi chos la so sor rtog [#]pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa [#]'thob pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i spyod pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob pa ste/_rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'thob pa chen po nyi shu po 'di dag
[\[88b.5\]]rnyed par dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung shig [#]ces gsungs so/_/rab tu byung ba la bar chad byed pa'i mdo las kyang /_bdud kyi 'ching ba bcom byas nas[#]/_/byang chub snying po'i lam [#]dag dang /_/kun mkhyen ye
[\[88b.6\]]shes tshol ba yis/_/rab tu byung phyir myur du dong /_/so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang /_/tshul khrims ma nyams bsrung bar gyis/_/sems can rnams ni thams cad la/_/byams sems rnam par bsgom [#]par gyis/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas ni/_/mtho ris dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[88b.7\]]mi khom pa dag spong 'gyur zhing /_/de dag dal ba rnyed dka' min/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas ni/_/sangs rgyas myur du mthong ba dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bshes 'gyur te/_/de phyir 'dod pa bsten mi bya/_/'di yang nga yi lam min zhing /_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs lam/_/
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]drang po des ni sdug bsngal dag_/kun las sgrol zhing mya ngan 'da'/_/gang dag shes rab 'chal rang bzhin/_/khyim du 'dod pa nges bsten pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i lam spangs nas/_/de ni ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de phyir 'dod pa rnam [#]spangs nas/_/
[\[89a.2\]]myur du rab tu 'byung [#]bar dong /_/lam 'di drang po rnams kyi phyir/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par gsungs/_/gang zhig 'di 'dra'i mdo sde ni/_/thos nas log par rtogs 'gyur ba/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa spangs nas su/_/myur du ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de ni pha dang ma yis
[\[89a.3\]]kyang /_/sdug bsngal ba las sgrol mi nus/_/de phyir tshul bzhin bsams nas ni/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/dri med tshul khrims bsrung byas na/_/nor 'dzin 'di dag g.yo 'gyur zhing /_/dpung bcas bdud ni brdzi [#]bar 'gyur/_/de phyir rab tu byung bar dong /_/de la lha dbang brgya
[\[89a.4\]]byin dang /_/gang dag lha gzhan chen po rnams/_/de kun de la phyag byed cing /_/dge slong rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/_/gang la so so'i skye chags pa/_/zol gyi las rnams btang byas nas/_/byang chub dam pa 'dod pa na/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/dmyal bar 'bar ba'i lus kyi [#]ni/_/
[\[89a.5\]]sdug bsngal tshor ba de shes nas[#]/_/thar pa'i sgo dag tshol ba na/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/mi gtsang khron pa'i tshogs nang du/_/shin tu gnod par byed sgo [#]can/_/'jig rten gsum po 'phyan mthong nas/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/[#]'jig rten zang zing tshol ba dang [#]/_/bu ni ngan song
[\[89a.6\]]'khrid par 'gyur/_/dri nga'i chung ma bsten pa yi[#]/_/rkang pa lag pa gcod par 'gyur/_/bud med dag ni rnam spang phyir/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/zag dang bcas pa'i las byas nas/_/rgan po rnams la zas byin [#]byed/_/de dag bdag la smod byed cing /_/bu ni ngan song 'gro bar
[\[89a.7\]]'gyur/_/'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/bdag gis don min byas par 'gyur/_/rdzas ngan dag la gang brten [#]pa/_/de dag sdig pa'i grogs zhes brjod/_/chos las log par byed gyur pa/_/de ni pha dang ma min no/_/gang dag chos mchod rjod [#]byed cing /_/sangs rgyas chos la
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]dga' byed pa/_/myur du rab tu byung smra ba/_/pha ma de dag bde ba can/_/dal ba thob nas kun mkhyen gyi/_/chos ni 'di 'dra [#]thob 'gyur te/_/las rnams thams cad btang byas te/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/ji ltar ston pa thams cad mkhyen/_/'di 'dra'i zhing gzhan yod min cing /_/'di
[\[89b.2\]]'dra'i [#]bde ba gzhan yod min/_/myur du rab tu byung bar dong /_/gling bzhi po dag spang byas nas/_/tshogs ni rnyed par dka' ma yin/_/nga [#]ni myur du rab byung na/_/ji ltar gzhan lta rab [#]mi 'byung /_/sems can bsod nams byas gang la/_/'di rnyed [#]smra bar nus par 'gyur/_/de ltar de phyir tshul
[\[89b.3\]]bzhin du/_/brtags nas myur du rab byung dong /_/bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/_/'di 'dra'i chos ni mi thos so/_/de phyir skyo ba drag po ni/_/skyed pas [#]rab tu byung bar dong /_/zhes gsungs so/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas te/_
[\[89b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni/_gang yang med de/_de dag thams cad kyang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung nas dgon pa la sems/_dgon pa la gzhol/_dgon par song nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
[\[89b.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/tshogs de yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni [#]kun du gnod pa ste/_rdul 'bab pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa'i skyon chags pa mang ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni yon tan
[\[89b.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa mang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyam nga ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bag yangs pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i dri ma can no/_/rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyes par spyod pa'i gzhi'o/_/rab tu
[\[89b.7\]]byung ba ni legs par spyod pa'i gzhi'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rdul gyi nang na gnas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni rdul gyi nang na mi gnas pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'dod pa'i 'dam nas 'byin pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni byis pa'i skye bo'i [#]zhugs
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni skye bo mkhas pa'i zhugs pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'tsho ba sbyang bar dka' ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'tsho ba sbyang bar [#]sla ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'gran zla mang ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'gran zla med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni phongs pa mang ba'o/_/rab tu
[\[90a.2\]]byung ba ni phongs pa med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mya ngan gyi gnas so/_/rab tu byung ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni ngan song gi them skas so/_/rab tu byung ba ni mngon par mtho ba'i them skas so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bcings pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni thar pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni
[\[90a.3\]]'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni chad pa dang bcas par spyod pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni chad pa med par spyod pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mtshon cha'i spyod pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mtshon cha mi spyod pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni
[\[90a.4\]]yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni kun du tshor bas sdug bsngal ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni kun du tshor ba [#]med pas bde ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rgod pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni nye bar zhi ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'jungs
[\[90a.5\]]pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni ma 'jungs pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni zhan pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mi zhan pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni ma rabs so/_/rab tu byung ba ni ya rabs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni kun du 'bar ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'bar ba zhi ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rang gi [#]don
[\[90a.6\]]to/_/rab tu byung ba ni gnyis ka'i don to/_/khyim na gnas pa ni don chung ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni don che ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gzi chung ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni gzi che ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pas sdug bsngal ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mngon par byung bas bde
[\[90a.7\]]ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni tshor ma bskyed [#]pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni tshor ma bsal [#]ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni chos chung ngu dang ldan pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni chos chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'dul ba ma yin pa byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'dul ba byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]pa ni 'gyod pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mi 'gyod pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mchi [#]ma dang nu zho dang khrag gi rgya mtsho 'phel ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mchi [#]ma dang nu zho dang khrag gi rgya mtsho skem [#]pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis smad pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni sangs
[\[90b.2\]]rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis [#]bsngags pa'o/_khyim na gnas pa ni chog mi shes pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni chog shes pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bdud dga' ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bdud mya ngan byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rnyog pa chen po'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[90b.3\]]rab tu byung ba ni rnyog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mthar thug pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni brdzi bar bya ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni brdzi bar mi bya'o[#]/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bran gyi las byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni rje bo byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni
[\[90b.4\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni g.yang sa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni g.yang sa las 'das pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mun nag go/_/rab tu byung ba ni snang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni dbang po la dbang mi byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni dbang po la dbang byed pa'o/_/
[\[90b.5\]]khyim na gnas pa ni dregs pa bskyed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni dregs pa 'dul ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni dam pa ma yin pa bskyed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bde 'gro bskyed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni blta bar mi 'os pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni blta bar 'os pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni brtson pa chung [#]
[\[90b.6\]]pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni brtson pa che ba[#]'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'bras bu chung ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'bras bu che ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gya gyu can no/_/rab tu byung ba ni drang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni yid mi bde ba mang ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni yid bde ba mang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas
[\[90b.7\]]pa ni zug rngu dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni zug rngu byung ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni na ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni nad med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni chos rgas par byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni chos dar bar byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bag med par byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bag yod par
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi 'byung gnas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni shes rab 'phel ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni shes rab kyi bar chad byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni shes rab kyi srog byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni slu bar so sor nye bar gnas
[\[91a.2\]]pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mi slu bar so sor nye bar gnas pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni byed pa mang ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni byed pa nyung ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni dug dang bcas pa'i btung ba lta bu'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i btung ba lta bu'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gnod pa can no/_/
[\[91a.3\]]rab tu byung ba ni gnod pa med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'dres pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni ma 'dres pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni kim pa ka'i 'bras bu lta bu'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu lta bu'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mi sdug pa dang phrad [#]par byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mi
[\[91a.4\]]sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sdug pa dang phrad par [#]byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni sdug pa dang bral bar [#]byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gti mug gis lci ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni ye shes kyis yang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sbyor ba rnam par 'jig [#]pa'o/_/rab
[\[91a.5\]]tu byung ba ni sbyor ba rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bsam pa rnam par 'jig [#]pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'jog pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa [#]rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni
[\[91a.6\]]dpung gnyen med par byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni dpung gnyen byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mgon med par byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mgon byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gnas med par byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni gnas byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni skyabs med par byed pa'o/_/
[\[91a.7\]]rab tu byung ba ni skyabs byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gnod sems mang ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni byams pa mang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni khur khyer ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni khur bor ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni thug pa med par spyod pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni spyod pa thams cad mthar 'byin
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gdung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni gdung bar mi 'gyur ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/
[\[91b.2\]]khyim na gnas pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni zang zing med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mngon pa'i [#]nga rgyal med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nor snying por byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni yon tan snying por byed pa'o/_/khyim
[\[91b.3\]]na gnas pa ni yams kyi nad do/_/rab tu byung ba ni yams kyi nad zhi bar byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'bri ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni 'phel ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rnyed par sla ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bskal ba brgya stong du yang rnyed par dka' ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bya sla ba'o/_/rab
[\[91b.4\]]tu byung ba ni bya dka' ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni chu bo'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni gzings so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i chu bo'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni zam pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni tshu rol
[\[91b.5\]]gyi ngogs so/_/rab tu byung ba ni pha rol gyi ngogs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni glags pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni ma glags pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni khon [#]du 'dzin pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni khon [#]du 'dzin pa zhi ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal po'i nan tur bzhin byed pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni sangs
[\[91b.6\]]rgyas kyi bstan pa bzhin byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyam thag pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni nyam thag pa med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bde ba [#]'byung ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sgang bu'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni zab pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni grogs
[\[91b.7\]]mang ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni grogs dkon pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni chung ma dang 'grogs pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mos pa dang 'grogs pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rgya dang 'dra ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni rgya bral [#]ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gzhan la gnod pa [#]byed pa gces su rtsi ba'o/_/rab tu
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]byung ba ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa gces [#]su rtsi ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni zang zing gi sbyin pa ched cher 'dzin pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni chos kyi sbyin pa ched cher 'dzin pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin
[\[92a.2\]]pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sdug bsngal gyi gzhi'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni sdug bsngal gyi gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni phung po 'phel ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni phung po thams cad nges par 'dor ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni thibs po'o[#]/_/rab tu byung ba ni thibs po las thar
[\[92a.3\]]pa yin te/_khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rin po che'i tog las kyang /_'jig rten rga [#]bas gzir gyur cing /_/'chi bdag gis [#]ni yongs bskor ba/_/de phyir gnyi ga spang ba'i phyir/_/rab tu byung ba legs par gzung /_/
[\[92a.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/dri ma med par grags pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_thams cad nas kha na ma tho ba med pa 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi [#]yo byad bsnyungs pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang /_kha na ma tho ba
[\[92a.5\]]med par bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms spyod pa la 'jug go zhes gsungs so/_/bzhi pa brjod pa'i mdo las kyang /_lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod tshul [#]yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_gang 'di lta ste/_khyim pa'i longs spyod dor nas rang gi longs spyod kyis[#] chog shes
[\[92a.6\]]pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor mngon par mi 'dod pa nyid dang /_rab tu byung nas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi yo byad bsnyungs pa nyid de/_bzhi po 'di dag go zhes gsungs so/_/sa'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_gdul bar dka' ba'i sems sreg [#]cing /_/dge slong
[\[92a.7\]]rnams pa rtsol [#]mi byed/_/'phags pa'i rigs la dag 'gyur na/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i dge slong spong byed cing /_/'phags la gus pas sten [#]par byed/_/dge 'dun rdzas dag mi za na/_/myur du byang chub reg par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]sems dpa'i lam gyi mdo las kyang /_byang chub sems dpas [#]bran ma yin pa dang /_'tsho ba gzhan la rag ma las pas 'tsho bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa [#]nyan thos kyi sa las kyang /_ji ltar na sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms
[\[92b.2\]]pa dang /_mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_stan gcig pa dang /_zas phyis mi len pa dang /_chos gos gsum [#]pa dang /_phying pa pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa dang /_dgon pa pa dang /_shing drung pa dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod pa dang /_cog pu pa dang /_gzhi ji bzhin pa ste/_de
[\[92b.3\]]dag kyang bsod snyoms pa dang /_chos gos dang /_gnas mal las brtsams nas/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis sam bcu gsum du 'gyur ro/_/de la bsod snyoms pa nyid las dbye na rnam pa gnyis te/_rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_mthar gyis [#]slong ba'i bsod snyoms
[\[92b.4\]]pa'o/_/de la rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dris pa'i khyim dag nas ci thob pa dang /_ci snyed pa tsam [#]za bar byed pa'o/_/mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa gang zhe na/_khyim rnams su khang khyim nas khang khyim du bslangs shing brgyus te/_bsod snyoms
[\[92b.5\]]ci thob pa dang /_ci snyed [#]pa za bar byed kyi/_bdag gis [#]'di nas bza' ba dang /_bca' ba bzang po ci tsam 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas mgo 'phang [#]bstod de/_khyim rnams su mi 'gro ba gang yin pa'o/_/de la bsod snyoms pa nyid bye brag tu ma phye ba las brtsams nas ni sbyangs
[\[92b.6\]]pa'i [#]yon tan bcu gnyis su 'gyur la/_bye brag tu phye ba las brtsams na ni bcu gsum mo/_/de la stan [#]gcig pa nyid gang zhe na/_stan gcig la 'dug nas ji tsam za bar byed pa de tsam za bar byed kyi/_stan de las langs nas za bar mi byed pa ste/_de ni stan gcig pa nyid ces bya'o/_/
[\[92b.7\]]zas phyis mi len pa nyid gang zhe na/_zas kyi [#]phyir 'dug nas ji srid du ji tsam gyis bdag 'tsho bar shes pa'i zas thams cad ma mnos pa de srid za bar mi byed cing /_gang las bdag gi zas kyi bya ba de las lhag pa med do snyam du shes par gyur pa/_de'i 'og tu thams cad blangs nas za bar
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]rtsom pa [#]ste/_de ltar na zas phyis mi len pa yin no/_/ji ltar na chos gos gsum pa yin zhe na/_chos gos gsum po snam sbyar dang /_bla gos dang mthang [#]gos kyis 'tsho bar byed cing chos gos gsum las lhag pa'i gos gzhan mi 'chang ba yin te/_de ltar
[\[93a.2\]]na chos gos gsum pa yin no/_/ji ltar na phying ba pa yin zhe na/_chos gos gsum pa'am/_gos lhag pa [#]gang cung zad cig [#]'chang ba de dag thams cad bal las byas pa sha stag 'chang gi gzhan ma yin pa ste/_de ltar na phying pa pa yin no/_/ji ltar na phyag dar khrod pa yin zhe
[\[93a.3\]]na/_gzhan dag gis [#]lam po che'am/_lam srang ngam/_bzhi mdo'am/_sum mdo'am/_lam ka'am/_lam gol bar bor ba dang /_spangs pa dang [#]/_btang ba'i gos bshang bas reg pa'am/_gci bas reg pa'am/_bshang gci dang /_rnag dang /_khrag dang /_mchil [#]mas
[\[93a.4\]]reg pa gang yin pa de las mi gtsang ba gang yin pa de bor la/_tha gi ba blangs te bkrus la/_drubs [#]te kha dog bsgyur cing 'chang ba yin te/_de ltar na phyag dar khrod pa yin no/_/ji ltar na dgon pa pa yin zhe na/_grong dang grong rdal las dben pa'i gnas mal dgon pa dang /_nags
[\[93a.5\]]'dab dang /_bas mtha' gang dag yin pa dag tu gnas par byed pa yin te/_de ltar na dgon pa pa yin no/_/ji ltar na shing drung pa yin zhe na/_shing drung du gnas 'cha' zhing /_shing drung la brten pa yin te/_de ltar na shing drung pa yin no/_/ji ltar na bla gab med pa yin zhe na/_ma bkab
[\[93a.6\]]pa dang ma g.yogs pa'i phyogs bla gab med par gnas 'cha' bar byed pa yin te/_de ltar na bla gab med pa yin no/_/ji ltar na dur khrod pa yin zhe na/_gang du skye bo'i tshogs shi'o cog 'dor ba'i dur khrod du gnas 'cha' bar byed pa yin te/_de ltar na dur khrod pa yin no/_/ji ltar na cog
[\[93a.7\]]pu pa yin zhe na/_khri'am/_khri'u'am/_rtswa bting ba'i steng du cog pur 'dug ste/_dus yol bar byed cing /_khri 'am/_khri'u 'am/_rtsig pa 'am/_shing ngam/_rtswa bting ba la rgyab bam[#]/_glos mi brten pa yin te/_de ltar na cog pu pa yin no/_/ji ltar na gzhi ji bzhin pa yin zhe na/
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]gang du rtswa bting ba'am/_lo ma bting ba'i steng du/_mal 'cha' bar byed cing /_rtswa bting ba'am/_lo ma bting ba de yang lan cig ji ltar bting ba de kho na'i steng du mal 'cha' bar byed kyi/_yang dang yang du mi rje mi 'chos pa yin te/_de ltar na gzhi ji bzhin pa yin no/_/de [#]ci'i phyir de dag la sbyangs
[\[93b.2\]]pa'i yon tan zhes bya zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na bal lam/_shing bal ni gang gi tshe ma bstsal [#]ma bshig ma rmel ba de'i tshe na/_'dzings shing mi 'jam[#]/_mi yang la 'di lta ste/_skud par bkal ba'am/_'da' bar bya ba'i las su mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin du 'di na la la bsod snyoms la chags
[\[93b.3\]]pas bsod snyoms la sems zhen cing kun du zhen pa dang /_chos gos la chags pas chos gos la sems [#]zhen cing /_kun du zhen pa dang /_mal stan la chags pas mal stan la sems zhen cing kun du zhen pa de sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gis 'di lta ste/_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par
[\[93b.4\]]bya ba'i phyir/_sems rnam par spyod bar byed/_drang por byed/_mnyen par byed/_las su rung bar byed/_rnal bar [#]byed/_btub [#]par byed/_rung bar byed pas na/_de'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya'o/_/de la bsod snyoms la chags pa ni bar chad rnam pa gnyis yin te/_zas bzang po la
[\[93b.5\]]chags pa dang /_zas mang po la chags pa'o/_/de'i phyir zas bzang po la [#]chags pa spang ba'i phyir bsod snyoms pa yin no/_/zas mang po la chags pa spang ba'i phyir stan gcig pa dang /_zas phyis mi len pa yin no/_/de la chos gos la chags pa ni bar chad rnam pa gsum yin te/_chos
[\[93b.6\]]gos mang po la chags pa dang /_'jam zhing reg na bde ba la chags pa dang /_bzang po la chags pa'o/_/de la chos gos mang po la chags pa spang ba'i phyir chos gos gsum [#]pa yin no/_/chos gos 'jam zhing reg na bde ba la chags pa spang ba'i phyir phying ba pa yin no/_/chos gos bzang po la
[\[93b.7\]]chags pa spang ba'i phyir/_phyag dar khrod pa yin no/_/mal stan la chags pa ni bar chad rnam pa bzhi yin te/_'di lta ste/_'du 'dzi la chags pa dang /_gnas la chags pa dang /_glos [#]'bebs pa'i bde ba dang /_nyal ba'i bde ba la chags pa dang /_stan dang /_gding ba dang /_dgab pa [#]la chags
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pa'o/_de la 'du 'dzi la chags pa spang ba'i phyir dgon pa pa yin no/_/gnas la chags pa spang ba'i phyir/_shing drung pa dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod pa yin no/_/dur khrod pa ni 'khrig pa la chags pa spang ba'i phyir yang yin no/_/glos 'bebs [#]pa'i bde
[\[94a.2\]]ba dang /_gnyid kyi bde ba la chags pa spang ba'i phyir cog bu pa yin no/_/stan dang /_gding ba dang /_dgab pa la chags pa spang ba'i phyir gzhi ji bzhin pa yin te/_de ltar na sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las kyang /_sha
[\[94a.3\]]ra dwa [#]ti'i bu khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/dgos pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams kyis tshogs gnas pa de'i nang du 'jug par mi bya ste/_dgra bcom pa nyon mongs pa med pa'am/_nad pa'am/_mkhan po'am/_slob dpon gyi rjes su 'jug pa ni ma gtogs so
[\[94a.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin las kyang /_bzang skyong 'di lta ste/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_srog chags kyi rigs gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig mes tshig par gyur cing /_'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur la/_tshig [#]bzhin pa'am tshig par gyur
[\[94a.5\]]pa zhig bsil ba nyid tshol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshol ba na so sor bsten pa ma gtogs par sgras bsel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bzang skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten la sdug bsngal gyis skyo ba yang [#]dben pa nyid yongs su tshol la/_de der gnas pa [#]des bde ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[94a.6\]]bzhin du dgon par gnas pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'dod pa med pa na chos gos 'tshol ba'i rgyus/_grong ngam grong khyer ram/_ljongs sam [#]gang yang rung bar zhugs nas skyes pa'am/_bud med la chos gos ci'i don du gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med de[#]/_
[\[94a.7\]]de chos dang po 'di dang ldan zhing tshul khrims srung bar byed do/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms spyod par 'gyur/_chos gos gsum 'chang ba sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad [#]dang ldan zhing /_sbyangs ba'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par spyod par
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de chos 'di gnyis dang ldan zhing tshul khrims yongs su sbyong bar byed do zhes gsungs so/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/_'di ltar bdag su'i ched la/_khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu [#]gyur snyam
[\[94b.2\]]du gzhal bar bya ste/_des mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du/_ye shes yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam [#]par bya'o/_/de lta de ltar yongs su 'jal bas[#]/_thog ma nyid du 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la rab tu gnas shing /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs
[\[94b.3\]]pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la rab tu gnas pa yin zhe na/_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/_chos gos ngan ngon gyis [#]chog par 'dzin pa yin chos gos ngan ngon gyis
[\[94b.4\]]chog par [#]'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod [#]pa yin te/_de chos gos kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do/_/chos gos ma rnyed na yang /_yi mi [#]'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do/_/chos gos rnyed na yang chags pa med/_rmongs pa med/_dga' ba med/_zhen pa med cing /_zhen
[\[94b.5\]]par mi 'gyur te/_nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas/_chags pa med par spyod de/_chos gos ngan ngon gyis [#]chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi stong cing gzhan la mi smod do/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par
[\[94b.6\]]'dzin pa yin/_bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod pa [#]yin te/_de bsod snyoms kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do/_/bsod snyoms ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing /_yongs su gdung ba med do/_/bsod snyoms rnyed na yang chags pa med/_
[\[94b.7\]]rmongs pa med/_dga' ba med/_zhen pa med cing /_zhen par mi 'gyur te/_nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas/_chags pa med par spyod de/_bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de/_bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod do/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mal cha [#]ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/_mal cha ngan ngon gyis [#]chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod pa yin te/_de mal cha'i phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do/_/mal cha ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing /_yongs su gdung ba
[\[95a.2\]]med do/_/mal cha rnyed na yang chags pa med/_rmongs pa med/_dga' ba med/_zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/_nyes dmigs mthong la/_'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/_mal cha ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi stod [#]cing gzhan la mi smod
[\[95a.3\]]do/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ngan ngon gyis [#]chog par 'dzin pa yin/_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod [#]pa yin te/_de na pa'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyi phyir
[\[95a.4\]]tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do/_/na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ma rnyed na yang yi [#]mi 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do/_/na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnyed na yang chags pa med/_rmongs pa med/_dga' ba med/_zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/_nyes dmigs
[\[95a.5\]]mthong la/_'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi stod [#]cing gzhan la mi smod do/_/spong ba [#]la dga' ba yin te/_spong ba la mos shing /_spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no/_/de sdig pa mi dge
[\[95a.6\]]ba'i chos rnams spangs pas/_dga' bar 'gyur te/_ma spangs pas ni ma yin no/_/de sgom pa la dga' ba yin te/_sgom [#]pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no/_/dge ba'i chos bsgoms pas dga' bar 'gyur te/_ma bsgoms pas ni ma yin no/_/spong ba la dga' ba/_spong ba la mos pa/_
[\[95a.7\]]spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa/_sgom [#]pa la dga' ba/_sgom [#]pa la mos pa/_sgom [#]pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa de/_bdag la mi stod [#]cing gzhan la mi smod do/_/khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la gnas pa yin no
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa sbyangs ba'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de shes kyi khe 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[95b.2\]]de snyan pa 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_de rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_de 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pa dang /_de tshul 'chos pa dang /_/kha gsag med par 'gyur ba dang /[ #]bdag la mi stod [#]gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_de [#]rjes su chags pa dang /_de khong khro ba spangs pas gzhan
[\[95b.3\]]gyi khyim du spyod pa [#]dang /_zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang /_de sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing chos bstan pa gzung [#]bar 'gyur ba yin te/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan
[\[95b.4\]]yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i phan yon no zhes gsungs so/_/yang mdo de nyid las/_byams pa la yang gnas pa bde ba [#]yin/_/snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bzhir rab tu mchod/_/rtag tu chog shes 'dod pa nyung bar 'gyur/_/dgon par gnas shing sbyangs pa'i yon tan brtson/_/
[\[95b.5\]]bsod snyoms len pa dag kyang mi gtong ste/_sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par 'gyur/_/rtag tu dang bar bcas shing dad par [#]'gyur/_/khor mor sangs rgyas bstan [#]la dad pa mang /_/dad pa mang ba'i phan yon 'di lags te/_/byad bzhin bzang zhing dbang po ma nyams 'gyur/_/yang
[\[95b.6\]]dag 'chad pa de la bdag gnas te/_/bdag ni rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid/_/nan tan snying por bgyid pa [#]lha klu yang /_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ri mo bgyid/_/ces gsungs so/_/gcig las 'phros pa'i mdo las kyang /_bsod snyoms pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_bsod snyoms
[\[95b.7\]]pa smyon [#]pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa g.yengs pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa 'dod chen po dang /_bsod snyoms pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang /_yang dag pa'i bsod snyoms pa ste/_'di dag ni bsod snyoms pa lnga'o/_/gzhan yang bsod snyoms pa bdun dag ste/_mthar phyin pa'i bsod
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]snyoms pa dang /_mthar phyin pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_nges pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_ma nges pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_dus ma yin par spyod pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_mgo mnyam pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_ya ba nar btags pa'i
[\[96a.2\]]bsod snyoms pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'dul ba las kyang /_ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yon tan dgon pa pa nyid yang dag par len par 'gyur zhe na/_bshad pa/_grong gi mtha' dgag pa'i phyir dgon pa pa [#]nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la dgon pa pa nyid ni rnam pa
[\[96a.3\]]gsum ste/_chen po dang 'bring [#]dang chung ngu'o/_/dgon pa pa chen po nyid gang zhe na/_rdul phra rab bdun la rdul lo/_/rdul bdun la sro ma'o/_/sro ma bdun la shig go/_/shig bdun la nas so/_/nas bdun la sor tshigs so/_/sor tshigs [#]bcu gnyis la mtho'o/_/mtho gnyis la
[\[96a.4\]]khru'o/_/khru bzhi la gzhu 'dom mo/_/gzhu 'dom lnga la srog shing ngo /_/srog shing nyi shu la ngal so'o/_/ngal so brgyad cu la rgyang grags so/_/gzhu 'dom stong phrag brgyad po de na gnas pa ni dgon pa pa chen po'o/_/dgon pa pa 'bring ni gang zhe na/_bshad pa/_gzhu 'dom stong phrag ste khru
[\[96a.5\]]bzhi stong na gnas pa'o/_/dgon pa pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_gzhu 'dom lnga brgyar bgrangs pa ste/_khru stong phrag gnyis su 'gyur ba na gnas pa'o/_/rgyu cis dgon pa pa yin na lam gyi tshad kyis sam rnam pas yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_lam gyi [#]tshad kyis dgon pa par rab tu shes kyi/_rnam pas
[\[96a.6\]]ni ma yin no/_/grong mtha' pa yin la dgon pa pa ma yin pa yang yod/_dgon pa pa yin la grong mtha' pa ma yin pa yang yod/_dgon pa pa yin la grong mtha' pa yin [#]pa yang yod/_dgon pa pa ma yin la grong mtha' pa ma yin pa yang yod do/_/de la grong mtha' pa ma [#]yin la dgon
[\[96a.7\]]pa pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dgon pa na yang gnas la grong la rtog pa rnam par rtog par byed cing /_nges par 'byung ba la rtog par mi byed pa ste/_'di ni grong mtha' ba yin la dgon pa pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dgon pa pa yin la grong mtha' pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/_grong mthar yang gnas la/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]sems kyis dben pa la gzhol/_dben pa la 'bab/_dben pa la bab pa/_bsrings pa/_nges par 'byung ba la dga' ba ste/_'di ni dgon pa [#]yin la grong mtha' pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dgon pa pa yang yin la grong mtha' [#]yang yin pa gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa ste/_
[\[96b.2\]]'di ni dgon pa pa yang yin la grong mtha' pa yang yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dgon pa pa yang ma yin la grong mtha' pa yang ma yin pa gang zhe na/_bzlog pa ste/_'di ni dgon pa pa yang ma yin la grong mtha' pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dgon pa na gnas shing /_gzhan yang dge 'dun gyi bya ba
[\[96b.3\]]dag dang /_nad pa'i bya ba dag gi ched dam/_chos nyan pa'i dbang du byas nas grong mthar 'jug par 'gyur ba na[#]/_'di ltar gdon mi za bar dgon par 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems skyed [#]par byed cing /_der gnas pa la skya rengs shar ba na [#]yang sbyangs pa'i yan lag 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste
[\[96b.4\]]yang dgon par 'gro bar mi bya'o snyam du sems skyed [#]par byed na/_skya rengs shar ba dang lhan cig sbyangs pa'i yan lag 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag bsod snyoms pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dgag pa'i phyir sbyangs
[\[96b.5\]]pa'i yon tan bsod snyoms pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no de la bsod snyoms pa nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/bsod snyoms ba chung ngu gang zhe na/_zas lnga po rnams las/_gang yang rung ba mgron [#]du gnyer ba'i zas mi len pa ste/_'di ni bsod snyoms pa chung
[\[96b.6\]]ngu'o/_/bsod snyoms pa 'di nyid gang zhe na/_zas lnga po dag las mgron [#]du gnyer ba mi len cing /_slong mos mgron [#]du gnyer ba yang mi len la/_sa phyogs ga ge mo zhes bya ba dang grong ga ge mo zhes bya bar shog shig [#]ces brda [#]byed pa ste/_'di ni bsod snyoms pa 'bring nyid do/_/bsod snyoms
[\[96b.7\]]pa chen po gang zhe na/_zas lnga po dag las gang yang rung ba la mgron [#]du gnyer ba'i zas mi len/_slong mos mgron [#]du gnyer ba yang mi len/_brda [#]byas par yang mi 'gro zhing /_khyim gyi sgor gnas pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms len pa ste/_'di ni bsod snyoms pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag phyag dar khrod pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_khyim bdag gi gos dgag pa'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yan lag phyag dar khrod pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la phyag dar khrod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen
[\[97a.2\]]po'o/_/phyag dar khrod pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_byi bas zos pa dang grog [#]mas zos pa dang rnam par tshig pa dang /_dum bur bcad nas hral te ched du byas nas bor ba de len pa ste 'di ni phyag dar khrod pa chung ngu'o/_/phyag dar khrod pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_ched du byas nas bor ba mi len cing /_gang sngar
[\[97a.3\]]byas pa ma nges par bor ba de len pa ste/_'di ni phyag dar khrod pa 'bring nyid do/_/phyag dar khrod pa chen po gang zhe na/_byi bas zos pa la hral te ched du byas nas bor ba'i bar du [#]len cing /_dur khrod dang phyag dar khrod dang lam du lhung ba rnyed nas len pa ste/_'di ni phyag dar khrod pa chen po'o/_/
[\[97a.4\]]ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag zas phyis mi len pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_zas lhag pa dgag pa'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yan lag zas phyis mi len pa nyid [#]yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la zas phyis mi len pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring
[\[97a.5\]]dang chen po'o/_/zas phyis mi len pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_stan ma bor ba bzhin du zos nas kyang ma bkrus par za ba ste/_'di ni zas phyis mi len pa chung ngu'o/_/zas phyis mi len pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_gang zhig za bzhin du bstabs pa lhag ma med par za ba de ni zas phyis mi len pa 'bring po [#]
[\[97a.6\]]nyid do/_/zas phyis mi len pa [#]chen po gang zhe na/_za bzhin du mi len cing /_zos nas kyang mi len pa ste[#]/_'di ni zas phyis mi len pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag stan gcig [#]pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_stan tha dad la za ba
[\[97a.7\]]dgag pa'i phyir/_sbyangs pa'i yan lag stan gcig pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la stan gcig pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/stan gcig pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_stan ma spangs par [#]dus ji srid kyi bar du za ba ste/_'di ni stan gcig pa chung ngu'o/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]stan gcig pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_zos nas kyang zas bsod pa rnyed pa len pa ste/_'di ni stan gcig pa 'bring nyid do/_/stan gcig pa chen po gang zhe na/_gang zhig za bzhin pa dang zos nas zas rnyed kyang mi za bar sngar bslangs ba zos nas 'gro ba ste/_'di ni stan gcig pa chen po'o/_/
[\[97b.2\]]ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_snod gzhan dgag pa'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yan lag lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa nyid ni rnam
[\[97b.3\]]pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang zhig lag pa gnyis kyis bcad nas bza' bar nus pa ste/_'di ni lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa chung ngu'o/_/lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_gang zhig lag pa
[\[97b.4\]]gcig gis bcad nas za [#]bar nus pa ste/_'di ni lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa 'bring du 'dod [#]do/_/lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa chen po gang zhe na/_lag pa gcig gis bcad nas ma yin/_khas bcad nas ma yin/_'jig [#]par mi byed 'jig [#]tu 'jug par mi byed cing /_gang
[\[97b.5\]]bshig nas rnyed pa za ba ste/_'di ni lhung bzed kyi bsod snyoms pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_mthon po'i khyim dgag pa'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yan lag mthar gyis slong ba'i
[\[97b.6\]]bsod snyoms pa yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang zhig grong du bsod snyoms la phyin pa na kun dga' bar gnas pas rnyed pa ste/_'di
[\[97b.7\]]ni mthar gyis slong ba'i [#]bsod snyoms pa chung ngu'o/_/mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_bsod snyoms la 'gro ba na kun dga' ra ba na gnas pas mi len cing bar gyi lam du rnyed pa len pa ste/_'di ni mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa 'bring nyid do/_/mthar gyis
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa chen po gang zhe na/_kun dga' ra [#]bar gnas nas kyang mi len cing bar gyi lam du [#]yang mi len pa/_grong ngam grong gi nye 'khor du rnyed pa len pa ste/_'di ni mthar gyis slong ba'i bsod snyoms pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag
[\[98a.2\]]dur khrod pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dgag pa'i phyir/_sbyangs pa'i yan lag dur khrod pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la dur khrod pa [#]rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/dur khrod pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang sngon dur
[\[98a.3\]]khrod du gyur nas phyis dur khrod ma yin par [#]gyur pa der gnas pa ste/_'di ni dur khrod pa chung ngu'o/_/dur khrod pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_gang du ro nyung ba [#]bskyal bar gyur pa [#]der gnas pa ste/_de [#]ni dur khrod pa 'bring nyid do/_/dur khrod pa chen po gang zhe na/_gang dur khrod chen por gnas pa [#]'di ni dur khrod
[\[98a.4\]]pa chen po ste/_dper na btsun pa gzhon nu'i rtogs pa brjod pa bzhin [#]no/_/sing g+ha [#]la'i gling du lo drug cu dur khrod na gnas pa na/_btsun pa 'di ni dur khrod pa zhig go zhes sus kyang ma shes so/_/lo drug cu 'das pa na dur khrod chen po der gnod sbyin chen po [#]mdangs 'phrog pa rnams 'dus par gyur la/_
[\[98a.5\]]btsun pa de yang dur khrod du dong bar gyur to/_/gang dur khrod de na dur khrod na [#]rgyun du gnas pa'i gnod sbyin de mi'i cha byad kyis [#]lam gyi dbus na btsun pa'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa gang du 'gro/_/des smras pa/_gcig pu dur khrod du 'gro'o/_/des 'di skad du smras pa/_btsun
[\[98a.6\]]pa ma 'gro shig[# ]/des smras pa/_gdon mi za bar 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa ma 'gro shig[# ]/dur khrod der 'byung po chen po rnams 'dus par gyur la/_btsun pa la rnam par 'tshe ba skyed par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_ci nas kyang 'gro bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_nga su yin pa ma shes sam/_
[\[98a.7\]]smras pa ma shes so/_/smras pa/_nga ni dur khrod na rgyun du gnas pa'i gnod sbyin no/_/gal te slar log par mi byed na ni grong khyer 'di'i mi rnams la gzhon nu lo drug cu dur khrod du gnas pa na khyed 'gas kyang ma shes zhes bya bar smra'o/_/des smras pa/_gnod sbyin sdig pa khyod mi rnams la ma smra [#]
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]shig_/nga phyir mi ldog par bya'o zhes gnas brtan gzhon nu lo drug cu lon pa na sbyangs pa'i yan lag 'khrug par mi [#]byed cing 'dod pa chung bar gyur to/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag bla gab med pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_g.yogs pa spangs pa'i phyir
[\[98b.2\]]sbyangs pa'i yan lag bla gab med pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la bla gab med pa ni [#]rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/bla gab med pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_ngos gsum g.yogs la ngos gcig ma g.yogs pa ste/_'di ni bla gab med pa chung ngu'o/_/bla gab med
[\[98b.3\]]pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_ngos gcig g.yogs la ngos gsum ma g.yogs pa ste/_'di ni bla gab [#]med pa 'bring nyid do/_/bla gab [#]med pa chen po gang zhe na/_ngos bzhi po [#]thams cad ma g.yogs pa ste/_'di ni bla gab med pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag
[\[98b.4\]]shing drung pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_gtsug lag khang spang ba'i phyir sbyangs pa'i yan lag shing drung pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la shing drung pa ni [#]rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/shing drung pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang ngos bzhi
[\[98b.5\]]po thams cad nas bsgribs pa ste/_'di ni shing drung pa chung ngu'o/_/shing drung pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_cung zad kyang mi sgrib [#]par sbyong ba dang /_'chag pa dang /_rab tu 'dus byas pa ste 'di ni shing drung pa 'bring nyid do/_/shing drung pa chen po gang zhe na/_mi sgrib [#]la rab tu 'dus
[\[98b.6\]]mi byed cing mngon par ma zhen pas gnas pa ste/_'di ni shing drung pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag cog pu pa nyid yan dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_ma la cha dang stan la 'dug pa spang ba'i phyir/_sbyangs pa'i yan lag cog pu pa nyid yang dag
[\[98b.7\]]par len pa yin no/_/de la cog pu pa nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/cog pu pa chung ngu ni ngos [#]gnyis su snyes [#]par byed pa ste/_'di ni cog pu pa chung ngu'o/_/cog pu pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_ngos gcig tu snyes [#]par byed pa ste/_'di ni cog pu pa 'bring
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]nyid do/_/cog pu pa chen po gang zhe na/_ngos thams cad du mi snyes [#]pa ste/_'di ni cog pu pa chen po'o/_/ci zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag gzhi ji bzhin pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_bshad pa/_gnas mal la brkam pa spang ba'i phyir sbyangs
[\[99a.2\]]pa'i yan lag gzhi ji bzhin pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin no/_/de la gzhi ji bzhin pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/gzhi ji bzhin pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_gang zhig mal cha lan gsum gyi bar du yang len cing /_lan bzhir mi len pa ste/_'di ni gzhi ji bzhin pa chung
[\[99a.3\]]ngu'o/_/gzhi ji bzhin pa 'bring nyid gang zhe na/_lan gcig la mi len pa[#]/_lan gnyis la mi [#]len pa ste/_'di ni gzhi ji bzhin pa 'bring nyid do/_/gzhi ji bzhin pa chen po gang zhe na/_gang zhig ji ltar bstan pa bzhin len par byed cing mi khyer [#]ba ste/_'di ni gzhi ji bzhin pa chen po'o/_/ci
[\[99a.4\]]zhig bkag pa las sbyangs pa'i yan lag chos gos gsum pa nyid yang dag par len pa yin zhe na/_/bshad pa/[# ]chos gos lhag pa spang pa'i [#]phyir sbyangs pa'i yan lag chos gos gsum pa yang dag par [#]len pa yin no/_/de la chos gos gsum pa ni rnam pa gsum
[\[99a.5\]]ste/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o/_/chos gos gsum pa chung ngu gang zhe na/_chos gos gsum las lhag pa/_dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang g.yan pa dgab pa dang mchis stan dang gding ba 'chang ba ste/_'di ni chos gos gsum pa chung ngu'o/_/chos gos gsum pa 'bring nyid
[\[99a.6\]]gang zhe na/_chos gos gsum 'chang bar byed cing dbyar gyi gos ras chen nas gding ba'i bar bdag nyid kyis [#]'chang bar mi byed la gzhan gyis longs spyod pa 'chang ba ste/_'di ni chos gos gsum pa 'bring nyid do/_/chos gos gsum pa chen po gang zhe na/_chos gos gsum pa [#]las
[\[99a.7\]]phyi rol du gyur pa mi 'chang ba ste/_'di ni chos gos gsum pa chen po'o/_/sbyangs pa'i yan lag bcu gsum bstan pa rdzogs so//_//[#]phyag dar khrod dang cog pu pa/_/phyis mi len dang phying pa pa/_/chos gos gsum pa shing drung pa/_/stan gcig pa dang [#]ji bzhin pa[#]/_/dur khrod
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa dang bla gab med/_/dgon pa pa dang bsod snyoms te/_/thub pa zhi ba'i thugs mnga' bas/_/sbyangs pa bcu gnyis 'di dag gsungs/_/de la phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro bas/_ras ma bor ba 'chang ba'o/_/cog pu pa nyid gang zhe na/_yang dag par blangs pa sngon
[\[99b.2\]]du 'gro bas/_glos mi 'bebs par cog pus mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa'o/_/zas phyis mi len pa [#]nyid ni/_yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro bas/_zos pa bstabs kyang mi za zhing /_dus ma yin pa'i btung ba mi 'thung ba'o/_/phying pa pa nyid ni yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro bas phying
[\[99b.3\]]pa'i gos 'chang ba'o/_/chos gos gsum pa nyid ni/_yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro bas/_chos gos gsum tsam 'chang gi lhag pa [#]mi 'chang ba'o/_/shing drung pa nyid ni/_shing drung la dga' bas yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro bas shing drung du gnas kyi/_bskyor bar mi 'jug pa'o/_/
