[\[139a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa bzang skyong lhun po chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snag gi gnyen mtshams 'di rnal 'byor gyis spangs pa dang /_nang du yang dag par 'jog pa dang /_zhal ta dang /_mang du thos pa yang rung ste/_gang la mngon par brtson
[\[139a.7\]]par gyur [#]lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa[#]/_rgyal po chen po dge slong 'di mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson par gyur to[#]/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang de skad du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa 'dis chos ji snyed cig [#]yongs su thob par gyur [#]lags/_bka'
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dge slong 'dis lo stong du tshig bzhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ston par gyur to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bton pas [#]nga'i snag gi gnyen mtshams 'di de skad du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs sam/_bcom ldan 'das gal
[\[139b.2\]]te seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bgyi na ni/_de bdag [#]gis bsgrag [#]par bya ste/_bdag gis [#]lo stong du de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yid du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang na ba'i rkyen sman dang yo byad phul lo/_/de skad ces gsol ba
[\[139b.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bzang skyong lhun po chen pos rgyal po gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod de skad ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang rgyal po chen po lo stong du sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba bsdoms pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul
[\[139b.4\]]na[#]/_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'di thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa'i dbugs [#]dbyung ba dang rngub pa gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro na/_nye bar ston pa
[\[139b.5\]]dang kha ton tshol ba la mngon par brtson zhing /_tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'don par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_nga ni bsod nams de'i mtha' mi smra'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyed [#]kyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos gtong ba [#]lta zhog_/rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems lo stong phrag
[\[139b.6\]]'da' bar de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la khyod kyis dgos pa [#]phul bar gyur na/_de mang ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod [#]yongs su gtong ba de thams cad bsdoms nas dge slong gcig
[\[139b.7\]]la dang /_rnam grangs 'dis dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la phul na/_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba de mang ngam/_gsol pa[#]/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bu mo nye bar ston pa dang /_kha ton la mngon par brtson pa gus pa dang bcas pa/_chos 'dod pa/_'khor ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa/_mya ngan las 'da' ba la re ba/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la brtson pa/_chos yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus la rab tu sbyor ba
[\[140a.2\]]ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/_/rgyal po chen po bdag nyid kyis [#]dad pas byin pa yongs su blangs nas/_zas 'dis chos tshol ba thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems skyed par byed na/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_/sems bskyed [#]pa'i
[\[140a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po chen po'i [#]de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la gus pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing gi sbyin pa zil gyis gnon [#]par 'gyur ba de ltar rig [#]par bya'o zhes
[\[140a.4\]]gsungs so/_/bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu de la thos pa mang po 'tshol [#]ba'i shes pa gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu gang sangs rgyas kyi [#]byang chub kyi phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa thob nas[#]/_thos pa mang po la mngon par brtson par mi byed pa de ni/_byang chub sems
[\[140a.5\]]dpa' bden par smra ba ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu ming tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangs rgya bar mi nus kyi/_shes rab dang ldan pa nyid kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[140a.6\]]'tshang rgya bar nus so/_/shes rab de yang gang las nges par 'byung ba yin zhe na/_mang du thos pa las shes rab 'byung ba yin [#]te/_shA ri'i bu de lta bas [#]na khyod kyis mngon sum du bya zhing khyod kyis [#]so sor rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
[\[140a.7\]]pa'i sems can mang du thos pa la de [#]ji ltar the tshom skye bar 'gyur zhes/_gang byang chub sems dpa' de sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i byang chub la bdud sdig can bar chad byed par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed [#]nas thos pa mang po
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]la mngon par mi brtson pa gang yin pa de ni/_bdud sdig can gyis yongs su byin gyis brlabs pa nyid yin no/_/de lta bas na shA ri'i bu bdud kyi [#]las thams cad yongs su shes par 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsam [#]par bya/_tshig gtso bor mi bya/_mkhas pa'i bya ba shes par bya zhing /_
[\[140b.2\]]'jig rten thams cad la grags pa'i bya ba shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i thos pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las [#]mngon par 'phags pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i tshul khrims
[\[140b.3\]]kyis [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gnas 'di don du gnyer ba mang yang nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub par byed pa ni med de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_'jig rten thams cad las
[\[140b.4\]]mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes dang /_smon lam las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gang gis [#]dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig des [#]smra bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don du smra bar mi bya/_byang chub
[\[140b.5\]]sems dpa' brtson 'grus dman par mi bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu stong du bgrangs pa las gcig 'grub pa'am/_grub pa med cing /_shA ri'i bu stong phrag bcu dang /_stong phrag nyi shu dang /_stong phrag sum cu dang /_stong phrag bzhi bcu dang /_stong phrag lnga bcu dang /_bye ba phrag stong du bgrangs pa
[\[140b.6\]]las gcig 'grub pa'am/_grub pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de ltar gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la gnas pa de ni mngon par 'byung bar dka' ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bas/_'di ltar
[\[140b.7\]]sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad kyi brnag [#]dka' ba brnag [#]par bya/_bzod dka' ba bzod par bya zhing /_bdag gi chos btsal bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par dga' bas brtson par bya'i/_longs spyod btsal ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos tshol bar
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]byed pa ni ye shes tshol bar byed pa yin te/_'dod pa rnyed pas rlom par mi byed/_rab tu rlom bar mi byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis [#]shes rab gtso bor bya'i/_longs spyod gtso bor mi bya'o/_/
[\[141a.2\]]shA ri'i bu de lta na chos kyi sbyin pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las kyang /_gzhon nus [#]smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol/_bdag gis bskal pa
[\[141a.3\]]gcig la sangs rgyas ni/_bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste [#]ri mor bgyis/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di [#]yang bdag gis dris[#]/_/gzhan yang bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong du/_/de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur[#]/_/nam yang mngal du skyes par ma gyur to/_/de
[\[141a.4\]]nas bdag gis [#]ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms te/_/rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa dag par thos/_/thos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de/_/nem nur med pas byang chub reg par bgyi/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang
[\[141a.5\]]du thos pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed pa dang /_gnod sems mi bskyed [#]pa dang /_the tshom rnam par 'byed pa dang /_lta ba drang por byed pa dang /_lam log pa spong ba dang /_lam la gnas pa dang /_mi 'chi [#]ba'i sgor gnas pa dang /_byang
[\[141a.6\]]chub tu bsnyen pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snang bar 'gyur ba [#]dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad kyis [#]mi 'jigs pa ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pa'i phan yon no zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las kyang /_ji ltar na byang
[\[141a.7\]]chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni brjod par bla'i/_dge ba byang chub kyi chos rnams [#]bsgrub pa ni dka'o snyam pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' gang la las chos kyi sbyin pas
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]sems can thams cad mgron [#]du gnyer te/_kho bos sems can khyed chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o zhes byas la mang du thos pa dang /_de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par mi byed na/_de sems can de dag la slu ba yin te/_de skad smras pa
[\[141b.2\]]de bzhin byed pa ma yin no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron [#]du gnyer te/_kho bos sems can khyed chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o zhes byas la/_mang du thos pa dang /_de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[141b.3\]]chos rnams la yang brtson [#]par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo las kyang /_mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud bzhi pham par
[\[141b.4\]]byed do/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_phung po'i bdud dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /_'chi bdag gi bdud dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud de/_bdud bzhi po 'di dag pham par byed do zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che [#]dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis
[\[141b.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshogs gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs de dag gi nang na tshogs gang ches mchog dang ches gtso bo lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid tshogs
[\[141b.6\]]gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs de dag gi nang na thos pa'i tshogs 'ba' zhig mchog ces bya/_rab ces bya/_rab [#]mchog ces bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya/_bla ma zhes bya/_bla na med pa zhes
[\[141b.7\]]bya/_gong na med pa zhes bya/_gong ma'i yang gong ma [#]zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi mdun na yungs 'bru gcig [#]'dug pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra [#]bar blta bar bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab ji lta ba de bzhin du ni
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thos pa'i tshogs
[\[142a.2\]]blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i tshogs ni bya ba gnyis byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbul ba sel ba dang /_longs spyod chen po sgrub [#]pa ste bya ba 'di gnyis byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis byed do[#]/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro sel
[\[142a.3\]]ba dang /_bde 'gro sgrub pa ste/_bya ba 'di gnyis byed do/_/shes rab kyi tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis byed [#]do/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta bar gyur pa thams cad sel ba dang /_shes rab sgrub pa ste/_bya ba 'di gnyis byed do/_/rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i tshogs ni zag pa dang bcas
[\[142a.4\]]pa dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_phung po rnam par smin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_phung bo rnam par smin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu thos pa'i tshogs ni zag pa med pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_phung po rnam par
[\[142a.5\]]smin pa ma yin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis thos pa'i tshogs la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros mi bzad [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
[\[142a.6\]]shes rab kyang mi zad pa yin te/_shes rab de'i rnam pa ni ji lta bur [#]'dug ce na/_thos pa ni rnam pa'o/_/tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o/_/thos pa yang rnam pa ji lta bu ji ltar 'dug ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i rnam pa ni brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/_'di lta
[\[142a.7\]]ste/_de ltar mos pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /_sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang /_phyag bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_bla ma bkur ba'i rnam pa dang /_mthun pa'i rnam pa dang /
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]bcos sla ba'i rnam pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i rnam pa dang /_rna gtad [#]de nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_yid la bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_'khrug pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_gzhag [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad
[\[142b.2\]]thams cad gzhil ba'i rnam pa dang /_dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang /_rtogs [#]pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang /_blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_gtong ba spel ba'i rnam pa dang /_dul zhing cang shes
[\[142b.3\]]kyi rnam pa dang /_mang du thos pa bsten [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_nan tan du byas te dga' ba myong ba'i rnam pa dang /_lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang /_sems tshim pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi sbyor [#]bar mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_don mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_nan tan du
[\[142b.4\]]mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_gzhan gyis [#]bstan pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_bkur sti bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_ma thos pa [#]mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par shes pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_byang chub
[\[142b.5\]]sems dpa'i sde snod mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin du mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba la mkhas pa [#]mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi skye ba la mkhas
[\[142b.6\]]pa [#]mnyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang /_byams pa'i rnam pa dang /_rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i
[\[142b.7\]]rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_sems can byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dang /_chud mi gsan [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_rang dbang gi rnam pa dang /_bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i rnam
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus mi klod pa'i [#]rnam pa dang /_chos la brtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam [#]pa dang /_bdag gi phyogs bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang /_pha rol gyi phyogs dang nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /_nor bdun la brten pa'i
[\[143a.2\]]rnam pa dang /_dbul ba thams cad gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /_mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang /_mkhas pa [#]mgu ba'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pa bsam [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_ma 'phags pa dad par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang /_phung
[\[143a.3\]]po'i nyes pa spang ba'i rnam pa dang /_'dus byas kyi nyes pa gzhil ba'i rnam pa dang /_don la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos la brten [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_ye shes la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_mdo sde nges pa'i don can la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[143a.4\]]bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang /_las legs par byas pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa dang /_bye brag tu 'gro ba'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/_'di dag ni thos [#]pa'i rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ste zhes gsungs so/_/dam pa'i chos
[\[143a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las kyang /_rab tu dang bas dam pa'i chos ston par byed pa nyan pa'i yon tan gzhan yang yod de/_gang 'ga' zhig chos nyan pa dad pa can rab tu dad pa [#]dang ldan pa/_dbang po 'dud pa dang [#]/_blo gtsang ba/_gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dad pa'i blo can/_
[\[143a.6\]]khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pas khyim nas byung nas lha khang ngam kun dga' ra bar 'gro bar byed pa na/_de gom pa 'dor zhing gom pa 'dor ba la tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang dag chos smra ba la mchod par byed pa des ni
[\[143a.7\]]don du na dngos su sangs rgyas la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gang chos ston pa po mchod par byed pa de ji lta ji ltar mchod pa [#]de dag yongs su bsngo [#]bar byed pa na de lta de ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur te/_de ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'gyur ba yin no/_/
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos nyan pa las sems las su rung bar 'gyur/_de las su rung bar byas na/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs par gyur ba'i mun pa rnams 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar chos ston pa pos byed pa ltar gzhan 'ga' zhig gis [#]kyang sems las su rung bar
[\[143b.2\]]byed pa ma yin no/_/bzhi po rnams kyi yang phan pa la lan gyis glan par sla ba ma yin no/_/bzhi po gang dag ce na/_'di lta ste/_pha dang ma dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos ston pa po [#]de dag rnams la byin pa ni gzhal du med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi ched du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten na bsngags
[\[143b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang dag gi sems khengs par gyur pa de chos bstan pas dul ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/chags par gyur pa sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur ro/_/ma rungs pa 'jam par 'gyur ro/_/rmongs pa mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu la kun du rmongs pa rnams
[\[143b.4\]]ni [#]chos bstan pa thos nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/log pa'i lta [#]ba la sems kun du zhugs pa rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang mi tshangs par spyod pa la dga' ba rnams ni chos bstan pa dag thos nas de
[\[143b.5\]]dag las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de chos bstan pas [#]las su rung ba byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir rgyu 'dis chos ston par byed pa po la lan glan par sla ba ma yin no zhes gsungs so//_//[#]thos pa nyung ba yongs su spang ba la dgongs pa bstan
[\[143b.6\]]pa/_byang chub kun du rgyu'i mdo las kyang /_zab cing 'jigs rung sdug bsngal mang mi bzang /_/rgya mtshor lhung ba shin tu ba lta [#]dka' la/_/sems brlag ngal ba don med ji bzhin du/_/de bzhin mkhas pa yis kyang bsam bya ste/_/rmongs pa bsten pa byas par gyur kyang ni/_/shes pa khyad
[\[143b.7\]]'phags thob par 'gyur ma yin/_/gang zhig sdig blo de 'dra sten byed pa/_/bsten kyang de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/_/ji ltar long ba'i mdun na 'dug pa dang /_/'on pa'i glu dang rol mo ci 'dra ba/_/de bzhin blun po [#]bsten par byas gyur kyang /_/khyad par skra nyag tsam du'ang 'gyur ma yin/_/_
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]ji ltar ma ning chung ma gzhon nu [#]dang /_/rkang pa bcad pa phrin [#]yig 'khyer ba dang /_/sna bcad me long lta bar byed pa dag_/'di kun don med 'gyur zhing mi rigs ltar/_/de bzhin rmongs pa rigs dma' bsam min pa/_/sems [#]'gyur bsten pa byas par gyur kyang ni/_/de las
[\[144a.2\]]byas pa shes pa'ang 'thob mi 'gyur/_/de nyid phyir na de ni mkhas pas spong /_/cod pan bcings pa'i spre'u dang ko lpags mkhan/_/tsan dan bzang pos mchod pa mdzes ma yin/_/mkhas pas rmongs la bsten [#]pa mdzes min te/_/gnas gsum 'di dag skal ba [#]mnyam ma yin/_/nga ni [#]khyod
[\[144a.3\]]kyi khyim 'dir mi 'dug ste/_/gang phyir khyod ni rtag tu skal mi mnyam/_/mi dbang khyod la rnam kun shes yod min/_/de phyir khyod ni rtag tu mgon med par[#]/_/rgyal po de phyir nga yis rab bstan pa'i/_/dam chos brten [#]gyis log par ci ste lta/_/shes nas de ni spong gis [#]spangs byas nas[#]/_/
[\[144a.4\]]phyi ma'i tshe la khyod ni bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa [#]las kyang /_'od srungs dge slong chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa spong bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin du dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa la lus kyis [#]gzir ba
[\[144a.5\]]dang /_tshig gis smod par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi po gang zhe na/_sdig pa'i chos can tshul khrims 'chal par gyur pa [#]dang /_thos par khas 'che ba thos pa nyung bar gyur pa [#]dang /_'jig tshogs la zhen pa bdag tu smra bar gyur pa [#]dang /_bdud kyis yongs su zin pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
[\[144a.6\]]gyur pa ste[#]/_'od srungs dge slong chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa spong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gzi brjid can gyi mdo las kyang /_rmongs pa ni brjed [#]ngas par 'gyur ro/_/gang brjed ngas pa de la dge sbyong gi tshul med do/_/gang dge sbyong gi tshul
[\[144a.7\]]med pa de la mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/_/yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i lus kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i ngag gi las mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro[#]/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gang yang zag pa dang bcas pa'i las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag nyid mngon par 'du byed pa'i zas can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las kyang /_byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan pa [#]lnga brgya pa tha ma
[\[144b.2\]]la/_dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas pa [#]la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thos pa nyung ngu'i sems can yongs su spong ba dang /_'khor mi bsdu ba dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal la la brten pa dang /_bdag dul ba dang zhi ba dang zhi gnas
[\[144b.3\]]kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa ste/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas [#]la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i mdo
[\[144b.4\]]las kyang /_mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag_/byis pa gang nas legs par 'ongs zhes smra[#]/_/de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas/_/de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog_/byis pa la [#]ni gang phan snying brtse ba/_/de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'/_/de lta'i nyes
[\[144b.5\]]phyir byis pa rnams [#]spangs te/_/ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu [#]dgon par gnas/_/mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas [#]ni/_/shes rab dman bsten [#]bdag gi mtho ris nyams/_/byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste/_/zhes gsungs so//_//[#]mi 'dri ba'i skyon la dgongs pa bstan
[\[144b.6\]]pa/_dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las kyang /_gzhan yang chos bcu gcig pa ni dge slong bsam gtan dang klog pa'i gegs [#]byed pa dang mchog tu dga' ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di [#]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nga rgyal gyis 'dri bar mi byed pa'o/_/'dir nang du blo dman
[\[144b.7\]]par 'gyur zhing blo gros rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bdag ni bstan bcos thams cad kyi don dang tshig gi sgo nas 'dzin pa dang /_don dang tshig gi sgo nas rjod par byed pa yin no/_/zhes phyi rol du bdag nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/nga ni ye shes kyi tshogs rnams ma lus par 'dzin par
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]byed pa yin no/_/bdag gis [#]don brgya stong phrag du ma rnams lhan cig tu gnas pa rnams dang /_zham [#]'bring ba rnams la yang nges par bstan to/_/nga dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes/_de ltar gzhan dag rnams la yang sgrogs [#]par byed 'god par
[\[145a.2\]]byed/_sems la rab tu 'jog par byed de/_de ni shes pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'ba' zhig tu zad par gyur pa/_sems can thams cad la rang gi yon tan rig par byed pa/_skye bo thams cad kyis go bar 'gyur ba ste/_ji ltar 'di shes pa thams cad las pha rol tu son pa de dang 'gran par
[\[145a.3\]]mtshungs pa rnams 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar 'jig rten pa rnams brjod par 'gyur ro[#]/_/de yang shin tu thos pa chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_nang stong par 'gyur ba dang /_gsog du 'gyur ba dang /_gsob tu 'gyur ba dang /_snod stong pa dang mtshungs pa dang /_ston ka'i sprin dag dang 'dra
[\[145a.4\]]ba dang /_bsam gtan dang klog pa las phyi rol du byas pa dang /_skye bo dman pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de ni gang gi tshe dge sbyong bsam gtan dang klog pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_gtong ba dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur pa dang [#]/_dmigs pa dang rang bzhin gyis thos pa rgya chen
[\[145a.5\]]por gyur pa dang /_dul ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la shin tu gces par 'dzin pa/_spro ba log pa med par gyur pa/_shes rab chen po'i dris rgyud bsgos par gyur pa rnams kyi nang na gnas pa ni/_de de'i tshe na nang [#]stong pa gsog dang gsob tu gyur pa
[\[145a.6\]]ni [#]'di snyam du gal te dge slong de dag gis [#]bdag la ji lta ba bzhin ston cig ces smras par [#]gyur na/_de dag gis [#]bdag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang sbyin pa po [#]sbyin bdag de rnams kyis [#]bdag la mchod par byed pa las de dag gi drung nas de dag rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
[\[145a.7\]]ro/_/bdag sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams kyis [#]zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/nga rgyal dang ngar 'dzin pas gzung [#]ba de rang nyid kyi shes rab kyis don rnams go bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zil gyis mnan par gyur pa'i [#]'jigs pas gzhan la yang 'dri bar mi byed do/_/ci ste gang dag
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]rang nyid kyi [#]blos mi rtogs shing thos kyang rtogs pa'am mi rtogs pa'i don 'ga' zhig yod pa de dag nang stong pa zil gyis gnon pas 'jigs pa des/_bdag nyid kyis [#]mi rtogs la zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pas gzhan la yang mi 'dri'o/_/de ltar log par smra ba de ni
[\[145b.2\]]bslab pa'i gzhi lnga las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_brdzun du smra bar 'gyur te/_shes pas rtogs pa med bzhin du 'on kyang smra bar byed pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi las 'da' ba [#]dang po'o/_/bslab pa'i gzhi las 'da' ba gzhan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mchod pa gang zhig
[\[145b.3\]]de shes pa dang ldan par bsams nas sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gis [#]byed par 'gyur ba de mi 'os bzhin du thos pa gzhan [#]pa des len par byed pa na blo gros gzhan [#]pa de'i ma byin par [#]len pa bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi las 'da' ba gzhan yin no/_/yang
[\[145b.4\]]bslab pa'i gzhi las 'da' ba gzhan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang gi tshe dge slong rab tu byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_ji ltar tshul khrims la kun nas brten pa dang /_tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa dang tshul khrims dmigs par byas nas/_ngas khyim gyi [#]gnas yongs su gtang [#]bar bya'o
[\[145b.5\]]snyam pas bslab pa'i gzhi yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/gang zhig thos pa med cing gzhan dag la yang thos pa ston par mi byed pa de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no/_/'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi las 'da' ba gzhan yin no/_/yang bslab pa'i gzhi las 'da' ba gzhan ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[145b.6\]]gzhan gyis dris pa dang slar dris pa bstan pa na/_zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pas 'jigs par 'gyur te/_chos la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni chos ma yin gyi [#]de ni mchog tu dka' ba mchog tu sdig pa'o zhes chos ma yin par rjod par byed do/_/yang bslab pa'i gzhi
[\[145b.7\]]las 'da' ba gzhan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos mi shes pa de'i tshe/_tshangs par spyod pa dang bcas pa de dag gis[#]/_khyod kyis [#]sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang dag par gyur pa zab mo 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes brjod par 'gyur ro[#]/_/ji ltar nga kho nas shes kyi khyed kyis ni ma yin no zhes
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]de dge 'dun la spyo bar 'gyur/_zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pas 'jig rten [#]skur bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ba bzhin dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan nyams par 'gyur bar chos brjod par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'dri ba nyid kyis mchog tu brdzun du smra ba ni lus zhig nas
[\[146a.2\]]ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mi 'dri ba de [#]la skyon chen po gzhan yang yod de/_'di lta ste/_gal te ci zhig ltar nga rgyal de nyid kyis nags su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/zil gyis mnan pas na [#]lam bzang po ston pa po la mi 'dri ste/_nga rgyal
[\[146a.3\]]gyi skyon gyis lam gang zhig yin par 'gyur/_ji ltar dmigs pa yid la bya/_rnam pa gang gis lam chud zos par 'gyur ba slar yang yid la gzhag [#]par bya zhes de skad du mi 'dri'o/_/de ltar ma rnyed pa de'i yid skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i [#]skyil krung las ma langs par da [#]'di
[\[146a.4\]]snyam du rgan rabs de dag 'di [#]la lam dang bsam gtan med snyoms par 'jug pa [#]med/_de nga rgyal gyi skyon dang zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pas bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes nga la skyo bar 'gyur ro snyam
[\[146a.5\]]du sems so/_/log par lta ba de lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs des tshigs su bcad de [#]gsungs pa/_dge slong bdag shes nga rgyal nyams/_/de bzhin bla ma
[\[146a.6\]]la 'dri zhing /_/brtson 'grus la ni brtson 'gyur pas/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob [#]par 'gyur/_/ji snyed cig ni thos gyur pa[#]/_de snyed kho na rab tu 'chad/_/bdag shes lam las ma nyams pa/_/dge slong gis ni de nyid rig[# ]/gang zhig rlom dang brnyas pa nyams/_/lam dang lam ma
[\[146a.7\]]yin la mkhas/_/rang dang gzhan dag tshul shes shing /_/chog [#]shes de ni dge slong brjod/_/rlom zhing ma rungs sems dang ldan/_/spobs pa chung zhing 'gyur bag can/_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur ste la/_/chags pa zhi bar ga la 'gyur/_/de ltar mi 'dri zhing rlom pa ma rungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]de la bsam gtan dang klog pa'i bya ba yod pa ma yin no/_/gzhan gyi zas za ba de cha lugs 'dzin pa tsam 'ba' zhig gis dge slong gi ming rnyed par 'gyur zhing nga rgyal gyi skyon dang mi 'dri ba nyid kyis lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar
[\[146b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir dge slong 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba dang yid bde bar 'gyur ro/_/lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro ma tho ris lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu rab tu dang ba dang spangs pa'i yon tan des mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
[\[146b.3\]]ro zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis [#]khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/_de nga rgyal des bla ma rnams dang /_sbyin gnas rnams dang /_pha ma dang /_
[\[146b.4\]]slob dpon dang /_mkhan po rnams dang /_de las gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun du 'dun pa dang /_'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid [#]cing /_de la ma gus par gyur pa dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhas pa/_khyad par thob pa/_
[\[146b.5\]]gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan du mi mchi/_mi bsnyen/_mi bsten/_bsnyen bkur mi bgyi/_yongs su mi 'dri/_yongs su 'drir mi 'tshal [#]zhing /_de ma thos pa'i chos nyan par mi bgyid/_thos
[\[146b.6\]]pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid/_de las gzhan pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyus [#]zin pa/_chos dan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang /_de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rjes su 'jug par gyur pa dang /_de dman pa la brten
[\[146b.7\]]zhing [#]khyad par dang bral bas [#]'di lta ste zhan pa'i 'gro ba blun pa/_'on pa/_lkugs pa'i 'gro ba dman pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogs su shing tsam pa ka bskrun la/_chab tshol [#]bar mi bgyid kyis gang nas chab mchi
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]bar mthong ba'i phyogs de yang gor ma dang gyo mo dag gis bkum na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar [#]na zhugs shing tsam pa ka chab dang bral ba de la yal ga dang /_lo ma dang yal ga phre'u [#]ma chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi 'gyur/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_yal
[\[147a.2\]]ga phre'u [#]chags pa rnams kyang bskams te dog sa la ltung [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems bskyed la/_nga rgyal gyis khengs shing /_nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur na/_de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_chos mnyan pa dang bral te
[\[147a.3\]]ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mi nyan[#]/_thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/_gzhol ba'i phyogs na mchis par [#]'gyur ro/_/de gzhol ba'i slad du chu klung thams
[\[147a.4\]]cad dang /_chab mig dang /_'bab chu thams cad tshegs chung ngus der 'bab po/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa/_bla ma dang sbyin gnas la gus pa la yang tshegs chung ngus chos zab mo'i sgo nas rna ba'i dbang po la grag [#]par 'gyur ro/_/de dran
[\[147a.5\]]pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur [#]te/_bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la kun du mi 'dud cing 'dud par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o byang chub sems
[\[147a.6\]]dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi [#]lcags kyus zin par rig par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]chos rku ba la dgongs pa bstan pa/_gzi brjid can gyi mdo las kyang /_
[\[147a.7\]]rkun po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni gso bar nus kyi/_bstan pa 'di la chos rku ba ni ma yin no/_/yang chos rku ba zhes bya ba gang zhig ce na/_gang zhig 'di ni rung ngo 'di ni mi rung ngo zhes cung zad tsam gyis [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ma sbas pa dkrugs [#]par byed pa de ni rang gi spobs
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]pa can zhes brjod do/_/yang gang zhig rang gi spobs pas dkrugs [#]par byed cing de de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs par smra ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing gang zhig de dag thams cad la yang dag pa ma yin
[\[147b.2\]]pa'i tshig dag gis gshe bar 'gyur/_spyo bar 'gyur/_skur par 'gyur la/_yang dad pa can nam/_dad pa can ma yin pa yang rung ste/_gang zhig slob dpon gyis mdzad pa ma grub pa la/_rang gi spobs pas byas pa'i chos 'jug pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa [#]zhes
[\[147b.3\]]bya'o/_/gang zhig rang [#]sangs rgyas de dag la skur pa dang /_gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa dag las/_de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa [#]'di ches lci ba yin no/_/yang gang zhig 'di skad du bslab pa spong /_sangs rgyas spong /_chos spong /_dge 'dun spong ngo
[\[147b.4\]]zhes smra bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gal te ston pa'i gsung spangs nas rang gi spobs pas byas pa'i tshig la bstod na de ltar na spangs par 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo 'di ni chos rku ba zhes bya'o/_/gang zhig rang gi spobs pas tshig gcig nang du bcug nas slob dpon gyis [#]mdzad pa
[\[147b.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par byas so snyam du sems pa 'di ni don ma yin pa des chos rkun po dang chos kyi chom rkun pa zhes bya ba/_chos sun 'byin par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo 'dzin pa de dag [#]dang ldan pa de gang sangs rgyas la rab tu dang ba bsgom pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la
[\[147b.6\]]rab tu dang ba bsgom pa ni gnas med cing go skabs med de 'di ni gnas med do/_/phyi nas de ni 'di ni rigs so/_/'di ni mi rigs so/_/'di ni 'brel [#]lo/_/'di ni mi 'brel [#]lo zhes mdo sde thos pa tsam du 'gyur ba [#]spong ngo zhes de ltar 'dod par bya'o/_/mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
[\[147b.7\]]ldan pa de mkhas pas [#]lhag par rlom par 'gyur ro/_/de lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de yang gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na blun por [#]'gyur/_'on par 'gyur/_lce med par 'gyur/_lce gnyis par 'gyur/_lce thor pa can
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]du 'gyur/_mi [#]'brel pa smra ba'i lce can du 'gyur/_lce lkugs [#]pa can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//[#]bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la smod pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_brjod du med pa'i mdo las kyang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
[\[148a.2\]]dga' ba dang ldan pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur cing 'dug [#]pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' brjod [#]du med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la slob pa na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa [#]slu bar byed pa yin/_smras pa/_de gal te bdag ni tshul khrims dang
[\[148a.3\]]ldan no/_/gzhan ni tshul khrims [#]'chal lo zhes de ltar slob na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de gal te bdag ni gtong ba dang ldan no/_/gzhan dag ni ser sna can no/_/bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan no/_/gzhan ni gnod sems can no/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan no/_/gzhan
[\[148a.4\]]ni snyom [#]las can no/_/bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o/_/gzhan ni sems g.yengs pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o/_/gzhan dag ni shes rab 'chal pa'o zhes de ltar slob na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/bdag ni 'dod pa chung ba'o/_/chog shes pa'o/_/rab tu rnam
[\[148a.5\]]par dben pa'o/_/dgang sla ba/_gso sla ba/_dgon pa pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba/_phyag dar khrod pa/_sbyangs pa la gnas pa/_ma 'dres pa rnam par dben pa la dga' ba/_brtson pa/_mngon par brtson pa/_mang du thos pa/_blang bar 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_stan [#]par smra ba/_tshig 'jam
[\[148a.6\]]pa/_dran pa dang ldan pa/_blo gros dang ldan pa/_cho ga dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/_bka' blo bde ba/_mthun par 'dzin pa/_des pa/_gnas bde ba/_yang dag par 'dzin pa la brtson pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms thob pa/_bden par smra ba dang /_
[\[148a.7\]]tshig bden pa dang /_tshig yang dag pa can/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'o/_/bdag gis bdud kyi [#]las rtogs nas kyang spang bar bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa dag la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag ni zab mo la bzod pa can no/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang lan gyi [#]gsung
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]rtog pa la gnas pa'o/_/bdag ni ston pa dang gsol ba 'debs pa dang rjes su yi rangs pa [#]dang yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/bdag ni 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang rnam par rig par byed pa
[\[148b.2\]]la mkhas pa'o/_/bag yod pas dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o/_/gzhan dag ni de dag sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhes de gal te de ltar bdag nyid la yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /_gzhan la smod na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/rigs
[\[148b.3\]]kyi bu gzhan yang de gal te 'di snyam du chos 'di dag kun chub par bya[#]/_chos 'di dag spang bar bya[#]/_'di dag 'gog par bya/_'di dag bsgom par bya snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_
[\[148b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos kyi dbyings 'di [#]ni gnas pa nyid de/_chos kyi dbyings 'di ni yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/_spang bar bya ba ma yin/_mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/_bsgom par bya ba ma yin no/_/bdag ni bden par smra ba'o snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu
[\[148b.5\]]bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bden pa la ni nga'o nga'i 'o snyam du gnyis su 'jug pa med do/_/bdag gis thob bo/_/bdag gis mngon sum du byas so snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang gis yongs su dag par bya ba med/_thob par bya ba med/_
[\[148b.6\]]mngon sum du bya ba med do/_/'di ni sbyor ba'o 'di ni spang [#]ba'o snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba med pa'o/_/bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa'o snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i
[\[148b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad [#]dran pa med pa yid la byed pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa [#]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bdag ni yang dag par spong ba la zhugs so snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni [#]rang bzhin gyis spangs
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]par de bzhin gshegs pa [#]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bdag gi [#]mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi tshul dag la brtson no snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni ma 'dres par
[\[149a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa [#]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bdag gi [#]dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang ldan no snyam na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'jig
[\[149a.3\]]tshogs ni [#]gzhan kho na'o/_/bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ni gzhan kho na'o zhes de ltar slob na de bzhin gshegs pa slu bar byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_gang dag rnyed pa can du gyur pa [#]de dag rnyed pa can ma yin pa la smod par
[\[149a.4\]]'gyur/_gang dag rab tu dang ba byed par gyur pa [#]de dag rab tu dang bar byed pa ma yin pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag lta bar byed par gyur pa [#]de dag lta bar byed pa ma yin pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag blta na sdug par 'gyur ba de dag blta na sdug pa ma yin pa la smod par 'gyur [#]
[\[149a.5\]]gang dag spros pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag spros pa dang mi ldan pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag gtong ba la mos par gyur pa de dag [#]ser sna can dag la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa [#]de dag tshul khrims 'chal pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag bzod pa
[\[149a.6\]]tsam thob par gyur pa [#]de dag gnod sems can la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa [#]de dag snyom [#]las dang ldan pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag bsam gtan par gyur pa [#]de dag sems rnam par g.yengs pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag shes rab dang
[\[149a.7\]]ldan par gyur pa [#]de dag shes rab 'chal pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag thabs la mkhas par gyur pa [#]de dag thabs la mi mkhas pa la smod par 'gyur/_gang dag mang du thos pa de dag thos pa nyung ba la smod par 'gyur/_yid du 'ong ba gang dang [#]gang rnyed par gyur pa [#]de dag de nyid kyis
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]gzhan la smod par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sbyin pa sgrib pa lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims sgrib
[\[149b.2\]]pa lags/_ji ltar na bzod pa sgrib pa lags/_ji ltar na brtson 'grus sgrib pa lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan sgrib pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab sgrib pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
[\[149b.3\]]bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa yin mod gyi 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la rang gi rnam par rtog pas sbyin [#]pa sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo ni sbyin pa sbyin [#]pa na/_ser sna can rnams la mi
[\[149b.4\]]dad pa'i sems skyed par byed do[#]/_/ma dad pa'i sems des de la tha ba'i skyon 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tha ba'i skyon skyes pas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de tshul khrims srung [#]ba na tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la smod cing gshe la/_de dag gi mi snyan pa
[\[149b.5\]]smra'o/_/de las de dag gi skyon thos nas skye bo mang po ma dad par byed do/_/de ma dad pa des ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzod pa sgom [#]pa na bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa yin/_gzhan 'di dag ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no snyam du bzod pa'i rgyags pas
[\[149b.6\]]bag med par 'gyur te/_bzod pa'i rgyags pas bag med pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de brtson 'grus rtsom [#]pa na dge slong 'di dag ni le lo can du gnas pa/_mngon par mi brtson pa/_dad pas byin pa yongs su spyod pa ste/_'di dag ni chu phor
[\[149b.7\]]gang gi'ang 'os kyang [#]ma yin no/_/de brtson 'grus rtsom pa des bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pas de byis pa yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/de bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa na/_bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa des 'dod pa skyed cing [#]'di snyam du sems te/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]bdag cag ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa yin/_dge slong gzhan 'di dag ni sems g.yengs par gnas pa yin/_'du 'dzi la dga' bas gnas pa ste/_de dag sangs rgyas su ga la 'gyur/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las ring ngo /_/de 'du
[\[150a.2\]]shes yid la byed pa das rlom pa dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed pa skyed par byed pa de snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/der de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya dgos so/_/gal te de mang du thos pa zhig yin na/_de yi ge med pa'i
[\[150a.3\]]chos thams cad la mi bden pa'i rnam par shes par brtags nas shes rab tu dmigs shing rlom par lhur len te de ni mi blun po'o [#]zhes nga smra'o/_/mi shes pas bcom pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/skyes bu dam pa ma yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/rtog [#]pas bcom pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/gal
[\[150a.4\]]te de theg pa chen po la gnas pa zhig yin na de 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_nga ni 'jig rten na rgan pa'o/_/nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo'o/_/nga ni 'jig rten na mchog tu 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/gal te des gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag mthong na/_de dag la ma dad pa'i sems skyed par
[\[150a.5\]]byed do/_/smod par byed/_gshe bar byed/_mi snyan pa rjod par byed do/_/de ngan du sems pa de dang dan du brjod pa des ngan song du 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa [#]yid la byed pa dang
[\[150a.6\]]bral bar 'gyur zhe na/_'di na byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par song ba rab tu dben pa na gnas pa ni/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa/_gzhan gang dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze yang rung ste/_de thams cad 'dres par gnas pa/_'dris pa
[\[150a.7\]]mang pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la brtson pa dor ba'o snyam du de ltar sems skyed [#]par mi byed de[#]/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/dad pa'i stobs skyed [#]pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]mdo las kyang /_bdag ni bdag la mi bstod pa dang gzhan la mi smod pa la gnas pas/_gzhan dag kyang bdag la mi bstod pa dang gzhan la mi smod pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs 'byin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la bdag la bstod pa nyid ni/_gang bdag [#]nyid
[\[150b.2\]]la yang dag pa [#]ma yin pa'i yon tan sgro 'dogs pa nyid do/_/gzhan la smod pa nyid ni gang [#]gzhan gyi yang dag pa'i yon tan 'joms pa nyid do zhes gsungs so//_//[#]byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan brjod pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_ye shes sgron me'i [#]mdo las kyang /_
[\[150b.3\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams par 'gyur zhe na/_'di na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/'o na
[\[150b.4\]]ci zhe [#]na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas rab tu brtags [#]pa de dag la rab tu bslab par bya'o zhes de ltar na spyod par byed pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/chos yang dag par sdud
[\[150b.5\]]pa'i mdo las kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yang lags la/_so sor thar pa tsam gyis yang dag par mi sems te[#]/_
[\[150b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la [#]brten pa yang lags so/_/cho ga dang spyod pa la [#]phun sum tshogs pa yang lags la/_cho ga dang spyod yul tsam gyis [#]dag par mi sems te/_byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga dang spyod yul la brten pa yang lags so/_/kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam
[\[150b.7\]]dag la yang 'jigs par lta zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la yang brten pa lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi de kho na shes pas las dang nyon mongs pas 'jigs shing skrag pa
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ma mchis pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes lags so zhes gsungs so/_/sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par
[\[151a.2\]]'phel bar byad pas zhing lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad rab tu bstan [#]pas sa lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par byed pas chu lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad la brten pa med pas rlung lta bu'o/_/lta ba'i nye bar len pa'i rtswa thams cad rab tu sreg pas me lta
[\[151a.3\]]bu'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pas nyi ma lta bu'o/_/chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par byed pas zla [#]ba lta bu'o/_/chos kyi snang ba byed pas sgron me lta bu'o/_/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su mthong bar byed pas mig lta bu'o/_/thams cad
[\[151a.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas lam lta bu'o/_/mu stegs ngan pa rnam par spong bas mu stegs lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par gnas pas bzhon [#]pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi sgor 'jug par byed pas
[\[151a.5\]]sgo lta bu'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa na gnas par byed pas gzhal med khang lta bu'o/_/chos kyi dga' ba dang /_mos pa nyams su myong bar byed pas bza' shing [#]gi ra ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba nas/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams [#]la mchod rten lta bu'o/_/[#]
[\[151a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rtsi yod de/_de 'chad na 'jigs pa lnga mi 'byung ste/_'di ltar mes mi tshig go/_/dug gis mi tshugs so/_/mtshon gyis mi chod do[#]/_/chus mi 'khyer [#]ro/_/du bas mi 'chi'o/_/
[\[151a.7\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi [#]rtsi 'chad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod chags kyi mes mi 'tshig [#]go/_/yul gyi dug gis mi tshugs so/_/[#]nyon mongs pa'i mtshon gyis mi chod do/_/srid pa'i chus mi 'khyer ro/_/yongs su rtog pa'i du bas mi 'chi'o zhes
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gsungs pa'i bar dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma 'phos na/_rgya mtsho chen po la bskal pas 'tshig pa'i me thams cad kyis kyang tal tsam yang bskam
[\[151b.2\]]par nus pa'i gnas med skabs med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nor bu rin po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po bsam pa dang /_sems kyi [#]rgyud la yod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[151b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'ga' zhig rnam par chud za bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de/_de ni mi srid de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yongs su gtong [#]ba zhig tu gyur [#]na ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang skam [#]par 'gyur ro
[\[151b.4\]]zhes gsungs pa'i bar dang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_ji srid du nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis [#]snang bar byed pa de srid du nor dang /_'bru dang /_rin po che'i rnam pa dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_gos dang /_longs spyod
[\[151b.5\]]gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go/_/de bzhin du ji srid du dus gsum la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings kyi yul snang bar mdzad pa de srid du lha dang mi dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[151b.6\]]zag pa yod pa'am/_zag pa med pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go zhes gsungs pa'i bar dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dngul chu'i rigs gser du snang ba zhes bya ba
[\[151b.7\]]yod de/_de ni srang gcig gis kyang lcags srang stong gser du 'gyur ro/_/dngul chu srang gcig po de ni lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba'am/_lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i [#]khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]pa'i ye shes kyis bzung ba ni las dang [#]nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te[#]/_chos thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ro'i khams gcig po de ni las dang /_nyon mongs pa'i lcags
[\[152a.2\]]thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par [#]bya ba'am/_zad par mi nus so zhes gsungs pa'i bar dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang thams cad las khyad par [#]'phags pa'i gser gyi rgyan zil gyis gnon to/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa
[\[152a.3\]]rdo rje rin po che bsam pa log par zhugs pas chag par gyur kyang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gser gyi [#]rgyan zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdo rje rin po che ni [#]chag kyang phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel lo/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen
[\[152a.4\]]pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje rin po che nan tan med pas chag par gyur kyang /_'khor ba'i phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel lo zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/byams pa 'jug pa'i mdo las kyang /_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse
[\[152a.5\]]ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]bslab pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas sam/_ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa byas sam mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs
[\[152a.6\]]te 'dug gam/_mtshams med pa lnga byas su zin kyang byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi sems kyang ma btang ma spangs te/_byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral la dmigs pa can gyi sems dang /_mngon par zhen pa'i sems kyang mi skyed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims dang
[\[152a.7\]]ldan pa kho na yin pa dang /_tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang /_tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang /_tshul khrims ma ral ba dang /_tshul khrims nag nog can ma yin par gzung [#]bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang bslab pa yang yin no/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ (]da [,]de [)]dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i las byas pas srid par 'gro ba bskyed du zin kyang /_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni [#]ji tsam du srid par 'gro ba bskyed pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
[\[152b.2\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang /_de nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/_dmigs par lta ba dang lhan cig rten par byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
[\[152b.3\]]khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong la/_dmigs par lta ba'i sems kyang mi skyed [#]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i [#]sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa [#]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan
[\[152b.4\]]yang gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/sems can rnams la mi snyoms pa'i las [#]byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/sems can rnams dang chos rnams la tha dad par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/sems can [#]
[\[152b.5\]]dmigs pa la brten pa'i byams pa phyogs gcig pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/stong pa nyid la mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni sbyin no 'di la ni [#]mi sbyin no snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni yon dbul lo 'di la ni mi
[\[152b.6\]]dbul lo snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni chos bshad par bya'o/_/'di la ni chos bshad par mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni bsnyen bkur [#]bya'o/_/'di la ni bsnyen bkur mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes
[\[152b.7\]]pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du so sor 'byed par byed de/_'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o snyam du so sor phye nas tshul khrims 'chal pa la brnyas par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]dpas [#]ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad la sems mnyam par bya dgos shing /_nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' lta bur snyoms pa'i sems dang zhes gsungs pa nas/_
[\[153a.2\]]dma' ba'i [#]smon lam ma 'debs shig_/de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin/_/shes rab bzang po mkhas par gyis/_/byang chub mchog la 'jug par gyis/_/mya ngan las 'das 'dod pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la/_/gang gis stong gsum thams cad kyang /_/rin chen bkang
[\[153a.3\]]ste phul ba [#]bas/_/gang gis [#]thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/sems kyis [#]byang chub bsngo byas la/_/tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang /_/de ni de bas shin tu che/_/gang gis [#]sems can thams cad la/_/bskal pa bye ba brjod med du/_/sems can kun la bsnyen [#]byas kyang /_/de yi bcu drug char mi phod/_/
[\[153a.4\]]gang gis [#]thal sbyar byang chub sems bskyed dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten don mdzad pa/_/rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs rnams la/_/bsod nams 'dod pa'i mi 'gas sngon chad kyi/_/'khor ba bskal pa bye bar mchod pa bas/_/mi gang mkhas shing mdzangs [#]pa'i rang bzhin can/_/
[\[153a.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la yid ches shing /_/byang chub sems ni brtan po bskyed nas kyang /_/bde gshegs mchod rten la ni me tog dbul[#]/_/'di ni de bas bsod nams khyad par brjod/_/byang chub sems kyi me tog dbul [#]byed la/_/bsod nams snga ma de ni dper mi rung /_/rgya
[\[153a.6\]]mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can ji snyed pa/_/bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas gyur[#]/_/bskal pa mang por las gzhan mi byed par/_/bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug pa med/_/de ni byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan[#]/_/bskal pa mtha'
[\[153a.7\]]yas bar du bshad na yang /_/cung zad tsam yang yongs su brjod mi 'gyur/_/sa gzhi dag las rdul ni langs [#]pa bzhin/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/byang chub yang dag sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_rnyed chen rab tu bshad bya yis/_/rnyed pa gang dang rkang gnyis kyi/_/dam pa
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]yang dag ldan gyur pa/_/bstan te bram ze mnyan par gyis/_/bdag ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug gi_/'khor los [#]sgyur bar 'gyur bya bar/_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug la/_/'dzeg [#]pa byed par
[\[153b.2\]]'gyur ba ni/_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/gang zhig 'dod khams gzugs khams dang /_/gzugs med bla na med par yang /_/'dod par gyur pa'i sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/sems can
[\[153b.3\]]rnams kyi yongs 'dren pa/_/don 'dod 'gyur bar [#]bya ba yang /_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/nad kun dag las thar byed pa'i/_/sman pa'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya/_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can des/_/sems ni
[\[153b.4\]]byang chub la gzhol bya/_/mun pa rnam par 'joms byed pa'i/_/snang ba dag ni byed 'gyur bar/_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/gang las srid pa gsum 'byung ba'i/_/phyin ci log dag rab 'joms par/_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can
[\[153b.5\]]des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/kun du sbyor ba rab spong zhing /_/bdud dag tshar bcad byed par yang /_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/ma rig zhi bar bya ba dang /_/srid pa'i dra [#]ba gcod 'gyur bar/_/'dod par gyur pa'i [#]sems
[\[153b.6\]]can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/'dod dang sred pa spangs pa [#]dang /_/nga rgyal nga rgyal mi [#]byed par/_/'dod par gyur pa'i sems can des/_/sems ni byang chub la gzhol bya/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo de nyid las/_gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir
[\[153b.7\]]sems can kun/_/tshul khrims 'di la bslab phyir rab 'god na'ang /_/bsod nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang la rab 'god na'ang /_/bsod
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang la rab 'god na'ang /_/bsod nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/
[\[154a.2\]]gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos 'dir rab 'god na'ang /_/bsod nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/lan cig phyir 'ong chos 'dir [#]rab 'god na'ang /_/
[\[154a.3\]]bsod nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos 'dir rab 'god na'ang /_/bsod nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig
[\[154a.4\]]sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/dgra bcom chos 'dir rab tu 'god byed na'ang /_/bsod nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can kun/_/rang sangs rgyas la rab tu 'god byed na'ang /_/bsod
[\[154a.5\]]nams phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/bsod nams rgyus gang tsan dan mchog rab [#]bzhin/_/sangs rgyas zhing du gtsug lag khang byed 'jug_/lhun po'i tshad tsam mchod rten byed 'jug pas/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/bsod
[\[154a.6\]]nams don gnyer sems can smin byed pa/_/gang zhig rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'khor [#]yug dang /_/'dra ba 'di na du ma byed pa des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang 'dir sems can thams cad bde bya'i phyir/_/mgo 'am phrag la bskal par khyer [#]byed na/_/bsod nams
[\[154a.7\]]phung po skyes pa de 'dra des/_/byang chub sems kyi bcu drug char mi phod/_/mya ngan med cing byang chub don gnyer gang /_/mi de dag gi chos nyid de 'dra zhing /_/de dag rtag tu sems can mchog tu 'gyur/_/de dag mtshungs med lhag lta ga la yod/_/de'i phyir de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]nas/_/gus par byas nas shes rab la 'dun gyis/_/bsod nams phung po du ma 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/bla med byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las kyang /_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na sbrul gdug pa'i phru gu ni grogs [#]mi dgos
[\[154b.2\]]par za'o/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yang grogs mi dgos par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sdud de/_gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sdud do/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na srin
[\[154b.3\]]bu me khyer brgya stong gis kyang nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi 'od zil gyis gnon mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na dug gi gnyen po nad med par byed
[\[154b.4\]]pa chung ngus kyang dug shin tu mang po zhi bar byed do/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi nad med pa chung ngus kyang nyon mongs pa'i dug mang po shin tu zhi bar byed do/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na bar snang las ro gcig pa'i chu'i rgyun 'bab pa bab
[\[154b.5\]]nas snod kyi bye brag gis ro bro ba tha dad du 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' [#]yang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ro gcig pa yang dag par bsgrub ste/_sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa rnams la chos bstan pa tha dad pa ston to/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i
[\[154b.6\]]bu 'di lta ste dper na gang du 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser byung ba der rin po che thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de bzhin du gang du byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che byung [#]ba der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[154b.7\]]nges pa dang ma nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad [#]rang sangs rgyas nyid la rab tu 'god par byed la/_'jam dpal gzhan [#]zhig theg pa
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskrun pa cig [#]kyang rgyas par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do zhes gsungs so/_/rin po che'i phung po'i mdo las kyang /_kun dga' bo de lta bas na dkon mchog gsum
[\[155a.2\]]yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung [#]bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par sdud par [#]bya'o/_/kun dga' bo don gyi dbang 'di [#]gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag la bu'i 'du shes yang
[\[155a.3\]]dag par skyed [#]par mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]gang bar gyur la/_de dag las gang bdag gis sems can khyed cag rnams mgron [#]du gnyer bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid bla na med pa yang
[\[155a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs [#]rgyas nas 'khor ba na spyod pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya'o zhes sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa 'ga' yang med do/_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_lag pa dang rkang
[\[155a.5\]]pa dag bcad na mi de gson par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gson par 'gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_yang 'ga' zhig snying phyung bar gyur na gson par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lag pa dang rkang
[\[155a.6\]]pa ji lta ba de bzhin du nga'i shA ri'i bu dang mod gal gyi bu dag yin la/_snying ji lta ba de bzhin du nga'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no/_/kun dga' bo gal te byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la zhon nas/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas rtse rol dga' bar byed la/_'ga' zhig de'i
[\[155a.7\]]shing rta 'dren par mi byed na/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i shing rta mgo bos 'dren par mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo gal te gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gnas na yang /_de la de bzhin gshegs pa [#]rim gro dang bsnyen bkur gyi phyir spro bar mdzad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la smad de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad pham par byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs
[\[155b.2\]]par byed/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dus de ni yod la/_yang nyan thos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi 'jug cing /_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon par nus pa'ang ma yin no/_/des
[\[155b.3\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nyid kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par gzung ba gsung bar [#]mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo
[\[155b.4\]]dam pa ma yin pa'i bu de bzhin du nga'i shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis dang de las gzhan pa'i nyan thos rnams yin par blta bar bya'o/_/dper na btsun mo dam pa'i bu 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yin par blta bar bya'o zhes
[\[155b.5\]]gsungs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las kyang /_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig_/'dzam bu [#]gling pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed pa nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar la rab tu 'god par byed la/_rigs
[\[155b.6\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'ga' zhig sems can gcig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god par byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed [#]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gang
[\[155b.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed na bsod nams mang du skyed [#]do zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na bya ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa mig ma bye
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ba yang /_'di lta ste zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa/_ma rig [#]pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa/_las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling
[\[156a.2\]]tog gis mig khebs pa yang 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to zhes gsungs pa nas/_'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar zla ba nya ba la ni [#]ma yin no/_/'od srungs
[\[156a.3\]]de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos
[\[156a.4\]]dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/chos thams cad mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi [#]khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
[\[156a.5\]]las sems can re res nyi ma re re zhing gdan rgyar gling bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la 'phang du ri rab lhun po'i tshad tsam rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa 'cha' bar byed la/_seng ge'i gdan de thams cad kyang lha'i gos kyis g.yogs pa zhig go/_/rin po che sna bdun gang zhe na/_gang 'di
[\[156a.6\]]lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_asma gar ba dang /_bdun pa mu sA ra gal pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyi ma re re zhing sems can re re las rnyed par gyur [#]la/_de dag kyang ji ltar 'dod
[\[156a.7\]]pa bzhin yongs su spyod par byed na/_shA ri'i bu de ltar byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' yon [#]gnas shin tu yongs su dag pa kho na yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_nyan thos dang
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yon gnas yin no zhes gsungs so/_/byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las kyang /_byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi 'di tsam du stobs dang ldan pa/_'di tsam du shugs dang ldan pa/_'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa/_'di tsam
[\[156b.2\]]du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur la/_des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag [#]chu'i phung po gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag [#]nas/_rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog
[\[156b.3\]]nas/_rgyun las bzlog thabs kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du bab par gyur na/_byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de dka' ba byed pa dang /_ngo mtshar che ba dang /_brtson 'grus che ba yin snyam mam/_byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/bde bar
[\[156b.4\]]gshegs pa de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/_de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du [#]snying rje chen po kun du bskyed nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[156b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do[#]/_/nan tan gyis [#]mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba [#]byed pa dang ngo mtshar che ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/dpas [#]byen gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste/_/sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i/_/
[\[156b.6\]]sems can 'dir su dga' bskyed [#]pa/_/de dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho/_/sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i/_/sems ni gang dag skyed [#]gyur pa/_/de dag sems can thams cad dga'/_/de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems la su dga' ba/_/de
[\[156b.7\]]dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing /_/mtshan gyis [#]shin tu spras pa dang /_/'jig rten snang bar byed par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni sems che ste/_/sems kun nang na dge ba mchog_/yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs/_/nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid/_/ces gsungs so/_/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]gzi brjid can gyi mdo las kyang /_/de la tshul khrims kyi stobs gang zhe na/_gang gis so so'i [#]skye bo'i tshul khrims log par lta ba [#]shes pa dang /_gang gis [#]so so'i skye bo'i tshul khrims log par lta ba 'dor ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa [#]ni
[\[157a.2\]]gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs pa so so'i [#]skye bo'i [#]tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ga' cam yang tshul khrims dang [#]ldan par ma gsungs so/_/'di nye bar bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par grub par gsung bar mi mdzad do/_/'on
[\[157a.3\]]kyang so so'i skye bo'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni bde 'gro mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las kyang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi [#]che'i sa gang lags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bcu pa [#]'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa
[\[157a.4\]]ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che'i sa'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi [#]rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che'i sa'o/_/sa la gnas
[\[157a.5\]]pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/smon lam mngon par bsgrubs [#]pa ni spyod pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni bsdu ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rigs su skyes pas byang chub
[\[157a.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rtogs [#]par bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/theg pa chen po ni thabs mkhas pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[157a.7\]]kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rigs su skyes pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]kyi tshe'i sa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi nan tan ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa ste/_rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o zhes
[\[157b.2\]]gsungs so//_//[#]byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa bzlog pa la [#]dgongs pa bstan pa/_gzi brjid can gyi mdo las kyang /_sdig pa'i dge slong chos drug dang ldan pa ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung [#]zhing /_rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par mi byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[157b.3\]]drug gang zhe na/_'di na sdig pa'i dge slong mu stegs can gzhan gyi ngag khong du chud par byed pa dang /_dge slong ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag_/tshul khrims kyi phung po las nyams su 'jug par byed pa dang /_dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dang bcas pa dag_/tshangs par spyod pa ma
[\[157b.4\]]yin pa [#]'khrig pa'i chos kyis skur pa dang /_gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub kyi sems las rnam par dbye bar [#]byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung du gzhan gyis sgro btags pa 'khor gyi nang du 'dug ste smra ba dang /_dge bsnyen bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa'i chung ma bgrod par byed
[\[157b.5\]]pa ste/_sdig pa'i dge slong chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan pa ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur zhing /_rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par mi byed [#]par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/dpas byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_sems can bsod nams chung ngu
[\[157b.6\]]rnams/_/byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid[#]/_/'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa/_/byang chub sems kyis [#]skyo bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang /_/de la gal te gzugs mchis na[#]/_/nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/_/de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[157b.7\]]dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag yongs su spangs pa nyid kyis/_sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rin po che'i [#]phung po'i mdo las kyang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la bka'
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu rang sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
[\[158a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi [#]sems las byung ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas [#]na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par blta bar bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi bzod pa gang yin
[\[158a.3\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa gang yin pa las bzod pa snga ma des ni bzod pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang [#]nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang mi 'gro'o zhes de bzhin du sbyar te/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_
[\[158a.4\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba nas gong na med pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_shA ri'i bu de ltar na sems bskyed pa mchog rnams la/_gang zhig bar du gcod
[\[158a.5\]]par brtson pa de ni bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed [#]do/_/gang zhig rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rang gi byang chub la bar chad bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /_gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya ba'i phyir brtson pa de gnyis las/_'di [#]ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches
[\[158a.6\]]mang du skyed [#]do zhes gsungs so/_/nges pa dang ma nges pa la 'jug par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams byang chub tu sems ma [#]bskyed pa dag 'dun bzlog par
[\[158a.7\]]byed la/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig tha na theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang theg pa chen po la [#]'dun pa zlog par byed na/_'di nyid [#]de bas sdig pa ches grangs med par skyed do zhes gsungs so/_/bu mo yon tan gyis brgyan
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo yon tan gyis brgyan pa [#]mngon par shes pa rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag dang lhan cig gnas pa gcig gis gnas par mi bgyi ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i
[\[158b.2\]]bshes gnyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu mo theg pa chen por sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa [#]ma gtogs pa/_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud dang
[\[158b.3\]]bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang bcas pa dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i skye dgu la ngas ma mthong ngo /_/bu mo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/de [#]ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag nyid
[\[158b.4\]]la phan par zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa [#]rnams dang gnas pa gcig gis gnas par mi bya'o/_/gnas khang gcig gam/_stan gcig [#]gam/_'chags gcig [#]gam/_lam gcig tu 'gro
[\[158b.5\]]bar mi bya ste/_gzhan du na theg pa chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pas de dag dang lhan cig gnas par bya bar ngas rjes su gnang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa
[\[158b.6\]]dge ba [#]'di lta bu'i mdo sde bstan par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems la bar du gcod par byed pa'o/_/'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa zlog par byed pa'o/_/'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems la co 'dri bar byed pa'o/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpas [#]
