[\[158b.7\]]srog yongs su gtang [#]bar bya ba ni bla'i[#]/_byang chub kyi sems yongs su btang nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ni [#]ma yin no/_/bu mo gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems yongs su btang zhing /_dam pa'i chos yongs su
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]'dzin pa btang /_de bzhin gshes pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa btang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa btang nas gang 'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la sems skyed par byed pa dang /_gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi
[\[159a.2\]]sems la [#]'dun pa zlog par byed cing co 'dri bar byed na/_de gnyi ga yang [#]ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpas bsha' sa dang ldan pa'i las lnga byas pa ni bla'i[#]/_byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsten pas ni ma
[\[159a.3\]]yin no/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpas [#]byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung bas/_bskal pa'am bskal pa brgya'am bskal pa stong ngam bskal pa [#]brgya stong du sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i[#]/_byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsten pa ni ma yin no/_/
[\[159a.4\]]bu mo byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas dag tu lhung ba ni bla'i[#]/_byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsten pa ni ma yin no/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpas [#]srog gcod pa [#]byas nas sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i[#]/_dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas rkun po
[\[159a.5\]]bred sha thon pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni ma yin no/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa can me'i 'obs su 'dug pa ni bla'i[#]/_byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su gnas pa ni ma yin no/_/
[\[159a.6\]]bu mo sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin par sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las kyang /_
[\[159a.7\]]rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig to can nam/_bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs su 'ongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lung ston par byed na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du 'di
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ni gdon mi za bar bdud sdig to [#]can nam/_bdud kyis [#]byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis 'ongs pa yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag [#]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang dag par 'dzin
[\[159b.2\]]du 'jug par mdzad pa ni ma yin no zhes sems par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo klog cing kha ton byed pa la/_bdud sdig to ca[#]na sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs su 'ongs nas 'di skad ces 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
[\[159b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa ma yin zhing nyan thos kyis kyang ma yin la/_gang la khyod spyod pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdud kyis smras pa'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ba na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 'byed
[\[159b.4\]]par byed pa de ni gdon mi za bar bdud sdig to can nam/_bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]byang chub kyi sems mi brjed [#]pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las kyang /_de skad ces gsol pa
[\[159b.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed [#]par 'gyur te/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_chos la ma gus pa
[\[159b.6\]]dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la khyad du gsod pa dang /_log pa'i tshig smra ba ste/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par
[\[159b.7\]]'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dang 'dris par byed pa dang /_theg pa dman pa la mos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' [#]sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /_chos rnams la slob dpon dpe mkhyud [#]byed pa ste/_sred med kyi bu byang
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgyu byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la g.yos
[\[160a.2\]]sten par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la lce gnyis byed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti [#]la lhag par zhen pa ste[#]/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
[\[160a.3\]]bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro[#]/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdud kyi lam la [#]gtogs pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs chung ba dang /_shes rab dang thabs med pa ste/_sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag
[\[160a.4\]]dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_rgyal po chen po bcu drug po 'di dag ni gang zag phrag dog can gyi mtshan ma yin par rig par bya ste/_bcu drug gang zhe na/_kha lug [#]ltar lkugs pa [#]dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_
[\[160a.5\]]legs par ma bsdams pa dang /_gzhan gyi bsngags pa ma yin pa bden par [#]'dzin pa dang /_gzhan gyi yon tan dag la yid mi ches pa dang /_bsam pa mang ba dang /_mya ngan mang ba dang /_yid mi bde ba mang ba dang /_mig ser ba dang /_kha dog dang dbyibs nyams pa dang /_nga rgyal gyis non pa
[\[160a.6\]]dang /_dge slong la mi dga' ba dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa la bsting pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_brtsad du rung ba'i 'khrul pa tshol ba dang /_gnas la ser sna byed pa dang /_chos nyan du 'gro ba la rna blags te mi nyan pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs shing gzhan dang gzhan du gtam rlung la [#]skur bar byed cing
[\[160a.7\]]chos kyi gtam la mi dga' ste/_'di skad du 'di ci zer ba ngas mi shes so/_/'di ni blun po yin te/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis chos ston to zhes kyang zer te/_gang 'phags pa rnams kyis [#]thugs su chud pa'i chos 'dul ba la ma gus pa 'di nyid mi blun po de dag mi shes pa yin no/_/bdag gis ni
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]byang chub thob nas gdod byang chub kyi [#]shing drung du chos la gus par gnas par bya'o zhes zer zhing /_dge slong rnams la chos ston pa na yang phyi sgo nas [#]'greng zhing 'dug la chos nyan par byed de/_stan la 'dug mi 'dod na yang dge slong dag la 'tshol bar byed de/_brgyad sde'i byang chub kyi yan lag
[\[160b.2\]]gi gtam ston pa na yan lag bdag gis [#]mnyan par bya'o/_/de thos na bdag gi nad de 'byang [#]par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de bas na mi blun po de dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pas byang chub yongs su btsal bar sems pa dag [#]ni dper na/_mi'i mig gnyis phyung nas blta [#]bar 'dod pa'am/_nor thams
[\[160b.3\]]cad med par [#]byas nas mgron po [#]mang po dang mi mthun par 'dod pa'am/_rkang pa bcad nas lam du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang 'dra ste/_rgyal po chen po de ltar 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag gi byang chub ni de 'dra ba [#]snyam byed do/_/rgyal po chen po chos nyi shu rtsa lnga dang ldan na gang zag byang chub
[\[160b.4\]]las nyams par rig par bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/_gnas la ser sna byed pa dang /_khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /_bsngags pa la ser sna byed pa dang /_phrag dog can dang /_ma dad pa dang /_ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_sdig pa'i bsam pa can dang /_g.yo ba'i bsam pa can dang /_
[\[160b.5\]]gzhan la gnod pa can dang /_spyod lam khong du chud pa [#]dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_'khon [#]dam du 'dzin pa dang /_gsog [#]'jog gi shas che ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la skrag nas log par brda sprod cing sgro 'dogs te chos spong bar byed pa dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin te mi
[\[160b.6\]]'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang /_chos la slu ba [#]byas kyang mi 'gyod pa dang /_snying mi 'bebs shing dgra zla mang ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du song ba dang mthong ma thag tu gzhan gyi mos pa bzlog [#]pa'i phyir gzhan dag gi mtshang 'dru ba dang /_gsang ba'i gnas la yid brtan pa las 'khu ba dang /_sngon mthong
[\[160b.7\]]yang rung ma mthong yang [#]rung ba'i dge slong dag la 'di [#]rnams la su yang dga' bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam ste/_gnod par bya ba'i phyir bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang /_gzhan gyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir gzhan sbod [#]pa dang /_rnyed pa'i bsam pas bdag bsnyen par
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]rdzogs pa de nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam te [#]so sor brtags nas tshul khrims gtsang ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang zag de 'dra ba de dag ni bstan pa las tshabs cher nyams par 'gyur ba'am khyim gyi [#]gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur [#]zhes gsungs so/_/nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo
[\[161a.2\]]las kyang /_de nas bdud kyis [#]bkrabs pa tshul khrims kyi rten sngon gyi tshe rabs dang smon lam dang sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis [#]bskul bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'ongs par gyur te/_gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas [#]thal mo
[\[161a.3\]]rab tu sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang /_myos pa ji lta ba dang /_sems 'khrugs [#]pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pa chags [#]lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nongs pa chags [#]lags so/_/'di ltar bdag gis [#]dran lags te/_grangs ma
[\[161a.4\]]mchis pa cig [#]rdzogs par bla na ma mchis pa [#]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa spyad lags so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyang ba mang du bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams bzhugs pa brgya
[\[161a.5\]]stong phrag bye ba la bdag [#]gis bsnyen bkur dang bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te chos kyang thos lags so/_/smon lam yang btab lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la dge slong la la nyan thos kyi gtam rjes su skul [#]bar bgyid lags te/_de nas bdag
[\[161a.6\]]gis ma bsams par kye ma dge sbyong gi [#]lus byad [#]kyi gang zag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du nyan thos kyi gtam 'chad pa 'di ni bdud do zhes sdig pa can gyi tshig brjod lags te/_der gal te bdag gis [#]sdig pa can gyi tshig de ma smas [#]par gyur na ni der bdag
[\[161a.7\]]gis bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur lags na/_sug las kyi lhag ma des bdag de nas shi 'phos nas bdud kyi gnas su skyes te/_dgung lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /_dgung lo brgya stong dag tu der bla na ma mchis pa yang dag
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi [#]sems bskyed pa gcig kyang ma byung lags na/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lan gnyis kyi bar du bzod pa gsol to/_/ji srid du sngon gyi mtha'i 'khor
[\[161b.2\]]bar 'khor ba de srid du slad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i mur sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro lags kyi bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sems ldog par ni mi bgyid lags so zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /_'od srungs byang chub
[\[161b.3\]]sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_sbyin gnas la slu ba dang /_gzhan 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
[\[161b.4\]]pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang mi snyan pa dang /_brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang /_sgyu dang g.yon can [#]la nye bar spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa ste/_'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang
[\[161b.5\]]chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/brjod kyis mi lang pa'i mdo las kyang /_de nas 'khor de nyid du bu mo rin po che zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur cing 'dug pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/snag gi gnyen
[\[161b.6\]]mtshams sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni rab tu mos par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka'o/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni brtson 'grus zhan pa dang /_bcos ma'i bsam pa can dang /_g.yon can dang /_sgyu can dang /_nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang /_gnod sems can dang /_
[\[161b.7\]]khro ba dang /_khong khro ba mang ba dang /_ser sna can dang /_byas pa mi shes pa dang /_bsam pa gsum yongs su ma dag pa dang /_khams gsum [#]pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /_dri ma gsum dang ldan pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]la skrag pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_ngag g.yengs pa dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang sems tshul 'chos pa dang /_ma gus pa dang /_khyim gyi gnas na 'dug pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag
[\[162a.2\]]can dang /_bdag dang gzhan slu ba dang /_rnyed pa dang bshes dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen pa dang /_sgo ma bsdams pa dang /_nyan thos kyi spyod pa lhur len pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /_ser sna can dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_gnod sems mang ba dang /_snyom [#]
[\[162a.3\]]las can dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_shes rab 'chal pa dang /_thabs la mi mkhas pa dang /_byams pa dang snying rje dang bral ba dang /_nyon mongs pa [#]ser sna'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gang zag tu mngon par zhen pa dang /_rgyu dang bya ba dang las dang rnam par smin
[\[162a.4\]]pa dang [#]'gal ba dang /_mi rigs pa dang mngon par mi brtson pa dang /_thos pa chung ba dang /_thos pa la [#]mkhas pa dang bral ba dang /_rgyags pa dang /_bag med pa la [#]spyod pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi yo byad bsnyungs pa dang bral ba dang /_lugs ma yin pa spyod pa dang /_dga'
[\[162a.5\]]ba dang mi dga' ba la log pa [#]dang bcas pa dang /_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bas bcom pa dang /_bdag la bstod pa dang [#]/_gzhan la smod pa dang /_lus dang srog la lhag par zhen pa dang /_gzugs la dga' ba dang /_sgra la dga' ba dang /_dri la dga' ba dang /_ro la dga'
[\[162a.6\]]ba dang /_reg bya la dga' ba dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_gnyid la dga' ba dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_dus mi shes pa dang /_tshod mi shes pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa can dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po spangs pa dang /_
[\[162a.7\]]byang chub kyi phyogs thams cad dang bral bas ni bsnyen par dka'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]dge slong rnams la gso dpyad dgag pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_gzhi rtsom pa'i mdo las kyang /_de la shA ri'i bu dge slong gang dag tshul khrims zhig par gyur pa de dag ni khyim
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]pa'i las kyi mtha' byed par 'gyur/_pho nya'i las kyis [#]'tsho ba rtog par 'gyur/_/gso dpyad kyi 'jug pas kyang 'tsho ba rtog par 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi sgo nas 'tsho bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa la dgra zla nyid
[\[162b.2\]]du kun du spyod pa la ltos/_shA ri'i bu de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_gzhan yang lha stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i ngo bo'i gsung rab la rnam par 'gyur ba chen po mthong nas smre sngags cher 'don par 'gyur
[\[162b.3\]]ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang nga la brten nas khyim pa rnams la rim gro byed pa 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu shAkya thub pa nga'i nyan thos dag ni lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin rnams kyi nye gnas sam rim gro byed par mi [#]'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang skyes bu
[\[162b.4\]]blun po khyim pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa na/_dmigs pa med pa'i chos stong pa nyid bsten [#]par 'gyur ba'am/_gnas par 'gyur ba de ni gnas yod pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa dag khyim pa rnams la chang phor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi gsung ston par
[\[162b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_chags pa shas che ba dang /_rmongs pa shas che ba dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_lus la chags pa dang /_spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyis [#]stong pa nyid kyi chos dmigs pa med pa shes pa'am/_
[\[162b.6\]]gting dpog pa'am/_mos pa'am/_dge sbyong gi chos bstan pa'am/_'thob par nus sam ste/_de ni gnas yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang /_'jig rten rgyang [#]pan pa'i gtam la ltos pa med pa [#]'gyur bar bya/_nyo tshong gi spyod pa las
[\[162b.7\]]ldog pa dang /_gso dpyad la dga' ba ma yin pa dang /_pho nya la dga' ba ma yin pa dang /_pho nya'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa ma yin par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rgyas pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_gang zhig lus na ba'i 'jigs pas sman pa la byin
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]par byed pa de'i sbyin pa yang yongs su ma dag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las kyang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa srog gcod pa [#]bsdus pa gnyis pa spang bar bya zhing mi bya'o/_/de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gso dpyad do/_/
[\[163a.2\]]dge slong gso dpyad byed pa na bsam gtan dang /_klog pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de gso dpyad byed pa na rnam pa gzhan du byed cing /_rnam pa gzhan du smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nad pa dag la sems gtod cing /_blo der son par 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar byed pa la 'dod pa stobs che bar
[\[163a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/'dod pas zil gyis non pa de slar yang ci nas nad tshabs che ba sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu/_des sems can rnams gzir na slar yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag grong nas grong dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer dang /_ri brags [#]
[\[163a.4\]]nas ri brags su [#]ljongs rgyu bas so sor yang dag par rgyu bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems pa brnab sems kyi zil gyis non pa de la yid kyi dri mar 'gyur gyi/_dge ba la spyod par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gso dpyad byed pa na dge slong ma yin pa dge slong du khas 'che ba la nyes
[\[163a.5\]]pa chen por 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe srog chags rnams rlung la sogs pa nad rnams kyis zil gyis mnan pa de'i tshe/_ji ltar myur bar til mar 'on cig_/gal te med na til tshir cig ces rdzas nye bar 'doms [#]so/_/til tshir [#]ba las ni srog gcod pa chen por 'gyur zhing srin bu mang po gsod
[\[163a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba la skyon gzhan 'di yang yod de/_nad la ltos [#]nas sha sar pa mtshon gyis gcod pa/_ha cang tshil can ma yin la/_ma shi ba/_nad kyis ma mnar ba gcan gzan [#]gyis ma bsad [#]pa/_mi rid pa 'on cig ces sgo [#]bar byed de/_de
[\[163a.7\]]ltar sgo [#]bar byed do/_/gang la bsgo ba dang gang srog gcod pa la sgo [#]bar byed pa yang srog gcod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_las mtshungs pa de gnyi ga sems can dmyal ba yang sos su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar brnab sems dang gnod sems kyi skyon gyis ni gso dpyad mi bya'o/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]sman pa dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_chom rkun po sdig pa'i skyes bu la nyes pa gzhan yang yod de gang gi tshe nad tshabs che bar gyur ba de'i tshe nags kyi sman gyi tshogs gang ljon shing dang lcug ma dang [#]gel pa rnams te/_don gyi [#]rgyus sems can gyi tshogs kyis [#]yongs su
[\[163b.2\]]bzung ba dang [#]/_brten pa dang bcas pa dang /_nang srin bu dag gis gang ba de dag rdzas kyi phyir bsgo [#]ba'am gcod par 'gyur ro/_/des brko ba na sa la gnas pa'i srog chags de'i rtsa ba la brten pa rnams gsod par 'gyur tshang 'jig par byed do/_/gcod par byed pa na de'i [#]
[\[163b.3\]]nang gi srog chags gsod par byed cing de la brten pa'i srog chags rnams kyang gsod par byed do/_/gso dpyad byed pa na nyes pa gzhan 'di yang yod de/_de ltar 'tsho ba'i chos can rab tu chags pa'i chos [#]can de la bsam gtan dang klog pa la mngon par dga' ba'i
[\[163b.4\]]sems 'byung bar ga la 'gyur zhing /_de la rjes su chags pa'i yid can nyes pa stobs [#]chen po can du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ngan du sems pa can sdig pa'i chos can des ljongs 'joms pa sems par byed de/_ji ltar gang gi tshe [#]ljongs kyi sems can rnams 'joms par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_
[\[163b.5\]]bdag la mchod pa dang rdzas dang bza' btung dang stan dang mal cha dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems par 'gyur/_'dod pa ma [#]bcom pa'i blo can de dge ba'i chos rnams sems par mi 'gyur/_bsam gtan dang klog pa'i rang bzhin can [#]du mi 'gyur/_bla ma
[\[163b.6\]]sten [#]par mi byed/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa can du mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i rang bzhin can du mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan du byed pa can lus zhig nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bdag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de de nas shi 'phos te gal te lan
[\[163b.7\]]grangs gzhan du myong par 'gyur ba'i las byas pas mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba na/_de sman pa'i las ngan pa de'i rang bzhin gyis rtag tu nad kyis thebs pa dang phongs pa dang tshe thung bar 'gyur ro/_/gso dpyad byed pa'i nyes pa gzhan yang skyon phal pa rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]gso bar sla ba/_thog ma med pa nas zhugs pa ma yin pa/_de dag gis rigs mthun pa dag ngan song du 'gro ba ma yin pa/_lus zhig pas de dag 'jig [#]par 'gyur ba/_de dag ni so so'i skye bo [#]thos pa dang mi ldan pa/_dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che bas
[\[164a.2\]]gso bar byed kyi[#]/_gang gi don du skra dang kha spu bzhar zhing mchog gi don du gos ngur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung ba/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug thog ma med pa nas zhugs pa lus la gdung ba de dag ni gso bar mi byed do/_/gang dag gis de la gdung bar 'gyur ba
[\[164a.3\]]de dag lus tshig [#]na tshig [#]par mi 'gyur zhing zhig pa na 'jig par mi 'gyur bar phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brel bas 'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba/_skyon chen po 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum po de dag dor nas/_gzhan dag gnod par byed pa/_skyes bu ngan du
[\[164a.4\]]sems pa/_rang nyid kyis [#]sems yongs su slu ba de'i rab tu byung ba ni don med par 'gyur ro/_/dper na skyes bu blo dman zhing nyam chung ba/_grogs med cing nor med pa 'ga' zhig dgra stobs dang ldan pas non par gyur na dgra de nor gyis [#]bzlog par ram/_dgra shin tu stobs dang ldan
[\[164a.5\]]pa de stobs kyis bsal [#]bar mi nus te/_des zin par 'gyur ro/_/des zin par 'gyur ro/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo blo gros ngan pa/_thos pa dang mi ldan pa/_dgra de'i [#]'jigs pa la rtsis med par byas nas skyes bu gzhan dman pa'i dgra'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i stobs byed par 'gyur ba na/_de ltar skyes bu blo
[\[164a.6\]]zhan pa/_shes rab 'chal pa bag med pa/_bya ba gzhan la bag med pa de la dgra 'ongs nas 'joms par 'gyur ba [#]de bzhin du dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba gang zhig_/rang gi dgra 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug stobs che ba/_brtson pa sna tshogs pa can/_'jig rten
[\[164a.7\]]gzhan du 'brang zhing rjes su gnas pa/_gti mug pa/_lhan cig gnas pa dang ldan pa [#]'dris pa/_rnam par rtog pa dang mnyam du 'jug pa/_stobs chen po gzhan gyi rjes su gnas pa ma yin pa bzod par byas nas/_gang dag gi don du rang gi skye bo dang grogs po dang chung ma dag yongs su
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]spangs te rab tu byung ba dor nas/_ji ltar bdag gis khyed cag gi rlung dang mkhris [#]pa dang bad kan gang dag yin pa de dag gzhom [#]par bya'o zhes nor gyi [#]rgyus gzhan dag la stongs par [#]byed par 'gyur ba na/_de lta bu'i blo can yid g.yengs [#]pa can de la 'chi bdag gi [#]rgyal po mngon par 'ongs par 'gyur
[\[164b.2\]]ro/_/gang dag gis [#]'dod pa'i thag pas bcings pa/_shin tu bag med pa/_bya ba gzhan la rab tu chags pa/_'dod pa stobs chen po can/_blo gros g.yengs par gyur pa de 'jig rten pha rol tu 'khrid [#]par byed pa'i dgra stobs che ba 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_
[\[164b.3\]]de'i phyir nyes pa 'di dag rig nas gso dpyad mi bya'o/_/gal te byed na'ang gang las phul du byung ba'i bde bar 'gyur ba sems gso ba'i gso dpyad bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_rlung sogs nyes par mi 'gyur zhing /_/'dod
[\[164b.4\]]chags la sogs skyon du 'dod/_/rlung la sogs pas [#]mi rnams ni/_/ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi 'gyur/_/sems skyon nyes pa chen po ste/_/rtag tu ngan 'gro ston par byed/_/de phyir de dag zhi ba dge/_/rlung sogs zhi bas 'dir ma yin/_/rang gi bya ba yongs btang nas/_/gang zhig
[\[164b.5\]]gzhan gyi [#]bya la 'jug_/de ni myur bar 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/mkhas pa rnams kyis bsting bar 'gyur/_/lus zhig pa las lus can gyi/_/rlung la sogs pa 'jig 'gyur gyi[#]/_/tshe rabs stong phrag dag tu yang /_'dod chags la sogs zhi mi 'gyur/_/de phyir 'dod chags zhi ba
[\[164b.6\]]dge_/rlung sogs zhi bas 'dir ma yin/_/'dod chags yang dag zhi ba las/_/gtan du ba yi [#]dge ba thob/_/gang zhig sems can gso de sman[#]/_/yin gyi lus gso sman pa min[#]/_/yid gso ba ni shes dka' yis/_/'jig rten pa'i shis de ltar min/_/de ltar na [#]bcom ldan
[\[164b.7\]]'das 'od srungs kyis rgyu 'dis rab tu byung bas gso dpyad mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/gso dpyad byed pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang mthun par [#]skyon la 'jug pa/_gso dpyad kyi nyes pa gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_'dod pas zil gyis non par 'gyur/_blar gyur pa'i sman pa la brten
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]nas nga rgyal byed par 'gyur/_zlar gyur pa'i sman pa de la smod par 'gyur zhing /_'tsho ba la [#]'joms par 'gyur/_de yi dgas kyi rgyu la 'jug par 'gyur/_de lta bu'i dri mas zil gyis mnan pa sems stobs dang ldan pa de'i gti mug stobs che bar 'gyur/_gti mug gis
[\[165a.2\]]zil gyis mnan pa de bud med mngon par mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas bskul bar 'gyur/_blo gros rmongs pa de bud med mngon par mthong nas 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur/_rlung la sogs pa skyon gzhan gso ban de nyid dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i [#]rgyur
[\[165a.3\]]gyur pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skyon stobs che ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis [#]zil gyis mnan [#]cing lta ba ngan pas zil gyis mnan pa'i sman pa ngan pa de [#]nyes pa chen po des bcings nas sems can dmyal bar 'khrid par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir rab tu byung bas rnam pa kun gyis rtag tu 'dod chags la sogs pa
[\[165a.4\]]zhi ba la rab tu 'bad par bya'i/_rlung la sogs pa ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang bsam gtan dang klog pa la gegs byed pa'i chos gnyis pa 'di ni dge sbyong mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pas mi bya'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]dge sbyong [#]rnams kyis [#]rgyu skar rtog pa spang ba la
[\[165a.5\]]dgongs pa bstan pa/_dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las kyang /_lnga pa 'di dge sbyong gi bsam gtan dang klog pa'i bar chad byed pa yin te/_de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge sbyong ngam dge sbyong du khas 'che ba rgyu skar brtsi ba dang sems pa'o/_/gnas skabs thams
[\[165a.6\]]cad du rgyu skar gyi rtsis dang /_sems pa mi bya ste de ni smad pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos bsam gtan dang klog pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems pa na bsod nams dang tshe'i 'du byed nub par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thob [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad pa bya ba ma byas pa de na ba dang /_
[\[165a.7\]]rga ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba las grol bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dus ring por 'khor bar yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur ro/_/de la rgyu skar gyis [#]cung zad kyang byed par mi 'gyur zhing /_rgyu skar ni bdag dang
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gzhan la skyob pa por mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_las nyid skyob pa po yin gyi rgyu skar ni skyob pa po ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyu skar gcig nyid la skyes bu skyid pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_rigs dang ldan pa dang /_rigs ngan pa dang /_chos dang ldan pa dang /_chos dang mi ldan pa
[\[165b.2\]]dang /_phyug [#]pa dang phongs pa dang /_rgyal po dang chom rkun dang /_mkhas pa dang rmongs pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang snyom [#]las can dang /_'jig rten pa dga' ba dang 'jig rten pa mi dga' ba dang /_de la sogs pa gzhan
[\[165b.3\]]yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyu skar gyi rgyu [#]yin par 'gyur na ni/_ji skad bshad pa'i skyes bu de dag thams cad mtshungs par 'gyur te[#]/_de dag gi [#]skye ba'i skar ma gcig yin no/_/rang gi yon tan dang skyon mngon par mi shes pa thog mar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu can gyi rgyu skar
[\[165b.4\]]dag mi rtsi [#]zhing /_skar mar gtogs pa'i [#]rgyu skar brtsi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rgyu skar brtsi ba dang sems pa dag mdzes pa dang dge bar mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_rgyu skar gcig nyid la mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams skye ba dang /_rgyu skar gyi mthus mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam
[\[165b.5\]]pa 'dis rgyu skar sems pa ni mi dge la/_las sems pa ni dge zhing de sems pa mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rgyu skar sems pa mi dge bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_rgyu skar stobs dang ldan pa phan tshun bzung ba na 'phel bar 'gyur/_zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[165b.6\]]rgyu skar gyis [#]rgyu skar zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing /_dus gzhan du slar yang rgyu skar de nyid zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir rgyu skar sems pa ni dge ba dang mdzes par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar gang dag bde ba dang sdug bsngal rgyu skar la rag las par brtsi ba dang /_sems pa de dag gi
[\[165b.7\]]sems pa ni dge ba dang mdzes par mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/gang dag bdag nyid kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la nus pa med pa de dag gis ji ltar na gzhan la [#]bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba byed par 'gyur/_de'i phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu ni las kho na'i yin gyi rgyu skar rnams kyis [#]ni ma yin no/_/gza'
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rnams kyang gza' rnams kyis 'khrug [#]par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_de dag kyang gzir bar 'gyur te/_dper na zla ba gza' sgra gcan gyis zung bas gzir bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de bas na gang dag bdag la nus pa med pa de dag ji ltar gzhan la nus par 'gyur/_de'i phyir
[\[166a.2\]]dge sbyong ngam dge sbyong du khas 'che bas rgyu skar bsam par mi bya'o/_/gza' ni gsum po 'di dag go/_/'di lta ste/_na ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'o/_/gang dag rtag tu gnas pa gsum po 'di dag ni gza' chen po ste/_'jig rten la sna tshogs par sems par byed do/_/dge sbyong ngan pa
[\[166a.3\]]dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_blo gros med pa/_thos pa dang mi ldan pa/_byis pa gza' gzhan dag sems par byed cing /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'jig rten pa/_skyon dang bcas pa sems par byed pa de ni/_gang bsams te yang dag par so sor brtags nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong
[\[166a.4\]]khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad sems par mi byed do/_/de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po lnga dang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang khams bco brgyad dag go/_/de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba dang bsal [#]ba dang /_bsdams pa dang dul
[\[166a.5\]]bas yang dag pa nyid du bsams nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/_dge slong rgyu skar bsams nas [#]ni mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba ni gang dag brtsis pas don du mi 'gyur zhing /_'khor ba nas mya ngan las 'da' bar
[\[166a.6\]]mi 'gyur ba/_rim gyis [#]zla ba bcu gnyis rtsi [#]bar byed kyi/_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_yang dag pa'i don shes pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba [#]gang dag mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba skye mched bcu gnyis bgrang bar mi byed do/_/dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba de dag
[\[166a.7\]]ma brtsis par gzhan gyi bya ba kun nas nyon mongs pa can sems par byed do/_/gzhan yang dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che bas ngan du sems pa ni gang dag bsams pas/_na ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dag las grol bar mi 'gyur ba/_'jig rten pa kun nas nyon mongs pa can/
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]nye bar 'tshe ba dang [#]bcas pa'i dus drug rim gyis rtsi [#]bar byed kyi/_gang dag bsams te yang dag par so sor brtags nas de dag dang [#]bral ba las mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ba/_lus la sum cu rtsa drug po sems par mi [#]byed do/_/gzhan yang dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dus
[\[166b.2\]]kyis [#]byas pa'i dus sbyor 'jig rten pa ji ltar dus sbyor che ge mo ni bzang ngo /_/che ge mo ni mi bzang ngo /_/dus 'dir dus sbyor 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dus 'dir 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes sems par 'gyur zhing /_de lta bu'i ngo bo'i bsam pa gang zhig dge bar byed pa ma yin pa dang /_bde bar byed pa ma yin pa dang /_mya ngan
[\[166b.3\]]las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar thug par byed pa ma yin pa sems par byed kyi/_sems kyi mtshan nyid dmigs pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i dus sbyor sems pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa dge ba sems kyi dus sbyor che ge mo skyes pa de ni bzang ba ste/_
[\[166b.4\]]bdag bde 'gror 'gro bar byed pa'am/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/bdag la dmigs pa mi dge ba'i sems mi dge ba kun nas nyon mongs pa can che ge mo skyes pa de bdag la bde bar byed pa ma yin/_dge bar byed pa ma yin/_bde 'gror 'gro bar byed pa ma yin pa
[\[166b.5\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dmigs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i sems che ge mo skyes pa de'i rnam par smin pa lung du ma bstan pa kho na'o zhes sems par mi byed do/_/gzhan yang dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba de 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi dmigs pa dus skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam
[\[166b.6\]]dang nyin mo dang zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang ldan par sems par byed kyi/_ji ltar bdag gi tshe'i 'du byed skad cig ma/_skad cig dang thang cig dang /_yud tsam dang /_nyin mo dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed du sdod pa 'dzad [#]cing /_'chi ba'i dus stobs che ba/_phyir bcos su med pa 'ong ngo
[\[166b.7\]]zhes/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu can/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshe'i 'du byed zad pa'i dus ni sems par mi byed do/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i tshul kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyu skar sems pa/_bsam gtan dang klog pa la bar du gcod pa sems par byed/_sgom par byed/_lan
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]mang du byed/_rab tu sgom par byed/_'jog par byed/_ji lta ba bzhin rgyu skar che ge mo zhes bya ba/_gza' che ge mo zhes bya bas bzung zhing /_'tshe bar byed do zhes gzhan dag la 'doms [#]par byed do/_/skye bo ngan pa de ltar sems pa'i bsam pa de ni/_na ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags
[\[167a.2\]]'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba las sgrol bar byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa [#]ni/_ji lta ba bzhin rgyu skar lta bu'i chos gzhan dag gza' lta bu'i chos rnams kyis [#]zil gyis gnon pa ni 'di lta ste/_skye ba'i rgyu skar ni 'chi ba'i gzas [#]nye bar 'tshe'o/_/
[\[167a.3\]]lha'i 'jig rten gyi rgyu skar ni 'chi 'pho ba'i gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu skar ni rgud pa'i gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/mdza' bo dang 'du ba'i rgyu skar ni mdza' bo dang bral ba'i gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/mi skye ba'i rgyu skar ni yongs su tshol ba'i gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/tshor ba bde ba'i
[\[167a.4\]]rgyu skar ni tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/dge ba'i sems skyes [#]pa'i rgyu skar ni mi dge ba'i sems skyes pa'i gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/mi sdug pa'i rgyu skar ni 'dod chags kyi gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/byams pa'i rgyu skar ni zhe sdang gi gzas nye bar 'tshe'o/_/ye shes kyi rgyu
[\[167a.5\]]skar ni gti mug gi gzas nye bar 'tshe'o zhes de ltar sems par byed do/_/dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che ba rang gi sems pa 'jig rten las 'das pa sems par mi byed kyi/_gzhan gyi sems pa sems par byed do/_/ji skad bshad pa'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
[\[167a.6\]]'das pa bsams te/_sngar bzhin yang dag pa nyid du so sor brtags nas dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas yang dag pa ji skad bstan pa'i gza' rnams la snga ma bzhin du gza' bsam pa bsgoms te/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis [#]so sor
[\[167a.7\]]brtags nas gza' dang rgyu skar sems pa ni/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir dang bde ba'i phyir dang zhi ba'i phyir 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur gyi/_gza' tha mal pa 'jig rten pa de dag dang rgyu skar bsams nas ni ma yin no/_/sems pa ni skyes bu brgya phrag stong brlag par gyur cing /
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_yi dgas dang /_dud 'gror 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa 'khor ba 'grub par byed pa/_de dag ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug skyed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa brgya stong phrag gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam [#]
[\[167b.2\]]bsgoms pas/_gza' dang rgyu skar de dag bsams te/_yang dag pa ji lta bar so sor brtags nas/_rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang bral ba'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur ba/_rtag pa rga ba med pa/_'chi ba
[\[167b.3\]]med pa/_zag pa med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di la dge sbyong ngan pa dge sbyong du khas 'che bas gdon mi za bar bslab [#]par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal mi 'dod pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir rgyu skar sems pa dang lus sems pa bsgom [#]par bya'o/_/ji skad bshad pa'i tha
[\[167b.4\]]mal pa kun nas nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin no/_/gang zhig shes kyang gtan du ba'i bde ba byed par mi 'gyur/_dge bar mi 'gyur/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par byed par mi 'gyur gyi/_dge slong gi bsam gtan dang klog pa'i gegs byed pa [#]'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na dge
[\[167b.5\]]slong rgyu skar sems pa dang brtsi ba ni smad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/nam mkha'i spyan [#]gyi mdo las kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po cang ma smra shig[# ]/rig pa'i gnas bcu gnyis po de ma lus par 'jig rten na dar bar 'gyur ba ni med do/_/de'i tshe
[\[167b.6\]]gang tshangs pa dang /_gang brgya byin dang /_gang lha dang drang srong rnams kyis bstan pa de rab tu byung ba rnams la rjes su mthun par bstan par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na/_gang du 'dus nas gsod pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dang grong khyer 'jig pa dang /_nor 'jig pa dang /_grogs
[\[167b.7\]]po 'byed pa dang /_g.yog 'khor 'byed pa dang /_grong 'jig pa dang /_khyim 'jig [#]pa dang /_srog gcod pa la brtson pa nas[#]/_log par lta ba'i bar la brtson pa yod pa'i gtam ni rab tu byung ba la rjes su mthun par brjod par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/rin po che'i
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]tog gi mdo las kyang /_kun du rtog pa'i spyod yul can/_/byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa/_/de ni byis pa'i rmongs pa ste/_/sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas/_/khyi dang sbrul dang rus sbal dang /_/srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po/_/skar ma rgyal la
[\[168a.2\]]gang skyes pa/_/de dag bde la brten ma yin/_/ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang /_/thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin/_/nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na/_/ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri/_/zhes gsungs so/_/stag rna'i [#]mdo las kyang /_bram ze bde 'gror 'gro ba ni/_/gal te sngags kyis [#]
[\[168a.3\]]'thob 'gyur na/_/gnag dang dkar ba'i las rnams ni/_/'di ni 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/gang phyir dkar dang gnag pa dang /_/'bras bur bcas pa 'gro ba lngar[#]/_/smin par snang ba de yi phyir/_/grags pa chen po tshar gcod min/_/zhes gsungs so//_//[#]rgyal po la brten pa smad
[\[168a.4\]]pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_gzhan yang bsam gtan dang klog pa la bar chad byed pa'i chos dgu pa [#]yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po la brten pa'o/_/dge sbyong gis rgyal po la brten pa gnas skabs
[\[168a.5\]]thams cad du mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po la brten pa ni yul 'khor ba thams cad kyis [#]mchod par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rgyal po la brten pa dang ldan pa de ni[#]/_nor gyi [#]tshogs sam grong khyer ram grong ngam ri brags sam[#]/_de lta bu'i rnam pa gzhan ci zhig slong bar byed/_gal te dge slong
[\[168a.6\]]de slong bar byed na 'dod pa mang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na mi slong [#]na de don med pa la nyon mongs pa la spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan dang klog pa las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de thar pa'i lam la gnas pa na 'ching ba'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na dge slong gis rgyal po
[\[168a.7\]]la brten par mi bya'o/_/de la brten pa ni 'grogs pa'o/_/mi bsten [#]pa ni yongs su spang ba ste/_su zhig la bya/_'di lta ste/_dper na sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]la byed pa dang /_rmugs pa dang gnyid dang /_bas mtha'i grong na gnas pa bsten [#]par mi bya'o/_/le lo can dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/_/tshul 'chos can rnams [#]dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/_/zhim lto can dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/_/tshong pa dang lhan cig 'dri rmed [#]kyang mi bya'o/_/
[\[168b.2\]]zol gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang ma yin/_rang bzhin gyis dri ma can dang ma yin/_lta ba log pa dang ma yin/_'gyur bag can dang ma yin[#]/_nga rgyal can dang ma yin/_khengs pa dang ma yin/_ltung bar gyur nas langs pa dang ma yin/_rgyan pos 'tsho ba dang ma yin/_chang khang ba dang ma yin/_chang tshong [#]
[\[168b.3\]]dang ma yin/_'thab krol can dang ma yin/_bud med la dad che ba dang ma yin/_nyo tshong gis [#]nye bar 'tsho ba dang ma yin/_sdang mig can dang ma yin/_skyes bu bya ma rta dang ma yin/_bya ba dang ma yin/_spros pa can rnams dang ma yin/_mu stegs can zhugs pa dang ma yin/_skye bo thams
[\[168b.4\]]cad dang zhe 'gras [#]pa rnams dang ma yin te/_lhan cig tu 'grogs pa dang ngag brjod pa'am [#]lam du 'grogs pa yang dge slong gis [#]mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhan gyi skyon rnam par dag pa'i skyes bu'am rab tu byung ba la skye bo mang po dag ji ltar gang zhig de ltar bsten [#]pa'am 'grogs
[\[168b.5\]]par byed pa ni/_nges par de lta bu'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro zhes sems par byed do/_/de gzhan gyi skyon des gos par byed do[#]/_/de'i phyir de dag la brten par mi bya'o/_/khyod la rgyal po la brten pas ci zhig bya ste/_de ni rnam pa thams cad du smad pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
[\[168b.6\]]des tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_dge slong nags na gnas pa yis/_/rgyal po bsten [#]pa smad par gyur[#]/_/ngur smrig gang na bsten [#]pa 'di'i/_/g.yog [#]bzhin lag gis [#]'tsho gang na/_/gang zhig lhas kyang bsten [#]bya ba'i/_/dge slong gis bsten 'os min te/_/
[\[168b.7\]]gtsang sbra sten byed ngang pa ni/_/ro dang 'grogs par 'os ma yin/_/lus ngan nga yir 'dzin med cing /_/re ba med par spros med pa/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs med pas/_/rgyal po bsten [#]pa mdzes ma yin/_/nags dang dgon pa dur khrod dang /_/lteng ka ri yis phyogs
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]na/_/gnas pa'i dge slong rab mdzes kyi[#]/_/rgyal po'i khab bsten ma yin no/_/de ltar rgyal po la brten [#]pa thabs du mas smad pa ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa thams cad kyis smad do/_/gal te dge slong gis [#]bya ba ni ye shes kyi [#]rgyal po bsten par bya'o/_/de ni gtan [#]
[\[169a.2\]]du ba'i zhi ba bsten par 'gyur ro/_/gdon mi za bar legs pa [#]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bsten pa'i thabs su gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus brten [#]pa nyid dang /_las gzhan med pa nyid dang /_bla ma bsten pa dang /_chog shes pa nyid dang /_rab tu bsten pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtag
[\[169a.3\]]tu sems pa dang /_mi brkam pa dang /_goms pa dang /_bla ma la 'dri ba dang /_rab tu bsten pa 'dzin pa dang /_dge 'dun la 'dud pa nyid dang /_snyom [#]las med pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa bsten pa'o/_/'di dag ni dge slong gis ye shes kyi [#]rgyal po bsten pa'i thabs yin
[\[169a.4\]]no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs des tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_goms dang bla ma la gus dang /_/de bzhin 'dri ba nyid dang ni/_/sbyin dang de bzhin khrims bsten pa/_/ye shes rgyal po [#]bsten pa'o/_/'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/_/rgyal po bde ba
[\[169a.5\]]sten byed pa/_/srid pa'i 'ching bas sdug bsngal gang [#]/_/khas 'che rgyal po ma yin no/_/gang la sdug bsngal yod min pa[#]/_/de ni rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/_/gang dag [#]sdug bsngal gyis dkris te/_/'di ni ji ltar rgyal zhes 'os/_/de ltar na dge slong gis ye shes kyi rgyal po la brten [#]
[\[169a.6\]]par bya'i/_tha mal pa ni ma yin te/_de bsten pa na bsam gtan dang klog pa las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de nyams na slar yang rgyal po de gang du 'gro ba'i yul/_dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/de'i phyir dge slong gis skyon de dag rig nas rgyal po bsten
[\[169a.7\]]par mi bya'o/_/[#]'di ni nags na gnas pa rnams kyis [#]smad pa ste/_de'i phyir chos dgu pa bsam gtan dang klog pa la bar chad byed pa 'di ni smad par bya ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/'dul ba las kyang /_bcu po 'di dag ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs so/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]bcu gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po btsun mo dam pa dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur la der dge slong 'jug pa na/_btsun mos dge slong mthong nas 'dzum par byed cing /_dge slong yang btsun mo mthong nas 'dzum par byed pa de'i tshe rgyal po 'di snyam du 'gyur [#]te/_ma la 'di gnyis ni byas
[\[169b.2\]]sam byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs dang po'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba/_btsun mo gang yang rung ba la bgrod de brjed [#]pa ni/_des de mngal chags par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_
[\[169b.3\]]'dir rab tu byung ba ma gtogs pa [#]gzhan 'ga' yang 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa [#]snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rin po che gang yang rung ba ma
[\[169b.4\]]mthong ba de'i tshe rgyal po 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_'dir rab tu byung ba ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' yang 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa'o/_/dge slong dag [#]gzhan yang
[\[169b.5\]]rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du gsang ba'i gros gang yang rung ba phyi rol [#]du thos pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_'dir rab tu byung ba ma gtogs pa gzhan 'ga' yang 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
[\[169b.6\]]du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na bu pha la gsol ba 'debs pa de'i tshe/_de dag 'di snyam du 'gyur [#]te/_'dir rab tu byung ba ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' yang 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam
[\[169b.7\]]mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs lnga pa'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po dma' ba na 'dug pa gnas mthon por 'jog pa de'i tshe/_gang dag de'i yid du mi 'ong ba de dag 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_rgyal po rab tu byung ba dang 'dris [#]pa zhig
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]ste/_rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs drug pa'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po mthon po na gnas pa gnas dma' ba la 'jog pa de'i tshe gang dag de'i [#]yid du mi 'ong ba de dag 'di
[\[170a.2\]]snyam du 'gyur te/_rgyal po rab tu byung ba dang 'dris [#]pa zhig ste rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs bdun pa'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po dus ma yin par bsten pa la sbyor ba de'i tshe gang dag de'i
[\[170a.3\]]yid du mi 'ong ba de dag 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_rgyal po ni rab tu byung ba dang 'dris [#]pa zhig ste rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs brgyad pa'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po'i [#]dpung gi sde nye bar sbyar te
[\[170a.4\]]lam bar nas zlog par byed pa de'i tshe/_gang dag de'i yid du mi 'ong ba de dag 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_rgyal po ni rab tu byung ba dang 'dris [#]pa zhig ste/_rab tu byung ba'i las su gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs dgu pa'o/_/dge slong dag
[\[170a.5\]]gzhan yang rgyal po'i pho brang du glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs 'tsher zhing /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dga' bar bya ba dag yod pa na 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba la legs pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po'i
[\[170a.6\]]pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa'i nyes dmigs bcu pa'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]khyim pa'i sbyin pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/_nye ba [#]'khor gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pa [#]ni sbyin pa gnyis la
[\[170a.7\]]gnas par bya'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos sbyin pa dang /_zang zing sbyin pa la ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni rjes su chags pa med pa dang /_khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa rgya chen po bzhi la gnas par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_smyu gu sbyin pa dang /_snag tsha sbyin pa dang /_glegs bam sbyin pa dang /_chos sbyin pa la ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
[\[170b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gtong ba dang /_gtong ba chen
[\[170b.3\]]po dang /_shin tu gtong ba la'o/_/de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'o/_/gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang bu dang bu mo yongs su gtong ba'o/_/shin tu gtong ba ni mgo dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang /_pags pa dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang [#]yongs su gtong ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[170b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni yongs su gtong ba gsum po de dag la gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs so//_//[#]bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang /_de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la [#]gang yod pa de yongs su
[\[170b.5\]]gtong bar byed de/_de lag pa yongs su gtong ba yin/_rkang pa yongs su gtong ba yin/_lag pa dang rkang pa yongs su gtong ba yin/_sna yongs su gtong ba yin/_mgo yongs su gtong ba yin/_yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba yin/_bu yongs su gtong ba yin/_bu mo
[\[170b.6\]]yongs su gtong ba yin/_chung ma yongs su gtong ba yin/_srog yongs su gtong ba yin/_nor yongs su gtong ba yin/_bde ba yongs su gtong ba yin/_lus yongs su gtong ba yin/_dngos po yongs su gtong ba yin/_yul yongs su gtong ba yin/_rin po che yongs su gtong
[\[170b.7\]]ba yin/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sbyin pa sbyin pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen pa yin no/_/de la sbyin pa shes [#]pa gang zhe na/_ji ltar lhung bzed du chud pa dus su sbyin pa dang /_rung ba sbyin pa dag sbyin
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]par byed de[#]/_ji ltar dge slong rnams la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gso [#]sman dang /_yo byad [#]rnams yongs su btang zhing mgron [#]du gnyer bar byed do zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros mi zad [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu byang
[\[171a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa yang mi zad pa yod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshad med pa'i phyir ro[#]/_/btsun pa sha [#]ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i las kun tshad med pa ste/_'di ltar zas kyis brel [#]ba rnams la tshe dang /_spobs pa dang /[# ]bde ba dang /_stobs dang /_kha
[\[171a.3\]]dog brtan pa'i phyir zas sbyin no/_/btung bas brel [#]ba rnams la nyon mongs pa'i sred pa bsal ba'i phyir btung ba sbyin no/_/bzhon pas brel [#]ba rnams la bde ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos po bsdu ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyin no/_/gos kyis [#]phongs pa rnams la khrel ba dang /_ngo tsha ba dang /_kha dog
[\[171a.4\]]mdzes shing dri ma sbyang ba'i [#]phyir gos sbyin no/_/me mar gyis phongs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir me mar sbyin no/_/sil krol gyis brel [#]ba rnams la sangs rgyas kyi [#]rna ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sil krol [#]sbyin no/_/spos dang byug pas brel
[\[171a.5\]]ba rnams la tshul khrims dang thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sbos dang byug pa'i phyir sbos dang byug pa sbyin no/_/phreng bas phongs pa rnams la gzungs dang spobs pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog 'thob pa'i phyir phreng ba sbyin no/_/phye mas brel ba rnams la mi 'phrogs [#]
[\[171a.6\]]pa'i gsung rab tu thob pa'i phyir phye ma sbyin no/_/ros brel ba rnams la mi chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba thob pa'i phyir ro thams cad sbyin no/_/khyim gyis bral ba rnams la sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /_dpung gnyen dang rten dang /_skyabs dang
[\[171a.7\]]mgon gyi [#]phyir khyim sbyin no/_/mal gyis brel ba rnams la sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi tshangs pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims sa [#]'thob pa'i phyir mal sbyin no/_/stan gyis [#]brel ba rnams la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sa thams cad
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]snying po byang chub [#]dang rdo rje'i gdan du 'gyur ba'i phyir [#]stan sbyin no/_/yo byad kyis [#]brel ba rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi yo byad thams cad rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yo byad sbyin no/_/nad kyi rkyen [#]sman gyis brel ba rnams la rga shi med cing 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba 'thob pa'i phyir sman sbyin
[\[171b.2\]]no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag [#]dbang dang rang dbang dang /_rang [#]byung gi ye shes rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bran pho dang bran mo dang las byed pa'i mi dang /_g.yog yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog rnams
[\[171b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir lhab lhub dang /_
[\[171b.4\]]phyang phrul sna tshogs thams cad btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_shing rta dang /_rkang thang dang /_dgal ba rnams btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan gyi
[\[171b.5\]]yan lag dang tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_khang pa yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dga' bar 'tshang
[\[171b.6\]]rgya ba'i phyir bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma sdug pa yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod dang /_bang ba kun dgang ba'i phyir nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam
[\[171b.7\]]pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po bya zhing /_snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba'i phyir/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 'dab dang /_yul dang /_pho brang dang /_rgyal po'i gnas dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_gling bzhi'i [#]rgyal po'i
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]dbang yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa 'thob pa'i phyir dang [#]/_bde ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_brtse ba kun btang zhing sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtsug tor bltar [#]mi mngon pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[172a.2\]]gtsug gi nor bu dang cod pan sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam pa'i chos kyi rkang pas snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba'i phyir rkang pa sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi lag pa sbyin pa'i phyir lag mthil sbyin no/_/dbang po ma
[\[172a.3\]]nyams par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams rna ba dang sna sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad bsgribs [#]pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig 'thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mig sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[172a.4\]]'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yan lag gi mchog mgo bo [#]btang zhing sbyin no/_/snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang zhing [#]btsal pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sha
[\[172a.5\]]dang khrag yongs su btang zhing sbyin no/_/'jam pa dang /_snum pa dang /_phra ba dang /_mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur kun sbyang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams pags pa sbyin zhing gtong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi sku rdo rje ltar mi chogs shing sra
[\[172a.6\]]ba dang /_skyes bu mthu bo che ltar brtan pa 'thob pa'i phyir rus pa dang rkang sbyin no zhes bya ba nas/_sbyin pa de ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas bsgrubs pa skye [#]de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni mtshan ma med pas bsgoms pa ste/_de'i phyir na [#]de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni smon pa med
[\[172a.7\]]pas rtogs pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni 'dus ma byas la bsngos pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni gzung ba shin tu zin pa ste/_de'i phyir na [#]de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni khams gsum pa dang ma 'dres pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]sbyin pa de ni rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu mthun pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni bdud thams cad shin tu char gcod pa ste/_de'i phyir na [#]de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma [#]'dres pa ste[#]/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni bye
[\[172b.2\]]brag 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni legs par byas pa gdon mi za ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs su spel ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni yang dag par bsngos pa ste/_de'i phyir
[\[172b.3\]]na de ni [#]mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi tshogs su dmigs pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni sems can thams cad 'tsho ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa ste/_de'i phyir na de ni [#]mi zad pa'o/_/
[\[172b.4\]]sbyin pa de ni mtha' med pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni yongs su ma god pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni kun du ma zhugs pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni tshad gzung [#]du med pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni
[\[172b.5\]]yangs pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni [#]gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni thug pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni kha na ma tho ba med pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni mi dpya ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi
[\[172b.6\]]zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni mi thul ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni zil gyis ma [#]non pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/sbyin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
[\[172b.7\]]phyir bsgrubs pa ste/_de'i phyir na de mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa mi zad pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_lan du
[\[173a.2\]]phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_snying rje'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi brnyas [#]pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum
[\[173a.3\]]tshogs pa rnams yin/_mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no[#]/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
[\[173a.4\]]dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/_shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/_gzhan du na de 'di ltar sems can dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya
[\[173a.5\]]snyam ste/_chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis [#]gnyis su med par gzhan dag la yang dag par ston te[#]/_ji ltar na rgyal po'am[#]/_blon po chen po la yang dag par ston pa de ltar gdol pa'am/_gdol bu la yang dag par ston na/_de ma yin pa grong ba dang /_yul
[\[173a.6\]]gyi mi gzhan dag la lta ci smos/_chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs [#]pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa
[\[173a.7\]]yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis [#]dbyig pa bor ba dang /_mtshon cha bor ba yin te/_gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'jog [#]go/_/de sems can thams cad la phar 'du shes pa yin/_mar 'du shes pa yin/_bur 'du shes pa yin/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]gnyen bshes su 'du shes pa yin/_nye du 'am snag gi gnyen mtshams dag kyang rung bar 'du shes pa'ang [#]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de [#]'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag tu sems can gyi ris su gang khyed kyi pha'am/_ma'am/_
[\[173b.2\]]bu'am/_gnyen bshes sam/_nye du'am/_snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ma gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu med do zhes gsungs so snyam nas/_de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/_srog chags chen po
[\[173b.3\]]che ba gzhan dag la lta ci smos te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i
[\[173b.4\]]las rab tu byed pa mthong na de dag zang zing gis sdud cing /_zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste/_dge ba'i gnas su 'god do/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo/_/byang chub
[\[173b.5\]]sems dpas sbyin pa sbyin na mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang ngan song gsum spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/_de bas na bdag gis [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing [#]sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/_de sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/_
[\[173b.6\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa yang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/_phan 'dogs
[\[173b.7\]]su re ba'i phyir ma yin/_don gyi phyir ma yin/_g.yog gi phyir ma yin/_'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phyir ma yin gyi gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/_gang byang chub sems dpa' [#]sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni [#]chos nyid yin no snyam ste/_de de'i rgyu de [#]de'i rkyen de'i phyir
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa
[\[174a.2\]]yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su sdug bsngal ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_gcer bu dang /_gos ngan pa dang /_bgo ba ngan pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_rten med pa lta bu bsod
[\[174a.3\]]nams med pa dag mthong na/_de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu bskyed cing /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can gang dag gi phyir bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal ba[#]/_mgon med pa/[# ]dbung
[\[174a.4\]]gnyen med pa[#]/_skyabs med pa[#]/_gnas med pa/_rten med pa 'di dag yin te/_kun du 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_rten du 'gyur snyam nas de snying rjes rab tu mi bzod do[#]/_/bdog cing yod pa'i
[\[174a.5\]]dngos pos [#]sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so/_/phan btags pa'i mod [#]las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun
[\[174a.6\]]sum tshogs pa [#]yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/_brnyas shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/_gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/_nyon mongs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/_phyug [#]pas rgyags shing dregs te [#]sbyin pa mi sbyin/_grags pa 'dod cing [#]sbyin pa mi sbyin/_mang du
[\[174a.7\]]thos pas [#]rgyags shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi ci sbyin pa de yang bsti stang du byas shing sbyin pas [#]sbyin par byed do/_/btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/ri mor byas te mchod cing rang gi lag nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_bla ma lta bu dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/_lus kyis gus pa dang [#]
[\[174b.2\]]bcas pa yin/_sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/_des gus pa bskyed/_ri mo [#]bskyed nas gus par smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsu ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_'dud pa'i las dag byed do/_/de dag gi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la yang
[\[174b.3\]]grogs su 'gyur te/_de ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la
[\[174b.4\]]bya ba dag byed de/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la spos sam/_me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_byug pa'am/_phyag pa'am/_skyang nul lam/_
[\[174b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa 'chos pa dag gis te[#]/_de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do[#]/_/ji ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed ce na/_de chos nyan to/_/klog go/_/'chang ngo /_/yi ger 'dri'o/_/kha ton du byed do/_/kun chub par byed do/_/
[\[174b.6\]]sems so/_/ma log par bsgom [#]pa'i sbyor bas goms par byed de[#]/_de ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed do/_/ji ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ce na/_de gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams dang /_chung ngu na chu grang mo [#]phor gang tsam yang dge
[\[174b.7\]]'dun la dbul te/_de ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha'am/_lha la la zhig tu shog ce'am/_rgyal po'am/_rgyal po la la zhig tu shog ce'am/_de ltar sems mi bskyed [#]de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems
[\[175a.2\]]dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor rtog [#]pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/_de sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin yang sbyin pa de dang de dag la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/_de ltar so sor rtog
[\[175a.3\]]pa la gang 'di sbyin pa'i nyes pa dang /_sbyin pa'i dri ma dang /_sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mi 'byung ste/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
[\[175a.4\]]pa rnams yin no zhes gsungs so//_//byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /_sdom ni/_ngo bo nyid dang thams cad dang /_/dka' ba dang ni sgo kun dang /_/skyes bu dam pa ldan pa dang /_/de bzhin rnam pa thams cad dang /_/phongs shing 'dod dang ldan pa dang /_/'di dang gzhan
[\[175a.5\]]du bde 'gyur dang /_/rnam par dag dang rnam dgu ste/_/mdor na sbyin pa de yin no/_/'di la byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rim gyis yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[175a.6\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_sbyin pa rnam pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_sbyin
[\[175a.7\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_thams cad sbyin pa dang /_dka' ba'i sbyin pa dang /_thams cad kyi sgo nas [#]sbyin pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i sbyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /_phongs shing 'dod pa la sbyin pa dang /_'di dang gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]sbyin pa'o/_/de la sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid gang zhe na/_yo byad thams cad dang /_rang gi lus la mi lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ma chags pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i sems pa gang yin pa dang /_des kun nas bslang ba sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i lus dang ngag gi las
[\[175b.2\]]dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po kha na ma tho ba med pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_sdom pa dag [#]la gnas pa dang /_'ongs pa mthong zhing 'bras bu la lta ba dang /_su gang 'dod pa de la dngos po de so sor sbyin par byed pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i [#]ngo bo nyid yin par rig
[\[175b.3\]]par bya'o/_/de la thams cad sbyin pa gang zhe na/_thams cad ces bya ba ni mdor bsdu na/_sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi dang phyi rol gyi'o/_/de la rkang pa yan chad rang gi lus yongs su gtong ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i [#]nang gi dngos po yongs su
[\[175b.4\]]gtong ba 'ba' zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can skyugs [#]pa za bas 'tsho ba rnams kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' zas skom zos 'thungs [#]shing skyugs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po 'dres pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ji skad
[\[175b.5\]]smos pa 'di las ma gtogs pa'i lhag ma sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po yongs su gtong ba ni/_phyi rol gyi sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po yongs su gtong ba kho na zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol lus 'dod pa dag la mdor na rnam pa gnyis kyis rang gi
[\[175b.6\]]lus sbyin par byed de/_ci dga' mgur byed du 'jug pas gzhan la dbang yod pa dang /_gzhan la rag las par byed cing bdag nyid gzhan dag la sbyin par byed de/_dper na la la zhig zas dang gos kyi phyir [#]gzhan dag la bran gyi dngos por khas len pa de bzhin du/_
[\[175b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni byang chub dam pa 'dod/_pha rol dag la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod de[#]/_ci dga' mgur byed du 'jug cing gzhan dag la dbang yod pa dang
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]rag lus par byed pas bdag nyid sbyin par byed pa dang /_lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang mgo bo dang /_yan lag dang nying lag rnams 'dod pa dag dang /_sha dang khrag dang /_rgyus pa 'dod pa dang /_rkang gi bar du 'dod pa dag la rkang gi bar du sbyin par [#]byed do/_/byang
[\[176a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnam pa gnyis kyis [#]phyi rol gyi dngos po sems can rnams la yongs su gtong ste ci bder longs spyod du gzhug pa'i phyir brnyan por sbyin pa dang /_de dbang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi thams cad du btang ba'i sems kyis sbyin par byed de/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' [#]ni nang dang
[\[176a.3\]]phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad bye brag med par rnam pa thams cad du sems can rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/_/'o na byang chub sems dpa' nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis las ci zhig ni sems can rnams la sbyin par byed/_ci zhig ni sbyin par mi byed/_ji ltar ni sbyin par byed/_
[\[176a.4\]]ji ltar ni sbyin par mi byed ce na/_nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po de las sbyin pa gang sems can rnams la bde ba kho nar 'gyur gyi/_phan par mi 'gyur ba'am/_yang na bde bar yang mi 'gyur la/_phan par yang mi 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' [#]gzhan dag la sbyin par mi byed do/_/
[\[176a.5\]]sbyin pa gang phan par ni 'gyur la/_bde bar 'gyur ba ni ma nges pa'am/_yang na bde bar yang 'gyur la/_phan par yang 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la sbyin par byed de/_de ltar na 'di ni sbyin pa dang mi sbyin pa'i mdor bstan pa yin no/_/'di man
[\[176a.6\]]chad ni rgyas pa rnam par dbye ba yin par rig par bya ste/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol la gnod par bya ba dang /_pha rol la brid [#]pa dang /_mi rigs [#]pas bskyed pas byed du bcug na pha rol gyi dbang du byed pa dang /_pha rol la [#]rag las par byed par bdag nyid sbyin
[\[176a.7\]]par mi byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag la bdag nyid kyi srog lan brgya'am/_lan stong ngam/_lan 'bum du yongs su gtong bar yang khas len med [#]kyi/_'on kyang pha rol gyi bsgo ba dang /_pha rol dga' bar bya ba'i phyir pha rol la gnod pa'am/_pha rol bsad [#]
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa'am/_pha rol brid [#]par mi byed do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa las brtsams te bsam pa dag pa yin du zin kyang /_de yang sems can gyi don bya ba mang po nye bar gnas par gyur [#]na/_rang gi lus dang /_yan lag dang nyid lag slong ba byung yang rang gi lus dang yan
[\[176b.2\]]lag dang nying lag rnams sbyin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa las brtsams te bsam pa dag pa de ni rnam grangs gang gis kyang 'di ni sbyin no/_/'di la ni [#]sbyin no snyam du sems zhum pa med pa'i phyir te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' de ni gang
[\[176b.3\]]gi tshe bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi dgos pa byung ba btang snyoms su byas te sbyin par mi byed na/_de ni de'i bsam pa dag pa yin pa'i phyir/_sems can gyi dgos pa byung ba btang snyoms su byas te sbyin par mi byed do/_/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnam par tho [#]'tshams pa'i
[\[176b.4\]]bsam pas slong du 'ongs pa rnams la yang de dag nyid la gnod pa dang /_phung po chen por mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus dang yan lag gse zhing [#]sbyin par mi byed do/_/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du/_des bslabs [#]pa'i sems can rnams la yang
[\[176b.5\]]de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni smyon pa dang /_sems 'khrugs [#]pa la yang rang gi lus dang /_yan lag gse zhing sbyin par mi byed do[#]/_/de dag ni rang gi sems la gnas par yang ma yin la/_'dod pa'i phyir slong ba yang ma yin te/_de ni de dag
[\[176b.6\]]gi sems la rang dbang med pa'i phyir bla brdol tsam du zad pa de'i phyir sbyin par mi byed do/_/rnam pa de dag las ma gtogs par de dag las bzlog pa'i 'dod pa rnams la ni byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus pha rol dbang bar bya ba tsam gyi phyir/_yan lag dang nying
[\[176b.7\]]lag dag gse zhing yongs su gtong bar yang [#]byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' ni nang gi dngos po sbyin pa dang mi sbyin pa ni de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dngos po las ni byang chub sems dpas dug dang /_me dang /_mtshon cha dang /_chang sems can rnams
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]la gnod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni bdag la gnod par bya ba 'am/_pha rol la gnod par bya ba'i phyir 'dod de slong na/_slong ba rnams la ni sbyin par mi byed do/_/dug dang me dang mtshon cha dang /_chang sems can rnams la phan par [#]'gyur ba gang yin
[\[177a.2\]]pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bdag la phan par bya ba'am[#]/_pha rol la phan par bya ba'i phyir 'dod de slong na/_slong ba rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol yid brtan pa [#]ma yin pa'i rdzas kyang gzhan dag la sbyin par mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni smyan byed
[\[177a.3\]]cing pha rol gyi chung ma bkug ste gzhan dag la sbyin par yang mi byed do/_/bza' ba dang btung ba srog chags dang bcas pa yang sbyin par mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po gang dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang ldan pa sems can rnams la gnod pa dang ldan
[\[177a.4\]]pa de yang byang chub sems dpas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de byin [#]na de dag byang chub sems dpa' la sems dga' ba tsam skye bar 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang sbyin pa de ni de la gnod pa ches che bar byed pa yin te/_de'i rgyus de rgyags pa dang /_bag med
[\[177a.5\]]pa dang /_nyes par spyod pa la zhugs pas lus zhig nas ngan song dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo la sogs pa'i dngos po yin la/_ngan song du 'gro bar byed pa yang ma yin/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba [#]sogs par 'gyur ba yang ma yin na ni de lta bu'i
[\[177a.6\]]dga' [#]ba dang /_rtsed mo la sogs pa'i dngos po de sems dga' bar bya ba'i phyir slong ba rnams la sbyin par byed de/_dngos po des kyang sdud pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' slong ba rnams la dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo'i dngos po ji lta bu ni
[\[177a.7\]]sbyin par mi byed[#]/_ji lta bu ni sbyin par byed ce na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni ri dgas gsad pa'i thabs bslab pa sbyin par mi byed do/_/mchod sbyin ngan pa yo lang chen po gang du srog chags mang po bsogs nas gsod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mchod [#]
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]sbyin dag bdag nyid kyang mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang mchod sbyin byed du mi 'jug go/_/lha rten [#]rnams su phyugs gsod pa sbyin par mi byed do/_/srog chags mang po gnas pa'i sa phyogs [#]srog chags chu nas skyes pa'am/_thang las skyes pa rnams gnas pa lta bu/_srog chags
[\[177b.2\]]de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/_slong na sbyin par mi byed do/_/rgya dang rngon gyi 'khrul 'khor dang /_rgya dang rngon gyi 'khrul 'khor bslab pa yang srog chags rnams la gnod par bya ba'i phyir slong na sbyin par mi byed do/_/spyo ba dang /_gsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_chad pas gcad [#]pa dang /_
[\[177b.3\]]gnod pa byed du gzhug pa'i phyir yang dgra rnams kyi dgra sbyin par mi byed do/_/mdor bsdu [#]na byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang rtsed mo'i dngos po sems can pha rol la gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can pha rol la sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang
[\[177b.4\]]rung ba de thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/_/glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang 'degs pa dang /_bzhon [#]pa rnams dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bsod pa rnams dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra bslab pa rnams dang /_gar dang /_
[\[177b.5\]]glu dang rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad rnams dang /_spos dang me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dang /_snod spyad sna tshogs dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_khang khyim dang dga' mgur spyad pa'i bud med rnams dang /_bzo dang las kyi gnas rnam pa sna tshogs bslab pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_
[\[177b.6\]]de lta bu'i dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo'i dngos po gang yin pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dga' bar bya ba'i phyir slong ba rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni nad pa slong du zin kyang /_kha zas dang btung ba tshod ma zin pa'am/_gnod par 'gyur ba sbyin par
[\[177b.7\]]yang mi byed do/_/sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can 'grangs [#]pa rnams la bza' ba dang /_btung ba bsod pa sbyin par yang mi byed do/_/sems can mya ngan gyis gdungs pa rnams rang 'geg par byed pa'am/_rdeg par byed pa'am/_dug 'thung ba'am/_g.yang
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]du mchong ba la yang dga' mgur byed du mi 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rnams la pha ma thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyin par yang mi byed de/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i pha ma ni bla ma lta bu'i mchog yin te/_nu ma snun pa dang /_
[\[178a.2\]]gso ba dang skyed pa yin pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yun ring por spyi bo la khyer na yang skyo bar mi bya ste/_spu gta' dang gtar gzhug pa dang /_gtso bo'i [#]tshul gyis bdag nyid kyang de gnyis la sbyin zhing dbang ba dang /_rag lus par bya ba yin na/_byang chub sems dpas gzhan
