[\[196b.4\]]pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa [#]yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob [#]ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin [#]na/_de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
[\[196b.5\]]mkhas pa zab pa/_shes rab kyi snang ba dang ldan pa ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_bdud rtsi 'dod/_snying po 'dod/_byang chub 'dod de/_yang shA ri'i bu mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te 'jig rten gyi
[\[196b.6\]]zang zing sbyin pa ni/_'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong [#]ba gang yang med do/_/'di lta ste/_shA ri'i bu khyim bdag chun pa zhing skam la gnas nas/_ba lang dang gnam sdod ma [#]yin pa'i zhing gi rmo rko rdzogs par byas te/_sa bon btab nas rnam grangs 'dis gshol [#]gyis 'tsho bas gser dang /_
[\[196b.7\]]dngul yang 'grub bo/_/dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'bru dang mtshungs pa'i nor med do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do/_/'di lta ste/_shA ri'i bu bas rtswa skam po dang /_gsher ba zos pa dang /_chu grang mo dang /_dron mo 'thungs pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste/_zho dang mar sar dang mar gyi snying po yang 'grub bo/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med
[\[197a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/_'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongs su 'grub bo/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa yang 'grub bo/_/gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[197a.3\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su 'grub po zhes gsungs so/_/bden pa po'i le'u las kyang /_yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis yang dag par mthong ba des/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bcu gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems kyi lam
[\[197a.4\]]ston par yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_longs spyod chen po yongs su 'grub [#]pa'i lam yin par yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_'dod pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[197a.5\]]pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_dad pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [#]sbyar bar bya ba dang /_ser sna tshar gcod par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_gtong ba'i rgyun 'phel bar 'gyur bar yang
[\[197a.6\]]dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_yi dgas kyi grong khyer gyi sgo gcod par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_skye bo mang po dang thun mong gi longs spyod rnams las snying po len par 'gyur bar yang dag par
[\[197a.7\]]mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_yo byad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la goms par byas par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_dngos po thams cad la 'dzin pa'i sems bdag la med par 'gyur ba yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang /_bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba
[\[197b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par zhugs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas [#]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya [#]ste/_rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis po de dag yang dag par mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
[\[197b.3\]]phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ste/_sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/'jam dpal gyi zhing gi bkod pa'i mdo las kyang /_shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i phan yon yin te/_
[\[197b.4\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_'di'i gtong ba'i sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mu ge'i [#]dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang /_slong ba po rnams nye bar dong ba na 'di'i khyim ma bsgribs par 'gyur ba dang /_ster ba'am len pa na 'di la 'ga' yang phrag dog par mi 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[197b.5\]]phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i phan yon bzhi yin no zhes gsungs so/_/las rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las kyang /_de la zas byin pa na chos bcu 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_bza' ba byin pa [#]na kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_skyid par
[\[197b.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe ring zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_rigs mtho bar 'gyur ba dang /_longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang /_mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_bza' ba
[\[197b.7\]]byin pa na chos bcu po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i sbyin pa dang /_khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /[# ]log par 'tsho ba dang /_chos smra ba la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_chos spong ba dang /_rma 'byin pa dang /_zhal ta byed pa dang /_yongs
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]su 'dzin pa dang /_'tsho ba ya nga ba dang /_'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_bdud kyis [#]smras pa dang /_nyo tshong dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mtshan ma dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa zil gyis gnon pa dang /_rab tu byung ba la bsngags pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_spyod yul ma
[\[198a.2\]]yin pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba dang /_thos pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang /_thos pa nyung ba spang ba dang /_mi 'dri ba'i skyon dang /_chos rku ba dang /_bdag
[\[198a.3\]]la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan brjod pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems brjed [#]pa dang /_gso dpyad dgag pa dang /_rgyu skar brtag [#]pa spang ba dang /_rgyal po la brten pa smad pa dang /_khyim pa'i sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /_
[\[198a.4\]]sbyin pa'i yon tan la dgongs pa bstan pa'o/_/mdo sde sna tshogs las btus pa'i gtam rdzogs so//_//sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni rab mchog theg pa chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba shAkya'i gnas brtan mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi yin no/_/gang 'dir bsod nams su gyur pa de [#]mkhan po dang slob
[\[198a.5\]]dpon dang pha dang ma sngon du 'gro bar byas te/_sems can gyi tshogs mtha' dag bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du gyur cig[# ]/thub pa'i gsung rab rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi'i bcud/_/ltung dang nyon mongs nad gso'i sman chen 'di/_/lnga brgya'i dus na bstan pa'i srog 'dzin pa/_/shAkya'i sras
[\[198a.6\]]po yon tan grags pa yis/_/dpe med grong du sku 'khrungs rtsod dus kyi/_/mkhas pa rgyal ba kun dga' la gsol nas/_/ya rabs spyod pa ma nyams dad dang ldan/_/pa tshab ldong gi sa skor zhogs kyi stong /_mkhas btsun 'byung gnas dam pas byin brlabs pa/_/dpal ldan ya gad gtsug lag khang chen du/_/
[\[198a.7\]]skad gnyis smra la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/_/shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma grags pa dang /_/khu yi ban de [#]mdo sde 'bar gyis bsgyur/_/des bskyed bsod nams zla ltar bsil ba yis/_/thub pa'i 'khor bzhi dang ni 'gro kun gyi/_/ltung dang nyon mongs gdung ba zhi gyur cig/[ #]//
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]{D3962}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi satwa s+ya mArga rngukra ma saM gra ha/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku gsum bdag nyid kun khyab rtag_/shes rab thugs rje dbyer med pas/_/
[\[198b.2\]]sems can don kun sgrub mdzad pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la gus phyag 'tshal/_/gdul bya'i skye bo rjes gzung phyir/_/byams dpal lo tsAs rab bskul bas/_/rgyal sras lam rim mdor bsdus ni/_/bdag gis ji ltar bzod ltar brjod/_/thog mar bshes gnyen bsten bya ste/_/de yi legs
[\[198b.3\]]spyad yon tan blang /_/de yang sems can don brtson nus/_/shes sogs yon tan pha rol phyin/_/phun tshogs dal ba myur du 'jig_/las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin/_/de spong shes rab snying brtse bsgom/_/kun mkhyen bstan pa'i snying po'o/_/mi khom brgyad spangs 'byor bcas
[\[198b.4\]]pa'i/_/dal ba phun tshogs rnyed dka' ste/_/rgya mtsho cher g.yengs shing bug tu/_/rus sbal mgrin chud rang mtshungs gsungs/_/de yang mi rtag mdun gnas te/_/skad cig mi sdod rnam par 'jig_/'du byed sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'dir/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med nyid/_/de
[\[198b.5\]]bzhin nyon mongs nye nyon mongs/_/lus ngag yid kyis bskyed pa yi/_/dge dang mi dge kun 'byung ba/_/las dang nyon mongs ming gis gdags/_/sdig pas ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/_/dge bas lha dang mir 'phen mod/_/de yang yongs
[\[198b.6\]]'gyur sdug bsngal nyid/_/de bas sems can don sgrub phyir/_/byang chub sems bskyed de yi rgyun/_/stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can/_/bsgom bya lam gyi mchog yin no/_/lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos/_/phyi nang gnyis dag tshul lus kyi/_/mtshan nyid rjes brtags mnyam 'jog pa/_/
[\[198b.7\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi bsgom/_/dge chos bskyed cing rnam 'phel dang /_/sdig sems mi bskyed nyer 'joms pa/_/bde gshegs kyis gsungs skyon sel phyir/_/yang dag spong ba bzhi rab bsgrags/_/'dun dang brtson 'grus sems dang ni/_/dpyod pa'i bya brag gis phye ba/_/mi
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dbang gis/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhir 'dod do/_/dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang /_/ting 'dzin shes rab ces grags pa/_/thar pa'i rgyu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rgyal sras dbang po lngar gsungs so/_/dad sogs rnam 'phel lnga thob pa/_/mi
[\[199a.2\]]mthun phyogs 'joms zag bcas dang /_/zag pa med mtha' bcas 'di dag_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs zhes bstan/_/dran dad shes rab 'byed brtson 'grus/_/dga' dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms rnams/_/byang chub yan lag bdun du 'dod/_/
[\[199a.3\]]yan lag lta dang rtog pa dang /_/ngag dang las mtha' 'tsho ba dang /_/brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin ni/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad du bzhed/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bgrod pa'i lam/_/byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun/_/blo ldan rnams kyis mnyam rjes su/_/zab yangs
[\[199a.4\]]rjes 'brel rtag tu bsgom/_/de la gsum ni tshogs kyi lam/_/gnyis rim nges 'byed yan lag dang /_/byang chub yan lag mthong lam ste/_/yan lag brgyad ni bsgom lam du'o/_/sdug bsngal me gsum gyis skrag pas/_/skye bo 'khor ba las dbyung phyir/_/snying brtse brtson 'grus dang
[\[199a.5\]]ldan gyis/_/sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub blo gros bskyed/_/phung po bdag min de la bdag_/ldan min bdag kyang de min te/_/de ldan ma yin bya byed kyi/_/mthun dngos min bdag stong pa nyid/_/khyab dang rtag dang byed po dang /_/rang dbang longs spyod chos nyid can/_/bdag ni phung po dang 'gal bas/_/
[\[199a.6\]]de'i phyir de gcig ji ltar 'grub/_/bya dang byed pa'i dngos po ni/_/rtag tu lhan cig srid ma yin/_/de yang de ldan ma yin pas/_/de yi gzhan phyogs gsum yang ngo /_/phung po yang der rigs min te/_/de yis de ltar 'dod byas pas/_/rtag tu thar pa thob gyur te/_/gzugs sogs dngos
[\[199a.7\]]bral mthar phyin to/_/sgyu 'dra'i phyi rol gzung don med/_/de med der 'dzin yod ma yin/_/rnam rig tsam de shes de yang /_/gdod nas ma skyes chos bdag med/_/brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phan/_/shes rab dman pas mya ngan 'da'/_/de'i phyir phan tshun mnyam ldan pa/_/rgyal bas bla
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]med lam du gsungs/_/thi gu las sbrul 'dir bsal med/_/thi gu'ang gsar gzhag ci yang med/_/mar mes thi gu yang dag mthong /_/de mthong 'jigs pa rnam par spangs/_/'di la bsal bya ci yang med/_/gzhag par bya ba'ang cung zad med/_/yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/_/yang dag
[\[199b.2\]]mthong na rnam grol bshad/_/'di dag dman par bsgoms na ni/_/'phags lam byang chub dman nyid 'thob/_/bsam sor yang ni dman nyid kyis/_/bdag tu lta ba spong bar byed/_/rgya chen 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kho nas/_/bsam pa la sogs khyad par gyis/_/
[\[199b.3\]]sku gsum byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdag gis 'di bsdus bsod nams ni/_/bskrun gyur gang des skye bo kun/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas/_/'gro la phan bde sbyin par shog_/dge slong shAkya'i dpal bzang ming /_/bdag dang gdul bya lhan cig tu/_/byams mgon
[\[199b.4\]]'phags pa'i zhabs pad drung /_/skyes nas de dgongs gsal byed shog_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa/_dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par yongs su grags pa'i kha che shAkya
[\[199b.5\]]shrI bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis rgyang ro sa lu'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//[ {D3963}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_mahA yA na u pa de sha gA thA/_bod skad du/_theg pa chen po'i man ngag
[\[199b.6\]]gi tshigs su bcad pa/_rje btsun mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnyed dka'i dal 'byor myur du 'jig_/'jig rten las 'bras sdug bsngal yin/_/de spang stong nyid snying rje bsgom/_/bde gshegs bstan pa'i snying po'o/_/bde 'dod skyes bus bsod nams bsags/_/de yang
[\[199b.7\]]rang bzhin med par bsgom/_/rang bzhin med shes bsod nams mchog_/de phyir bsod nams bde ba'i rgyu/_/bsod nams bsags pas bde ba 'thob/_/de phyir mis ni bsod nams bsags/_/de yang yang dang yang du bsgrub/_/di ring nyid nas 'dun te bsgrub/_/chos kun rang sems rnam
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]par snang /_/rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med/_/stong nyid snying rje ro gcig thabs/_/de bsgom 'bras bu byang chub mchog_/sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir/_/byang chub mchog gnyis sems bskyed de/_/stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can/_/bsgom bya de 'bras sku gsum 'thob/_/
[\[200a.2\]]bsam pa rin chen sems gnyis 'brel/_/sbyor ba dka' spyad dang len dang /_/rnam pa kun du mi dmigs shes/_/gnod pas skyo med sangs rgyas sras/_/skye 'gag gnas med byang chub sems/_/rgya chen sems can don la mkhas/_/tshogs gnyis rgyun chad med pa'i lam/_/stong nyid snying rje'i
[\[200a.3\]]snying po'o/_/rmi lam lta bur phyi rol min/_/sgyu ma lta bur bden don med/_/nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid bral/_/chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal yin/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal nyid las 'dir/_/ma skyes skye ba'i rten can gyi/_/byang chub sems gnyis rjes 'brel bas/_/sems can kun
[\[200a.4\]]don spyad par bya/_/dam pa gsum gyis sdig las bzlog_/dri med gnyis kyis dge tshogs bsgrub/_/mnyam par gzhag pas rang sems gdul/_/bdag nyid chen po'i bsgrub pa'o/_/sems ni rtag par byang chub 'dod/_/bya ba lus can don la brtson/_/bde sdug rmi lam 'drar
[\[200a.5\]]shes pas/_/mkhas pas gzhan don sgrub par byed/_/khrims kyis dal 'byor snying po blang /_/thos pas tshe yi snying po blang /_/bsgrub pas bstan pa'i snying po blang /_/de yi snying po gzhan don no/_/rtse gcig gnas pas dran pa bsten/_/byang chub sems kyis tshogs gnyis bsags/_/
[\[200a.6\]]ma bcos mthong bas mnyam par gzhag_/bsgrub pa'i snying po mdor bsdus pa'o/_/gang gis skye dang gnas mthong ba/_/rmi lam mar me dag dang mtshungs/_/'gro ba brdzun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis/_/rigs ldan skyes bu rtag tu bslus/_/'du byed gar mkhan lta bu ste/_/de yi rang
[\[200a.7\]]bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/_/mkhas pas don kun bsgrub 'dod pas/_/bden gnyis mtshan nyid rtogs par byos/_/bya byed phra men rdzu 'phrul 'dra/_/'chi bdag ri gzar chu drag bzhin/_/mdza' sdang rmi lam dgra gnyen mtshungs/_/'jigs pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yin/_/yid
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]'ong mi 'ong rkyen gyis bsgrub/_/dge sdig kun slong bsam pas bsgrub/_/thams cad las kyis 'grub gyur te/_/kye ma dal 'byor don yod byos/_/mdza' dang mi mdza' chags sdang gis/_/gtan sdug sdig pa 'phel 'gyur na/_/thams cad slu ba'i chos can la/_/kye ma yid brtan
[\[200b.2\]]su zhig 'cha'/_/yid mthun tshong grogs lta bur 'bral/_/mi mthun lam kha'i tsher shing bzhin/_/rang srog bum nang bung ba 'dra/_/thams cad sha lam grog tshang mtshungs/_/legs bshad me tog ci ltar phan/_/nyes spyad sbrul gdug so ltar gdug_/kun kyang bdag sdug
[\[200b.3\]]mi 'dod na/_/dal ba don med ci tha tshig_/nyin mtshan glog rgyun lta bur 'das/_/tshe srog chu bur ji bzhin 'gag_/bde sbyor chu 'gram bye ma bzhin/_/kye ma ji ltar bdag 'chi grang /_/'du byed rmi lam yul 'dra ste/_/mdza' bshes srang sdod tshong grogs mtshungs/_/dge sdig
[\[200b.4\]]rang lus grib ma bzhin/_/ci byas mi bzad tshor ba'i rgyu/_/gshin rje'i pho nyas phyi bzhin gtugs/_/gnyan nor na bun lta bur dengs/_/'jigs chen g.yangs sar bdag lhung na/_/kye ho bsod nams su zhig sogs/_/srid gsum sdug bsngal me 'obs 'bar/_/skye bo don med
[\[200b.5\]]'ching bas bcings/_/de bas snying brtse brtson 'grus kyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsgrub par bya/_/phung po bdag med sgyu ma 'dra/_/yid ni me long gzugs bzhin te/_/sems can sgyu ma'i 'bras dang mtshungs/_/chos kun stong pa nyid shes bya/_/'khrul phyir snang ba phyi
[\[200b.6\]]rol min/_/sna tshogs snang phyir snang min te/_/shes byed med phyir shes yod min/_/de phyir chos kun stong pa nyid/_/brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phen/_/shes rab smad pas mya ngan 'da'/_/de phyir phan tshun mnyam ldan pas/_/rgyal bas bla med lam du gsungs/_/nyin
[\[200b.7\]]mtshan sdod med res 'jog 'gro/_/tshe 'di snod med rtag tu 'brid/_/gzhan du 'od cir 'gyur gding med na/_/'chi tshe bdag yid ji ltar bde/_/gang bsags bung ba'i rtsi ltar 'dor/_/gnyan sdug sbrul tshang bya khyung bzhin/_/bdag gcig ya nga'i thang la rgyug_/kyi hud bzod
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dka'i tshor bas 'jigs/_/mi sdug gshin rje'i pho nyas bzung /_/yid 'ong gnyen dang bshes pas spangs/_/skyabs gcig bsod nams rgyang bsrings na/_/de tshe gnas skabs ci 'dra zhig_/de ring nyid kyang 'chi srid na/_/lo brgyar bde bar gnas sam ci/_/nams
[\[201a.2\]]kyang mi sdod 'gro 'gyur gyis/_/bdag don bdag gis bsgrub par gyis/_/'di la mi 'jigs su yang med/_/'jigs nas gding thob ci'ang med/_/gdeng drod dge las gzhan med na/_/ci phyir bdag yid bde bar 'dug_/sngon chad ma myong bde sdug med/_/gang myong de la snying po med/_/kye ma rmi
[\[201a.3\]]lam sgyu 'dras bslus/_/da ni bla ma'i bka' bsgrub rigs/_/ji lta ji ltar sna tshogs spyod yul gang snang ba/_/rgyal sras spyod tshe yul dus ngo bo de med bsgom/_/de lta de ltar mnyam nyid 'gro 'ong med gnas nas/_/sems can don brtson tshogs gnyis 'du byed mkhas par 'gyur/_/gson tshe rtswa
[\[201a.4\]]rtse'i zil pa 'dra/_/pha rol la yang shin tu nye/_/gcig pur gar 'gro nges med de/_/thams cad slu ba'i chos can nyid/_/bdag gis bdag don ma bsams na/_/nyin mtshan don med 'da' bar zad/_/mi dge spyad pas sdug bsngal 'byung /_/de bas bag yod brtson par rigs/_/ma thob
[\[201a.5\]]thob na dga' snyam sems/_/thob nas cung zad cis kyang skyo/_/mi skyo na yang chog shes med/_/chog shes gang med dbul po yin/_/dbul pos 'byor pa'i chog mi shes/_/phyug po rgyal pos chog mi shes/_/rgyal po lha yi dbang phyug 'dod/_/des kyang mi chog brgya stong 'dod/_/
[\[201a.6\]]gos med tshe na gos 'dod de/_/gos thob gos zas mang po 'dod/_/des kyang mi chog de bzhin du/_/rgya yul sogs kyi gos gzhan tshol/_/nor med tshe na nor 'dod de/_/gcig gis mi chog khri phrag tshol/_/de snyed na yang pa ru sha'i/_/rta glang gser ri la sogs 'dod/_/gcig
[\[201a.7\]]thob brgya 'dod brgya rnyed na/_/stong 'dod de yis mi chog ste/_/gnyis 'gyur de bzhin gsum 'gyur dang /_/brgya 'gyur la sogs 'dod me mched/_/de phyir gang la chog shes yod/_/de la nor rnams thams cad yod/_/gang la de med thams cad med/_/phyug po dbul po'i khyad
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]par ci/_/dbul po cung zad dngos pos phongs/_/cung zad thob na'ang che thob sems/_/phyug po chog med mang pos phongs/_/chen po rnyed kyang chung ngur sems/_/srid la yid skyo nges 'byung mchog_/bdag 'dul sangs rgyas bstan pa'i srog_/'chi bdag mi bzad dgra bo'i sde/_/pha rol don
[\[201b.2\]]shes rnyed pa'i mchog_/bag byed khrel yod chos 'dul yin/_/rang blo rang sbyong lhag pa'i sems/_/phyi nang stong shes shes rab ste/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sgrol ba'i gru/_/bstan rtsa bslab pa bsrung 'dod pas/_/'bad pas kun gyis sems bsrung bya/_/bslab pa ma bsrungs
[\[201b.3\]]lus don ci/_/sems ma bsrungs na chos don med/_/rang sems rang gis bsrung 'dod na/_/bsrung bral mtshan ma med bsgom bya/_/sprul pa lta bu'i dran pa yis/_/thams cad 'bad de bsrung bar gyis/_/bdag gi mnyam nyid rang bzhin te/_/yang dag don shes bsrung ba'i mchog_/gang gis
[\[201b.4\]]lus sems sgyu 'drar ni/_/gnas nas yang yang mnyam gzhag bya/_/sdig byas 'bras bu rnam gsum ste/_/sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab/_/sna tshogs 'jigs pa char bzhin te/_/mi 'dod nyi so grib 'dra'o/_/yid 'ong thob dang dge rgyun 'phel/_/gang dang gar 'gro mdun stong dang /_/de dang
[\[201b.5\]]der song 'dod dgu gsum/_/'di dag bsdom nas mchod 'os 'bras/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas chos rje shAkya shrIs yul 'khor so sor byon pa'i tshe zhu ba po rnams kyi skal ba dang sbyar te zhar byung du brtsams shing gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa kha 'thor ba rnams rdzogs so//_//dpal sa'i
[\[201b.6\]]steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i ma hA paN+Di ta de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D3964}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_dzi na mArga a ba tA ra/_bod skad du/_rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa/_bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
[\[201b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/gang zhig bag la nyal ni bag chags bcas dang bdud dgra ma lus thams cad ni/_/gnyen po yang dag gzung ba'i stobs kyis nges bcom byang chub mchog ni rgyas ldan zhing /_/kun mkhyen bde gshegs thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin skyob pa rab ston mnga' bdag po/_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]de dang bla ma mchog dang dge 'dun bcas la gus pas rtag par kun nas 'dud/_/gnyen po yongs su gzung ba yis/_/mi mthun phyogs de kun spang dang /_/byang chub mchog ni rtogs pa dang /_/'gro ba'i don ni 'dod pa yis/_/rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa 'di/_/
[\[202a.2\]]ji ltar lung bzhin mdor bsdus pas/_/rang gis rtogs par bya ba dang /_/dge slong mkhas pa byams dpal bzang /_/zhes bya chos kyi don gnyer ba/_/de yis gus par bskul ba dang /_/rang nyid mchog tu goms 'phel phyir/_/rang gi shes rab kyis brtags brjod/_/spyod yul min la
[\[202a.3\]]goms byas nas/_/don mchog rig pa ldan 'gyur te/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yis/_/tshod ma sbyin la'ang 'bad bzhin no/_/mdor na dal 'byor rnyed dka' dang /_/mi rtag nyid dang sred sdug bsngal/_/thog med srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi/_/mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral 'dod dang /_/
[\[202a.4\]]dpal ldan bla ma'i mtshan nyid dang /_/byang sems bskyed dang sdom pa dang /_/sdig bcu 'bras bu dang bcas dang /_/bag med 'dod sred bud med chang /_/bag la nyal dang de bzhin du/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs dang bdag med/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo dang /_/'phags pa'i bden pa
[\[202a.5\]]bzhi rnams dang /_/dam chos mnyan pa la sogs dang /_/pha rol phyin bcu rnams gsungs pa/_/'jig rten pa dang don dam dang /_/mi sdug rnam pa gsum dang ni/_/gzhan yang dbugs rngub 'byung rjes dran/_/sbyor ba'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam/_/bsgom pa'i lam dang de bzhin du/_/khyad
[\[202a.6\]]par lam zhes grags pa dang /_/sa rnams yongs su sbyang ba dang /_/yongs smin sku bzhi brjod pa dang /_/de bzhin du ni smon lam ste/_/rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa 'di/_/mdo ru bsdus te yongs brjod na/_/'di ltar le'u sum cur ni/_/go rims bzhin du gnas pa yin/_/'di ni rgyal
[\[202a.7\]]ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mdor bsdus kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o//_//mi yi dngos po rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/rab bsngags skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_/rab bsngags yul dang 'tshe dang skrag pa med/_/nad med pa dang dbang po tshang gyur dang /_/lang tsho ldan gyur nas kyang
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]tshe ring dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bor g.yengs pas 'jigs/_/dka' tshegs med pa'i gos dang bza' la sogs/_/snying po yod med dpyod shes blo ldan dang /_/sangs rgyas byon dang de yis chos gsungs dang /_/chos thos 'dod cing mngon par brtson pa dang /_/
[\[202b.2\]]dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i bsnyen bkur dang /_/thos don sems dang bsgom sogs shin tu dkon/_/de ltar ston pas gsungs te 'jig dus kyi/_/rlung gis cher g.yengs gcig gyur rgya mtsho yis/_/gnya' shing bu gar lo brgya nas 'thon pa'i/_/rus sbal mgrin pa chud ltar mi rnyed
[\[202b.3\]]dka'/_/sngar bshad las ltos lhag par khyad par du/_/de de rim pa rim pas rnyed par dka'/_/de phyir dal 'byor rin chen legs rnyed pa/_/mi yi lus kyi skyes bu'i don bsgrubs te/_/gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsams na/_/phyis ni gsungs pa'i dal 'byor ga la rnyed/_/bla ma'i bka'
[\[202b.4\]]lung rang gi rigs pa yis/_/blo dang ldan pas brtag cing dpyad par bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las dal 'byor rnyed par dka' ba brgyud pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//skyes pa tsam nas skye 'gro yi/_/mdun na brtse ba med pa yi/_/'chi ba zhes bya'i
[\[202b.5\]]'dra chen gnas/_/shin tu bzlog dka' 'jigs par byed/_/ma dang pha dang bu dang ni/_/spun dang sring mo de bzhin du/_/chung ma gnyen bshes mdza' bo dang /_/mi mdza' kun kyang gshin rjes gsod/_/byis pa rgan po gzhon nu dang /_/dar ma dang ni mchog gzugs can/_/lang tsho can
[\[202b.6\]]dang lang tsho med/_/khrel med 'chi bas za ba'o/_/'khor los sgyur dang mi yi ni/_/dbang po blun po la sogs dang /_/tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang /_/nor rgyas la sogs klu rnams te/_/'di dag kun kyang 'chi bas zos/_/bsam gtan can dang shes pa can/_/zhi dang thub dang snying rje
[\[202b.7\]]mchog_/gtong dang dge ba'i las can dang /_/sna tshogs rig pa'i pha rol phyin/_/bde ldan rnyed ldan kha drag dang /_/smra mkhas pa dang chos smra rnams/_/'chi ba yis ni 'joms pa ste/_/kun la gtong ba gang yang med/_/gcugs pa dang ni ngo yang med/_/dad pa can dang gus
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]can med/_/sa mtshams dang ni rtog dpyod med/_/gar yang 'chi bdag 'di ni 'byung /_/snod dang sems can 'jig rten grags/_/dus gsum gyi ni khams gsum rnams/_/skyes pa nas bzung brlag gi bar/_/mdor na 'jigs pa'i rjes su phyogs/_/yid
[\[203a.2\]]brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/_/byas dang ma byas mi sdod 'dzoms/_/bde dang mi bde yid brtan med/_/gnam lcags chen po glo bur la/_/gsod pa'i gnas su gsod bya ba'i/_/skyes bu stobs kyis khrid pa ltar/_/skye 'gro rnams ni skye tsam gyis/_/de ni skad cig skad cig 'chi/_/dal
[\[203a.3\]]'byor rin chen rnyed dka' ste/_/rnyed kyang skad cig 'jig rang bzhin/_/de mthong yang ni ci nas rang /_/'chi ba nyid du mi rtogs te/_/rgas med 'chi med bdag nyid du/_/go zhing lus can gsod pa ste/_/'dod dang gti mug 'jigs khro yis/_/bla ma dang ni phan 'dogs dang /_/gang yang rung ste su yang
[\[203a.4\]]gsod/_/bla ma dkon mchog gsum dang yang /_/yon tan can dang sdug phongs kyi/_/rdzas ni dogs pa med pas 'phrog_/longs spyod don du lha bzhin du/_/'dod pas log par spyod pa rnams/_/rung dang mi rung rnam dpyod med/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnyed bzhin du/_/rten cing rab tu tshim par
[\[203a.5\]]byed/_/brdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub dang /_/ngag 'khyal ba yi tshig dang ni/_/rol rtsed byed dang sems can ni/_/pha rol sems la zug rngu byed/_/gzhan gyi nor la bdag por ni/_/'dod pa skyed par byed pa dang /_/gzhan la gnod par sems par byed/_/chos dang chos min phyin ci log_/'di
[\[203a.6\]]ltar sdig pa byas kyang ni/_/rgas med 'chi ba med bzhin rol/_/shin tu ltung ste cher rtsub pa'i/_/dmyal ba mi bzad myong bar 'gyur/_/mchog tu tshe ring mi rnams kyang /_/tshe lo brgya pa yin par brjod/_/stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/zhag la lo ni brgya yin te/_/de rnams nang
[\[203a.7\]]nas gang rung ba'i/_/nyin zhag la ni nges par 'chi/_/kha cig mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur/_/kha cig skyes ma thag tu 'chi/_/skad cig 'jig pa'i rang bzhin du/_/chos rnams yang dang yang du bsam/_/bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la/_/blo ldan 'bad pas skyabs su 'gro/_/'di ni rgyal
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mi rtag pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//spyir ni 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi/_/phung por rab tu grags pa yin/_/skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi/_/de bzhin du ni ngan song gsum/_/sdug bsngal rang bzhin nyid du gsungs/_/'khor ba cis kyang 'byung ba yin/_/
[\[203b.2\]]zhing las g.yo dang tshong dang ni/_/phyugs skyong ba yi sdug bsngal dang /_/sdug pa dang bral sdug bsngal dang /_/mi sdug dang phrad sdug bsngal dang /_/'dod don btsal yang ma rnyed dang /_/shin tu bkres skom sdug bsngal dang /_/dbul ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu che/_/dgra rnams sna tshogs sdug
[\[203b.3\]]bsngal dang /_/bsam pa ma grub nor zad dang /_/grogs med sdug bsngal sdug bsngal nyid/_/'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal chen po ni/_/dbang po lnga ni rgyas byed pa'i/_/dbang po'i spyod yul longs spyod kun/_/de bzhin rgyal po dbang phyug sogs/_/khams gsum po ni ma lus kyi/_/
[\[203b.4\]]mdor na zag bcas bde ba 'di/_/mthar ni 'bral bar 'gyur ba ste/_/'di ni sdug bsngal nyid yin no/_/nges par sdug bsngal 'di rnams kyi/_/nyer len rgyu ni sred pa ste/_/de bzlog pa yi ched du ni/_/chos kyi bdag med bsgom par bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'khor
[\[203b.5\]]ba'i sdug bsngal brjod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba ru/_/las rlung shugs kyis gang 'khor ba/_/'di dag dal ba med par 'khor/_/sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i chos can de/_/thog ma med ldan 'khor bar ni/_/skye ba brgyud mar 'khor ba na/_/res 'ga' la lar
[\[203b.6\]]gang la la/_/pha dang ma dang bu dang ni/_/snag gnyen sogs su brgya stong du/_/'di la gang zhig ma gyur med/_/bu dang tsha bo sogs 'brel ba/_/nye 'khor gnyen dang rtsa lag rnams/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ru/_/bying ba'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/_/nan tan gyis ni legs brtags
[\[203b.7\]]nas/_/dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsten/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'gro ba bsgral bar 'dod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//lta ba kun gyi gnad shes shing /_/snying po yod med rnam dpyod can/_/rtog ge'i bstan bcos kun don dang /_/dbu ma'i don la rnam dag blo/_/rgyags
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]min nga rgyal med pa dang /_/snyoms shing mchog tu snying rje can/_/srid pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer/_/bla ma dkon mchog gsum la brten/_/gzhan las rnyed pa don mi gnyer/_/chog shes rang gi las la sems/_/pha rol dpal dang rnyed pa dang /_/bkur
[\[204a.2\]]sti yon tan grags pa yis/_/bde dang ldan na shin tu dga'/_/mdo dang chos mngon 'dul ba yi/_/'gal ba'i don ni gsal byed cing /_/bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yi/_/theg pa chen po'i don ston pa/_/brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/_/bzod ldan gsong por legs smra ba/_/tshul khrims
[\[204a.3\]]'chal yang lam la gnas/_/byas pa'i ltung ba 'chos par byed/_/de la sogs te gsung rab las/_/gsungs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ldan/_/de 'dra'i dpal ldan bla mar bya/_/de las gzhan pa bdud kyi phyogs/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las dpal ldan bla ma'i mtshan nyid bstan
[\[204a.4\]]pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//rnam dag tshes dang gza' la sogs/_/rjes su mthun pa kun bzung la/_/gus pas bla ma dkon mchog la/_/cho ga bzhin du mchod byas te/_/tha ma 'bring sogs dbye ba ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas sku cho ga yis/_/bla ma dang ni dkon mchog la/_/
[\[204a.5\]]ci nus pa yi yon dbul bya/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pa'i/_/yid kyis bstod cing phyag kyang bya/_/byang chub snying po ma thob bar/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/_/bla ma mchod pa la sogs pa'i/_/thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas/_/tshe rabs 'di 'am
[\[204a.6\]]gzhan dag tu/_/bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa'am/_/bgyid du stsal pa nyid dang ni/_/gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/_/rjes su yi rang gang bgyis pa/_/nongs pa de dag mthong bgyis nas/_/bsam pa thag pas mgon la bshags/_/bdag gis dkon mchog gsum dang
[\[204a.7\]]ni/_/pha ma'am bla ma gzhan dag la/_/nyon mongs sgo nas lus ngag dang /_/yid kyis gnod bgyis gang lags dang /_/nyes pa du mas skyon chags pa'i/_/sdig can bdag gis sdig pa gang /_/shin tu mi bzad bgyis pa de/_/thams cad 'dren pa rnams la 'chags/_/sdig pa
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]bshags pa'o/_/'dren pa rnams kyis bdag gi sdig_/nongs pa legs par gzung du gsol/_/'di ni bzang po ma lags pas/_/slan chad bdag ni yang mi bgyid/_/mi byed par sdom pa'o/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas khyab pa/_/'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs
[\[204b.2\]]rgyas byang sems de dag kun/_/dus gsum du ni byung rnams dang /_/nyan thos bse ru sangs rgyas dang /_/'phags min lus can rnams kyi ni/_/dus gsum bsod nams thams cad la/_/dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/rjes su yi rang bgyis
[\[204b.3\]]pa las/_/bsod nams dpag med gang skyes pa/_/dge des skye bo thams cad rnams/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob gyur cig_/bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/'jig rten khams brjod sangs rgyas gang /_/dus gsum 'byung ba'i brtse can rnams/_/rnam pa kun du grags par ni/_/
[\[204b.4\]]chos ni gsung zhing bstan du gsol/_/bskul ba'o/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa'i/_/skyob pa rtag par bzhugs su gsol/_/dam chos thos te sems can rnams/_/srid pa las ni phyir phyogs shog_/gsol ba'o/_/mgon po khyod la thams cad du/_/nges par bdag nyid
[\[204b.5\]]dbul bar bgyi/_/deng nas bzung nas bran nyid du/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mchi bar bgyi/_/mgon po bla ma sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems kyis bdag bzung mdzod/_/mi 'jigs pa ni bdag la stsol/_/deng nas 'gro ba'i don bgyi'o/_/bdag nyid dbul ba'o/_/de nas
[\[204b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/_/sems ni bla na med par bskyed/_/lung las gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/_/sems ni rtse gcig dad byas la/_/'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu nam mkha' kun khyab pa'i/_/'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa yi/_/ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/de sras byang chub
[\[204b.7\]]sems rnams dang /_/'phags pa nyan thos byang chub gang /_/'dren pa rang rgyal rnams dang ni/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha la sogs/_/de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba dam po las/_/sems can khams rnams
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]bsgral phyir dang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bya'i phyir/_/ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/_/byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/_/tshul khrims rnam pa gsum bsrungs te/_/sangs rgyas sbyor skyes
[\[205a.2\]]sdom pa dang /_/dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/sems can don byed tshul khrims ni/_/bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/_/deng nas brtsams nas gzung bar bgyi/_/de ltar sems ni bskyed nas kyang /_/de
[\[205a.3\]]nas de la mi mthun phyogs/_/chom rkun skabs tshol spang ba'i phyir/_/de la zhugs te sems kyis bsrungs/_/sgrib pa'i mun pa kun 'joms shing /_/kun mkhyen ye shes byed pa po/_/gang la phan yon dpag med pa/_/thub pa skyes mchog gis gsungs shing /_/dpal ldan kun du bzang spyod
[\[205a.4\]]sogs/_/smon lam mtha' yas kyis bcings pas/_/rdo rje lta bur brtan pa ste/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i mchog_/phun sum tshogs pa kun bskyed cing /_/bdud ni thams cad 'jigs byed pa/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun skyob pa'i/_/rin thang med pa'i rin chen mchog_/byang chub
[\[205a.5\]]spyod 'jug la sogs su/_/bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis ni/_/sems can kun la brtse ba yis/_/mdor bsdus gsungs pa rig par bya/_/ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu dang /_/bum pa bzang po mi zad gter/_/dpag bsam shing gi myu gu ni/_/rnyed bzhin 'bad las bsrung bar bya/_/cho ga bzhin du
[\[205a.6\]]sdom blangs na/_/byang chub smon pa ldan 'gyur te/_/stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas/_/byang chub sems su rab tu grags/_/sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba'am/_/de bzhin lhan cig skye bar brjod/_/nyon mongs la
[\[205a.7\]]sogs kyis bsgribs phyir/_/de yi gzugs ni mi gsal ba'i/_/ma rig pa yi gzugs yin phyir/_/rnam par rig byed min zhes brjod/_/sdom par brjod pa de yang ni/_/dkar po'i phyogs kyi rgyun yin no/_/thar pa'i cha mthun gnas pa ni/_/chung ngu la sogs dbye ba gsum/_/'dun
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]pa lhan cig mtshungs ldan sems/_/dag cing bzang ba'i zhing sa bzhin/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs mchog yin/_/skye zhing 'byung ba'i rten yin no/_/bsam pa rjes su zhugs pa'i sems/_/dag pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa ste/_/da ltar dang ni phyi nas kyang /_/rnam pa kun
[\[205b.2\]]du 'gyur ba med/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa mtshungs ldan pa'i/_/dkar phyogs zla ba tshes pa bzhin/_/dge ba'i chos ni thams cad kyang /_/gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed/_/las ni dang po par gnas la/_/rim pa bzhin du gsum gsungs pa/_/chung ngu 'bring dang chen po ste/_/thar pa'i
[\[205b.3\]]cha dang mthun gyur pa'o/_/sbyor ba'i lam dang mtshungs ldan pa'i/_/sems ni me dang 'dra ba ste/_/mi mthun phyogs kyi bud shing bsreg_/rab tu sbyor ba 'phro phyir 'byung /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin ldan pa/_/mi zad pa yi gter dang 'dra/_/'dod don kun gyis tshim byas kyang /_/'dod don yongs
[\[205b.4\]]su zad pa med/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin ldan pa/_/rin chen 'byung gnas lta bur 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen de dag kun/_/skye ba'i rten ni de yin no/_/bzod pa'i phar phyin rnal 'byor pa'i/_/sems ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhin/_/mi 'dod pa kun thog bab kyang /_/rgyud la bde ba 'khrug
[\[205b.5\]]mi 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ldan pas/_/rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje bzhin/_/yid ches mngon par brten pa ste/_/bdud kyi ris kyis mi phyed pa'o/_/bsam gtan phar phyin rnal 'byor pa'i/_/sems ni ri rgyal lta bu ste/_/dmigs pa kun gyis g.yengs pa yi/_/bdag nyid che rnams mi bskyod
[\[205b.6\]]pa'o/_/shes rab pha rol phyin ldan pa/_/lha rdzas sman chen lta bu ste/_/nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad/_/des ni kun du 'joms pa yin/_/thabs kun gyis ni phar phyin ldan/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu ste/_/kun nas rtag par thams cad du/_/sems can don ni yongs mi gtong /_/
[\[205b.7\]]smon lam dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/_/sems ni yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/_/smon lam gyi ni nus pa yis/_/'bras bu smon pa 'phel ba nyid/_/stobs kyi pha rol phyin ldan pa'i/_/sems ni nyi ma lta bu ste/_/rang gi gdul bya'i lo tog kun/_/yongs su smin pa nyid du byed/_/ye shes pha rol phyin ldan pa/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]glu dbyangs snyan pa sgrogs pa bzhin/_/chos rnams yang dag bstan pas ni/_/sems can 'dun par byed pa po/_/sems ni bcu po 'di rnams ni/_/rim pas sa ni bcu po ste/_/mthong lam bsgom lam zhes pa las/_/der ni gcig dang go rims bzhin/_/mngon par shes dang mtshungs
[\[206a.2\]]ldan dang /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin/_/thogs pa med pa'i mthu yis ni/_/sems can don kun byed pa nyid/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs ldan pa/_/bang mdzod dang ni mtshungs pa ste/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis kyis/_/mdzod ni nges par gnas pa nyid/_/byang
[\[206a.3\]]chub phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_/ldan pas spyod lam dang 'dra ba/_/'phags pa'i gang zag ma lus pa/_/'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba nyid/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong ldan pa ni/_/bzhon pa lta bur dgongs pa yin/_/zung 'jug lam du 'gro bas na/_/srid dang zhi bar mi ltung nyid/_/gzungs dang
[\[206a.4\]]spobs pa dang ldan pa/_/bkod ma'i chu dang 'dra ba ste/_/thos dang ma thos chos rnams kun/_/rtag par 'dzin cing ston pa'o/_/rim pa bzhin du brjod pa yi/_/sems ni lnga po 'di dag nyid/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa la ni/_/khyad par lam gyis bsdus pa'o/_/chos kyi sbyin pa dang ldan pa/_/
[\[206a.5\]]kun dga'i sgra brnyan lta bu ste/_/thar pa 'dod pa'i gdul bya la/_/kun dga'i tshig ni sgrogs par byed/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/sa dang 'brel te sangs rgyas sar/_/'jug sbyor ba yi lam gyis bsdus/_/de las gzhan yang gang zhig ni/_/bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyis
[\[206a.6\]]ni/_/rjes zhugs gang gA'i chu rgyun bzhin/_/snying brtse shes rab dbyer med cing /_/gcig tu sbyor bas gzhan don byed/_/chos sku mngon par ldan pa yi/_/sems ni sprin dang 'dra bar 'dod/_/mtha' yas lus kyi sprul sprin gyi/_/sems can don byed rgyu nyid do/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
[\[206a.7\]]sas bsdus pa'i/_/sems 'di gnyis ni rim pa bzhin/_/sngon du gsung ba dngos gzhi'i skabs/_/phyi ma rjes kyi skabs su 'dod/_/'di ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi/_/sems kyi dbye bar gsungs pa yin/_/smon dang 'jug pa'i dbye ba yis/_/byang chub sems ni gnyis su gsal/_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gang nas bzung ste sems can khams/_/mtha' yas rab tu sgrim pa'i phyir/_/mi ldog pa yi sems kyis su/_/sems de yang dag blangs gyur pa/_/deng nas bzung ste gnyid log gam/_/bag med gyur kyang bsod nams shugs/_/rgyun mi 'chad par du ma zhig_/nam mkha'
[\[206b.2\]]mnyam par rab tu 'byung /_/byang chub smon pa'i sems las ni/_/'khor tshe 'bras bu cher 'byung yang /_/ji ltar 'jug pa'i sems bzhin du/_/bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min/_/'di dag gis ni dge ba'i chos/_/zag bcas zag med thams cad kyis/_/lam 'bras dang
[\[206b.3\]]bcas mtshan nyid rnams/_/yang dag bsdus te ji bzhin gsungs/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//mchog tu dge ba bzung ba dang /_/mi dge thams cad spangs pa ste/_/de yis sdom pa bzung ba ni/_/ji lta ba
[\[206b.4\]]bzhin yongs su bsrungs/_/bstan pa'i sems kyis 'khor ba yi/_/sdug bsngal rjes su dran par bya/_/sdug bsngal rgyu ni spang ba'i phyir/_/gnyen po yongs su gzung bar bya/_/de ni dge bsnyen bsnyen gnas dang /_/dge tshul dang ni dge slong rnams/_/lnga dang brgyad dang bcu dang ni/_/thams cad
[\[206b.5\]]spong zhing bsrung bar gzung /_/pho dang mo yi dbye ba yis/_/mdor na slar yang brgyad du dbye/_/so sor thar pa'i sdom zhes pa/_/'dul ba nyid du rgyas par spros/_/dge slong lus ni bsdams pa ste/_/dge slong ngag ni bsdams pa yin/_/dge slong yid ni bsdams pa ste/_/dge slong kun du bsdams
[\[206b.6\]]pa yin/_/sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad/_/rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/de dag nyid ni theg chen la/_/zhugs nas khyad par 'phags pa nyid/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang /_/ldan zhing de rnams so
[\[206b.7\]]sor 'brang /_/byang chub sems kyi bslab pa ni/_/mtha' yas thub pas gsungs pa rnams/_/byang chub spyod 'jug la sogs su/_/bsdus pa de rnams blta bar bya/_/mdor na byang chub sems rnams kyis/_/bslab pa sems can don bsgrub cing /_/phung po la sogs chos rnams kyi/_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]ngo bo nyid med rnam par bsgom/_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma nyams pa/_/rab tu 'bad pas spyad par bya/_/nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/kun rdzob pa dang don dam ste/_/sdom pa blangs nas bsrung ba ni/_/kun rdzob pa ru 'dod pa yin/_/tshad med pa ni bzhi rnams la/_/bsnyen
[\[207a.2\]]cing bsten pa don dam ste/_/sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal gyi/_/rgyu las 'gro ba bsgral 'dod nyid/_/de ni snying rje chen por gsungs/_/ston ka'i zla 'od bzang bzhin no/_/'gro ba bla med bde ba la/_/sbyor bar 'dod pas byams pa nyid/_/nam mkha' kun ni mthar thug pa'i/_/in+d+ra nI
[\[207a.3\]]la'i 'od mnyam pa'o/_/gzhan la phan 'dogs la mkhas shing /_/byang chub la phyogs sems can de/_/mthong nas tshim pa dga' mtshan nyid/_/pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang mtshungs/_/rnyed pa la sogs 'jig rten chos/_/de dag kun la btang snyoms pa'i/_/ting 'dzin de bskyed
[\[207a.4\]]rnal 'byor pa/_/btang snyoms pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i 'od/_/rang bzhin dang ni mtshan ma dang /_/'bras bu dang mngon 'du byed kyi/_/stong pa nyid kyi snying rje sogs/_/rim bzhin 'khyud par shes par bya/_/tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po rnams/_/dbye ba rnam bzhi rtag bsgom bya/_/rnam par
[\[207a.5\]]thar pa'i sgo de yis/_/gal te 'khyud par ma gyur na/_/'di dag zag pa dang bcas so/_/tshangs par spyod pa 'di gnyis ni/_/rgyal ba'i sras po rnams kyi'o/_/tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa/_/bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/_/rang gzhan rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa/_/spong zhing dben par gnas
[\[207a.6\]]pa yi/_/bza' ba la sogs pa rnams ni/_/srog bsrung tsam gyis chog shes pa/_/gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di nyid ni/_/ldan pa'i mi de rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub lam ni dang po la/_/bsgom pa'i snod gyur gzhan du min/_/'khor ba'i bde dang longs spyod ni/_/sred pa nyid du sred par byed/_/
[\[207a.7\]]de yis rnam g.yengs sems kyis ni/_/lam la goms pa shin tu ring /_/thos bsam rab 'phel las byung zhing /_/sred dang srid pa rnams spong ba/_/thar pa'i cha mthun dge ba ste/_/de thob thub sras chung ngu'o/_/bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te/_/so so'i skye dang 'phags pa yi/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]dbye ba zag bcas zag med do/_/mthong ba zhes bya zag pa med/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sdom pa brjod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//'di ltar skyes pa'i rin chen sems/_/bsrung ba ru ni 'dod pa yis/_/phan dang mi phan dngos po ni/_/rim bzhin
[\[207b.2\]]blang dor shes par bya/_/dor bya'i dbye ba rang bzhin dang /_/bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba'o/_/kha na ma tho mi dge'i las/_/phye nas phye ste bshad par bya/_/rang bzhin kha na ma tho nyid/_/mi dge bcu po 'di dag ste/_/rnam smin mi bzad sdug bsngal nyid/_/de dag rnam par spang bar bya/_/srog gcod pa
[\[207b.3\]]ni ma 'khrul par/_/bsams bzhin srog chags gsod pa'o/_/ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor/_/mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gis byed/_/bgrod min bgrod par 'dod pa yi/_/log par g.yem pa rnam pa bzhi/_/brdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan bsgyur ba'i/_/tshig don mngon par go ba'o/_/mig rna yid
[\[207b.4\]]kyi rnam shes dang /_/gsum gyis nyams su myong gang de/_/mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang /_/rtogs pa yin te rim bzhin bshad/_/phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir/_/nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig_/tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa/_/nyon mongs can kun kyal ba yin/_/gzhan yang nyon mongs can
[\[207b.5\]]sems kyi/_/kha gsag glu dang rol mor bcas/_/bstan bcos ngan pa'i tshig yin no/_/brnab sems gzhan nor log par chag_/gnod sems can la sdang ba'o/_/dge dang mi dge med lta ba/_/log par lta ba yin 'di la/_/gsum mam bdun ni las kyang yin/_/de la rnam smin thams
[\[207b.6\]]cad du/_/dmyal bar yongs su brjod pa ste/_/rgyu mthun rgyu 'bras mthun par ni/_/sa steng nyid du myong bar byed/_/bdag pos phyi yul 'dod pa'i don/_/phyin ci log tu 'byung ba'o/_/sdug bsngal phyir dang gsad phyir dang /_/gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnams gsum/_/sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes
[\[207b.7\]]rnams kyis/_/gnas skabs go rims bzhin du'o/_/rgyu mthun srog gcod pa yis ni/_/tshe thung lus la nad zug ste/_/ma byin par ni blangs pa yis/_/dbul por 'gyur zhing rgyal po dang /_/chom rkun sogs kyis nor zad byed/_/'dod pas log par g.yem rnams kyis/_/chung ma
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]gzhan la 'phyo bar 'gyur/_/brdzun du smra bas skur pa 'debs/_/phra mas grogs dang dbye bar 'gyur/_/tshig rtsub brjod pas mi snyan thos/_/ngag 'khyal gyis ni legs bshad kyang /_/mi len gzhan gyi bzhad gad rgyu/_/brnab sems kyis ni 'dod chags dag_/
[\[208a.2\]]drag cing longs spyod zad par 'gyur/_/gnod sems kyis ni zhe sdang drag_/lus kyang ngan pa nyid yin no/_/gti mug drag cing lta ba ngan/_/log par lta ba'i 'bras bur grags/_/'di ni rgyu mthun 'bras bu'o/_/bsad pas phyi rol dngos po rnams/_/'bras bu bcud chung la sogs pa/_/ma byin
[\[208a.3\]]blangs pas thog 'bab cing /_/rdul gyis rab tu gang ba nyid/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa yis/_/phyogs kun rdul gyis khyab pa nyid/_/brdzun du smra bas thams cad du/_/dngos po thams cad dri mi zhim/_/phra ma'i tshig gi 'bras bu ni/_/shin tu mtho dang dma' ba nyid/_/tshig rtsub
[\[208a.4\]]smras pa las byung ba/_/sa ni chu med tsha sgo can/_/ngag 'khyal smras pa las byung ba/_/dus tshigs rnams ni log par 'byung /_/brnab sems kyis ni 'bras bu phra/_/gnod sems kyis ni 'bras bu rtsub/_/'bras med pa'am 'bras bu chung /_/log par lta ba las byung ba'i/_/lhan skyes kha na
[\[208a.5\]]ma tho ba/_/'bras bcas gsungs pa de smad pa'o/_/'di ni bdag po'i 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la [(]'brug [,]'jug [)]pa las mi dge ba bcu brjod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//bag med la dga' skye bo gang /_/'di ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/_/bag med dug gis brgyal ba
[\[208a.6\]]ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa shin tu ring /_/dgra bo 'jigs pa cher byed pa/_/bag med dang mnyam 'ga' yang med/_/gang yang bag med dbang song ba/_/dmyal ba ru ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/bag med rab ldan mi dag ni/_/rtse zhing dogs med sdig pa spyod/_/de nas mi bzad dmyal bar
[\[208a.7\]]ltung /_/rtag par bag yod mi rnams ni/_/bsod nams ye shes pha rol phyin/_/mchog tu zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/_/de yi 'jigs pa thams cad zad/_/gang zhig mi bdag thob nas kyang /_/bag med pa la mi 'jug cing /_/de las gzhan du bzlog pa ni/_/de ni mkhas pa zhes
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]su brjod/_/sngon du bde ba ltar rtogs nas/_/bag med pa la rjes su 'jug_/bag med las byung 'bras bu 'thob/_/phyi nas nges par de gdung 'gyur/_/dgra mang yid du mi 'ong dang /_/grags pa ngan zhing shin tu smod/_/tshogs pa'i nang du sma 'bab cing /_/bag med ldan pa sdug bsngal snod/_/
[\[208b.2\]]kun du rtag par las kun la/_/bag med mchog tu nyes pa ste/_/gang yang nyin dang mtshan mo ru/_/de la dge ba rdzogs mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bde ba/_/cung zad gang yod bag med des/_/rlag par byed par dogs nas ni/_/de nas de ni spang bar bya/_/
[\[208b.3\]]bag med 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste/_/bag yod mchog tu 'gro ba'o/_/de bas bag med spangs pa de/_/kun du rtag par bde bar 'gyur/_/bag med brgya yis bcings pa ni/_/yul gyi rgya mtshos g.yengs pa nyid/_/srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa yi/_/lha rnams dpag
[\[208b.4\]]tu med par rtse/_/skyes pa tsam gyis lha yi ni/_/bde ba skad cig rim pas 'dzad/_/bag med pa yis brgyal ba rnams/_/skad cig zad par mi shes so/_/rtag tu yul la rol pa rnams/_/yid ni bag med kyis g.yengs 'khrul/_/'dod pa'i bde bas chog shes med/_/de
[\[208b.5\]]yis lha rnams sdug bsngal nyid/_/'dod pa'i rim gyis 'khrul pa yi/_/lha rnams bag med mun pas gtibs/_/'byor pa g.yo zhing srog kyang ni/_/mthar kyang 'jigs par mi shes so/_/thog mar grogs po gzhan du mthong /_/phyi nas dgra bo bzhin du 'gyur/_/lus can
[\[208b.6\]]rnams kun bag med kyis/_/nya rnams lcags kyus brlag bzhin no/_/lha dang lha min mi rnams dang /_/klu rnams la ni khyad par du/_/kun du don med byed par mthong /_/bag med pas ni dgra bo mchog_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag cing /_/rang dang mdza' bo 'chi bsams
[\[208b.7\]]te/_/sems can kun la brtse ba yis/_/bag med yang dag rab tu sel/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las bag med pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//'dod pa rnams la 'dod mi bya/_/'dod pa yis ni kun du bslus/_/'khor ba'i
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]'ching ba drag po ste/_/kun kyang dmyal ba'i rgyu rnams so/_/'di la chags dang 'dod pa gang /_/de yi sdug bsngal mtha' yas so/_/'dod pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa la/_/zhi ba'i rgyu ni gang yang med/_/chags pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams/_/zhe sdang yongs su 'bar ba
[\[209a.2\]]ste/_/gti mug dbang du gyur pa yis/_/tshig rtsub po ni smra ba yin/_/gtum pa las byung gtum pa ste/_/gyur pa dang ni drag gtum nyid/_/'dod pa dug gi me 'dra ste/_/rab tu 'bad pas spang bar bya/_/so so'i skye bo dbang po ni/_/dbang po'i don la zhen byas te/_/'dod pa 'di ni byis pa yi/_/
[\[209a.3\]]yid 'phrog byed cing dmyal bar ltung /_/'dod chags me ni bsreg bya yi/_/yul tsam gyis ni tshim mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni dbang po yang /_/yul las zhen pa tshim pa med/_/rtsol bas me ni 'byung ba ste/_/ma 'phrad par ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mi rnams kyi ni 'dod pa'i me/_/phrad
[\[209a.4\]]dam ma phrad kyang ni skye/_/me ni ring na 'tshig mi byed/_/'dod me ring yang bzod par dka'/_/dug ni zos pas 'chi ba ste/_/'dod chags dran pas yis kyang 'joms/_/kun rtog las byung shing la ni/_/'dod pa'i rlung gis sbar ba ni/_/gol la sogs zhen chags kyi/_/mar blugs me yis
[\[209a.5\]]shin tu bsregs/_/'byung po rnams ni sun par byed/_/mes ni mchog tu sreg byed de/_/chags med shin tu rno yang na/_/mi rnams sun par mi byed do/_/da ltar byung ba'i 'dod pa ni/_/skyon dang bcas la khyad par du/_/mi rmongs bde bar gnas pa gang /_/de ni brtan pa zhes su
[\[209a.6\]]brjod/_/rlung gis bskyod pa'i shugs rlabs kyis/_/shin tu g.yo ba'i chu zla dang /_/dbu ba lta bur snying med la/_/mkhas pa su zhig dga' bar 'gyur/_/kun rtog byung nas 'dod chags te/_/de nas zhe sdang rab tu skye/_/zhe sdang khong khros skye bo ni/_/de nas dmyal ba nyid du 'gro/_/de
[\[209a.7\]]bas ri bo nyams dga' zhing /_/sna tshogs ljon shing yod pa ru/_/brten cing nges pas bsam gtan bya/_/'dod pa'i kun 'byung mdzad pa yin/_/nges par skyon rnams 'di kun gyi/_/dang po'i byed mkhan ma rig nyid/_/de phyir ma rig gzhom bya ste/_/de yi ngo bo rnams dpyad bya/_/'di ni
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyi/_/'phel bar byed pa sred pa nyid/_/de phyir sdug bsngal zhi 'dod pas/_/de bas sred pa mkhas pas gzhom/_/dmyal ba'i me bas sred pa
[\[209b.2\]]yi/_/me nyid shin tu bsran par dka'/_/lus ngag yid ni nges sred byed/_/dmyal ba'i me ni de lta min/_/khams gsum pa yi rjes 'jug cing /_/thog ma med pa'i las gsum ni/_/'bar med dus gsum du 'byung ba/_/sred med zhes bya gzhan yin no/_/mtho ris 'dod chags me yis
[\[209b.3\]]bsreg_/dud 'gro zhe sdang gis bsreg ste/_/gti mug me yis ngan song bsreg_/sred me kun gyis sreg byed do/_/nga rgyal ser sna'i me dud ni/_/kun du rtog pa'i shing las byung /_/'dod pa'i me yis 'jig rten bsreg_/shing byung me yis de lta min/_/'dod pa'i sbrul gyis
[\[209b.4\]]zin pa gang /_/de dag sos par 'gyur ba med/_/'dod pa bsten dang bsgoms pa yis/_/phyir zhing de nyid 'phel bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar me yis bsreg bya thob/_/'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin 'di/_/'dod pa'i me ni 'phel ba na/_/bzlog par nus pa ma yin no/_/'khor lo bzhi 'khrul
[\[209b.5\]]'jig rten ni/_/'dod pas yongs su bslus pa nyid/_/thog med zag med 'jig rten la/_/'dod pa lta bu'i dgra med do/_/'dod pas bskul ba'i mi rnams ni/_/rgya mtsho drag shul can du 'jug_/mtshon cha sbas pa'i g.yul ngo ni/_/zab mor rab tu 'jug pa'o/_/'dod pa
[\[209b.6\]]yis ni sa skyong yang /_/phan tshun nges par gsod pa ste/_/spun dang spun ni lhan cig tu/_/pha dang bu yang phan tshun no/_/dug can mda' yis phog pa yi/_/ri dgas gang du rjes su rgyug_/der ni dug de nyid 'gro ste/_/de bzhin sred dug mi la'o/_/sdug bsngal can gyi yi dgas
[\[209b.7\]]rnams/_/yi dgas [(]yongs [,]longs [)]spyod la rgyug ste/_/dmyal ba dmyal ba nyid du ni/_/da ni sred pas cher bskul ba'o/_/yun du lha yi bde ba ni/_/spyad pa'i lha rnams lha yul nas/_/sred pa'i zhags pas drangs nas ni/_/slar yang dmyal bar ltung ba'o/_/bla ma dkon mchog gsum
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]dang ni/_/yon tan can dang btsun mo'i nor/_/gnyis skyes sogs dang sdug phongs kyi/_/nor ni 'dod can 'phrog par byed/_/skye 'gro kun ni brtse med pas/_/sdig pa thams cad byed pa yin/_/nor de bor nas 'gro ba ste/_/shi nas sdig dang lhan cig 'brang /_/
[\[210a.2\]]de nas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal de 'byung 'gyur/_/drag shul skyob pa med pa de/_/las de yis ni myong bar 'gyur/_/sred pa'i yul ni nges grol zhing /_/chags pa'i sol me rnam spangs pa/_/rdo dang rin chen mnyam pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das la bde bar 'gyur/_/blo ldan
[\[210a.3\]]ye shes chu yis ni/_/'dod pa'i me ni 'bad de gzhom/_/'dod pa ma bkum pa la ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa shin tu ring /_/skad cig dga' ste shes par dka'/_/rnam par smin pa me dang mtshungs/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde 'dod pas/_/de phyir sred pa nges gzhom bya/_/sred pa'i zhags pas rnam grol
[\[210a.4\]]zhing /_/chags dang zhe sdang spangs pa dang /_/sdig pa'i dri ma bral ba yi/_/mkhas pa rnams ni mya ngan bral/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sred pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//bud med ngan song rtsa ba ste/_/thams cad du ni nor zad byed/_/bud med ngag
[\[210a.5\]]nyan mi dag ni/_/tshogs pa ru ni bzhad gad rgyu/_/bud med rnams ni don med chags/_/g.yo dang ser sna che ba ste/_/'jig rten gnyis su rlag byed pa/_/skyes pa rnams la nye bar gnas/_/chags las skyes pa'i rnam 'gyur tshig_/'jam zhing myos byed rnam par lta/_/de yi snying ni gzhan du ste/_/
[\[210a.6\]]yongs su brjod pa gzhan du'o/_/'jam zhing snum la reg bde yang /_/'dzin na rdo rje lta bu ste/_/phan byas bkur byas mi dran zhing /_/dri ma can gyi bsam pa'o/_/gos dang zas dang lus rgyan sogs/_/ster ba'i gzhon nu yid 'ong ba/_/rang gi bdag po bor nas ni/_/byes mi la ni 'gro bar byed/_/
[\[210a.7\]]gang du 'gro ba'i grogs de la/_/bud med dga' bar byed pa ste/_/gnas pa'i skyes pa myur myur ba/_/'di ni spong bar byed pa yin/_/ji lta bung ba me tog gi_/bcud zad nas ni song ba ltar/_/de bzhin skyes pa nor zad nas/_/bud med kyis ni spong bar byed/_/ral gri'i snying ste rtsub cing g.yo/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]sdig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa ste/_/bud med skyes pa brlag bya'i phyir/_/skyes te rgyu gzhan ci yang med/_/lha rnams la yang bud med kyi/_/'ching ba las dam gzhan med de/_/bud med 'ching bas nges bcings pa/_/phyi nas dmyal bar ltung ba'o/_/bud med kyis ni byis pa las/_/sgyu gsog
[\[210b.2\]]khram ni mngon pa'am/_/bud med chags pa rmongs pa'i mi/_/rmongs pa'i phyir na mi rig go/_/blo gtad skyes pa slu brid kyi/_/'bad pa yis ni bcings nas kyang /_/longs spyod kyi ni bcud 'phrog ste/_/bur shing bzhin du 'jibs nas 'dor/_/skyes pa thabs kun 'chang bas ni/_/rnam pa kun gyis
[\[210b.3\]]yongs bsrungs kyang /_/bud med dbang du bya bar ni/_/thams cad du ni mi nus so/_/yid 'ong tshig gis skyes pa rnams/_/ri dgas bzhin du rmongs byed cing /_/phyi nas rgud par gyur pa ni/_/mi gtsang thal ba bzhin du spong /_/phan byas mi dran bkur byas nas/_/de bzhin dbang phyug byams byas
[\[210b.4\]]pa/_/khyod la rgud pa nyer gnas na/_/bud med kyis ni mi dran no/_/me tog rnying pa spangs nas ni/_/bung ba bzhin du rgyug pa ste/_/de bzhin khyo ni rgud pa la/_/mo la brtse dang ngo tsha med/_/snying dga' bar ni mi nges shing /_/nges pa med cing snying bzang dang /_/g.yo zhing byed pa yid du 'ong /_/
[\[210b.5\]]nga rgyal can ni thams cad du/_/ji ltar dug 'dres sbrang bzhin spang /_/bud med phal cher sdig bsam can/_/srid pa'i bang mdzod 'ching ba rnams/_/mi mthun thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir/_/thar pa 'dod pas shin tu spang /_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las bud med kyi nyes
[\[210b.6\]]dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//gang ni skyon kun byed pa nyid/_/chang ni btung bar mi bya ste/_/de yis bag med kyang 'byung zhing /_/khyad par du ni yon tan 'joms/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/cher ni shin tu 'bar byed pa'o/_/'jig rten bzhad
[\[210b.7\]]gad le lo dang /_/ngag skyon kun dang nor zad byed/_/blo gtad med cing brdzun tshig dang /_/rnam 'khrul bya ba nyams pa nyid/_/blo ni g.yo zhing lus dbang med/_/nad dang blo ni rgud pa dang /_/ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa/_/rtsod cing pha rol kun smod dang /_/nges pa med pa'i bya ba nyid/_/de bzhin
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]sdig pa spyod pa ste/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal cher byed pa'o/_/'di dag la sogs nyes 'byung bas/_/de bas chang ni rnam par spang /_/gang dang gang gis bslab pa'i gzhi/_/ji ltar thub pas bcas pa gang /_/rgya cher bcas pa de nyams
[\[211a.2\]]na/_/de ni kha na ma tho ba'o/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las chang gi nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/_/nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs nyid/_/nyes pa kun gyi rten 'di rnams/_/rab tu 'bad pas gzhom par bya/_/nyon mongs
[\[211a.3\]]nye ba'i nyon mongs 'byung /_/'du byed rnams las dge sogs dang /_/de las 'khor ba'i phung po 'di/_/mtshan nyid sdug bsngal rab tu skye/_/bag la nyal drug rtsa ba ste/_/'dod chags khong khro nga rgyal lta/_/ma rig the tshom nyon mongs te/_/'di la 'dod chags rnam pa gnyis/_/'dod pa'i
[\[211a.4\]]khams kyi 'dod chags te/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags zhes su brjod/_/gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa ni/_/srid pa'i chags pa'o lta bu ni/_/bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang /_/med dang dman la mchog lta dang /_/rgyu min lam min de lta ba/_/de rnams lta ba lnga yin no/_/
[\[211a.5\]]nyon mongs bcu ni khams gsum du/_/dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du phye ba/_/'di dag 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ni/_/mthong dang bsgom lam rnams kyis spong /_/'di rnams rgya cher spros nas ni/_/mthong lam skabs su mngon par brjod/_/'di ni mi mthun phyogs kyi ni/_/gnas skabs
[\[211a.6\]]tsam du brjod pa yin/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las bag la nyal ba'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//khro dang khon 'dzin g.yo phrag dog_/'chab dang 'tshig dang ser sna dang /_/sgyu dang rmugs dang nyes rtsom dang /_/ngo tsha med dang khrel med
[\[211a.7\]]dang /_/thob 'jal dang ni tshul 'chos dang /_/kha gsag rnyed pas rnyed 'dod dang /_/gzhogs slong zhes bya 'di dag ni/_/log par 'tsho ba lnga rnams so/_/skyon zlos rgyags dang snungs med dang /_/zhen dang yongs su zhen nyid dang /_/yid la mi byed mi bzod dang /_/chags dang mi rigs
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]chags pa dang /_/snyom pa dang ni chos min chags/_/zhum dang zas mi 'dod pa dang /_/thob 'dod dang ni 'dod 'dun dang /_/gnod sems dang ni rgod 'gyod dang /_/rmugs dang gnyid dang sdig 'dod dang /_/le lo dang ni 'dod chen dang /_/bka' blo mi bde tshul med dang /_/skye bo
[\[211b.2\]]ngan mtshungs mi dga' dang /_/rtog pa'i skye ba bzhi dang ni/_/nga rgyal dbye ba bdun du shes/_/the tshom rnams ni nye nyon mongs/_/dri ma 'di rnams spang bya'o/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mdor bstan pa'o/_/khro ba sems rab 'khrugs pa ste/_/'khon 'dzin de dang rab 'brel nyid/_/sems kyi gya gyu
[\[211b.3\]]g.yo yin te/_/gzhan skyid mi bzod phrag dog go/_/rang skyon sgrib pa 'chab pa'o/_/'tshig pa sdig pa zhen pa nyid/_/ser sna rab tu mi gtong ba'o/_/sgyu ni pha rol slu ba'o/_/non pa spobs pa nyams gyur pa'o/_/nyes rtsom khros pas non pa'o/_/ngo tsha med dang khrel med pa/_/rang dang gzhan
[\[211b.4\]]la mi 'dzem pa'o/_/thob kyis 'jal ba rnyed pa'i phyir/_/mngon sum gzhan la smod byed pa'o/_/tshul 'chos rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir/_/dbang po sdom par byed pa ste/_/kha gsag rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir/_/tshig 'jam sngar ni smra ba'o/_/rnyed pas rnyed pa rnams 'dod pa/_/sngar thob pa
[\[211b.5\]]la bsngags byed pa'o/_/gzhan gyi rdzas la mngon zhen pas/_/gzhan gyi rdzas la bsngags byed pa/_/gzhogs slong nyid de lnga 'di dag_/log pas 'tsho bar 'dod pa'o/_/skyon zlos gzhan khros sems la ni/_/gsos 'debs pa la brjod pa'o/_/rgyags pa dregs pa'o snungs med
[\[211b.6\]]ni/_/sems ni rtog par gyur pa'o/_/zhen pa kun nas dkris pa chung /_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags las byung ba'o/_/yongs su zhen pa 'dod pa la/_/kun nas dkris pa che ba'o/_/yid la mi byed don rnams la/_/sems kyi sor rtog med pa'o/_/mi bzod gnod pa byed pa dang /_/sdug
[\[211b.7\]]bsngal dag kyang mi bzod pa'o/_/chags pa rang gi rdzas la ni/_/chags pa'i 'dod chags ldan pa'i yid/_/gzhan gyi rdzas la zhen pa ni/_/ma rigs chags pa zhes bya'o/_/snyom pa rtsom pa med pa'i lus/_/sgyid lug don gyi le lo'o/_/spang bya bud med la chags pa/_/chos la
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]chags pa zhes 'dod do/_/rang gi yon tan bskyed nas kyang /_/sems dman zhum pa yi chad pa'o/_/zas mi 'dod pa bza' drags pas/_/lus mi bde ba yin par brjod/_/thob 'dod bdag nyid ci nas kyang /_/yon tan yang dag ldan zhes brjod/_/'dod 'dun
[\[212a.2\]]yon tan lnga rnams la/_/'dod pa don du gnyer ba yin/_/gnod sems brlag par smon pa yis/_/gzhan la gnod par sems pa'o/_/lus sems rab tu ma zhi nyid/_/rgod par yang dag rab tu brjod/_/'gyod pa ngan byas phyi nas ni/_/yang dag rab tu gdung 'gyur ba'o/_/rmugs
[\[212a.3\]]pa lus sems lci ba yis/_/las la sbyor bar mi nus nyid/_/gnyid ni rnam shes dbang po la/_/'dus pa gnyid ces brjod pa'o/_/sdig 'dod yon tan med bzhin du/_/yon tan ldan par tshul 'chos pa'o/_/le lo las la sun skyo bas/_/lus sems bying ba nyid yin no/_/'dod
[\[212a.4\]]chen rab tu brkam pa ste/_/dpal ldan chog shes las 'da' ba'o/_/bka' blo mi bde gang gsungs pa/_/chos la smod pa'i tshig yin no/_/tshul med slob dpon bla ma yi/_/bya ba rnams la mi gus pa'o/_/bla mar gus pa nyams pa nyid/_/'di ni skye na mtshungs pa'o/_/sems ni
[\[212a.5\]]'dod sogs la zhen pas/_/brtan nyams pa ni mi dga' ba'o/_/nye du dang 'brel rtog pa ni/_/nye du la byams 'du shes so/_/de bzhin yul sred de don du/_/de yi yon tan brjod pa'o/_/de bzhin mi 'chir rtog pa gang /_/'chi ba'i 'jigs pas mi dogs pa'o/_/rjes rnams rig
[\[212a.6\]]dang ldan rtog ni/_/bdag nyid ci nas gzhan dag gis/_/yon tan bdog pa'i rnam pa yis/_/bla mar byed par 'gyur snyam pa'o/_/gzhan rjes chags dang ldan pa yi/_/rnam rtog gang yin gzhan dag la/_/chags dang gnod sems dregs pa yis/_/phan dang mi phan rnams sems
[\[212a.7\]]pa'o/_/kun du brtags pa'i khyad par gyis/_/gang gis ci nas yid kyi ni/_/rnam shes 'jug pa nga rgyal lo/_/'di ni thun mong nyid yin no/_/dman pas dman pa nga rgyal te/_/rang las dman las dman snyam pa/_/nga rgyal nyid du nges pa'o/_/dman pa nyid dang bdag nyid ni/_/mnyam
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]snyam pa yang nga rgyal te/_/dman pa las bdag lhag snyam pa'i/_/blo de yang ni nga rgyal nyid/_/mnyam dang bdag nyid mnyam snyam pa/_/mnyam pa yi ni nga rgyal lo/_/khyad 'phags pa dang bdag mnyam par/_/rlom pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal lo/_/khyad 'phags las bdag khyad 'phags
[\[212b.2\]]blo/_/nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal lo/_/gar yang bdag ni dgos med ces/_/dman pa'i nga rgyal nyid yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong nyer len gyi/_/phung po lnga la bdag blo gang /_/nga'o snyam du rlom pa ni/_/de ni nga'o snyam par bshad/_/bsam gtan dang ni de 'bras bu/_/ma thob pa yang
[\[212b.3\]]bdag gis ni/_/thob pa nyid du rtog pa de/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhes su brjod/_/log pa'i lam la sems chags pas/_/mi 'dod 'bras bu gang zhig la/_/bden pa'i las kyi dngos por rtogs/_/de ni log pa'i nga rgyal brjod/_/tha dad 'du shes 'du shes gang /_/chags
[\[212b.4\]]sdang mun gyis bsgribs pa'o/_/bden dang dkon mchog gsum sogs la/_/blo rnams gnyis ni the tshom mo/_/'di dag nye ba'i nyon mongs te/_/lnga bcu rtsa bdun rab tu brjod/_/phran tshegs gzhir ni drangs pa rnams/_/thar pa 'dod pas spang bar bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la
[\[212b.5\]]'jug pa las nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//'di dag chos kyi bdag med pa/_/rtogs pas bag chags bcas pa rnams/_/rab tu spang ngo yang na ni/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams/_/yang dag par ni mthong
[\[212b.6\]]bas so/_/yang na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/_/yang dag mthong zhing phung po sogs/_/stong pa nyid du goms pa dang /_/'gro ba'i don la bsgom pas spong /_/phung po 'di spangs gzhan du ni/_/nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa gang /_/phung po rnams las gzhan pa'i
[\[212b.7\]]bdag_/srid pa'i lam du 'gro ba med/_/byed pa po dang las rnams dang /_/de 'bras spyod dang rtag pa la/_/de ni byed po za ba'o/_/bya ba'i nus pa bral ba nyid/_/phung po bdag min bdag la ni/_/phung po mi ldan bdag gi ni/_/phung po ma yin bdag kyang ni/_/phung po la ni gnas ma yin/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa nyid/_/brtags phyir bdag tu rigs ma yin/_/phung po bdag la 'brel med do/_/de dag rnam par 'gal bas so/_/sngon dang phyi ma gcig pa'i gzugs/_/mi rtag dang 'brel ga la srid/_/'on te 'brel na rtag pa yang /_/mi rtag bdag
[\[213a.2\]]nyid du ni 'gyur/_/mi rtag pa yang rtag nyid du/_/rtag tu 'brel pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de ltar dpal ldan 'phags pa ni/_/klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa ste/_/mu stegs can gyis gang brtags pa'i/_/bdag de rigs pas rnam dpyad na/_/phung po kun gyi nang rnams ni/_/gang zhig nas kyang
[\[213a.3\]]rnyed min te/_/phung po rnams yod de rtag min/_/de yang bdag gi ngo bo min/_/gang yang rtag dang mi rtag dag_/rten dang brten pa'i ngo bor med/_/phung po tsam zhig bdag tu ni/_/'dod pa nyid ni mi 'gegs te/_/de nyid sbom dang dgar la sogs/_/da rung rlom pas 'phel ba nyid/_/de
[\[213a.4\]]yang sgyu ma ltar brjod de/_/gang phyir rnam dpyad spyod yul min/_/rnam par spyod pa rgya che'i phyir/_/'dir ni bdag gis ma spros te/_/de yi don ni rtog ge dang /_/dbu ma'i bstan bcos dag na yod/_/chos dang gang zag dbye ba yis/_/bdag med rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/_/dbu ma la ni
[\[213a.5\]]'jug pa ru/_/zla grags zhabs kyis gsungs pa ni/_/bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnam grol phyir/_/chos dang gang zag dbye bas rnam gnyis gsungs/_/de nyid rnam mang phye ste slar yang ni/_/de ltar gdul bya rnams la ston pas gsungs/_/spros dang bcas nas stong pa nyid/_/bcu drug
[\[213a.6\]]bshad de mdor bsdus nas/_/slar yang bzhi ru bshad pa ste/_/de dag theg pa chen por 'dod/_/gang phyir de yi rang bzhin te/_/yin phyir mig ni mig gis stong /_/de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce/_/lus dang yid kyang brjod par bya/_/ther zug gnas min 'jig min nyid/_/nye bar bzung ba'i ngo
[\[213a.7\]]bo nyid/_/mig sogs drug po gang yin pa/_/nang stong nyid du de 'dod do/_/gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/_/yin phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_/de bzhin sgra ro dri dang chos/_/reg bya'i bar du'ang shes par bya/_/gzugs la sogs pa dngos med pa/_/phyi rol stong pa nyid du 'dod/_/
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gnyi ga'i ngo bo stong pa ni/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yin no/_/chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/mkhas pas stong pa nyid ces brjod/_/stong nyid de yang stong pa ni/_/stong pa nyid kyi ngo bor 'dod/_/stong nyid stong pa nyid brjod pa/_/stong nyid stong pa nyid 'dod de/_/stong nyid dngos po'i blo can gyi/_/'dzin
[\[213b.2\]]pa bzlog phyir gsungs pa yin/_/sems can snod kyi 'jig rten ni/_/ma lus pa la khyab byed phyir/_/tshad med dpe med mu mtha' ni/_/med phyir phyogs rnams chen po nyid/_/phyogs rnams bcu nyid 'di dag kyang /_/phyogs kyi stong pa nyid de ni/_/chen po stong pa nyid du gsungs/_/chen por
[\[213b.3\]]'dzin pa bzlog phyir ro/_/de ni dgos pa mchog yin phyir/_/don dam mya ngan 'das pa yin/_/de ni de yis stong nyid gang /_/de ni don dam stong nyid de/_/myang 'das dngos blo can rnams kyi/_/dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/don dam pa yi stong pa nyid/_/don dam mkhyen pas gsungs pa
[\[213b.4\]]yin/_/rkyen las byung phyir khams gsum po/_/'dus byas yin par nges par brjod/_/de ni de yis stong nyid gang /_/de ni 'dus byas stong nyid gsungs/_/gang la skye gnas mi rtag nyid/_/de dag med pa 'dus ma byas/_/de ni de yis stong nyid gang /_/'dus ma byas stong nyid du gsungs/_/gang
[\[213b.5\]]la mtha' ni yod min pa/_/de ni mtha' las 'das par brjod/_/de ni de nyid kyis stong nyid/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid brjod/_/thog ma dang po tha ma mtha'/_/de dag med pas 'khor ba ni/_/thog ma tha ma med par brjod/_/'gro 'ong bral phyir rmi lam lta'i/_/srid 'di de yis dben nyid
[\[213b.6\]]gang /_/de ni thog ma dang tha ma/_/med pa stong pa nyid do zhes/_/bstan bcos las ni nges par brjod/_/dor ba zhes bya bkram pa de/_/btang ba la ni nges par brjod/_/de spangs dor ba med pa ste/_/'ga' yang btang med gang de ni/_/dor ba med pa de nyid kyis/_/de nyid stong pa nyid gang
[\[213b.7\]]yin/_/de phyir de la dor ba med/_/stong pa nyid ces nges par brjod/_/slob ma rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/'dus byas sogs kyi ngo bo nyid/_/gang phyir ma byas de phyir ni/_/'dus byas sogs kyi ngo bo nyid/_/rang bzhin du ni brjod pa ste/_/
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]de nyid kyis de stong nyid gang /_/de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/bco brgyad khams dang reg pa drug_/de las skyes pa'i tshor ba drug_/gzugs can gzugs can min pa'i chos/_/de bzhin 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/_/gang yin de dag des dben phyir/_/chos rnams thams cad
[\[214a.2\]]stong pa nyid/_/gzugs la sogs pa dngos med gang /_/de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/_/gzugs ni gzugs rung mtshan nyid de/_/tshor ba myong ba'i mtshan nyid can/_/'du shes mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/_/'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa/_/yul rnams so sor rig pa ni/_/rnam shes
[\[214a.3\]]rang gi mtshan nyid do/_/phung po'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal te/_/khams kyi mtshan nyid sbrul gdug 'dod/_/skye ba'i sgor gyur skye mched de/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis skye mched gsungs/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung gang yin pa/_/rkyen tshogs pa yi mtshan nyid can/_/gtong ba sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/
[\[214a.4\]]tshul khrims gdung ba med mtshan nyid/_/bzod pa khro med mtshan nyid de/_/brtson 'grus kha na ma tho med/_/bsam gtan sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/shes rab ma chags mtshan nyid can/_/pha rol phyin pa drug rnams kyi/_/mtshan nyid 'di ni bstan pa yin/_/bsam gtan rnams
[\[214a.5\]]dang tshad med rnams/_/gzhan yang gang dag gzugs med pa/_/'di dag mi 'khrugs mtshan nyid du/_/yang dag mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin/_/sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs/_/nges par 'byung byed rang mtshan nyid/_/stong pa nyid gang dben pa'i phyir/_/de yi mtshan nyid
[\[214a.6\]]dmigs med nyid/_/zhi phyir mtshan ma med pa ste/_/gsum pa'i nyid mtshan sdug bsngal dang /_/rmongs med rnam par thar pa yi/_/mtshan nyid rnam par grol ba'o/_/shin tu rnam par nges pa yi/_/ngo bor stobs rnams kyang brjod do/_/skyob pa mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/_/
[\[214a.7\]]shin tu brtan pa'i ngo bo'o/_/so so yang dag rig rnams ni/_/spobs sogs tshad med mtshan nyid can/_/'gro la phan pa nyer sgrub pa/_/byams pa chen po nges par brjod/_/sdug bsngal can rnams yongs skyob pa/_/snying rje chen po'o dga' ba ni/_/rab dga'i mtshan nyid
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]btang snyoms ni/_/ma 'dres mtshan nyid can zhes bya/_/sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/bcu dang brgyad du gang 'dod rnams/_/gang phyir ston pa des mi 'phrogs/_/de phyir mi 'phrogs mtshan nyid can/_/rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/_/mngon sum mtshan nyid
[\[214b.2\]]can du 'dod/_/gzhan ni phyogs gcig pa yin phyir/_/mngon sum zhes byar mi 'dod do/_/'dus byas mtshan nyid gang yin dang /_/'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang /_/de de kho nas stong pa nyid/_/de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/_/da ltar 'di ni mi gnas shing /_/'das dang ma
[\[214b.3\]]'ongs yod ma yin/_/gang du de dag mi dmigs pa/_/de ni mi dmigs pa zhes brjod/_/mi dmigs pa de rang ngo bo/_/de yis dben pa nyid gang de/_/ther zug gnas min 'jig min pas/_/mi dmigs zhes bya'i stong nyid do/_/sbyor ba las byung gzugs rnams med/_/dngos
[\[214b.4\]]po'i rgyan las byung ba'i phyir/_/rkyen las byung rnams de nyid kyis/_/stong pa dngos po stong pa nyid/_/dngos po'i sgra yis brjod pa ni/_/mdor bsdus phung po lnga rnams te/_/de rnams de yis stong nyid gang /_/de dngos stong pa nyid du bshad/_/mdor bsdus na ni dngos med par/_/'dus
[\[214b.5\]]ma byas chos rnams la brjod/_/de ni dngos med de stong nyid/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/_/rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med ni/_/ngo bo nyid brjod stong nyid de/_/'di ltar rang bzhin ma byas pas/_/ngo bo nyid ces bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni byung yang rung /_/ma byung yang
[\[214b.6\]]ni dngos po nyid/_/dngos po kun gyis stong pa nyid/_/gzhan gyi dngos por rab tu bsgrags/_/yang dag mtha' dang de bzhin nyid/_/gang de gzhan dngos stong pa nyid/_/shes rab pha rol phyin tshul las/_/de dag dge ni rab tu bsgrags/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug
[\[214b.7\]]pa las bdag med pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//thog ma med dang nyon mongs kyis/_/'dus byas phung po mtshan nyid de/_/thog ma med pa'i srid 'khor lor/_/rgyun du yongs su 'khor ba ste/_/dpal ldan dbyig gnyen zhabs kyis ni/_/
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]chos mngon mdzod du gsungs pa ni/_/bdag med phung po tsam nyid de/_/nyon mongs las kyis mngon 'dus byas/_/srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis ni/_/mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro/_/ji ltar 'phangs bzhin rim gyis rgyun/_/skyes nas las dang nyon mongs
[\[215a.2\]]kyis/_/'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro/_/srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med/_/de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/_/yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo/_/sngon dang phyi mar gnyis gnyis dang /_/bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la/_/sngon skabs nyon mongs ma rig pa/_/
[\[215a.3\]]'du byed dag ni sngon las kyi/_/rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin/_/ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad/_/skye mched drug dod tshun chad do/_/de ni gsum dus tshun chad do/_/reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi/_/rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do/_/tshor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni/_/longs spyod 'khrig pa'i chags
[\[215a.4\]]can gyi/_/nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/_/thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i/_/de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/las byed gang yin de srid pa/_/nying mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin/_/tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi yin/_/'di ni gnas skabs bar 'dod la/_/gtso bo'i phyir ni
[\[215a.5\]]yan lag bsgrags/_/sngon dang phyi mtha'i bar dag la/_/rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro/_/nyon mongs gsum po las gnyis so/_/bzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin/_/gnyis kyis rgyu 'bras mdor bsdus pa/_/bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las/_/nyon mongs pa las nyon
[\[215a.6\]]mongs dang /_/bya ba nyid do de las bzhi/_/de las bzhi dang nyon mongs skye/_/'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las rten 'brel gyi 'khor lo brjod pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//_//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams
[\[215a.7\]]te/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung de bzhin du/_/sdug bsngal 'di yi 'gog pa dang /_/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam/_/bden pa 'di rnams so sor yang /_/rnam pa bzhir ni nges pa ste/_/thar pa 'dod pas 'bad pa yis/_/'chad par 'gyur ba bsgom par bya/_/
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]sdug bsngal gyi ni bden pa yang /_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/_/rgyu ni rgyu dang kun 'byung dang /_/rab tu skye ba de bzhin rkyen/_/'gog pa'i 'gog dang zhi ba dang /_/gya nom pa dang nges 'byung ba'o/_/lam gyi lam dang rigs pa dang /_/sgrub dang nges par 'byin pa'o/_/
[\[215b.2\]]de ltar nyon mongs spang bya'i phyir/_/'phags pa'i bden bzhi bsgom par bya/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/_/mi rtag skye dang 'jig pa nyid/_/sdug bsngal rjes su mi mthun phyir/_/zag pa dang bcas dngos po ni/_/bdag med deng mi ldan pa'o/_/brtags pa'i chos ni stong
[\[215b.3\]]pa'o/_/rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/thar pa 'dod pas rtag shes bya/_/sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i phung po rnams/_/dga' ba'i bag chags yang dag 'byung /_/dga' la chags dang yang dag ldan/_/sred dang srid pa'i byed pa po/_/rtag tu bden pa'i lam bsgoms pas/_/'di
[\[215b.4\]]ni 'bad pas gzhom par bya/_/rgyu de sa bon chos yin phyir/_/nad dang sdug bsngal gzhi nyid do/_/sdug bsngal yang dag skye de'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung nyid shes bya/_/glo bur myong ba'i sdug bsngal la/_/'bras bu zhes ni mngon par brjod/_/rab tu skye ba 'brel sbyor nyid/_/de ni
[\[215b.5\]]sdug bsngal zug rngu'i rgyur/_/mngon par brjod bya don gyis ni/_/rkyen ni chu bo 'ching ba nyid/_/'phel ba'i rgyu ni nyon mongs rnams/_/bral ba'i sbyor ba 'gog pa'o/_/sdug bsngal phung po dang bral bas/_/zhi ba zhes su mngon par brjod/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral ba dang /_/dge dang bde
[\[215b.6\]]ba gya nom pa/_/nges par 'byung ba bdag med de/_/phan dang bde ba rjes su 'phel/_/yang na ma rig 'gog pas na/_/'gog pa yi ni bdag nyid do/_/zhi ba sdug bsngal yang dag zad/_/gya nom bde ba 'ba' zhig go/_/nges par 'byung ba stong nyid sogs/_/rnam thar bde ba'i mtshan
[\[215b.7\]]nyid do/_/bdag dang bdag gi bas stong phyir/_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/'dus byas kun gyi rgyu rnams ni/_/rnam par zhi ba mtshan ma med/_/smon pa med pa khams gsum ni/_/kun du smon pa zad pa'o/_/las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/_/dngos med mngon par 'dus ma byas/_/
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]yang na 'khor ba'i phung po rnams/_/rgyu ni zad pa 'gog pa ste/_/zhi ba chags sogs nyon mongs pa/_/mi bzad me dpung zhi ba nyid/_/gnod pa kun las nges grol zhing /_/bde ba mi zad gya nom pa'o/_/mi mthun phyogs kun nges grol ba/_/nges par 'byung bar rab tu grags/_/
[\[216a.2\]]'di yis rgyal ba'i sras rnams ni/_/de nyid don tshol byed phyir lam/_/rigs pa yang ni mi rigs pa'i/_/nyon mongs rnams kyi gnyen po ni/_/thob par byed pa sgrub pa ste/_/lam ni rnam par bsgoms pa yis/_/rtag par phyin ci log zad byed/_/chags thogs med pa'i theg pa
[\[216a.3\]]gang /_/nges 'byung yin te der 'byung ba/_/nges par 'byin pa zhes brjod de/_/srid las shin tu 'byung phyir ro/_/yang na 'gro ba'i don gyis lam/_/rigs pa sbyor bas rigs pa'o/_/yang dag par ni thob byed pa'i/_/don gyis sgrub par rab tu brjod/_/'khor ba las ni yang dag
[\[216a.4\]]par/_/'byung bas nges par 'byin pa'o/_/'di rnams bshad pa gzhan yang ni/_/rnam par gzhag pa yod mod kyi/_/gzhung bsdus pa yi phyir na 'dir/_/ma sbyar bzod pa nyid du rigs/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po ni/_/kun du de ltar rtag bsgom bya/_/'di ni nyan thos
[\[216a.5\]]rang rgyal gyi/_/byang chub lam gyi rjes 'brang ste/_/gzhan du srid mtsho'i sdug bsngal las/_/sus kyang pha rol bgrod pa med/_/'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/_/ngo bo nyid med dmigs pa nyid/_/chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/byang chub sems dpas bsgom par
[\[216a.6\]]bya/_/'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i rnam pa ni/_/rang gi rang gzhan bral ba nyid/_/ji lta bar ni gsungs pa rnams/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bsgom par bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//'on
[\[216a.7\]]kyang mi mthun phyogs dang ni/_/gnyen po'i chos rnams nges pa ni/_/dam chos mnyan las gzhan du min/_/de bas dam chos mnyan par brjod/_/nyes pa thams cad spang phyir dang /_/kun mkhyen go 'phang thob byed pa'i/_/rgyu ni dam chos nyid yin te/_/de bas 'bad pas
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'di mnyan bya/_/dam chos 'bad pas mnyan byas nas/_/yang dag bsam zhing yongs su bsgom/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol ba/_/kun gyi bdag po rgyal bar 'gyur/_/shin tu gya nom gos dang ni/_/bza' ba dang ni stan dag dang /_/bzhon pa'am ni mal cha yis/_/rang gi lus ni
[\[216b.2\]]bskyed mi bya/_/byas pa mi gzo sran mi thub/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi 'byung gnas te/_/lus ni dgra ste de don du/_/mkhas pa su zhig sdig pa byed/_/nad kun gyi rten gnod pa can/_/mi gtsang mtha' dag 'dus pa ste/_/shin tu dri nga'i bdag nyid can/_/rang dbang med pas 'jig pa'i
[\[216b.3\]]rgyu/_/glog dang mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin/_/'dod pas tshim med shes byas nas/_/mkhas pas 'di yi bsnyen bkur spang /_/de yang 'tsho ba tsam byin nas/_/'di yi yongs su bskyang bar bya/_/rang gzhan bsod nams sogs la sogs/_/bsgrub phyir legs par 'tsho bar bya/_/
