[\[216b.4\]]dam chos 'dzin lus don med du/_/sdug bsngal nyid du mi bya ste/_/lus la brten nas srid pa yi/_/rgya mtsho las ni brgal bar bya'o/_/ji srid 'chi ba ma byung zhing /_/blo ni rtogs par ma gyur pa/_/de srid blo ldan 'bad pa yis/_/yid ni chos la dga' bar gyis/_/'tsho ba thams cad brlag
[\[216b.5\]]phyir dang /_/bde ba thams cad zad bya dang /_/sdug pa kun dang bral bya'i phyir/_/'chi ba mngon par 'ong bar 'gyur/_/mchog tu mi bzad 'chi ba ni/_/thob nas shin tu bzlog dka' ste/_/de tshe chos las gzhan skyabs med/_/de bas chos la dga' bar bya/_/shi nas ngan song las skyob la/_/
[\[216b.6\]]chos las mchog ni gang yang med/_/sdug pa'i bu dang chung ma sogs/_/'brel pa yang ni shin tu ring /_/gang yang bdag dang bdag gis 'brel/_/sngon dang phyi mar gang dang ni/_/gang la yang med par bgyi yang /_/tha snyad phyir na mi rigs pa/_/de yang rang gis byas pa'i las/_/dge
[\[216b.7\]]ba'am yang na mi dge ba/_/bde dang sdug bsngal nyer spyod phyir/_/'khor dang mdza' dang mi mdza' med/_/de phyir bu dang chung ma sogs/_/shin tu zhen pa spang bar bya/_/sdang la slar yang zhe sdang spang /_/dben par chos ni bklag par bya/_/gal te 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtshos/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]'jig pa mi bzad yod na ni/_/chos kyi blo ni bya ba ste/_/'di ltar bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/gang nyid skyes pa'i skye 'gro ni/_/de nyid 'chi bar nges pa ste/_/ji ltar nyin mo'i mtha' ru ni/_/mtshan mo cis kyang 'byung ba bzhin/_/ji srid 'chi ba ma byung ba/_/de srid nyid du rab
[\[217a.2\]]'bad nas/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs te/_/chos bsam pa nyid mchog tu brjod/_/sems ni kun du dam chos la/_/mkhas pas zhen pa nyid du bya/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i yul tshogs las/_/'bad pas rab tu bzlog par bya/_/sems ni kun du rtag par ni/_/rang dag byas
[\[217a.3\]]te blo can gyis/_/sems kyi dbang du 'gro mi bya/_/sems kyi dbang gyur dmyal bar ltung /_/bzlog par dka' zhing 'khrul pa dang /_/g.yo zhing dri ma can nyid gang /_/dam chos 'dzin pas g.yo med cing /_/dri ma med par byas pa ste/_/bag chags kun dang bdud dang ni/_/mtha' dag
[\[217a.4\]]dgra ni pham byed cing /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong gi lam/_/skyes bu dam pas sbyong ba nyid/_/sems kyi dbang gis las 'byung ste/_/las kyi dbang gis 'bras bu 'byung /_/sems kyi las las yang dag 'byung /_/'khor ba zhes ni yongs su brjod/_/sdig dang bsod nams las dang
[\[217a.5\]]ni/_/de yi 'bras bu sems kyis byas/_/bde dang sdug bsngal gang cung zad/_/sems las gzhan pa'i byed po med/_/bya ba thams cad sems dbang ste/_/'bras bu'ang sems kyi dbang du shes/_/ji ltar sems ni sna tshogs pa/_/de bzhin 'bras bu yang ni shes/_/ji ltar ri mo mkhan
[\[217a.6\]]gcig gis/_/ri mo sna tshogs 'dri byed pa/_/de bzhin sems ni gcig gis kyang /_/sna tshogs srid pa'i las byed do/_/sems kyi sprul pa las yin te/_/las kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'o/_/las kyi sprul pa bsdus pas ni/_/sa gnyis po ni bsdus par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sems ni
[\[217a.7\]]sna tshogs pa/_/de las 'bras bu sna tshogs shes/_/'gro ba gsum po 'di dag kun/_/sems kyis bris pa nyid du dgongs/_/thog med ma rig pas bcings pa'i/_/sems ni 'khor bar brjod pa ste/_/de nyid 'ba' zhig dag pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das 'chi med zhi ba'o/_/
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]sems dang sems de'i sprul pa yis/_/bskyed pa yi ni khams gsum pa/_/sgyu ma lta bur rnam shes pa'i/_/blo dang ldan pa'i don dam nyid/_/des na de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/yang dag dam chos mnyan la 'bad/_/kun rtog thams cad bsdus nas ni/_/blo ldan
[\[217b.2\]]gyis ni chos don bsgoms/_/'di ltar dam chos kun la ni/_/rtag par brdzun ni mi mthun nyid/_/srid sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs 'di la/_/blo dang ldan pas de dag spang /_/bde dang mi ldan mi rnams ni/_/legs pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/'jig rten 'dir ni rtsa
[\[217b.3\]]bzhin 'gro/_/pha rol ngan 'gro sdug bsngal nyid/_/gang zhig chos la mchog rton pa/_/gang du yang ni brdzun mi smra/_/mchod 'os yid ches pa yi gnas/_/de yi ngag ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/brdzun smra ngag ni mi btsun zhing /_/shin tu skal ngan chung bar 'gyur/_/kha ni rul ba'i
[\[217b.4\]]dri ma can/_/phyis nas 'gyod pas gdungs par 'gyur/_/'di ltar bden pa nyams pa na/_/de yi chos ni shin tu ring /_/chos ni nyams par byas pa yis/_/mtha' yas sdug bsngal rim par brgyud/_/ji tsam bsod nams ye shes tshogs/_/rtsa ba bden pa mchog tu 'dod/_/de
[\[217b.5\]]las bzlog pa skyon du bzhed/_/bden pa mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/_/gzhan nas bden pa btsal mi bya/_/yul gzhan du ni 'gro mi dgos/_/'jug ngogs rnams las 'jug ngogs mchog_/chu yis bkang ba 'jug ngogs yin/_/sgron ma'i nang na sgron mchog tu/_/bden pa sangs rgyas
[\[217b.6\]]rnams kyis gsungs/_/sman gyi nang na de mchog ste/_/sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/_/bden pa gnyis don 'di nyid du/_/dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/bden pa smra ba thob gyur pa/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o/_/brdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub dang /_/ngag
[\[217b.7\]]'khyal pa ni smra ba ste/_/dmyal ba'i me dang khyad med pa'i/_/ngag skyon de dag spang bar bya/_/bden dang phan dang yid tshim dang /_/rgya chen don ni tshig nyung ba/_/skabs dang legs par 'brel ba dang /_/brjod bya 'jam por smra bar bya/_/chog shes pa dang rgyags min dang /_/sems can kun la
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]phan 'dod cing /_/chags dang zhe sdang rnam grol ba'i/_/bya ba sgrub par nges par gnas/_/mdza' dang mi mdza' dbye ba med/_/sems snyoms pa yi lus can ni/_/ngan song las ni rnam grol zhing /_/bsam pa'i don ni rab sgrub 'gyur/_/sdom la gnas shing zhi ba
[\[218a.2\]]dang /_/bla ma mchod la dga' ba dang /_/bya dang bya min cho ga shes/_/nan tan don ni rab tu 'grub/_/g.yo med shin tu brtson pa dang /_/rtag par ngag ni yid 'ong dang /_/bsam gtan kha ton la chags pa'i/_/bya ba 'grub pa ring ba min/_/yul dang dus dang cho ga shes/_/sgrub dang
[\[218a.3\]]sgrub min bye brag shes/_/nus pa dang ni thabs dang ldan/_/dngos grub thams cad nye bar gnas/_/gzhan yang mi khros khro ba 'joms/_/bzod pas mi bzod yid 'joms te/_/chos kyis chos min nges par 'joms/_/'od zer gyis ni mun pa 'joms/_/brdzun gyi tshig ni bden
[\[218a.4\]]pas 'joms/_/phra ma ting nge 'dzin gyis te/_/tshig rtsub 'jam pa'i sems kyis so/_/ngag 'khyal phan par smra nyid kyis/_/gsod pa byams pa bsgoms pas te/_/rku ba sbyin pas rtag tu rgyal/_/tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed pa/_/de kho na nyid bsgoms pas 'joms/_/ji ltar nyi
[\[218a.5\]]mas mtshan mo bzhin/_/ma rig rig pas nges par 'joms/_/dkar po'i phyogs kyis nag po yi/_/phyogs ni 'joms pa de bzhin du/_/'dod log spyod dang 'dod pa rnams/_/blo yis de nyid brtags pas so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa'i lam gyis ni/_/lam ngan pa rnams rtag par
[\[218a.6\]]'joms/_/mi 'jigs bzhi po de dag gis/_/nyam nga ba ni legs par spang /_/brjed ngas spong ba dran pa ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes spong /_/me yis shing la byed bzhin du/_/yang dag gis 'joms yang dag min/_/'jig tshogs la ni lta ba kun/_/stong nyid bsgoms pas
[\[218a.7\]]'joms pa'o/_/rtag par 'dzin pa rab 'joms pa/_/skad cig 'jig par bsgoms pas so/_/le lo'i gti mug 'phel ba kun/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni 'joms pa'o/_/ye shes lhag ldan rtag par dul/_/skyes bu de nyid smra ba yis/_/brdzun smra ma rungs las can gyi/_/mi
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]rnams nges par 'joms pa'o/_/mu stegs gya gyu'i bsam can kun/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni pham par mdzad/_/lha min lha yis pham pa ste/_/chos nyid kyis ni gnas pa yin/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la sogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
[\[218b.2\]]pa'o//_//chags pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/sbyin pa btang ste rnam pa bzhi/_/zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni/_/byams par brjod de la lar gsum/_/ji srid gang du chags gyur pa/_/de srid 'khor ba'i 'ching ba ste/_/chags pa thams cad spang don du/_/'di ltar sbyin pa sbyin
[\[218b.3\]]par bya/_/gang zhig phyug dang dbang phyug dang /_/nad med pa dang rgyal po ni/_/stobs kun dang ni ldan pa dang /_/skal bzang tshe ring gyur pa ni/_/de ni sbyin pa las byung 'bras/_/lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi/_/rab tu sbyin pa stobs kyi mchog_/sbyin dang mi ldan ngan 'gror ltung /_/skyes bu kun gyi tha
[\[218b.4\]]ma'o/_/'dod dang ser snas bcings pa rnams/_/bu dang chung ma'i dbang du 'gro/_/bza' ba 'ba' zhig 'dod pas ni/_/mi dag brlag nas 'gro ba ste/_/'dod pas bcings pa dgrol phyir dang /_/nga rgyal shing ni zad bya dang /_/sdig pa'i phung po gzhom bya la/_/rab tu sbyin pa stobs kyi mchog_/
[\[218b.5\]]sbyin pa mdun nas 'gro ba ste/_/sbyin pa po ni de rjes 'gro/_/lam ston pa ni sbyin pa'o/_/'jig rten pha rol rab 'gro ba'i/_/sbyin pa'i chu yis ma bkrus nas/_/tshul khrims rlabs kyis yongs bsgos te/_/ye shes kyis brgal dri ma med/_/sdug bsngal pha rol rab tu 'gro/_/skyes bu phan
[\[218b.6\]]par 'dod pa yis/_/sgron ma gsum ni rab bsten bya/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims ye shes te/_/'di dag skyon rnams sel byed pa'o/_/sbyin pa ma byas ngo tsha yis/_/nyon mongs skyon gyis bslus pa rnams/_/lhar skyes nas kyang dman 'gyur te/_/de phyir sbyin pa mchog tu 'gyur/_/sbyin pa'i rim gyis
[\[218b.7\]]'phel ldan pas/_/ser sna'i stobs ni spangs pa rnams/_/lha yi rtsed mo la gzhol zhing /_/sems ni tshim pa nyid du 'gyur/_/yi dgas yang dag rab gzir ba'i/_/bkres skom rang bzhin me gang yin/_/ser sna dgra yi 'bras bur ni/_/thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs/_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]snying rje'i mchog ldan gang zhig ni/_/sdug bsngal can la bde sbyin pa/_/sbyin pas de la bde bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sbyin pa rab tu bsngags/_/sbyin pa 'jig rten sgron ma byed/_/gang du 'gro ba'i rjes su 'gro/_/nyes pa zad pa'i tshig gi gnas/_/de bzhin
[\[219a.2\]]gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs/_/ser sna'i sgra ni nges bcom par/_/byas nas sems ni legs bsgoms te/_/gang zhig sbyin pa rab gtong ba/_/de ni srid pa'i mtsho las brgal/_/dang po rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin/_/'bad pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/_/sred pa ye shes kyis gzhom bya/_/
[\[219a.3\]]lam 'di bde bar 'jug pa'i lam/_/ser sna dang ni ldan pa'i sems/_/rtog par kun du de gzhom bya/_/bdag med bsgoms pa goms pa yis/_/chags pa thams cad gzhom par bya/_/sbyin pa ma btang bkres skom gyis/_/yi dgas gnas su gdung bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pas chos dang ldan pa yi/_/'khor
[\[219a.4\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/sbyin pa'i sa la brten nas ni/_/tshul khrims srung rnams mkhas pa yin/_/tshul khrims ldan pa dus kyis ni/_/ye shes kyis ni yongs su grol/_/sdug bsngal nges 'byung lam du ni/_/'di ni thob pa rnams kyis bsngags/_/de ltar rig nas mkhas pas ni/_/
[\[219a.5\]]rtag tu sbyin pa dga' bar bya/_/sngon du bag med spyad pa gang /_/sbyin pa la sogs ma spel ba/_/phyi nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_/de ni rang sems gdung bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pa byed mi nor de ni/_/rtag par longs ni mi spyod pa/_/'bad pas yongs su bsrungs pa yis/_/nor de rnams ni chud zos 'gyur/_/
[\[219a.6\]]bla ma'i tshogs la sbyin pa'i phyir/_/rtag tu nor ni spyod byed pa'i/_/nor de mdzes par lta ba yin/_/de las bzlog pa rtswa dang mtshungs/_/stobs chung ba dang dul rnams la/_/sdig dang ma 'dres sbyin byin na/_/sems can rnams kyi mig ji bzhin/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/sbyin pa mi yi
[\[219a.7\]]'jig rten du/_/byin pas dge bar 'gro ba'o/_/lha rnams sbyin pa mi gtong ste/_/'di ni 'bras bu'i sa ru 'dod/_/mi rnams las kyis yin te/_/lha rnams 'bras bu'i sa yin no/_/las kyi dbang gis 'bras bu ste/_/rgyu med pa las 'bras bu yin/_/bsam gtan dang ni nyan pa spangs/_/
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sbyin dang tshul khrims rnams spang zhing /_/rtsod dang rtsub dang rmongs pa yin/_/gson yang shi dang mtshungs pa'o/_/gang zhig chos kyi rjes 'brang na/_/'jig rten 'dir ni srog dang bcas/_/rang gis thams cad rab byin pas/_/rtag par sems can don bya ste/_/sems can la gnod
[\[219b.2\]]sbyin pa ni/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis mi bya'o/_/'jigs dang skrag dang ngo tshas min/_/lan la re bas sbyin mi bya/_/lhag bsam ma yin g.yo dang sgyu/_/rgyags dang bcas pas mi sbyin no/_/de yi 'bras bu spyod 'dod dang /_/brdzun dang rgod pa'i sems kyis min/_/bdag bstod pa dang gzhan smod
[\[219b.3\]]dang /_/khro dang zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/yid la gcags dang 'gyod pa dang /_/grags dang bde ba'i 'dun pas min/_/de ni sbyin pa byas nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bsngo/_/khams gsum kun du khyab pa yi/_/bdag med pa ni yongs su bsgom/_/rgyu mthun 'bras bu rnam grol te/_/
[\[219b.4\]]bdud kyi 'jigs pa kun bzlog pa'o/_/gcig tu ma nges kun khyab pa/_/sems can thams cad nyer 'gro ba'i/_/rnam thar bzhi ni yang dag pa'i/_/tshangs gnas bzhi po bsgom par bya/_/nyon mongs kun dang bral byed cing /_/khyad par 'gro ba'i gzhung lam ste/_/mtha' med chad pa med pa yi/_/kun
[\[219b.5\]]mkhyen ye shes byed pas so/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i skyon bral zhing /_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i yon tan ldan/_/sbyin pa de ni mi zad de/_/mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shigs so/_/rgya mtsho chen por chu 'khyor gang /_/blugs pa mi zad ji bzhin no/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i gtam mo/_/bde ba thams cad thob
[\[219b.6\]]bya dang /_/sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/_/mtho ris tshogs kyi byed pa po/_/tshul khrims rtag par bsrung bar bya/_/sdom dang sems can don kun byed/_/dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/tshul khrims rnam pa gsum du grags/_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyis gsal bar gsungs/_/nor gyi nang na tshul
[\[219b.7\]]khrims mchog_/'od nang nyi ma ji bzhin no/_/nor de spangs nas 'gro ba ste/_/tshul khrims nyid ni mdun nas 'gro/_/ji ltar nyi mas mun 'joms pa/_/de bzhin tshul khrims sdug bsngal 'joms/_/mtho ris tshogs kyi lam bzang po/_/skyong zhing 'jigs pa sel bar byed/_/srid pa'i longs spyod
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]phyir phyogs phyir/_/tshul khrims de ni mchog tu bsrung /_/de nyid 'jig rten phyi mar yang /_/tshul khrims nyid ni nges rten 'byung /_/tshul khrims kyis ni 'dir yang skyob/_/pha rol du yang ngan song sbyong /_/tshul khrims bde 'gro'i skas yin no/_/de bas tshul khrims lhag par
[\[220a.2\]]spyod/_/tshul khrims mi zad mdzod du 'gyur/_/tshul khrims mi zad bde ba'o/_/rgyal po chom rkun chu sogs kyis/_/tshul khrims nor ni 'phrog mi nus/_/khrims kyis lus sogs dge las rnams/_/nyon mongs med pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur/_/snyan dang skal bzang mchog tu bde/_/bag yod shin tu 'od bzang dang /_/dri med srid la
[\[220a.3\]]chags bral sogs/_/tshul khrims sangs rgyas kyis rab bsngags/_/'khor ba kun gyi spyod pa las/_/zhi dben thob par bya phyir ro/_/tshul khrims dam pa'i gos gyon pa/_/ngo tsha dang bcas skyes bu mchog_/gzhan du gcer bur tha ma ste/_/dud 'gro dang mtshungs ngo tsha
[\[220a.4\]]bral/_/yan lag lnga yi sgo nas ni/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag bya ste/_/bla mar gus shing nyan par 'dod/_/dad pa shin tu bskyed par bya/_/kha na ma tho rdul tsam gyi/_/'jigs pas ma sbags tshul khrims so/_/theg pa gzhan la ma brten pas/_/ma nyams pa yi tshul khrims nyid/_/ma
[\[220a.5\]]rungs mi bzad mi skye ba/_/skyon med pa yi tshul khrims nyid/_/nyon mongs skye bos ma bcings pa/_/de bzhin ma 'dres tshul khrims nyid/_/dben zhing lhad ma zhugs pa'i phyir/_/dkar po'i chos ni rnam 'phel nyid/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro ba'i phyir/_/smin pa yi ni tshul khrims nyid/_/mkhas
[\[220a.6\]]pas rab tu bsngags pa ni/_/kun la yang dag bsngags pa'o/_/kun nas kha na ma thob/_/med phyir ma smad par brjod do/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de/_/rnam gar gzigs nas rab tu bsgrags/_/de dag la sogs rnam pa ni/_/drug cu rtsa lnga dag pa ni/_/tshul khrims phung po rnam par
[\[220a.7\]]dag_/'gyur zhing yongs su mi zad brjod/_/gzhung bsdus phyir na bdag gis ni/_/de dag thams cad ma bsdus so/_/tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rab rib kyis/_/bag med pa ni rnam par spyod/_/sdig pa byed cing ngan 'gro cher/_/rab tu lhung zhing 'jigs chen myong /_/de bas kun du rab
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'bad pas/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis tshul khrims bsrung /_/chos kun bdag med rnam bsgoms pas/_/theg pa chen po'i rjes su 'gro/_/srid pa'i longs spyod ma lus pa'i/_/gzung yul lus la sogs pa sdom/_/tshul khrims phung po rnam dag pas/_/rang bzhin med pa gsal bar ldan/_/
[\[220b.2\]]de nyid rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu/_/don ni thams cad sgrub pa po/_/de ni dpag med rnam pa ste/_/de ltar mdo ru bsdus te brjod/_/de bas kun du rtog pa kun/_/rab tu bsdus la goms bya ste/_/gang phyir tshul khrims kun gyi ni/_/spros rnams 'dir ni 'dus 'gyur ba'o/_/de ni tshul khrims kyi gtam mo/_/
[\[220b.3\]]khro ba'i me ni bzod dka' bas/_/bsod nams ljon shing kun rlag byed/_/rang bzhin lus sogs spong gdung ba/_/skal ba ngan pa'i rgyu gcig po/_/zhe sdang las skyes khro ba dang /_/'khon du 'dzin pa dgra chen po/_/gang zhig khong khro la sogs kyis/_/dbang phyug gzhan la gnod byed de/_/gzhan gnod
[\[220b.4\]]las skyes sdug bsngal ni/_/mi bzad shin tu bzod par dka'/_/de ni sna tshogs tshul gyis ni/_/'bad pas bzod pa bsgom par bya/_/dpal ldan zhi ba lhas gsungs pa/_/zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig pa med/_/bzod pa lta bu'i dka' thub med/_/de bas bzod la nan tan du/_/sna tshogs tshul gyis bsgom
[\[220b.5\]]par bya/_/bde gshegs sras kyis gshe ba la/_/slar yang gshe bar mi bya ste/_/sgra rnams sgra brnyan lta bur ni/_/yang dang yang du bsam par bya/_/rdeg pa la ni slar yang ni/_/'dis ni brdeg par mi bya ste/_/lus ni gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par/_/mkhas pas yun
[\[220b.6\]]ring yang dag bsam/_/khros la khro bar mi bya ste/_/sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs zhes/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis ni/_/don dam pa la dmigs pas kyang /_/shin tu bzod pa 'byung ba yin/_/de yang chos rnams kun gyi ni/_/rang bzhin rnam par rigs pa yis/_/ngo bo nyid med
[\[220b.7\]]la bzod pa/_/mchog gi bzod pa skye bar 'gyur/_/bzod pa khro ba'i sbrul gyi ni/_/nam mkha' lding gi gsang sngags mchog_/khong khro'i rab rib mun pa ni/_/sel ba'i sman mchog bzod pa'o/_/dam chos nor ni nyams pa yis/_/'khor ba'i 'gro ba lnga po la/_/gang dag
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]bzod nor rang bzhin can/_/sems can de rnams phyug por shes/_/skyes bu rnams la thar pa ston/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs pa sel ba po/_/mtho ris skyabs su gyur pa de/_/dmyal ba'i me ni rlag byed pa'o/_/bdud dgra kun gyi dpung stobs ni/_/rab tu 'joms byed rgyu
[\[221a.2\]]yi mchog_/zhe sdang sogs kyi gnyen por ni/_/mkhas pas rtag tu bzod bsgom bya/_/sdug bsngal lhag bzod chos la ni/_/nges par sems pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/gzhan gyi gnod pa ji mi snyam/_/zhes bya bzod pa gsum du brjod/_/de bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las/_/'gro ba bsgral bar
[\[221a.3\]]'dod pa nyid/_/gzings dang 'dra ba'i bzod pa ni/_/bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsgom/_/'di ni bzod pa'i gtam mo/_/skyes bu kun gyis yang dag don/_/'grub pa'i rgyu yi brtson 'grus brtsam/_/kun du brtson 'grus nyid med na/_/'dod pa cung zad mi 'grub ste/_/le lo dang ni gnod spro
[\[221a.4\]]dang /_/yi chad dang ni cung zad chog_/mi mthun phyogs te gzhom pa'i phyir/_/'di ltar brtson 'grus rnam bsgom bya/_/brtson 'grus brgyad ni yang dag par/_/blang bar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/de las cung zhig yang dag drangs/_/mdor bsdus nas ni mngon par brjod/_/byang chub sems
[\[221a.5\]]dpa'i go cha dang /_/gzhan don sogs la mchog 'gro dang /_/yang dag rnyed dang 'gro ba smin/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs mchog dang /_/shes rab ces bya nyid kyi tshogs/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos/_/yang dag blangs pa'i bsod nams tshogs/_/mi zad par ni yongs su brjod/_/
[\[221a.6\]]de la go cha mi zad pa/_/de ni bskal pa la sogs pa/_/grangs med 'khor bar mi skyo nyid/_/sems can kun gyi rgyu yin phyir/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs gang yin/_/pha rol phyin pa mngon rdzogs byed/_/yang dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dam chos nyan dang 'dzin la sogs/_/
[\[221a.7\]]dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la/_/mchod dang nye bar gnas pa sogs/_/'di dag mi zad go cha ste/_/bskal pa la sogs grangs med pa'o/_/'di lta'i bya ba rnams la ni/_/rab tu spro te nam mkha' bzhin/_/bskal pa'i sa mtshams yangs pa 'di/_/byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]brjod pa'o/_/go cha'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni blta phyir dang /_/dam pa'i chos ni mnyan phyir dang /_/sems can yongs smin bya phyir dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa thob bya'i phyir/_/khor yug chen po'i bar du ni/_/sa mtshams med par me mdag khengs/_/
[\[221b.2\]]'jig rten khams su 'jug 'gro yang /_/yang dag spro ba brtan pa ste/_/rtag par brtson pa gzhan don phyir/_/'gro de mchog tu 'gro ba'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la byang chub sems/_/bsgom bya gsungs pa'i rim pas so/_/mchog tu 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/gang
[\[221b.3\]]dag cung zad blangs pa yi/_/bsod nams tshogs de bsngo bar bya/_/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bzhin du/_/byang chub bsngos de mi zad gsungs/_/sems can rnams ni byang chub la/_/dgod pa'i phyir ni yongs su bsngo/_/mi zad yang dag thob pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpas shes
[\[221b.4\]]par bya/_/yang dag rnyed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/nyi ma re rer stong gsum gyi/_/stong chen du ni gtogs pa yi/_/'jig rten khams ni ji snyed pa/_/sems can gnas pa de yang ni/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis sangs rgyas ni/_/nyid du thub sras yongs smin byed/_/'di ltar rim pas
[\[221b.5\]]bskal pa ni/_/grangs med bye ba brgyar yang ngo /_/de lta mod kyi sems can khams/_/mtha' yas grangs med sa yi ni/_/stong gi cha yi cha gcig kyang /_/de ni yongs su smin ma gyur/_/rjes bstan 'di ltar thos nas kyang /_/de las mchog tu spro ba thob/_/mi zad yongs su smin pa ni/_/byang chub
[\[221b.6\]]sems dpa' yin par brjod/_'gro ba smin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i/_/'jig rten gsum na gnas pa yi/_/sems can de dag kun dang yang /_/slob pa rnams dang byang sems dang /_/bse ru nyan thos byang chub ni/_/dus gsum bzhugs pa de kun gyi/_/
[\[221b.7\]]bsod nams tshad ni ji tsam pa/_/de tsam bsod nams bcu 'gyur du/_/bsags pa yi ni thub pa yi/_/ba spu'i bu ga gcig skye'o/_/de ltar ba spu'i bu ga rnams/_/thams cad skye ba'i dge ba yis/_/bsod nams brgya 'gyur dag las ni/_/dpe byad gcig ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/dpe byad
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]thams cad bsdus pa yi/_/bsod nams phung pos mtshan yin te/_/stong phrag gcig tu bsdoms pas ni/_/mtshan rnams kun gyi rgyu yin no/_/stong phrag bcu ni bsdoms pa yis/_/thub pa'i mdzod spu gcig yin no/_/mdzod spu'i dge ba'i phung po ni/_/'bum gyis gtsug tor
[\[222a.2\]]'byung ba'o/_/bsod nams 'bum de bye bas ni/_/chos kyi dung ni rab tu skye/_/mi bzad pa yi bsod nams tshogs/_/brtson chen thub pas gsungs pa nyid/_/de snyed pa ni cher spro ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' la skye'o/_/bsod nams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/stong gsum 'jig rten khams kyi ni/_/
[\[222a.3\]]sems can dang rjes 'brang gyur par/_/yongs su brtag pa nyer bzung ste/_/thams cad 'di ltar gyur kyang ni/_/chos kyi rjes 'brang rtogs pa yi/_/cha dang dpe yis bstan mi bzod/_/de bzhin du ni ji srid du/_/sa bcu'i ye shes thob pa yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang ni/_/gnas min mkhyen
[\[222a.4\]]pa'i stobs kyi ni/_/de dag kun gyis cha dang ni/_/dpe bstan par yang nye mi 'gyur/_/de ltar me bzhin sangs rgyas chos/_/ma 'dres pa ni thams cad la/_/'jug cing de rnams la yang ni/_/cher spro ba yang mi zad pa'o/_/de yang ye shes tshogs kyi ni/_/brtson 'grus brtson pa brjod pa nyid/_/
[\[222a.5\]]'di dag byang sems ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod yul min/_/ye shes kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/rgya chen nam mkha' kun gnas pa'i/_/dus gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa ni/_/gang gis kun du shes 'gyur ba/_/de ltar shes rab
[\[222a.6\]]kyi ni tshogs/_/blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/thob par bya ba de ni yang /_/spro ba chen po skye bar 'gyur/_/shes rab kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gang ni/_/byang chub sems la sogs bsdus pa/_/sems ni dang po nas brtsams nas/_/byang chub snying
[\[222a.7\]]po yi ni bar/_/bsags te yang dag gzung rnams dang /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kun/_/yang dag blangs pa'i tshogs de ni/_/mi zad yang dag blangs par brjod/_/yang dag blangs pa'i tshig gis so/_/brtson 'grus 'di kun mtha' dag la/_/chos kyi bdag med
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]bsgoms pa nyid/_/nam mkha' bzhin du rnam dag 'gyur/_/gzhan du lta ba ldan pas min/_/'gro kun ngo bo nyid med pas/_/dbang po drug ni rab bsdus nas/_/zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/'di de rtag par bsgoms pa'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam mo/_/
[\[222b.2\]]skyon rnams sel ba'i bsam gtan dang /_/de bzhin gnas pa'i bsam gtan mchog_/dbang sbyor dang gsum shes par bya/_/tshangs pa'i bde ba rab bsgrub pa'o/_/rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang /_/bde dang rtse gcig sems dang ni/_/yan lag lnga po 'di dag ldan/_/
[\[222b.3\]]bsam gtan dang po rab tu skye/_/nad ni yongs su dang ba dang /_/dga' dang bde ba rtse gcig sems/_/rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ldan/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la gnas gsungs/_/btang snyoms dang ni dran pa dang /_/shes bzhin bde ba rtse gcig sems/_/yan lag lnga
[\[222b.4\]]po 'di dag ldan/_/bsam gtan gsum pa nyid du 'gyur/_/btang snyoms dran ldan sdug bsngal min/_/bde min pa ni myong ba ste/_/rtse gcig sems ldan yan lag ni/_/bzhi ldan bsam gtan tha ma'o/_/yang na gzugs sogs spyod yul gyis/_/g.yeng byed 'dod pa'i sdig
[\[222b.5\]]chos ni/_/bzod dka' de rnams spangs pa yis/_/dben pa'i bsam gtan dang po ste/_/rtog dang dpyod pa gnyis po yis/_/shin tu dben pa las skyes pa'i/_/dga' dang bde ba mtshungs ldan pa/_/bsam gtan dang po mnyam par gzhag_/bsam gtan dang po'i rjes mthun gang /_/rtog pa nye bar brtags pa dang /_/shes
[\[222b.6\]]dang mthong dang dpyod pa nyid/_/don gcig pa yi tshig rnams so/_/brtags pa de nyid la dpyod dang /_/yongs su sbyor dang rjes su 'gro/_/'jug dang rnam dpyod kyang don gcig_/gnas pa nye bar rdzogs pa ste/_/yang dag myong ba legs skyong ba'o/_/de la gnas nas mthong ba'i lam/_/
[\[222b.7\]]thob par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa 'thob/_/mthong lam 'dun pa thob nas ni/_/sngar gyi bsam gtan la mi chags/_/dngos po las ni khyad 'phags pa'i/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa tshol bar byed/_/rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa yi/_/sgrib pa rab tu 'joms pa yis/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa thob
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]pa ni/_/nang yang dang zhing sems kyi rgyun/_/gcig tu gyur pa'i blo de ni/_/dga' zhing bde ba'i bdag nyid do/_/rtog dpyod nye bar zhi ba dang /_/nang ni yongs su dang bar 'gyur/_/rgyun ni gcig tu 'gyur zhes pa/_/'di yang ro mnyam gyur pa yi/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bzhin du/_/
[\[223a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi ro gcig 'gyur/_/dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la ste/_/de phyir de ni dben skyes bde/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa thob nas ni/_/de la gnas na slar yang ni/_/mi skye'i chos la bzod pa ni/_/thob par bya phyir thams cad du/_/'dun pa skye bo de nas ni/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa yis
[\[223a.3\]]skyo nas/_/bsam gtan de bas bla med pa'i/_/bsam gtan gsum pa de tshol byed/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sgrib pa ni/_/dga' ba yin te de spangs nas/_/bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa ni/_/de bzhin dga' med bde ba'o/_/de bas bsam du med 'di dag_/dga' ba med pa'i bde ba brjod/_/
[\[223a.4\]]'di dag mchog gyur ma yin te/_/zad pa'i chos phyir de las yang /_/mi skye'i chos la bzod pa ni/_/thob par bya phyir de bzhin du/_/'dun pa drag mchog mi zad pa/_/blo ldan rnams la skye ba nyid/_/de ni bde yang ma chags pas/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa thob 'gyur te/_/btang
[\[223a.5\]]snyoms dran pa yongs su dag_/sdug min bde min zhi ba'o/_/bsam gtan 'di dag snyoms 'jug pas/_/de yi sems ni 'jam par 'gyur/_/dga' zhing shin tu dul ba ste/_/brtan zhing drang la 'od gsal ba/_/lus can rnams kyi phan bde ba/_/skyed la rab tu zhugs pa
[\[223a.6\]]yi/_/skye ba med pa'i chos la ni/_/bzod pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur/_/de nas mchog tu lhun grub cing /_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i lam la 'jug_/nyan thos la sogs lam dang ni/_/bsam gtan thun mong pa ru brjod/_/zag med rnam pa bcu drug rnams/_/byang chub sems
[\[223a.7\]]dpa'i ma 'dres pa'o/_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin gsungs pa/_/nyan thos sogs kyi spyod yul min/_/gzhung ni yang dag bsdus pa'i phyir/_/'dir ni lung las ma sdebs so/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi gtam mo/_/thos bsam bsgom las 'khrungs pa yi/_/shes rab
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]gsal ba thar pa'i blo/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bcom pas/_/gnyis med ye shes snang ba ste/_/gcig dang du ma las nges grol/_/dngos dang dngos min rnam par spangs/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu las 'das pa/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid las grol ba/_/dus gsum khams gsum
[\[223b.2\]]shin tu 'das/_/kun rtog rten ni nges par spangs/_/spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba ste/_/dag cing shin tu dri ma med/_/gnod pa med cing yang dag gnod/_/don dam pa yi ngo bo nyid/_/ma lus chos kyi bdag med kyi/_/ye shes shes rab 'bras bu'i bdag_/'di ni shes rab kyi gtam mo/_/rang
[\[223b.3\]]gi skyon ni gzhom pa dang /_/sems can thams cad lam gzhug dang /_/myur du bde ba mngon rtogs byed/_/thabs ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod/_/'di ni thabs kyi gtam mo/_/smon lam dbye ba gsum zhes pa/_/rang gi tshogs rgyun mi 'chad dang /_/'gro ba'i don gyi rgyu dang
[\[223b.4\]]ni/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyong ba'o/_/zhes pa ni smon lam gyi gtam mo/_/las kyis zlog par byed pa dang /_/nyon mongs pa ni sel ba dang /_/rgol ba dang ni bdud dgra kun/_/bzlog pa'i stobs dang gsum zhes gsungs/_/zhes pa ni stobs kyi gtam mo/_/rtog dang rtog med mnyam
[\[223b.5\]]nyid du/_/snang dang rnam par mi rtog dang /_/sems can don thabs nges snang [(]te [,]ste[)]/_/ye shes gsum du dbye ba'o/_/zhes pa ni ye shes kyi gtam mo/_/sbyin pa la sogs 'di dag rnams/_/byang chub sems ni sngon 'gro bas/_/byams pa'i bsam pa mngon bsgoms rnams/_/slar yang
[\[223b.6\]]phar phyin 'jig rten pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams so/_/dmigs pa'i yul ni gsum po rnams/_/chos kyi bdag med bsgoms pa yis/_/de rnams 'jig rten 'das par shes/_/de nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so/_/byams pa'i bsam
[\[223b.7\]]pa khyad med kyang /_/chos kyi bdag med dang ldan pa'i/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs rnams/_/yongs su dag pa'i khyad par ro/_/'di ni sa rnams kyi khyad par gyi rgyu'o/_/sbyin pas rab dga'i rnal 'byor te/_/tshul khrims ldan pas dri med 'gyur/_/bzod pas 'od byed brtson 'grus
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]kyis/_/'od 'phro 'di ni bsod nams ldan/_/bsod nams las ni sbyang dka' ba/_/shes rab kyis ni mngon 'gyur mthong /_/ring du song ba thabs chen pos/_/stobs dang ldan las mi g.yor 'gyur/_/smon lam gyis ni legs blo can/_/ye shes ldan pas chos kyi sprin/_/
[\[224a.2\]]pha rol phyin pa bcu pa ni/_/dag pa'i rim pas sa bcu'o/_/gzhan yang 'dir/_las kyi rdzu 'phrul sems dang tshe/_/bsod nams ye shes yo byad dang /_/chos dang ye shes dbang phyug nyid/_/stobs kyang bcu ste nan tan dang /_/spobs dang dad dang thos dang bsgom/_/yang dag so sor brtags
[\[224a.3\]]pa dang /_/bsod nams ye shes bzod pa'o/_/'di ni dbang bcu dang stobs bcu dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/_/sa 'di rnams kyi dmigs pa ni/_/khyad par med de stong nyid do/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med kyi/_/mtshan nyid de
[\[224a.4\]]bzhin gnyis med pa'o/_/de dang de yi rtog pa ni/_/gzhom phyir de yi ngo bo dgongs/_/dngos su rtog pa'i dbye ba yis/_/rnam pa mtha' yas rnam par smin/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las pha rol du phyin pa bcu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//
[\[224a.5\]]blang bya dang ni dor bya'i tshig_/'di ni mngon du shes dang ni/_/da dung ye shes sar 'jug phyir/_/cho ga yang dag rab bstan bya/_/de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang /_/dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa ste/_/de la chags can mi sdug pas/_/chags pa yongs su zad par byed/_/chags pa kha dog dbyibs
[\[224a.6\]]dang ni/_/reg bya dri sogs yul yin no/_/mi sdug goms pas de zad de/_/zhi gnas yang dag 'byung ba'o/_/rang lus sha dang rul dang zags/_/rus pa'i dra ba tsam du bsam/_/de ni rim pas 'phel nas ni/_/sa ni gang ba nyid du lta/_/dad mos 'phel phyir 'di gsungs te/_/slar yang
[\[224a.7\]]de bzhin bsdus nas ni/_/rang nyid la ni bsgom bya ste/_/rus pa yi ni lug brgyud du'o/_/bsgoms pa'i dngos po gsal ba na/_/las dang po ni rdzogs pa'o/_/keng rus dang ni thod phyed par/_/btang bas sbyang ba byas par bshad/_/shin tu 'das nas yid byed pa/_/smin mtshams
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dkyil du sems bzung bya/_/rnam par spel dang bsdu ba yi/_/rim pa nyid ni rnam par bsgom/_/mi sdug rnam gsum gsungs pa ni/_/dman dang 'bring sogs dbye ba nyid/_/mi 'dod bdag nyid rang bzhin ni/_/de ni chags pa'i gnyen po ste/_/mi sdug bsgoms pa gsum pa'o/_/
[\[224b.2\]]'di ltar lus la yang dag brtag_/so dang skra dang sen mo skye/_/khrag dang pags pa sha dang ni/_/rdul dang tshil dang zhag chu ser/_/rgyus pa rkang dang mcher ba dang /_/snying rus mkhris glo mchin pa dang /_/pho ba rgyu ma zhag dang ni/_/glad pa dang ni mig rnag dang /_/phyi sa dang ni bad kan dang /_/
[\[224b.3\]]snabs dang mchi ma gcin dang ni/_/mchil ma dang ni khu ba dang /_/srin bu rnag sogs de dag gi/_/phung po la ni lus zhes brjod/_/dri ma ngan dang mi sdug dang /_/rang dbang med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/mngon sum mi gtsang bsdus pa ni/_/don med kun gyi snod yin no/_/'di la chags te
[\[224b.4\]]bzlog dka' ba/_/ma rig pas bsgribs ya mtshan che/_/ga bur la sogs dri bzangs dang /_/gang dang 'grogs pas brlag par 'gyur/_/'di ltar dur khrod sa dbus su/_/song nas shi ba'i ro la ni/_/lta zhing rang gi gnyen gyis spong /_/gzhan yang 'jig par byed pas so/_/rlung gis shin tu
[\[224b.5\]]g.yengs pa ste/_/rnam par bsngos shing rnam par gzigs/_/phyed zos pa dang 'bu yis ni/_/rab tu mngon par gzhig pa nyid/_/sha med rnam par gtsigs pa dang /_/rus pa keng rus rang bzhin nyid/_/rnam par 'thor ba mthong nas ni/_/mkhas pas rang gi lus dang mnyam/_/de ltar mi sdug
[\[224b.6\]]yang dag par/_/bsgoms pa yis ni mi chags 'gyur/_/de yis zhi gnas rdzogs pa ste/_/de ni bsgom pa'i snod yin no/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mi sdug pa bsgom pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//rtog dpyod mang na dbugs rngub dang /_/dbugs 'byung dran
[\[224b.7\]]pas brtan par bya/_/thams cad du ni sems bsdus te/_/de bas srog la dmigs pa mchog_/'jug pa'am ni 'byung ba yi/_/srog gi rlung ni bgrang bar bya/_/dran pa tsam du gcig la sogs/_/gcig bcu'i mthar bgrang slar de bzhin/_/gal te bar du g.yengs na ni/_/slar yang de ni bgrang
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]bar bya/_/sems ni 'dus dang g.yengs pa dang /_/chad dang lhag pas ma yin no/_/yang na dbugs 'byung la sogs rung /_/'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'gro bya/_/ji tsam ring bar 'jug pa dang /_/'byung ba yang ni sems kyis brtag_/gzhag pa zhes bya sna rtse ni/_/rkang
[\[225a.2\]]sor mthar ni yang dag gnas/_/nor bu'i thag pa bzhin du ni/_/rtse gcig sems kyis bsam par bya/_/ci 'di rjes su mthun pa'am/_/nye bar 'joms pa'i rlung rnams zhes/_/dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa bsgom/_/zhi gnas dang ni nad med rgyu/_/bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang /_/rtog
[\[225a.3\]]pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang /_/yongs su dag dang drug 'di ni/_/dbugs rngub dbugs dbyung dran par 'dod/_/'dir ni gzhung bsdus 'dod pas ni/_/rnam pa gsum ni rnam par phye/_/drug po rnams las gang rung bas/_/yang dag 'dod don 'grub pa yin/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las
[\[225a.4\]]dbugs 'jug pa dang 'byung ba dang bgrang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//zhi gnas rdzogs par byas pa las/_/dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa ni/_/lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos/_/mtshan nyid bral ba yongs su bsgom/_/lus 'di yang ni btags pa tsam/_/don de bzhin du brten pa med/_/yul gcig na med thams cad kyi/_/
[\[225a.5\]]cha la yang ni mi gnas so/_/lag pa la sogs gcig la yang /_/lus kyi blo ni skye mi 'gyur/_/cha shas las gzhan lus kyi blo/_/gang la nges pa skye mi 'gyur/_/cha shas rnams ni lus nyid na/_/'di dag ma lus lus su 'gyur/_/phyogs kyi cha yis rnam phye bas/_/phra rab rdul yang cha dang ldan/_/cha ji
[\[225a.6\]]snyed ni gcig min te/_/de bas du ma nyid kyis min/_/gcig dang du ma rnam bral gang /_/dngos med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/drug gis cig car sbyar ba na/_/phra rab rdul yang drug car 'gyur/_/drug po dag ni go gcig na/_/gong bu rdul phran tsam du 'gyur/_/de bas na ni ngo bo nyid/_/med kyang
[\[225a.7\]]lus kyi blo skye dang /_/thog med ma rig pa las 'byung /_/'jig tshogs lta bar rab tu skye/_/lus mi srid na mig la sogs/_/srid pa yang ni shin tu ring /_/de phyir mig sogs 'dus reg las/_/'byung ba'i tshor ba ga la yod/_/gzung bya'i dngos med sems de med/_/de phyir 'dzin pa po mi _
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]srid/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa nges grol na/_/slar yang 'dzin pa ga la zhig_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/_/rten cing 'brel pa'i spyod yul rnams/_/thams cad skye med ngo bo nyid/_/dngos po rang las ma skyes te/_/don med phyir te de mi srid/_/rdzogs
[\[225b.2\]]par skye bar 'gyur ba ni/_/slar yang rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur/_/gang tshe rgyu nyid 'bras bu na/_/de yi rgyu ni so so ru/_/kha dog dbyibs dang ro nus pa/_/rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/_/snga ma'i gzugs ni yongs spangs nas/_/phyi ma'i gzugs ni yongs 'dzin pa/_/de yi de nyid ji ltar yin/_/de phyir
[\[225b.3\]]rang nyid las mi skye/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gcig par/_/'jig rten pa yang mi rtog go/_/gang phyir rgyu de nyams nas kyang /_/'bras bur gsal ba ma mthong ste/_/de bas 'jig rten du mi rigs/_/de kho na nyid du yang min/_/rang las skyes pa'i phyogs 'di ni/_/dpag tu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_/
[\[225b.4\]]gzhan las kyang ni mi skye ste/_/gzhan nyid la ni khyad med na/_/dngos po kun las dngos po kun/_/skye ba ru ni 'gyur ba'o/_/gang las gang ni skye bar 'gyur/_/rjes su 'gro las ldog pa dang /_/pha rol nyid las khyad med kyang /_/gang las gang ni skye 'gyur ba/_/de nyid de yi rgyu
[\[225b.5\]]yin na/_/gang las de nyid skye 'gyur ba/_/de dag nyid ni gang na ste/_/gang ste mthong phyir zhe na min/_/gang phyir sgyu mas ma nges nyid/_/shA lu ka sogs las kyang ni/_/shA lu ka skye ci las kyang /_/skye mthong rwa las mda' mthong ste/_/sa dag pa las pad ma'o/_/rang nyid grub nas gzhan
[\[225b.6\]]'byung ste/_/gzhan grub nas ni rang nyid 'dod/_/de gnyis ltos nas grub pa ste/_/pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs/_/gnyis ka las kyang skye min te/_/skyon ni gnyis ka 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyu med las kyang rigs min te/_/kun du rab tu thal 'gyur te/_/rgyu gzhan la ni mi ltos phyir/_/_
[\[225b.7\]]rtag tu yang dang med par 'gyur/_/ltos pa yi ni dngos po rnams/_/res 'ga' ba nyid du ni 'gyur/_/dngos rnams yod pa skye min te/_/rang nyid thob phyir don med nyid/_/skyes pa yang ni skye ba na/_/de ni thug pa med par 'gyur/_/dngos rnams med pa skye min te/_/ri bong rwa sogs ji bzhin no/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]thams cad nyid las 'di dag kun/_/rtag par skye bar rab tu thal/_/yod dang med las mi skye ste/_/'gal ba'i phyir na mi srid do/_/gnyis ka min las mi skye ste/_/de lta'i don ni mi srid phyir ro/_/lus la sogs rnams ji tsam bzhin/_/dbu ma rtsa ba la sogs su/_/
[\[226a.2\]]gsungs pa gang de yongs shes bya/_/bsdus pa'i phyir ni 'dir ma brjod/_/gang gang cung zad gang gi tshe/_/gang du de ltar nyid snang ba/_/de kun de tshe de ru ni/_/de lta nyid du rab tu med/_/de phyir gang la gang gzugs kyis/_/ji srid cung zad rab rtogs pa/_/de yi gzugs kyis de stong ste/_/sgyu ma'i
[\[226a.3\]]grong khyer sprul bzhin no/_/'di ltar lus la sogs pa ni/_/ngo bo nyid med rnam bsgoms pas/_/de la ngo bo nyid med pa'i/_/rang bzhin nyid du dran pa skye/_/thos bsam sogs kyis shes rab ni/_/dran pa'o de la nye bar 'jog_/nye bar gzhag pa'o lus la sogs/_/'di dag dbye ba rnam pa
[\[226a.4\]]bzhi/_/phyin ci log ni bzhi po yi/_/gnyen po nyid ni ngo bo nyid/_/gtsang sogs 'khrul pa gzhom pa nyid/_/bzhi po 'di dag dbye ba'o/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i dran nyer gzhag_/bsgoms pa byas te legs par gnas/_/mdor na lus la sogs pa ni/_/mi rtag sogs su blta bar bya/_/de
[\[226a.5\]]nas drod du 'gyur zhes pa'i/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal la sogs bden bzhi ni/_/rnam pa bcu drug spyod yul lo/_/gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pas/_/ji ltar phyi rol me 'byung bzhin/_/yang dag shes pa'i me las ni/_/'byung ba'i rtags ni dang por brjod/_/
[\[226a.6\]]mngon shes la sogs bcos pa yi/_/rnam pa nye bar mtshon pa ste/_/lus sogs las su rung dang zhi/_/mngon par shes sogs yon tan yang /_/chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste/_/de ni rim pas skye bar 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor shin tu dad pa yis/_/bden pa nyid du shin tu bsgom/_/de las
[\[226a.7\]]de yi mi mthun phyogs/_/skyes pa rnams ni spong bar byed/_/slar yang de dag mi skyed cing /_/kun du skyes pa 'joms par byed/_/gnyen po'i phyogs rnams ma skyes pa/_/bskyed phyir yang dag 'bad par byed/_/skyes pa rnams ni nan tan gyis/_/bsrung zhing yongs su 'phel bar byed/_/'dun pa
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bskyed cing brtson 'grus ni/_/rtsom ste thub pa'i sras kyis so/_/brtan pas yang dag spong ba ni/_/bzhi po 'di dag bsgom par bya/_/de nas rtse mor gyur zhes pa'i/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur/_/de 'phel ba las skyes de ni/_/spong ba'i brtson 'grus ldan pa zhes/_/gsungs pa'i brtson
[\[226b.2\]]'grus can la ni/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa 'di dag 'byung /_/'dun dang brtson 'grus sems dang ni/_/dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin 'di dag go/_/'dun pa drag po'i stobs ldan pas/_/dge ba'i chos ni rnams bsgoms pas/_/de la rtse gcig sems kyis ni/_/ting 'dzin nye bar skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[226b.3\]]yang dag spong ba'i brtson 'grus de/_/yang dag ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/de yi bdag rkyen brtson 'grus kyi/_/ting 'dzin nya bar skye bar 'gyur/_/sems sbyong ldan pa yi ni sems/_/de kho na nyid gcig pu'i sems/_/sems ni bdag pos ma bskyed par/_/de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[226b.4\]]da lta bdag la sdig pa'i chos/_/yod pa nyid dam 'on te med/_/dpyod pa zhes pa'i ting 'dzin gyi/_/rgyal por sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi/_/rkang pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams so/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po dag_/gsungs pa 'di dag ting 'dzin te/_/
[\[226b.5\]]'di las bzod par 'gyur zhes pa'i/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag bstan/_/chos kun mngon par 'dod par 'gyur/_/bzod thob ngan song mi 'gro zhing /_/rgyal bas byang chub lung ston 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sras ni sems bskyed nas/_/grangs
[\[226b.6\]]med bskal pas nges 'byung 'gyur/_/dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang /_/de bzhin ting 'dzin shes rab bcas/_/dbang po lnga ste mthong lam gyi/_/bskyed pa yi ni bdag po nyid/_/bden dang dkon mchog dge sogs la/_/dad dang ye shes bdag nyid de/_/de yang rnam pa
[\[226b.7\]]gsum du 'dod/_/dad dang yod nyid gsungs pa nyid/_/le lo don med brtson pa dang /_/yi chad pa dang zhum bdag nyid/_/de dag gnyen po brtson 'grus te/_/dge la spro ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/dran pa dus gsum sa la ni/_/sems ni nyams pa med pa'o/_/sems rtse gcig
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]pa'i chos la ni/_/ting nge 'dzin du yongs su brjod/_/shes rab thos bsam las byung zhing /_/chos rab 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do/_/'di dag sngon du skyes kyang ni/_/rim pa 'dis ni rgyas pa'o/_/de nas chos mchog de bzhin nyid/_/ces pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung /_/'jig
[\[227a.2\]]rten pa yi chos kun gyi/_/mchog nyid phyir ni de bzhin brjod/_/dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams su/_/rim pas 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur/_/bzod pa chos mchog la gnas te/_/dad pa la sogs stobs ldan pas/_/gang tshe lha dang bdud dang ni/_/nyon mongs kun gyis thub dka' zhing /_/
[\[227a.3\]]ting 'dzin grangs las 'das pa ni/_/blo ldan la ni skye bar 'gyur/_/'di ni nges par 'byed pa yi/_/cha bzhi ru ni brjod pa yin/_/chung dang 'bring sogs dbye ba yis/_/tha dad so so'i dge ba gsum/_/'di dag sbyor ba'i lam du 'gyur/_/tshogs kyi sa ni zhes kyang ngo /_/de bzhin so
[\[227a.4\]]so'i skye bo'i sa/_/mngon par dga' ba rin chen 'od/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sbyor lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//da ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/mthong ba'i lam ni brjod par bya/_/yang dag de nyid yang dag mthong /_/mi mthun phyogs
[\[227a.5\]]ni spong bar 'gyur/_/mthong lam de yi dri ma ni/_/rtsa ba'i bag la nyal drug ste/_/chags dang khong khro nga rgyal lta/_/ma rig the tshom zhes nyon mongs/_/'dod chags la yang rnam gnyis te/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags gang /_/de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mchog_/gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa ni/_/_
[\[227a.6\]]srid pa'i chags pa'o lta ba ni/_/bdag dang bdag gir rtag chad dang /_/med dang dman la chad lta dang /_/rgyu min lam min der lta ba/_/de rnams lta ba lnga yin no/_/nyon mongs bcu ni khams gsum du/_/brgyad cu rtsa brgyad du dbye ste/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams kyis/_/lta ba 'di
[\[227a.7\]]dag slar yang spong /_/gang 'di 'dod par spyod pa yi/_/sdug bsngal bden pa yid byed na/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang /_/bdag med rnam par skye bar 'gyur/_/sdug la chos shes bzod pa dang /_/sdug bsngal la chos shes 'di gnyis/_/'dod pa'i chu bo'i nyon mongs gang /_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]sngar bstan de rnams kun spang byed/_/de bzhin gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal bden bsgoms pas/_/sdug bsngal rjes su shes bzod dang /_/de shes pa ni yang dag skye/_/gzugs dang gzugs med nyon mongs ni/_/de nyid khong khro ma gtogs pa/_/rab tu 'joms
[\[227b.2\]]te so so ru/_/rnam pa dgu gnyis bco brgyad do/_/'di ltar khams gsum nyon mongs ni/_/sdug bsngal bden pa mthong ba yi/_/skad cig bzhi po 'di nyid kyis/_/nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu spong /_/'dod pa'i kun 'byung bden pa ni/_/rgyu dang kun 'byung dang yang ni/_/rab tu skye dang de bzhin rkyen/_/rnam pa
[\[227b.3\]]bzhir ni yid la bya/_/kun 'byung la chos shes bzod dang /_/de shes pa ni yang dag skye/_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs 'jig tshogs lta/_/mthar 'dzin lta rnams ma gtogs pa/_/'dod chags khong khro nga rgyal dang /_/ma rig the tshom 'di dag dang /_/log lta lta ba mchog 'dzin te/_/'dod pa'i 'dun
[\[227b.4\]]rnams zad par 'gyur/_/gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa yi/_/kun 'byung bden pa bsgoms pa las/_/kun 'byung la rjes shes bzod dang /_/de shes pa ni rab tu skye/_/gzugs dang gzugs med nyon mongs ni/_/khong khro ma gtogs rab 'joms te/_/so sor drug drug bcu gnyis so/_/
[\[227b.5\]]de ltar khams gsum nyon mongs rnams/_/kun 'byung bden pa mthong ba las/_/skad cig bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/nyid kyis bcu dgu zad par byed/_/'gog dang zhi dang de bzhin du/_/gya nom pa dang nges 'byung ste/_/'gog pa'i bden pa 'dod pa de/_/rnam pa bzhi 'di yid la bya/_/'gog la
[\[227b.6\]]chos shes bzod pa dang /_/de shes yang dag skyes pa las/_/gang de kun 'byung du gsungs rnams/_/nyon mongs bdun ni rab tu spong /_/blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/gzugs dang gzugs med khams phyin nas/_/slar yang 'gog pa'i bden pa ni/_/yid la byas
[\[227b.7\]]pa de la ni/_/'gog la rjes shes bzod pa dang /_/de shes yang dag skyes pa las/_/gzugs dang gzugs med srid nyon mongs/_/rnams ni so sor drug rim bzhin/_/gnyis por de ltar bcu gnyis te/_/khams gsum por ni skad cig bzhin/_/'gog bden de ni mthong
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ba las/_/bcu dgu rab tu spang ba'o/_/lam gyi bden pa bsgoms pa ni/_/'dod pa'i khams su rnam pa bzhi/_/lam dang nges par 'byin pa dang /_/rigs pa sgrub pa'i rang bzhin las/_/lam la'ang chos shes bzod pa dang /_/de shes yang dag skyes pa las/_/
[\[228a.2\]]tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin dang /_/bcas pa brgyad ni 'dod pa'i'o/_/gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa ni/_/de bzhin lam bden bsgoms pa las/_/gzhan yang lam la rjes shes pa'i/_/bzod dang de shes skyes pa las/_/gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa na/_/bdun bdun de ni
[\[228a.3\]]bcu bzhi'o/_/da ltar khams gsum nyon mongs rnams/_/lam gyi bden pa mthong ba las/_/skad cig bzhi po 'di yis ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis rab tu spong /_/'di dag gis ni byang sems kyi/_/mthong ba'i lam ni rab tu skye/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams/_/de ltar mthong ba'i
[\[228a.4\]]lam de nyid/_/nyon mongs pa ni brgyad cu brgyad/_/bden pa yis ni rab 'joms so/_/'gro kun ngo bo med pa ste/_/gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs gsal ba'o/_/dag cing gnyis med nam mkha' mnyam/_/de nyid de nas mthong bar 'gyur/_/mthong lam du ni bden mthong ba'i/_/bden pa'i rgya
[\[228a.5\]]mtsho skye ba'o/_/mthu dang sems can don dang ni/_/ting 'dzin yon tan mtha' yas ldan/_/dran dang chos rab 'byed pa yi/_/shes rab brtson 'grus gong du brjod/_/dga' ba sems las byung bar gsungs/_/shin tu sbyangs pa lus bde ste/_/snyoms par gnas pa'i btang snyoms so/_/ting
[\[228a.6\]]'dzin sems ni rtse gcig pa'o/_/byang chub yan lag bdun ldan pa'i/_/chos 'di dag ni zag pa med/_/de nas kun bden mi 'gyur ba'i/_/ting 'dzin de nas de la skye/_/dbu ni bcad nas sbyin byed kyang /_/sdug bsngal bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dga' ba'i sa de la/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rjes 'brang /_/
[\[228a.7\]]byang chub sems dpas dang po yi/_/mchog tu dga' ba thob pa nyid/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mthong lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang ni bsgom pa'i lam/_/theg pa gsum la rjes gnas pa'i/_/phra zhing phra ba'i dri ma ni/_/zad byed
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'bad pas bsgom par bya/_/mthong ba'i don gyi de nyid la/_/sems kyis yang yang bskyed cing bsgom/_/goms nas thar pas 'gro ba'i lam/_/chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste/_/slar yang gsum du dbye ba ni/_/chung ngu'i chung ngu chung ngu'i 'bring /_/chung ngu yi ni chen po dang /_/de bzhin 'bring
[\[228b.2\]]dang chen po yang /_/'dod pa'i sar ni dgu ru dbye/_/bsam gtan gzugs med snyoms 'jug gi_/sa brgyad pa la de bzhin no/_/so so so so'i sa la ni/_/dgu dgu yi ni rnam par 'gyur/_/'di ltar bsgom la khams gsum du/_/brgyad cu rtsa gcig dbye ba ni/_/mi mthun spang bya las phye ba/_/
[\[228b.3\]]chags dang khong khro nga rgyal dang /_/ma rig bag la nyal 'di bzhi/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi mi mthun phyogs/_/bsgom pas spang bar bya rnams so/_/de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su ni/_/khong khro ma gtogs gsum de nyid/_/gsum ni gzugs med khams su ste/_/bcu po 'di
[\[228b.4\]]ni khams gsum du'o/_/chung ngu'i 'bring dang chen po ni/_/slar yang gsum du dbye ba ste/_/chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba ni/_/dgu ru 'dod pa'i sa rnams su'o/_/bsam gtan gzugs med sa brgyad la/_/mi mthun phyogs ni dgu dgu'o/_/'dod pa la sogs sa dgu la/_/rnam
[\[228b.5\]]pa brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'gyur/_/lam la bzlog pa'i rim pa nyid/_/chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs kyis/_/chen po'i che sogs dri ma spong /_/gsungs pa'i mthong dang bsgom pa'i lam/_/mthong ba zhes ni gsungs pa dang /_/bsgom lam zhes pa la brten nas/_/nyan thos sogs kyi
[\[228b.6\]]tshul gyis ni/_/sa brgyad po ni thob par 'gyur/_/de yang rigs kyi sa dang po/_/gnyis pa de bzhin brgyad pa ste/_/mthong ba zhes bya gsum pa'o/_/bzhi pa de bzhin bsrabs pa'i sa/_/lnga pa 'dod chags bral zhes pa/_/drug pa byas pa bsrung ba ste/_/bdun pa nyan thos zhes pa'o/_/brgyad
[\[228b.7\]]pa de bzhin rang rgyal sa/_/nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub kyi/_/lam zhugs pa la gsungs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes bya ni/_/dri ma med sogs sa dgu ste/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dang /_/mtshungs par ldan pa bsgom pa'i lam/_/lta ba rtog pa ngag dang las/_/
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]'tsho ba dang ni rtsol ba dang /_/dran pa ting 'dzin yang dag ldan/_/lam gyi yan lag brgyad por shes/_/gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa/_/nyes dang dri ma kun zad phyir/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin dag pa/_/ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol
[\[229a.2\]]phyin dag pa/_/gsum pa 'od byed pa yang ni/_/ye shes me lce rab 'bar bas/_/'dzin pa gnyis ni legs par bsregs/_/bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yang ni/_/yang dag ye shes 'od 'phro'i phyir/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin lhag cing /_/byang chub phyogs kyis rgyun du byas/_/
[\[229a.3\]]lnga pa rgyal bar dka' ba yang /_/bdud kun gyis thub shin tu dka'/_/bsam gtan phar phyin gyis bcings pa/_/bsod nams tshogs kyi bsgrubs pa nyid/_/drug pa mngon du 'gyur zhes pa/_/sangs rgyas chos la mngon phyogs nyid/_/shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa/_/
[\[229a.4\]]'gog pa'i bden pa thob ste rgyas/_/bdun pa ring song thabs chen po/_/rjes su ring du song ba'i phyir/_/blo [(]ltan [,]ldan [)]skad cig skad cig der/_/'gog pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin brgyad pa mi g.yo'i phyir/_/gzhon nu'i sa ste mi g.yo ba/_/smon lam rnam par dag pa'i sa/_/
[\[229a.5\]]'gog las rgyal ba skul byed pa'o/_/dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros zhes/_/bgyi ba'i sa ste stobs la brten/_/'di ni blo ldan legs pa yi/_/blo gros so sor rig pa thob/_/bcu pa chos kyi sprin yang ni/_/dam chos char ni mngon par 'bebs/_/'di ni byang sems dbang
[\[229a.6\]]bskur te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis dag par byed/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las bsgom lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//lam gzhan kun la khyad 'phags shing /_/rtse mo nyid du phyin pa las/_/khyad par lam du grags pa yang /_/sa ni
[\[229a.7\]]bcu pa'i nang du'o/_/sangs rgyas zhing dang mngon shes dang /_/dam pa'i bsod nams ye shes tshogs/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyogs kyi chos/_/rnams dang zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas/_/gzungs dang spobs pa rnams dang ni/_/sha la sogs pa'i spyan lnga dang /_/'di
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dag la sogs chos rnams kun/_/thams cad du ni yongs su sbyong /_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las khyad par gyi lam bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//sa 'di rnams kyi sbyong ba'i lam/_/'phags pa mi pham zhabs kyis ni/_/mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du gsungs/_/
[\[229b.2\]]yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis/_/sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te/_/bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang /_/sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid/_/gtang dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang /_/dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang /_/rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang /_/sangs rgyas
[\[229b.3\]]skur 'dod dga' ba dang /_/chos ston pa dang bden pa yi/_/tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod/_/'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/_/yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya/_/tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod/_/rab tu dga' dang snying rje che/_/bkur sti bla ma la gus
[\[229b.4\]]nyan/_/brgyad pa sbyin pa sogs la brtson/_/thos pa mi ngoms nyid dang ni/_/zang zing med par chos sbyin dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang /_/'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang /_/ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba/_/rlom med bdag nyid de rnams lnga/_/nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes
[\[229b.5\]]dang /_/sbyangs pa yang dag sdom bsten dang /_/bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang /_/'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong /_/mi zhum pa dang lta ba med/_/'dris dang khyim dang 'khren pa dang /_/'du 'dzir gyur pa'i gnas dang ni/_/bdag bstod gzhan la
[\[229b.6\]]brnyas pa dang /_/mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang /_/rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log_/blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs bzod/_/bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs na/_/sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/_/bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas/_/
[\[229b.7\]]slob ma dang ni bse ru la/_/dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs dang /_/slong na mi zhum bdog pa kun/_/btang yang mi dga' med pa dang /_/dbul yang slong ba mi spong bas/_/sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob/_/bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang /_/srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang /_/mtshan ma
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]rgyu dang phung po dang /_/khams dang skye mched dag dang ni/_/khams gsum pa la gnas dang chags/_/sems ni kun du zhum pa dang /_/dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims la/_/de lta ba yi mngon zhen dang /_/stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang /_/de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni/_/
[\[230a.2\]]nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa/_/de yis sa ni bdun pa thob/_/rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang /_/'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang /_/snying rje dang ni rlom med dang /_/chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes/_/mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang /_/chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston/_/rtog pa kun du 'joms
[\[230a.3\]]pa dang /_/'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong /_/zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang /_/lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang /_/sems dul ba dang thams cad la/_/thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_/chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod pa'i/_/zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang /_/kun du bdag gi ngo bo ni/_/
[\[230a.4\]]ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o/_/sems can kun yid shes pa dang /_/mngon par shes pas rtse ba dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing bzang bsgrub pa dang /_/yongs su brtag phyir sangs rgyas ston/_/dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi/_/zhing skyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang /_/bsams bzhin srid pa len pa dang /_/las ni rnam
[\[230a.5\]]pa 'di brgyad bshad/_/smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang /_/lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang /_/spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang /_/mjal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni/_/rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang /_/'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni/_/nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams dang /_/yon tan phun sum tshogs
[\[230a.6\]]pa yin/_/sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni/_/gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas pa/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa/_/bcu pa yin par shes par bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sa bcu yongs su sbyong ba'i lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//tshogs
[\[230a.7\]]ni thams cad ma lus pas/_/lam ni yongs su dag pa'i rgyun/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku bzhi ni/_/blo chen rnams kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/_/khams gsum spyod pa las grol ba/_/dag cing zhi la mkha' mnyam pa/_/brtag dka' rtogs par dka' ba yi/_/bden bzhi dpe med
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]mthug po ste/_/mchog gi bde bas khyab pa'o/_/mchog tu mi 'gyur bde dam pa/_/rnam par rtog med cha las 'das/_/yang dag mtha' ste 'od gsal ba/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das/_/phra rab rdul ni rnam par spangs/_/skyid cing 'jigs med snying brtse yi/_/mthar
[\[230b.2\]]phyin chos rnams rang bzhin bdag_/lhan skyes ngo bo nyid ces pa'i/_/sku de sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/_/mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du ni/_/'phags pa mi pham pas gsungs te/_/thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni/_/zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag_/thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa/_/de dag rang
[\[230b.3\]]bzhin mtshan nyid can/_/ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o/_/byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams spyod yul lo/_/sgrib pa kun las nges grol ba/_/stong pa nyid dang ro gcig mchog_/chos rnams de dag kun gyi ni/_/rten du yang dag rab tu brjod/_/rnam pa kun gyi
[\[230b.4\]]mchog ldan pa/_/khyab bdag stong nyid ro gcig ste/_/rnam dag stong nyid gcig pa'i bdag_/sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin dam pa ste/_/stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas/_/dngos dang dngos min gcig mtshan nyid/_/bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid du/_/dpal ldan chos sku ston pa'o/_/gtso
[\[230b.5\]]bo ye shes tshogs gnyis ni/_/yongs su smin pa mkha' dang mtshungs/_/gtso bo sems gang gsal dag pa/_/thub pa zung 'jug bdag nyid do/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras kyis/_/chos kyi sku de gsungs pa ste/_/mngon rtogs rgyan du gsungs pa ni/_/byang chub phyogs mthun tshad
[\[230b.6\]]med dang /_/rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni/_/snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang /_/zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang /_/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni/_/rab tu dbye bas rnam brgyad dang /_/nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dang /_/mngon shes so so yang dag rig_/rnam pa
[\[230b.7\]]thams cad dag bzhi dang /_/dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang /_/mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang /_/bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang /_/dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang /_/bsnyel ba mi mnga'i chos nyid dang /_/bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang /_/skye la thugs rje chen po
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]dang /_/thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos/_/bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang /_/chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin/_/chos kyi sku'o/_/theg chen kun gyi rnam pa ni/_/sdud pa'i chos ni yang dag gsungs/_/sa bcu dbang phyug
[\[231a.2\]]rnams dang ni/_/de ni bde ba longs spyod nyid/_/thogs med zag med khyab pa ste/_/gsal zhing 'byung ba'i rdul phran spangs/_/dbang po'i gzhu dang nam mkha' yi/_/skar tshogs dri ma med pa bzhin/_/me long rnams su phan tshun du/_/de ni gzugs brnyan gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/
[\[231a.3\]]sum cu gnyis mtshan brgyad cu yi/_/dpe byad rgyan du byas te 'bar/_/bsod nams tshogs ni gtso bo ru/_/rnam par smin pa gsungs bdag nyid/_/ma lus nam mkha' yongs gang zhing /_/mtha' yas 'od gsal mtha' yas pa/_/de ltar mngon rtogs rgyan las gsungs/_/mtshan
[\[231a.4\]]'di sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_/dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di/_/theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir/_/thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/ji lta ji lta'i gzugs kyis ni/_/sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste/_/sems can bsam pa'i rjes brtags nas/_/shAkya thub pa la
[\[231a.5\]]sogs pa'i/_/thub pas 'khor ba ma stongs bar/_/kun du skye dang byang chub sogs/_/bstan nas 'gro don byed pa ste/_/lus gtsor sprul pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/'phags pa rgyal ba byams pas gsungs/_/gang gis srid pa ji srid par/_/'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag_/mnyam
[\[231a.6\]]du mdzad pa'i sku de ni/_/thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad/_/sprul sku'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal bas lung bstan pa/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa/_/khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos kun ngo bo nyid/_/dag cing zhi la rnam bsten mchog zhi'i rang bzhin
[\[231a.7\]]rnal 'byor pa nyid sprul/_/rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab phan khyab cing mtshan ma med/_/rgyal ba'i bden pa mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtog sku gcig la phyag 'tshal/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o/_/gang zhig gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan phan phun tshogs chen
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]po'i gzhir gyur pa/_/dngos dang dngos med ma yin nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can/_/'gyur med gos pa med cing zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa po ste spros med pa/_/so sor rang rig dpe med rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku de la bdag ni phyag
[\[231b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/chos sku'o/_/gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs byas dam pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du/_/'byor pas 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs gsal mdzad blo ldan chen po rnams ni dga' ba'i rgyu/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten kun las rab
[\[231b.3\]]byung rgyun mi 'chad par rgya chen dam chos sgrogs/_/chos kyi rgyal srid che la rab zhugs longs spyod rdzogs sku de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/gang zhig sems can smin pa'i ched du la lar me bzhin du ni gsal bar snang gyur cing /_/yang ni la
[\[231b.4\]]lar rdzogs par byang chub chos 'khor bskor nas slar yang mya ngan 'das gang mthong /_/rnam pa du mar zhugs nas srid gsum 'jigs pa sel ba'i thabs su sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni/_/phyogs bcur rjes song don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/sprul
[\[231b.5\]]pa'i sku'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la gnas/_/mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi yang /_/spros pa rgya che ba yi phyir/_/so so ru ni mngon par brjod/_/bla ma'i rjes 'gro la sogs pas/_/phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa'o/_/mi phyed sdom pa blangs pa yis/_/zhabs ni rab
[\[231b.6\]]tu legs par gnas/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/_/yun ring du ni bsten pa yis/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ni/_/ngang pa bzhin du dra bas 'brel/_/gya nom pa yi bza' bca' sogs/_/rab tu byin pas phyag zhabs ni/_/gzhon zhing 'jam ste byis pa ni/_/skyes ma thag
[\[231b.7\]]pa ji bzhin no/_/lhag pa la sogs byin pa yis/_/phyag zhabs gnyis kyi rgyab dang ni/_/ltag khung phrag pa gnyis te bdun/_/mtho ba yi ni sku can nyid/_/gsod pa'i skye bo thar byas pas/_/lag pa'i sor mo ring ba nyid/_/skye 'gro'i mtsho la phan btags pas/_/rtag
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]tu rting pa yangs pa nyid/_/srog gcod pa ni spangs pa yis/_/sku che shin tu drang ba nyid/_/dge chos blangs pa'i gtso bo yis/_/zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon nyid/_/dge ba blangs te spel ba yis/_/spu ni gyen du phyogs pa nyid/_/rig dang bzo sogs gus
[\[232a.2\]]byas te/_/byin pa e n+ya'i byin pa nyid/_/slong ba bdog pa'i nor byin pas/_/phyag ni ring zhing mdzes pa nyid/_/gsang ba'i tshig ni bsrungs pa dang /_/'gro ba tshangs spyod la bkod pas/_/mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su ni/_/nub pa nyid du grags pa'o/_/gding ba gya nom pa byin pas/_/mdog ni
[\[232a.3\]]gser 'dra ba nyid dang /_/khang bzangs dam pa byin pa yis/_/pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog nyid/_/'du 'dzi la sogs spangs pa yis/_/spu ni re re nas g.yas 'khyil/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad ni/_/gnas ji lta bzhin bkod pa yis/_/zhal mdzod spus mtshan drag tshig
[\[232a.4\]]ni/_/med pa seng ge'i ro stod 'dra/_/snyan dang rim pas legs smras pas/_/dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid/_/smin la sogs pa rab byin pas/_/thal gong yang dag rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog byas pas/_/ro ni bro ba'i mchog nyid do/_/nags tshal kun dga' ra ba
[\[232a.5\]]sogs/_/mi rnams yang dag byed bcug pas/_/sku yi dkyil 'khor mnyam nyid de/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi dkyil 'khor bzhin/_/gtsug lag khang sogs byin pa yis/_/dbu ni gtsug tor ldan pa nyid/_/'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig smras pas/_/ljags ni ring zhing srab pa nyid/_/dam chos legs
[\[232a.6\]]par go byas pas/_/de bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung nyid do/_/sems can kun la tshig kyal pa/_/spangs pas seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid/_/sems can kun la legs bkur ba'i/_/sbyin pa sogs kyis tshems dkar nyid/_/'tsho ba dag pa don gnyer bas/_/tshems ni mnyam pa nyid du brjod/_/
[\[232a.7\]]bden tshig kun du spyad pa yis/_/tshems ni thags ni bzang ba nyid/_/phra ma'i tshig ni spangs pa yis/_/tshems ni bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid/_/sems can kun la mnyam nyid du/_/bltas pas spyan ni mthon mthing nyid/_/khong khro sogs dang bral bltas pas/_/rdzi ma pa yi lta bu nyid/_/gsungs pa
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]'di dag thub chen gyi/_/mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/'du byed kun la ma chags pas/_/thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog nyid/_/sems can kun la phan bsams pas/_/sen mo'i mdog ni snum pa nyid/_/rigs kyi mchog las 'khrungs pa'i phyir/_/sen mo mtho ba nyid yin no/_/tshul ni kha
[\[232b.2\]]na ma tho ba/_/med pas sor mo zlum pa nyid/_/legs par dge ba bsags pa yis/_/sor mo rnams ni rgyas pa nyid/_/mthar gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis ni/_/sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid/_/lus sogs las dang 'tsho ba ni/_/rab bsrungs rtsa mi mngon pa nyid/_/nyon mongs mdud pa rnam dgrol bas/_/
[\[232b.3\]]rtsa yi mdud pa med pa nyid/_/sems la chos ni sbas pa yis/_/long bu mi mngon pa nyid do/_/skye bo kun bgrod dka' bsgral bas/_/zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid/_/mi zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis/_/seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid/_/klu zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis/_/
[\[232b.4\]]glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid/_/mkha' la gshegs mkhas bsod nams kyis/_/ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid/_/skyes bu khyu mchog bsod nams kyis/_/khyu mchog stabs su gshegs pa nyid/_/bskor phyogs lam mthun gshegs pa yis/_/g.yas su ldog cing
[\[232b.5\]]gshegs pa nyid/_/mdzes pa'i dge mkhas nyid kyis ni/_/yang dag mdzes par gshegs pa nyid/_/rtag tu gya gyu'i sems med pas/_/mi g.yo bar ni gshegs pa yin/_/rnam dag yon tan thob pa'i phyir/_/sku ni 'khril bag chags pa nyid/_/sdig pa'i chos dang ma bsags pas/_/sku ni byi dor
[\[232b.6\]]byas 'dra nyid/_/gdul bya kun gyi sems brtags nas/_/dam pa'i chos ni ston pa dang /_/lus sogs gtsang sbra'i tshul gyis ni/_/sku ni rim par 'tsham pa dang /_/sku sogs kun spyod gtsang sbra'i phyir/_/sku ni shin tu gtsang ba nyid/_/thugs ni brtse chen gyis brlan phyir/_/sku ni shin tu
[\[232b.7\]]'jam pa nyid/_/thugs ni shin tu yongs dag phyir/_/sku ni rnam par dag pa nyid/_/chos 'dul ba ni rdzogs pa yis/_/thub pa'i mtshan ni rdzogs pa nyid/_/yangs mdzes yon tan brjod pa yis/_/sku yi kho lag yangs pa nyid/_/kun la thugs ni snyoms pa'i phyir/_/gom pa
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]shin tu snyoms pa nyid/_/rnam dag chos ni yang dag ston/_/spyan ni shin tu yongs dag nyid/_/go sla'i chos ni ston pa'i phyir/_/shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang /_/thugs ni rtag tu ma zhum phyir/_/dku ni zhum pa med pa nyid/_/dge ba yang dag 'phags pa yis/_/
[\[233a.2\]]shin tu rgyas shing mtho ba'i sku/_/yang srid pa ni zad pa'i phyir/_/sku ni shin tu grims pa nyid/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung gsal ston pas/_/yan lag rnam par phyed pa nyid/_/tshig don shin tu rnam dag par/_/ston pas gzigs pa dag pa nyid/_/brtul zhugs phun tshogs slob ma ni/_/bsdus pas
[\[233a.3\]]dku ni zlum pa nyid/_/bdud stobs 'joms pas dku ma zhom/_/de bzhin dam pa'i sku nyid do/_/chos zad pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/phyal ni phyang nge ba nyid do/_/shin tu zab pa'i chos ston pas/_/lte ba zab pa nyid yin no/_/slob pa mthun par 'dzin pa yis/_/lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa nyid/_/thams
[\[233a.4\]]cad du ni rab mdzes pa'i/_/'khor 'byung ba yi chos nyid kyis/_/de'i phyir kun du rtag pa ni/_/kun nas mdzes pa nyid yin no/_/thugs ni kun du yang dag phyir/_/kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyid/_/dus min chos dang bral ba'i phyir/_/sku la sme ba gnag bag med/_/lus sogs zo mdog bde ba yi/_/rgyu
[\[233a.5\]]yi chos ni bstan pa'i phyir/_/phyag gnyis shing bal lta bur ni/_/shin tu legs par 'jam pa nyid/_/dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa yis/_/phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod nyid/_/chos zab mo la gnas pa'i phyir/_/phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid/_/phyi rjes su ni yang dag par/_/yang dag chos ni ston
[\[233a.6\]]mdzad dang /_/sems can kun la brtse ba yis/_/phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid/_/bslab pa rab mang kun ston pas/_/zhal ni ha cang mi ring nyid/_/khams gsum po ni thams cad kyi/_/shin tu rab tu gsal bar ni/_/gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa'i phyir/_/mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar nyid/_/'jam
[\[233a.7\]]por smras pas ljags mnyan nyid/_/yon tan mchog mnga' ljags srab nyid/_/chags pa'i byis pa gting dpag dka'i/_/chos kyis 'dul bas ljags dmar nyid/_/bsnyengs pa thams cad mi mnga' bas/_/'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid/_/shin tu snyan la sogs gsungs pas/_/gsung snyan mnyen
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]la 'jam pa nyid/_/srid pa'i kun sbyor bsdams pa'i phyir/_/mche ba zlum pa nyid yin no/_/gdul dka'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/_/mche ba rno ba nyid yin no/_/shin tu dkar ba'i chos kyis ni/_/gtul phyir mche ba dkar ba nyid/_/mnyam pa'i sa la rab gnas phyir/_/mche ba rab tu
[\[233b.2\]]mnyam pa nyid/_/rim pas chos ni nges rtogs shing /_/gsal bas mche ba byin gyis phra/_/shes rab mchog la gnas pa'i phyir/_/shangs ni mtho zhing yid du 'ong /_/skye 'gro gtsang ma phun tshogs pas/_/shangs ni yang dag gtsang ba nyid/_/chos ni shin tu
[\[233b.3\]]rgya che'i phyir/_/spyan ni yangs pa nyid yin no/_/don gyi tshogs ni bsdus pa yis/_/mchog tu rdzi ma stug pa nyid/_/gzhon nu ma kun mngon mgu bas/_/spyan ni pad 'dab rgyas 'dra nyid/_/rtag tu phyi rjes gzigs pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin smin tshugs ring ba nyid/_/chos 'dul 'jam po la
[\[233b.4\]]mkhas pas/_/smin ma shin tu 'jam pa nyid/_/thugs rgyud dge bas brlan pa'i phyir/_/smin ma shin tu snum pa nyid/_/thams cad du ni skyon gzigs phyir/_/smin ma'i spu ni mnyam pa nyid/_/mchog tu gnod pa bzlog mdzad pas/_/phyag ni ring zhing rgyas pa nyid/_/chags
[\[233b.5\]]sogs g.yul las nges rgyal bas/_/snyan gnyis mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/sems can kun gyi rgyud la ni/_/rab tu gnod pa spangs pa yis/_/sgra gsan snyan gyi dbang po ni/_/nyams pa rnam par spongs pa nyid/_/lta bas byas pa thams cad kyis/_/gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid
[\[233b.6\]]kyis/_/dpral ba legs 'byes rtsod pa kun/_/zhi byas dbyes ni che ba nyid/_/smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa yis/_/dbu ni yongs su rgyas pa nyid/_/'dod la zhen pa bzlog pa yis/_/dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag nyid/_/mthong dang bsgom pa'i spang bya ni/_/bcom pas dbu skra
[\[233b.7\]]stug pa nyid/_/bstan pa blo ni 'jam po yis/_/yongs su shes pas dbu skra 'jam/_/dri mas thun ni ma 'khrugs pas/_/skra ni ma 'dzings pa nyid do/_/rtag par tshig rtsub ma brjod pas/_/skra ni mi bshor ba nyid do/_/byang chub yan lag me tog ni/_/bkram phyir dbu skra dri zhim
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nyid/_/rtag par kun du mdzes par ni/_/'gyur ba'i bsod nams nyid kyis ni/_/dpal be'u dang ni bkra shis mtshan/_/dpal gyis mdzes pa'i phyag zhabs nyid/_/'di dag ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/_longs spyod rdzogs
[\[234a.2\]]pa'i sku la gnas pa'o/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sku bzhi brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//rgyal ba'i lam 'jug yang dag par/_/sbyar las bsod nams tshad med gang /_/de yis 'gro kun rgyal ba yi/_/lam la legs par 'jug par shog_/
[\[234a.3\]]bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni/_/nam mkha'i kun khyab skye bo rnams/_/ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhing /_/mi khom thams cad rnam par spangs/_/skye bar lha dang mi yi ni/_/skye ba yongs su thob par shog_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pas/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro
[\[234a.4\]]zhing /_/dam chos nyan sems don bsgom dang /_/sems ni bden par gnas par shog_/theg pa chen po la gnas te/_/tshangs pa'i spyod dang ldan par shog_/lam kun rnam par bsgoms pa yis/_/sa la sogs pa kun thob nas/_/zhing kun yang dag sbyangs nas su/_/myur du rgyal ba
[\[234a.5\]]thob par shog_/ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas skabs su/_/bsam pa'i don kun thams cad ni/_/nam mkha'i mdzod bzhin mkha' nyid nas/_/sems can kun la 'byung bar shog_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar gnas pa'i/_/'jig rten khams ni de dag rnams/_/don grub 'jig
[\[234a.6\]]rten khams bzhin du/_/de dag thams cad rnam dag shog_/bdag kyang byang chub snying po'i bar/_/zang zing mi 'jigs dam chos dang /_/byams pas sems can thams cad kyi/_/bsam kun yongs su rdzogs byed cing /_/rtag pa nyid du tshangs spyod dang /_/sdom pa kun gyis bsdam
[\[234a.7\]]par shog_/sems can don kun byed pa dang /_/chos kun don ni ston par shog_/'jig rten khams kyi sems can kun/_/bdag la gnod pa byed kyang ni/_/bdag ni de dag thams cad la/_/phan 'dogs byed pa nyid du shog_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsran nas bdag_/rtag par sems can
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]don la brtson/_/sems ni dam chos bsam gtan la/_/ro gcig bstan pa nyid du shog_/ji ltar brtson ldan brtson 'grus bzhin/_/bdag kyang go cha sbyor ba dang /_/de bzhin mi ldog pa zhes pa'i/_/brtson 'grus dang ni ldan par shog_/ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yi/_/tshogs kyi byang chub
[\[234b.2\]]bsgrubs pa yis/_/bsam gtan kun la gcig tu gnas/_/bdag sems rdo rje lta bur shog_/shes rab nam mkha'i mtha' khyab pa/_/rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid dang /_/rab mthug kun dga'i tshogs dang ni/_/snying rje'i ro yis nges gang zhing /_/thabs dang smon lam de bzhin du/_/stobs ni rab
[\[234b.3\]]tu 'byor pa dang /_/ye shes bdag nyid 'di dag ni/_/bdag la rnam par dag par shog_/mngon shes kun gyi mthar phyin te/_/khyad par lam ni thob par shog_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyangs te/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig_/'di nyid kyi ni rim pa yis/_/bdag gi bsod nams
[\[234b.4\]]mthu yis ni/_/'khor ba pa yi sems can kun/_/myur du rgyal ba nyid du shog_/bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba 'di/_/bdag nyid kyi ni blo yis byas/_/kun nas kun du ma lus pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pas na/_/kun du bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i/_/smon lam rgya mtsho ji lta ba/_/
[\[234b.5\]]de bzhin du ni bdag la yang /_/dge ba rgya mtsho de myur du/_/'bras bu dang ni bcas par shog_/phyogs bcu nam mkhas kun khyab pa'i/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyal rnams gang /_/de dag ji ltar smon lam ni/_/mngon du byas pa'i rim pa rnams/_/de tsam nyid du bdag gis
[\[234b.6\]]kyang /_/bsam pa brtan pa de bzhin gyi/_/bsod nams mthu yis 'di dag ni/_/de bzhin du ni 'grub par shog_/ji ltar dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs kyi/_/smon lam de ltar bdag gi yang /_/dus ni yun mi ring ba yis/_/smon lam 'di ni yongs rdzogs shog_/sangs rgyas kun
[\[234b.7\]]rnams rang rang gi_/zhing bzhugs mya ngan mi 'da' zhing /_/mkha' mnyam chos kyi char gyis ni/_/rtag tu sems can phan byed shog_/sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas chos/_/dge 'dun bcas pa thams cad la/_/lha rdzas mchod sprin mtha' yas pas/_/yang dag par ni
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]mchod byed shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis/_/'jig rten khams kun gang bar shog_/mchog gi chos rnams sems 'gyur zhing /_/srid pa sbyong bar byed par shog_/lung don gang dang 'gal ba dang /_/don med pa'am yang na ni/_/gang 'og 'chol dang sgra ngan ldan/_/gzhung gi skyon
[\[235a.2\]]ni cung zad gang /_/brtse ba can gyis dag byed pa'am/_/'on te sgro skur spangs te byas/_/chos kyi blo tsam gyis byas phyir/_/mkhas pas bdag la bzod par rigs/_/blo ni zhan par gyur pa dang /_/so so skye bo yin pa'i phyir/_/'dir ni bdag gis skyon bsdus gang /_/spang zhing chos dang mthun bzung ste/_/blo can brtse
[\[235a.3\]]bas bzod par mdzod/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las smon lam gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//ji skad bshad pa'i spang bya dor/_/gzung bya thams cad blang bar bya/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus bya zhing /_/chos kyi bdag med goms par bya/_/rang gzhan phyir ni slob dpon ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes
[\[235a.4\]]dpal gyis byas/_/rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa yi/_/chos bsdus pa ni rdzogs pa'o/_/rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po rig pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs shing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//e ma rtsom pa'i tshad ldan
[\[235a.5\]]paN chen gyis mdzad rgyal ba'i lam 'jug 'di/_/nyung la gsal rdzogs lung rigs dang 'brel don chen ldan mthong ste/_/legs sbyar skad kyis dben pa'i mi rnams la ni phan 'dod nas/_/rtsod dus skyes kyang rig gnas lnga sbyangs sdom gsum la gnas pa'i/_/bod yul dbus kyi dge slong dgra
[\[235a.6\]]bcom legs par mnyan te bsgyur/_/phrag dog 'gran khengs dregs sems spangs te blangs na don chen 'gyur/_/gang dag srid zhen blo zhan 'tsho med long med bsgom 'dod sogs/_/thos bral rnams kyang 'di tsam cig nyan nus na thos mang 'gyur/_/gzhung 'di'i tshad ni tshigs bcad stong dang tshig brgyas
[\[235a.7\]]lhag pa ste/_/sgra don dpyad nas bsgyur kyang nongs na mkhas rnams bzod par bzhes/_/brtsam zhus bsgyur ba'i mkhan po gsum gyis 'bad 'bras 'di dar nas/_/dge des bdag sogs 'gro kun rgyal ba'i lam zhugs kun mkhyen shog_/bsgyur ba'i dgos 'brel dang gzhan la gdams pa dang /_/bzod par gsol ba _
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dang bsngo ba la sh+loka gsum lo tsA bas bgyis so//[ {D3965}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi satwa go tsa ra pa ri shud+d+hi sU trA r+tha saM gra ha/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[235b.2\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' dag spyod yul ma yin pa/_/spyod yul spyod yul min spangs pas/_/spyod yul thams cad dag gyur pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/zhing ni yongs su sbyong 'dod pas/_/rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud dag la/_/byang chub sems dpas 'di
[\[235b.3\]]ltar yid/_/so so'i spyod yul 'gyur bar bya/_/thog mar gnyid sad de yi tshe/_/'di ltar yid la bya ba ni/_/bsod nams ye shes mngon 'phel don/_/'bad pa med par mkhas gyur cig_/bag med gnyid las rnam grol zhing /_/skye dgu'i mi shes mtshan mo zad/_/thams cad
[\[235b.4\]]mkhyen pa'i nyi shar bzhin/_/bla med de mthong ldan par shog_/gnyid yongs su sad pa yi'o/_/ldang tshe nyon mongs nyer len gyi/_/'khor ba'i gnas mal spangs nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes de ltar/_/stobs dang brtson sogs bla med shog_/gnas mal las yongs su
[\[235b.5\]]ldang ba'i 'o/_/ngo tsha dang ni khrel yod gos/_/byams dang snying rje'i ska rags ni/_/sems can thams cad bla med par/_/rgyal ba ji bzhin gyon gyur cig_/smad g.yogs gyon pa'i 'o/_/byams chen dang ni brtse ba'i gos/_/bde gshegs ji bzhin gyon pa dang /_/mtha' dag sems
[\[235b.6\]]can yan lag ni/_/legs sbas mnyam pa nyid gyur cig_/stod g.yogs gyon pa'i'o/_/bla med theg pa chen por ni/_/rkang pa 'jug par byed gyur cig_/lha yi bzhon dang tshangs pa yi/_/bzhon pa la sogs nges 'byung gi/_/rim pas mthar gyis bgrod par shog_/mchil lham gyon
[\[235b.7\]]pa'i'o/_/lus can thams cad thams cad du/_/thams cad bde 'gro myong 'das dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer gnas/_/sgo chen po ni 'byed par shog_/sgo dbye ba'i'o/_/khams gsum rmongs pa chen po yi/_/srid pa'i khyim las phyir byung ste/_/thams cad mkhyen pa gsal
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]'dod pa/_/'jig rten mtha' dag nges 'gro shog_/khang pa las phyir 'byung ba'i'o/_/mi khom ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa las/_/mtha' dag skye bo rnams kyi sgo/_/mi dge gang byas byang sems dang /_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang bcad gyur cig_/sgo 'gegs pa'i'o/_/bla med de
[\[236a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/gom pas thams cad du bgrod shog_/'gro ba'i 'o/_/nyon mongs ngan du spyod pa yi/_/bshang gci dri ma 'dor gyur cig_/dri ma 'dor ba'i 'o/_/mi gtsang dri ma'i zhing sogs 'dor/_/tshul [(]khrim [,]khrims [)]'chal ba'i dri bsal te/_/brtse dang bya ba dag pa yi/_/phyag zhabs
[\[236a.3\]]sems can ldan gyur cig_/khrus kyi'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas sgor/_/rnam 'phel bde bar gshegs pa bzhin/_/kun mkhyen tshul khrims dri zhim dang /_/ye shes snang ba 'char bar shog_/kha 'khru ba dang so shing za ba'i'o/_/rtag tu sems can mnyam par ni/_/na rgas nyon mongs
[\[236a.4\]]thams cad dang /_/bral zhing thams cad mtshungs par yang /_/rdo rje snying po'i lus su shog_/sman nye bar spyod pa'i'o/_/kun nas rab tu dang ba dang /_/'dod chags la sogs rdul spangs te/_/sems can rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/_/blta bas mi ngoms skur gyur cig_/chag chag
[\[236a.5\]]dang phyag dar skyang nul gyi'o/_/spyi gtsug 'jig rten mi mthong dang /_/lha dang mi la sogs rnams kyi/_/phyag 'os rtag tu sems can kun/_/rdzogs sangs mchod rten bzhin mchod shog_/mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i'o/_/skyes bu chen po seng ge yi/_/chos 'dzin rdo rje'i gdan 'dug ste/_/'os su
[\[236a.6\]]gyur pa'i sems can gyi/_/bdud stobs stobs las rgyal thob shog_/stan dang gding ba'i'o/_/kun mkhyen dam chos thams cad kyi/_/mdzod ni 'byed dang 'don pa dang /_/skye bo rnams kyis bka' lung ni/_/tshangs dbyangs lta bu thob par shog_/glegs bam 'byed pa dang 'don pa la sogs pa'i'o/_/rdul dang
[\[236a.7\]]nad kyi skyon spangs te/_/gser gyi mdog can gnyen nyid dang /_/sna tshogs yan lag mtshan nyid bzang /_/sems can rgyal ba ji bzhin shog_/bla med rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan/_/dag pa lnga dang rtag ldan zhing /_/nyon mongs gdung ba dri ma'i tshogs/_/lus can rnams ni dag par shog_/dril phyis
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]dang spyan 'byed dang khrus la sogs pa'i 'o/_/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ldan chus/_/yun ring zug rngur bying phyung ste/_/chos shes mngon par dag byed dpal/_/lus can rnams kyis rnyed par shog_/khrus bya ba sbyin pa'i'o/_/ma lus bkres dang skom pa las/_/bde gshegs bzhin du rnam grol dang /_/
[\[236b.2\]]ye shes bdud rtsis legs tshim zhing /_sems can rnams ni nad med gyur/_/bza' ba dang btung ba la longs spyod pa'i'o/_/kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa yis/_/kha mgrin dpal ni brgyan pa dang /_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das par ni/_/shes brtse'i gom pas rim bgrod shog_/lung bstan
[\[236b.3\]]rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/so sor yang dag rig rnam bzhi/_/pha rol phyin pa chen po'i lam/_/bzhon pa chen por 'dzeg par shog_/brtse dang shes rab yang dag 'byung /_/ma lus lus dang ngag gi las/_/gzhan don phyir mi ldog par ni/_/sems can thams cad mnyam gyur cig_/tam po
