[\[236b.4\]]la za ba dang /_'chag pa dang /_'bel pa'i gtam dang /_lam dang /_bzhon pa la 'dzeg pa dang /_bya ba rnams kyi'o/_/thams cad du ni sgrib bral gyi/_/dran dang shes rab yon tan ldan/_/sems can thams cad don phyir yang /_/sems can kun dge byed gyur cig_/de dang de'i spyod yul gyi sgo'i
[\[236b.5\]]rnam pa'o/_/bla med de bzhin gshegs pa yi ni tshul khrims dri/_/byang chub yan lag me tog mdzes khebs de yan lag_/bzang po'i mtshan rnams kyis ni mngon par brgyan pa dang /_/sems can rnams ni 'gro ba'i don 'dod gyur par shog_/dri 'am bdug pa dang me tog dang rgyan byin pa'i
[\[236b.6\]]'o/_/grang dang tsha ba'i gdung ba sel bar byed pa'i dri zhim dang /_/gdugs dang 'dra ba'i phyogs kyi gnas yangs bdag po dang /_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas phyogs su brgyan pa yis/_/sems can rnams ni 'gro la rab tu gsal gyur cig_/me tog dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng
[\[236b.7\]]pa'i'o/_/shes rab rab tu gsal bas mun pa rnam bcom zhing /_/des ni sdig pa'i snum dang sdong bu bsregs nas ni/_/spyan lngar nye bar 'phel ba rnams ni thob pa dang /_/rgyal ba lta bur sems can rnams ni rab gsal shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa mi 'gyur ba'i/_/snyan dang ldan zhing
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]legs pa'i yid ches ngag dag dang /_/tshangs dbyangs ltar 'gyur de dag yon tan chen po ni/_/sems can bde bar gshegs pa dag dang mtshungs gyur cig_/sgron ma dang bstod pa 'bul ba'i 'o/_/'gro ba khyab par rgyun chags min/_/mtha' dag smon lam chen po rnams/_/
[\[237a.2\]]rgyun chad med 'das brtse ba yi/_/mal bder lhag par nyal gyur cig_/ma smad spyod pas thams cad du/_/pha rol sems can rjes 'dzin des/_/rang tshul spyod dang spyod yul ni/_/sems can sangs rgyas bzhin gyur cig_/smon lam dang gnas mal dang ma smad pa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi'o/_/spyod
[\[237a.3\]]yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/_slob dpon dpal sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba kha che shAkya shrI bzang po dang /_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[237a.4\]{D3966}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da [#]bi d+hi/_bod skad du/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[237a.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_dam pa'i chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/dag ming 'di zhes
[\[237a.6\]]bgyi bas/_thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na [#]'khor ba'i tshe/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang /_sems can dag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyid [#]pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba ci mchis
[\[237a.7\]]pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdoms shing bsdus te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa'i so sor bshags pas [#]'chags so/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad 'di lta bu mi bgyid do/_/de skad lan gsum bzlas/_sdig pa bshags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pa thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags
[\[237b.2\]]pa nyan thos thams cad dang /_'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de skad lan gsum bzlas/_bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'o[#]/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung
[\[237b.3\]]rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du/_dus 'di nas bzung ste/_byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_'jigs pa thams cad
[\[237b.4\]]dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po/_/skyes bu khyu mchog sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bla na med pa'i sku/_chos kyi sku mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/_bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ba/_zhi ba [#]chos kyi sku so sor [#]rang
[\[237b.5\]]gis rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge 'dun dul ba tshogs kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/_phyogs bzhi'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad lan gsum bzlas/_skyabs su 'gro ba'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang
[\[237b.6\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung [#]ste byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dus ji lta ba dang stobs ci mchis pa bzhin du bdag dbul [#]zhing mchis na/_mgon po
[\[237b.7\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag bdag bzhes [#]su gsol/_/de skad lan gsum bzlas[#]/_bdag dbul ba'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag [#]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_sems can thams cad
[\[238a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du ci [#]ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams
[\[238a.3\]]cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/ji ltar sngon gyi sangs
[\[238a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag gis dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang zung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/_chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems gzod ma nas ma skyes pa/_stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
[\[238a.5\]]nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdud dpung dang
[\[238a.6\]]bcas pa pham par mdzad de/_nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang bdud dpung dang bcas pa mtha' dag pham par bgyis [#]te/_bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
[\[238a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub mchog tu sems
[\[238b.2\]]ni bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron [#]du gnyer/_/byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/_/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/de skad lan gsum bzlas/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[238b.3\]]'di dang /_gzhan yang bdag gis bsod nams cung zad ci bgyis pa dang /_bgyid [#]pa dang bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad pha ma la sogs pa sems can thams cad dang bdag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/bdag gis bsod nams 'dis pha
[\[238b.4\]]ma la sogs pa sems can ma brgal [#]ba rnams ni bsgral [#]lo/_/ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol lo/_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung ngo /_/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni/_yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams ni [#]mngon par
[\[238b.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/_/skyabs ma mchis pa dang /_gnas ma mchis pa dang /_dpung gnyen ma [#]mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi skyabs dang gnas dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur cig_/bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/_/thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/_
[\[238b.6\]]rga nad 'chi ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi/_/srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par bgyi/_/de nas bdag sbyin pa stsol ba dang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /_bzod pa bsgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsam pa [#]dang /_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag [#]pa dang /_shes rab rnam par dpyod [#]
[\[238b.7\]]pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa la slob pa ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go/_/'phags pa ngag bdag byang chub sems dpa' lags kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' lags par gzung du gsol/_/sa dang chu dang
[\[239a.2\]]me dang rlung /_/rtsi dang nags kyi shing lta bur/_/rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyis[#]/_/'dod dgur dpag med spyod par shog_/mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang /_/thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang /_/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/nad rnams gso bar bgyid gyur cig_/sems can thams
[\[239a.3\]]cad bde dang ldan gyur cig_/ngan 'gro thams cad rtag tu stongs par shog_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag su bzhugs pa/_/de dag kun gyi smon lam 'grub gyur cig_/de skad lan gsum bzlas/_bsod nams bsngo ba'o/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga_/slob dpon mkhas pa chen
[\[239a.4\]]po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs sto[#]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ran dra [#]bod+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA [#]ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D3967}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi satwa sam+ba ra bi d+hi/_bod
[\[239a.5\]]skad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po rnams su brjod pa ste/_sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /_dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims
[\[239a.6\]]dang /_sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims so/_/de rnams la slob par 'dod pa'i khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pas lhan cig tu chos mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang mkhas pa nus pa/_ngag gi rnam par rig
[\[239a.7\]]byed kyis don mdzad pa dang /_go bar nus pa'i zhabs dag la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_bdag rigs kyi bu khyod dam/_tshe dang ldan pa'am/_btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len par 'tshal bas de stsal ba la rung zhing dka' ba ma mchis na/_
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]thang cig bdag la rjes su brtse bas stsal cing gson cig ces bya'o/_/'di ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rnams na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[239b.2\]]rnams la btud nas/_de rnams kyi yon tan rnams mngon sum du byas nas sems chen po bskyed nas/_pus mo btsugs pa'am sa la tsog tsog por 'dug pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon du bzhugs su gsol nas mchod de/_mngon sum du byas nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/_/
[\[239b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am tshe dang ldan pa'am btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba bdag la rjes su stsal du gsol zhes so/_/de nas rtse gcig tu nye bar gzhag nas sems dang ba rjes su bskyed de/_bdag ni ring por mi thogs par zad pa med cing dpag
[\[239b.4\]]tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter thob par 'gyur ro zhes don 'di nyid bsam zhing cang mi smra bar bya'o/_/slar yang byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa des/_de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sems ma yengs par 'dug pa'am 'greng bas 'di skad brjod de/_khyod ming 'di skad
[\[239b.5\]]ces bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad de/_'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang /_tshul khrims gong ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyir
[\[239b.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_gang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang /_tshul khrims gang da ltar phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang bslab pa'i gzhi gang yin pa rnams te/_bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang tshul khrims gang rnams la 'das pa'i byang chub
[\[239b.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad kyis bslabs pa dang ldan pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis slob par 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams da ltar slob pa rnams nod dam/_des kyang nod lags so zhes dam bca'o/_/lan gsum du'o/_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/_gang cung zad lus dang ngag dang yid
[\[240a.2\]]rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_ma dang pha dang /_de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la brten nas bskyed pa'i 'di dang srid pa gzhan rnams su bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad
[\[240a.3\]]gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te bsdoms nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_slob dpon gyi spyan sngar mchog dang gtso bo'i bshags par bgyi'o/_/shes shing dran pas rab tu mi 'chab po/_/'di ltar lan gsum du'o/_/bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di
[\[240a.4\]]ltar sdig pa bshags nas dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la nye bar mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi phyed pa'i sku/_bla na
[\[240a.5\]]med pa'i sku/_chos kyi sku/_rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/_dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[240a.6\]]bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/_dus 'di nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o/_/'di ltar lan gsum du'o/_/bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas
[\[240a.7\]]'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/_gsum la skyabs su mchis te/_mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams bsgral ba'i phyir dang /_'byung ba'i phyir dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la gzhag pa'i
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]phyir/_'di ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_sangs rgyas nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtogs par gyur pa dang /_rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /_
[\[240b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa rnams dang /_ji ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i cho ga des/_bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba slob dpon dang nye bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa yang
[\[240b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/'di ltar lan gsum mo/_/bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa 'di dang /_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[\[240b.4\]]tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/skyabs med pa dang /_skyob pa med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa dang /_gling med pa'i 'jig rten la skyabs dang /_skyob pa dang /_gnas dang dpung gnyen dang /_gling du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
[\[240b.5\]]ma bsgral ba las sgrol bar gyur cig_/sgrib pa las yongs su ma 'das pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar gyur cig_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin par gyur cig_/'di ltar lan gsum mo/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di
[\[240b.6\]]ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/_sems can gyi khams mtha' med pa la ji ltar ma dang pha dang sring mo dang spun dang /_/bu dang bu mo dang /_gzhan gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa rnams 'di ltar so sor gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang /_
[\[240b.7\]]stobs ji lta ba dang /_brten pa ji lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o/_/'di nas bzung ste/_cung zad sbyin pa gtang bar bgyi'o/_/tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bzod pa bskyed par bgyi'o/_/brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o/_/bsam gtan la snyoms
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]par 'jug go/_/shes rab brten par bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang slob po/_/de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/_sa chen por chud
[\[241a.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can de rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i 'jug pa'i rjes su mchi'o/_/'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag byang chub sems dpar dus 'di nas bzung ste/_bdag slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol/_'di ltar lan gsum mo/_/de nas slob dpon des sku de'i spyan sngar
[\[241a.3\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing 'tsho zhing 'dzin pa dang /_gzhes pa rnams la zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas btud de gsol bar bya'o/_/ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub
[\[241a.4\]]sems dpa' dang nye ba las ji srid du lan gsum du/_yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/_bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid dpang du gyur par yang
[\[241a.5\]]dag par shes te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' med pa rnams su 'phags pa'i mchog lkog tu gyur kyang /_sems can gyi don la lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams la/_'di byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la mkhyen par gsol
[\[241a.6\]]lo/_/'di ltar len gsum mo/_/'di ltar yang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i las kyi rjes la/_'di ni nges par chos nyid yin te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa la gtugs pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs shing 'dzin pa rnams
[\[241a.7\]]gzhes pa rnams dang /_sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ltas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_gang gis de rnams la 'di lta bur 'gyur ba ste/_ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bas ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]dang nye ba las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba blangs so zhes so/_/'di ltar re zhig gzhan yang blang ba'i cho ga brjod pa/_gal te yon tan dang ldan pa gang zag de dang nye bar ma gyur na/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
[\[241b.2\]]mdun du rang nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_sa chen
[\[241b.3\]]por bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btud par bya ste/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'am/_tsog tsog pos tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[241b.4\]]thams cad dang /_sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsol bar bgyi'o/_/de rnams kyi yang spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad blang ba la/_tshul khrims gang zhes bya ba
[\[241b.5\]]la sogs pa sngar bzhin no/_/ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' bdag byang chub sems dpar 'di nas bzung ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang bdag gzung du gsol zhes pa ni las so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub
[\[241b.6\]]bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po bla ma su nA ya shrI mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D3968}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da sa mA dA na bi d+hi/_
[\[241b.7\]]bod skad du/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga_/thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ni/_/'jam mchog mgon la rab btud nas/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang /_/yi dam gsal po bri bar bya/_/de la dang po re zhig rigs kyi bu'am rigs
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]kyi bu mo rten dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa'i thad du song nas/_dkyil 'khor bya ba sngon du btang nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces/_rigs kyi
[\[242a.2\]]bu skyabs gsum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi byang chub kyi sems bdag la stsol cig ces lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des kyang nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin no zhes khas blang ngo /_/de nas sa phyogs yid du 'ong bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying
[\[242a.3\]]po can gyi mchod rten nam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/_ri mo bzhugs su gsol te/_chu dri zhim pos sku khrus gsol la/_gos dkar pos phyis nas na bza' sna tshogs gsol te/_'og nas 'chad pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor rnams byas nas/_ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog la sogs
[\[242a.4\]]pas phyi rol gyi mchod pa bya'o/_/me tog bdug pa mar me dang /_/dri dang lha bshos nyid dang ni/_/na bza' dang ni rgyan dang gdugs/_/gar dang rol mo glu dbyangs ni/_/yid 'ong sangs rgyas spyod yul dag_/nam mkha' mtha' dag kun khebs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/_/blos sprul
[\[242a.5\]]nas ni bdag 'bul lo/_/zhes yid kyi mchod pas mchod par mdzad do/_mchod par bya ba dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_mchod pa rnams rang bzhin gyis dbyer med par dmigs te/_ji ltar 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa/_/rgyal ba rnams la mchod mdzad pa/_/de bzhin
[\[242a.6\]]bdag gis de bzhin gshegs/_/mgon po sras dang bcas rnams mchod/_/ces sgrub pas mchod par bya'o/_/dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/chos dang tshogs kyi mchog bcas la/_/zhing rdul kun gyi grangs rnyed kyi/_/lus btud nas ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_zhes
[\[242a.7\]]lan gsum phyag byas la/_rgyal dang de sras rnams la bdag gis ni/_/bdag gi lus kun rnam pa kun du 'bul/_/sems dpa' mchog rnams bdag ni yongs bzhes shig_/gus pas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi/_/ces bya ba 'dis bdag gi lus sangs rgyas rnams la
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dbul bar bya'o/_/de'i rjes la/_thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas/_/tshe rabs 'di 'am gzhan dag la/_/bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa'am/_/bgyid du stsal ba nyid dang ni/_/gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/_/rjes su yi rang gang bgyis pa/_/de ni 'gyod pas shin tu
[\[242b.2\]]yang /_/'gyod par bgyis te bdag 'chags kyis/_/'dren pa rnams kyis nyes pa la/_/nyes pa lags par gzung du gsol/_/'di ni bzang po ma lags pas/_/mgon po slan chad bdag mi bgyid/_/ces nyes pa thams cad bshags pa byas nas/_zag bcas zag pa med pa
[\[242b.3\]]yi/_/dge la dga' bas yi rang ngo /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad du/_/sangs rgyas rnams la bdag bskul lo/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das bzhed rnams/_/bskal pa mtha' las bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag gis dge kun ltos med par/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o/_/zhes
[\[242b.4\]]brjod pas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_sangs rgyas la bskul ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba byas nas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin no/_/de la rang la mngon du phyogs shing tsog tsog por 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas
[\[242b.5\]]gnas pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad ces brjod cig ces smrar gzhug ste/_phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can rnams kyang bdag la dgongs su gsol/_slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_
[\[242b.6\]]bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas la sogs pa la mchod pa la sogs pa bgyis pas/_byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/_/sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi/_/chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi/_/zhes lan gsum brjod
[\[242b.7\]]par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la/_lus dang de bzhin longs spyod dang /_/dus gsum gyi ni dge ba rnams/_/sems can don grub bya ba'i phyir/_/ltos pa med par gtang bar bgyi/_/sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang /_/nam mkha' bzhin du rtag par yang /_/sems can dpag tu med
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa yi/_/rnam mang nyer 'tsho'i gzhir yang shog_/de bzhin nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/_/sems can khams ni rnam kun du/_/thams cad mya ngan 'das bar du/_/bdag ni nyer 'tsho'i rgyur yang shog_/mgon po'i spyan sngar rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub tu ni sems
[\[243a.2\]]bskyed de/_/sems can de dag thams cad kun/_/sangs rgyas bde la mgron du 'bod/_/ces smon pa'i mtshan nyid mngon du bya'o/_/de nas/_ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis/_/byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang /_/de dag byang chub thugs bsrung la/_/dus kun du ni gnas pa ltar/_/de bzhin
[\[243a.3\]]'gro la phan don du/_/bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed cing /_/de bzhin du ni dus kun du/_/bdag gis de ni bsrung bar bgyi/_/zhes lan gsum gyi bar du smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bzung ba la mos pa
[\[243a.4\]]brtan po yod na de'i tshe sdom pa sbyin no/_/ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab bzung ste/_/de dag byang sems bslab pa la/_/rim pa bzhin du gnas pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'gro la phan don du/_/byang chub sdom pa gzung bgyi zhing /_/de bzhin bslab
[\[243a.5\]]pa de dag la/_/rim pa bzhin du gnas par bgyi/_/zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa sbyin no/_/ltung ba dang ltung ba med pa'i gzugs brnyan yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan par bya'o/_/de nas langs te dkon mchog gsum la phyag
[\[243a.6\]]btsal nas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du yon phul nas/_de ring bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/_/mi yi srid pa legs par thob/_/de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/_/sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur to/_/skyon med btsun
[\[243a.7\]]pa'i rigs 'di la/_/ji ltar rnyog par mi 'gyur bar/_/de bzhin du ni rang rigs dang /_/mthun pa'i las ni bdag gis bya/_/zhes bya bas mjug rgyas par bya'o/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen med na ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar bya'o zhes bya ba
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ni dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du song ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga'o/_/de ltar byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gnyis po spyod pas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa des na spyod pa la mngon par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de
[\[243b.2\]]yang rnam pa gsum ste/_las dang po pa la ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/_yi dam gyi spyod pa'o/_/mos pas spyod pa'i spyod pa can la ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa'o/_/sa la bzhugs pa la ni sems can gyi don
[\[243b.3\]]bya ba nyid gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/_sems can ston pa'i spyod pa'o/_/de la las dang po pa'i yi dam gyi spyod pa brjod do/_/nang par langs te/_oM pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAH_pra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing yongs su brtags pa'i chus gdong la
[\[243b.4\]]sogs pa dag par bya zhing kun du spyod pa gtsang bas/_sa phyogs yid du 'ong bar/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs sam/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_thang ka bkram zhing /_bar snang la yang phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
[\[243b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis dmigs te/_oM a ma le/_bi ma le/_nirma le/_swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHswA hA/_zhes brjod la/_chu dri zhim pos sku khrus gsol te/_gos dkar pos phyis nas/_ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams sngags 'dis dbul lo/_/oM A badzra waste hUM/_oM A badzra
[\[243b.6\]]A laM ka re hUM/_de nas mdun du mngon par phyogs te bsdad la/_oM badzra b+hU mi hUM/_zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa'i char/_oM badzra u da ka hUM/_zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lci ba dang /_chus kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la/_oM badzra re khe hUM/_zhes
[\[243b.7\]]bya bas dkyil 'khor btang nas lag pa bkru'o/_/de nas dbus nas brtsams te/_dbus nyid kyi mthar thug par me tog sngags 'dis dgram mo/_/oM haM ma hA me ra be+e swA hA/_dbus su'o/_/shar dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams su ni/_oM yaM pUrba bi dai hA ya swA hA/_oM raM dzaM bu dwI
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pA ya swA hA/_oM laM ut+ta ra ku ra be swA hA/_oM baM a ba ra ko da na ye swA hA/_me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung gi phyogs dag tu ni/_oM yaHu pa dwI pA ya swA hA/_oM raHu pa dwI pA ya swA hA/_oM laHu pa dwI pA ya swA hA/_oM baHu pa dwI pA ya swA hA/_bar gyi shar dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams
[\[244a.2\]]su ni/_oM ya ga dza rat+nA ya swA hA/_oM ra pu ru Sha rat+nA ya swA hA/_oM la s+t+rI rat+nA ya swA hA/_oM ba a shwa rat+nA ya swA hA/_me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung rnams su ni/_oM yA khang+ga rat+nA ya swA hA/_oM rA ma Ni rat+nA ya swA hA/_oM lA ma hA ni d+ha nA ya swA hA/_oM bA tsakra rat+nA ya swA hA/_oM haM a d+ho me
[\[244a.3\]]ra be swA hA/_zhes bya bas yang dbus su bzhag la dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas/_oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/_oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/_oM badzra dI pe hUM/_oM badzra gan d+he hUM/_oM badzra nai wi d+ya hUM/_zhes bya bas ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_dri dang /_lha bshos dag dbul
[\[244a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas/_rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/kun gyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang /_/gang du byang chub la reg dang /_/zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba
[\[244a.5\]]dang /_/zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang /_/'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang /_/seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/_/gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/steng dang bar dang 'og dag dang /_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang /_/skur bcas sku ni
[\[244a.6\]]med pa yi/_/mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/zhes bya bas lan gsum du phyag byas la 'dug ste/_rten gyi stobs la sogs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i don du phung po gsum pa gdon par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang rjes su dran par bya'o/_/de nas bar snang la rang
[\[244a.7\]]gi gzhi bdag dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yid kyis dmigs te/_oM AHhUM zhes bya bas lan gsum byin gyis brlabs pas bdud rtsir gyur par bsam yid kyis de dag nyid la byin nas/_oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM Ad+ya nu ta pan+na twAta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/_zhes brjod pas
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bdud rtsi des tshim pa rnams rang gi gnas su song bar blta'o/_/de nas theg pa chen po'i mdo lnga dang /_de dang rjes su mthun pa dag las mdo gang yang rung ba ci nus kyis bton nas/_sdug bsngal ba dang mgon med pa dag la gos dang zas la sogs pa tha na kham gcig tsam tshun chad byin la/_'khor
[\[244b.2\]]gsum yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par bsdus nas smon lam 'di skad ces gdab bo/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/_/sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir/_/ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyod mdzad pa/_/bdag gi spyod pa'ang de 'drar shog_/ji srid nam mkha'
[\[244b.3\]]gnas pa dang /_/'gro ba ji srid gnas kyi bar/_/de srid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ni/_/'joms pas bdag kyang gnas par shog_/bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/_/thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/_/rga nad 'chi ba'i dba' klong 'khrugs pa yi/_/srid
[\[244b.4\]]pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog_/de nas/_oM badzra muH_zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol te/_de nas byang chub kyi sems dang bslab pa dran pa sngon du btang bas ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/_/zan za ba'i dus su na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma bya'o/_/
[\[244b.5\]]oM ha ri te ma hA yak+Shi Ni i dam ba ling gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na k+Shi/_zhes bya bas 'phrog ma la zan changs gnyis sbyin no/_/oM agra paN+Di a shi b+h+yo aM/_zhes bya bas thog mar za ba rnams la zan changs gcig sbyin la ran pa tshod zin par zos nas/_oM uts+tshi Sh+Ta paN+Di a shi b+h+yaHswA hA/_zhes bya bas
[\[244b.6\]]lhag ma za ba rnams la lhag ma byin no/_/gal te nus pa yod na nyi ma phyed dang dgongs ka'i thun dag la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/nus pa med pa ni sngar ji skad brjod pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor skyong nul byas la/_mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba yang byas nas phung po gsum pa bton te smon lam
[\[244b.7\]]gdab po/_/de ni yi dam len pa'i cho ga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang sems can mgu bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/_mdo sde dang byang chub spyod 'jug dang bslab pa kun nas btus pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dang yi dam gyi/_/cho ga bdag gis byas pa las/_/dge ba
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]thob pa gang yin des/_/'gro ba byang chub bsten par shog_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga_/slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po
[\[245a.2\]]su ma ti kIrti dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3969}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsit+ta ut+pA da [#]sam+ba ra bi d+hi kra ma/_bod skad du/_sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
[\[245a.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngan song thams cad 'jig pa dang /_/sgrib pa thams cad las grol zhing /_/rdzogs sangs go 'phang stsol mdzad pa/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la yang /_/de
[\[245a.4\]]bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/sdom pa'i rim pa bri bar bya/_/de la dang po [#]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/_'di skad ces
[\[245a.5\]]gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po la bzhugs pa rnams kyis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs
[\[245a.6\]]bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang slob dpon gyis [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do/_/de ltar gsol ba btab nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni/_
[\[245a.7\]]slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas/_ji srid byang chub [#]snying po la mchis kyi bar du/_rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/_/slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/_ji srid byang chub [#]snying po la mchis kyi bar du chos rnams kyi mchog zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chog rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/_/slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/_ji
[\[245b.2\]]srid byang chub [#]snying po la mchis kyi bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum du brjod do/_/de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
[\[245b.3\]]dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid kyis [#]dmigs te/_phyag btsal ba dang /_ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa [#]byas la/_slob dpon mdun du byas te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'am tsog pur [#]yang rung bas 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar
[\[245b.4\]]bas [#]sems bskyed par bya ste/_phyogs bcu rnams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sbyin pa'i rang bzhin
[\[245b.5\]]dang /_tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang /_bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
[\[245b.6\]]dang /_sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung [#]nas ji srid byang chub [#]snying po la mchis kyi bar du bla na
[\[245b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen po la sems bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can ma brgal [#]ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o/_/ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi'o/_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o [#]zhes lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar slob dpon med kyang bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i chog ni[#]/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bsams te/_phyag 'tshal
[\[246a.2\]]ba dang /_mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa byas nas/_gsol ba gdab pa dang slob dpon zhes pa'i tshig spangs pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i go rims [#]gong ma bzhin du bya'o/_/de ltar sems bskyed pa'i gang zag gis [#]byang chub kyi sems spel bar bya ba'i phyir tha na nyin lan
[\[246a.3\]]gsum mtshan lan gsum du/_sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/_/byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa 'di dag gis/_/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/ces byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/
[\[246a.4\]]byang chub kyi sems nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhi las ldog par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bla ma dang mchod par 'os pa slu ba dang /_gzhan 'gyod pa'i gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang /_sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang gis tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa
[\[246a.5\]]brjod pa dang /_sems can thams cad la g.yo dang sgyus spyod pa'o/_/byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhi la bslab par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_srog gi phyir yang bsams bzhin du brdzun mi smra ba dang /_sems can thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa
[\[246a.6\]]rnam par dag pas gnas par bya'i g.yo dang sgyus ma yin pa dang /_sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing phyogs bcur yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par bya ba dang /_sems can 'ga' zhig dge ba la 'god pa de dag bla na med pa
[\[246a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la ni ma yin no/_/khyad par du mngon par shes pa myur du thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa'i chos bdun pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo la bslab
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]par bya'o/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phan yon ni/_sdong po bkod pa'i mdo la sogs pa las shes par bya'o/_/de la dang por cho ga bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la legs par slob par
[\[246b.2\]]'dod pas/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 'bogs pa'i sgo nas slob ma rjes su gzung bar nus pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag byas te/_de'i rkang pa
[\[246b.3\]]la gtugs nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/_slob dpon khyod las bdag byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom [#]pa yang dag par blang ba de lan bar 'tshal gyis/_de la gnod pa ma mchis na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du cung zad cig gsan cing stsal ba'i rigs so zhes de
[\[246b.4\]]ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod nyon cig_/khyod 'di ltar sems can ma brgal [#]ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa
[\[246b.5\]]rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod dam/_de las khyod kyis sems bskyed pa brtan pa dang yi dam brtan par bya'o/_/gzhan dang 'gran [#]pa'i ched du ma yin nam/_gzhan gyi nan gyis lan [#]du bcug pa ma yin nam zhes
[\[246b.6\]]'dri'o/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i lugs sku'am ras ris [#]la sogs pa mdun du bzhugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
[\[246b.7\]]cad mdun du bsam la[#]/_ci nus pa'i phyi'i mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang phyag byas la/_de ma thag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen stan mthon po la 'dug pa la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis phyag byas te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'am tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge ba'i
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bshes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nod pas 'di ltar bskul bar bya ste/_slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa bdag la myur du stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gsum du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bskul nas/_
[\[247a.2\]]de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dug pa'am langs pa yang rung ste/_des [#]byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nod pa de dag la 'di skad ces dri ba bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod byang chub sems dpa' yin nam/_byang chub tu smon lam btab bam zhes dris pa na/_len pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[247a.3\]]des kyang btab lags so zhes khas blang bar bya'o/_/de nas mi zad pa dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter chen por gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ring por [#]mi thogs par thob par 'gyur ro zhes snyam du bsam
[\[247a.4\]]zhing sems rab tu dang bar gyur pas dga' ba dang bcas pas cang mi smra bar thal mo sbyar te 'dug par bya'o/_/de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang tshul khrims thams cad de/_sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /_
[\[247a.5\]]dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims mdor bsdus pa slob ma la go bar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi slob pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims de dag ci bdag las len par 'dod dam zhes slob ma la 'dri
[\[247a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/des de ltar len par 'tshal lo zhes khas len par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa sbyin par bya ste/_btsun pa'am/_tshe dang ldan pa'am/_rigs kyi bu ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las/_'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[247a.7\]]thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na da ltar byung ba'i byang
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa'i [#]bslab pa'i gzhi gang dag dang tshul khrims gang dag la/_'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bslab [#]par gyur pa dang /_ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' [#]
[\[247b.2\]]thams cad kyis slob par 'gyur ba [#]dang /_phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad de/_sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang dge ba chos sdud [#]pa'i tshul
[\[247b.3\]]khrims dang /_sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims nod dam zhes smros shig_/des kyang nod lags so zhes smros shig_/de ltar slob dpon gyis lan gsum gyi bar du len nam zhes brjod cing slob mas rab tu len lags so zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa blangs par 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[247b.4\]]nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des/_slob ma la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa byin nas/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces lan gsum brjod par bya ste/_byang chub sems
[\[247b.5\]]dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bas/_bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang bar bya ba lan gsum gyi bar du mnos lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba 'dis/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
[\[247b.6\]]khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dpang du gyur par 'phags pa'i mchog lkog tu gyur kyang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas gtugs pa'i chos thams cad lkog tu ma gyur pa'i thugs mnga' ba thams cad la mkhyen par gsol lo
[\[247b.7\]]zhes lan gsum gyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brjod de/_phyag btsal nas bla ma dang slob ma ldang bar bya'o/_/de nas langs la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa mnos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ces brjod par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par len pa'i las brjod pa rdzogs pa de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
[\[248a.2\]]cad du/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las
[\[248a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa mnos so zhes yang dag par mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis chos kyi brtse bas bu dang spun zla'i dgongs pa mdzad la de ltar dgongs pa mdzad pas bsod
[\[248a.4\]]nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa
[\[248a.5\]]yang dag par blangs pa 'di dad pa med pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir/_dad pa med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa rab tu bstan na/_dad pa med pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa [#]ma dad pas spong bar byed de/_des na ji snyed byang
[\[248a.6\]]chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa la bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ba de snyed kyi bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ma dad pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas [#]sems can sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bsrung
[\[248a.7\]]bar bya ba yin pas gzhan sdig pa las bzlog par bya ste/_de'i phyir mchog tu dge ba'i byang chub sems dpas [#]gsang bar bya ba yin no/_/de nas bslab pa'i gzhi pham pa'i gnas su gyur pa sdom pa 'jig pa'i rgyu bstan cing /_nyes byas kyi ltung ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]yin pa yang bstan par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdor bsdus pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga_/slob dpon chen po dpal mar
[\[248b.2\]]me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA [#]ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba lags so/_/[#]slad kyis [#]paN+Di ta de nyid dang /_lo tsA [#]ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa[#]//_//
[\[248b.3\]{D3970}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi satwa sam+ba ra gr-ih+Na bi d+hi/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bla med bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu skye ba yi/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag bsam shing ljon sa bon ni/_/sdom pa dam pa
[\[248b.4\]]bskyed cing spel bar byed pa ste/_/'bras bu mchog des sems can tshogs rnams tshim par byed/_/'dir nges par sdom pa gzung ba ni sdom pa 'bogs pa'i cho ga la mkhas shing /_len 'dod kyi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i bla mas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod par bya ste/_dkon mchog gsum
[\[248b.5\]]dang bla ma'i maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas sam maN+Dal med kyang rung ste/_slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhi ba 'dod chags
[\[248b.6\]]dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de ltar gsum mo/_/skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen du bdag gzung du gsol/_de'i rjes su bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
[\[248b.7\]]ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo /_/srog gcod pa las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa las log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]pa bag med pa'i gnas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/_/de ltar gsum mo/_/deng nas bzung nas/_bdag mchog gi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes pa'o/_/de ltar 'dis yan lag gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yan lag lnga yongs su rdzogs
[\[249a.2\]]pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa nyin zhag gcig pa ni rtag tu mi 'dogs pa'i rgyan bzhag ste/_nyi ma shar ba nas sngar bzhin du bzung ste/_slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid sang gi nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du
[\[249a.3\]]srog gcod pa spong ngo /_/srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang /_khri stan mthon po dang /_mal stan
[\[249a.4\]]chen po dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_kha dog 'chang ba dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_ltad mo blta ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/_/dgra bcom pa yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan nas bzhugs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/
[\[249a.5\]]bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di yang sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_ma thob pa'i don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig_/de ltar gsum mo/_/de ltar 'di ni bsnyen gnas yan
[\[249a.6\]]lag brgyad pa'i sdom pa ste 'phags pa rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nyin par tsam yang dag par len pa la dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid nyi ma nub kyi bar du zhes brjod par bya'o/_/mtshan ma tsam la ni dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du zhes brjod par
[\[249a.7\]]bya'o/_/gso sbyong gi sdom pa kho na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du len pa ni go mi'i sdom pa ste/_de blang ba ni dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhes brjod par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa don du gnyer bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mdun du byas nas mchod pa byas te/_
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]de'i mdun du dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rab tu dang ba yang dag par bskyed nas phyag byas te/_pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pa'am tsog tsog por yang rung bas thal mo
[\[249b.2\]]sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu bdag khyod las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa de la spro yis/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du stsal du gsol zhes de ltar gsum mo/_/bla ma des
[\[249b.3\]]'di ltar brjod de/_khyod kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab bam/_bdag las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa 'dzin par 'dod dam zhes pa yang gsum mo/_/des kyang 'dzin par 'tshal lo zhes dam bca' bar bya'o/_/bla ma las 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
[\[249b.4\]]gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_ma dang pha dang
[\[249b.5\]]sems can gzhan la brten nas skye ba 'di dang gzhan rnams su sdig pa'i las gang cung zhig bgyis par gyur pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi'o/_/shes shing dran pas mi 'chab bo zhes lan gsum mo/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus
[\[249b.6\]]'di nas bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du/_rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mkhyen pa thams cad ston pa 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi phyed pa'i sku bla na med pa'i sku la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[249b.7\]]'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog zhi ba'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/tshogs rnams kyi mchog phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum mo/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]sdug bsngal las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_gdon par bya ba'i phyir dang /_yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir/_ji ltar 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub tu sems bskyed
[\[250a.2\]]de sangs rgyas pa dang 'tshang rgya ba dang 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen cing rjes su mkhyen pa'i cho ga des/_bdag
[\[250a.3\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi bas slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdun du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo/_/bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa dang /_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang
[\[250a.4\]]chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/'jig rten na skyob pa med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa dang /_gling med pa rnams kyi skyob
[\[250a.5\]]pa dang /_skyabs dang gnas dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_gling du 'gyur bar bgyi zhing /_sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_yongs su mi ldog pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan
[\[250a.6\]]las 'da' bar bgyi ba dang /_dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams la ji ltar ma dang pha dang sring mo dang spun zla dang bu dang bu mo dang /_gzhan yang
[\[250a.7\]]nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su gnas pa de ltar rab tu gzung ngo /_/rab tu bzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang /_stobs ji lta ba dang /_snod ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o/_/'di nas bzung nas gang cung zhig sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshul
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]khrims srung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bzod pa sgom par 'gyur ba dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan la sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa la slob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang sems
[\[250b.2\]]can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa des byang chub sems dpa'
[\[250b.3\]]bdag slob pas 'di nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpar slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes lan gsum mo/_/'di dag thams cad byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas bdag
[\[250b.4\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs so zhes bya'o/_/de 'dra ba'i bla ma yang med na rang gis yang dag par blang bar bya ste/_slob dpon dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba dang /_slob dpon ming
[\[250b.5\]]'di zhes bgyi ba bzhag nas/_'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpas gzung du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar mkhyen par gsol ba'i mthar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas
[\[250b.6\]]bsngags pa dang /_rtag tu 'di'i dge ba mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las gsungs pa'i cho ga bsdus pa'o/_/gzhung 'di'i bsod nams bdud rtsi yis/_/sems can yongs su tshim byas te/_/mkhas pa 'jigs
[\[250b.7\]]pa med pa ni/_/kun rig dpag bsam go 'phang shog_/slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas bsdus pa'i sdom pa bzung ba'i cho ga rdzogs sto//_//kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang /_chag lo tsA ba dge slong dgra bcom gyis bsgyur ba'o/_/
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]{D3971}#]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_hri shar Na sap+ta ti/_bod skad du/_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge bsnyen gsum la skyabs 'gro ba/_/de ni sdom brgyad rtsa ba yin/_/sangs rgyas de'i chos dge 'dun
[\[251a.2\]]ni/_/thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs/_/dus gsum lam las nges grol zhing /_/shes bya la ni blo rnam rgyas/_/rmongs pa'i zum pa bcom pas na/_/sangs rgyas pad ma ltar rnam rgyas/_/thog mtha' med pa'i srid pa ru/_/ma rig gnyid kyis log pa yi/_/'gro la gang gang snang de de/_/brdzun
[\[251a.3\]]te rmi lam lta bur 'dod/_/ma rig gnyid ni rgyun chad cing /_/yang dag ye shes nges 'byung bas/_/gang zhig rnams da de sangs rgyas/_/skyes bu gnyid sangs ji bzhin no/_/yang dag de nyid ston mdzad cing /_/mi mkhas sems can rtogs mdzad pas/_/des kyang sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
[\[251a.4\]]dang /_/de yang sangs rgyas dang mtshungs 'dod/_/ye shes bla na med pa yis/_/yang na de nyid thugs chud pa'am/_/zhi ba nyid kyis rtogs sangs rgyas/_/de bas sangs rgyas sangs rgyas 'dod/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs kyi sku/_/mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis 'bar/_/'gro ba rang gi
[\[251a.5\]]mos pa yi/_/dbang gis [#]sna tshogs skur 'dzin gang /_/bsod nams tshogs ni tshad med las/_/'khrungs pa de ni rgyal ba'i sras/_/sa bcu la ni gnas rnams kyis/_/mthong bar gyur pa sku de yis/_/chos kyi rdzogs longs spyod 'di ni/_/rgyal sras rnams ni spyod pa yin/_/
[\[251a.6\]]rgyal ba sku de la bzhugs nas/_/bla med byang chub thugs su chud/_/ye shes spros pa med pa gang /_/shes bya skye med pa las byung /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku de/_/ye shes tshogs las byung ba yin[#]/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/stobs dang ldan pa bco brgyad dang /_/_
[\[251a.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sogs kyis/_/ye shes de ni yang dag brgyan/_/ngo bo nyid ni rgyu rkyen las/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba rigs min te/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ni/_/rang bzhin bcos ma yin par 'gyur/_/ngo bo nyid ni bcos ma ru/_/ji ltar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/_/bcos
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ma ma yin ngo bo ni/_/gzhan la ltos [#]pa yod ma yin/_/chos rnams nyid kyi ngo bo ni/_/thams cad yod pa ma yin te/_/de phyir skad cig gcig gis ni/_/bde gshegs thams cad mkhyen par 'dod/_/ma rig nyon mongs can byas rtog/_/rang gi ngo bo sgro btags 'dod/_/byis pa
[\[251b.2\]]rnams kyi 'khor ba'i rgyu/_/de rtogs gyur pa log shes yin/_/ma rig nyon mongs med yod pas/_/rnam pa kun mkhyen spangs pa nyid/_/slob ma rang sangs rgyas dag gis/_/byang chub ngo bo med pa yin/_/rgyal bas dngos po de rnams ni/_/gzugs brnyan dang yang 'dra
[\[251b.3\]]mkhyen pas/_/gnyis med ye shes ma rig zad/_/shes bya skye med pas [#]rab phye/_/de bas de ni cung zad kyang /_/mi mkhyen ci yang ston mi mdzad/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha' ji bzhin du/_/de ltar chos nyid la rab bzhugs/_/yid bzhin nor bu ci yang ni/_/mi 'byed rtogs [#]pa
[\[251b.4\]]med na yang /_/'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/tshim par byed pa yin par bshad/_/rdzogs sangs thugs [#]kyi rin chen ni/_/rang gi mos bzhin dgongs mdzad pas/_/'gro ba'i bya ba de dang ni/_/de bzhin mdzad par go ba yin/_/de yi phyir na 'phags pa rnams/_/
[\[251b.5\]]bsam mi khyab pa'i rkyen las 'khrungs/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i bya ba ni/_/mthong la 'thad pa yod ma yin/_/chos rnams dngos med nyid la ni/_/blo gnas sangs rgyas yin par bshad/_/'og min gzhal yas khang du ni/_/yang dag mngon sum yin par 'dod/_/sangs rgyas
[\[251b.6\]]rtogs pa mnga' ba yi[#]/_/gzugs kyi skur ni yang dag byung [#]/_/sprul pa'i skus ni sa steng du'ang /_/yang dag byang chub ston par mdzad/_/thub dbang rnams kyi sku gsum ste/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa 'di/_/gus pas blo la bzhag par gyis[#]/_/
[\[251b.7\]]sngon med pa las slar byung zhing /_/byung nas kyang ni yang dag med/_/rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas chos/_/don dam par ni mi brjod [#]do/_/gang zhig rmi lam sgyu ma dang /_/chu zla lta bur slu byed pa/_/skyes sogs dang ldan de spang bya'i/_/chos spang [#]bar ni rigs ma yin/_/dus gsum du yang dngos gcig
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]phyir/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'byung /_/rga shi dag las grol ba nyid/_/chos rnams kyi ni chos zhes [#]bshad/_/zad dang chags bral mya ngan 'das/_/'gog dang stong pa nyid zhi ba/_/de bzhin nyid kyang chos rnams kyis/_/rang gi ngo bo de nyid bshad/_/lam gang mya ngan 'das
[\[252a.2\]]'gro ba/_/thub pa rnams kyis yang dag gsungs/_/de yi rgyud las skyes gyur pas/_/des ni mngon sum dag tu gzigs/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa bzhi/_/rtogs te shes nas dad gyur pas/_/skyes bu gang zag zung brgyad po/_/mi phyed dge 'dun zhes bshad do/_/nyon mongs
[\[252a.3\]]gzhom phyir slob pas na/_/gang zag bdun ni slob pa yin/_/nyes pa ma lus zad pa'i phyir/_/brgyad pa mi slob par bshad do/_/de rnams 'bras bur gnas pa bzhi/_/bzhi ni zhugs pa po yin la/_/ston pa'i slob ma'i tshogs 'di ni/_/grol dang grol ba'i lam la gnas/_/sangs
[\[252a.4\]]rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/_/bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang /_/gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pa/_/de phyir dge 'dun zhes bshad do/_/thub dbang gi ni sku gsum dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang gang zag brgyad/_/sdom brtson bcas la mos pa yis/_/gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro ba/_/
[\[252a.5\]]dge bsnyen du ni dam bcas pas/_/skyabs ni gsum po bsrung bar bya/_/mu stegs kun la gus pa yis/_/mchod dang phyag 'tshal mi bya'o/_/rten gyi dam pa blangs [#]nas ni/_/slar yang dman la brten gyur na/_/nyes byas phyogs la gnas pa'i phyir/_/de ni dam pa'i bzhad gad
[\[252a.6\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig 'phags lam ma skyes pa'i/_/byis rmongs so so'i skye bo dag/_/de ni slob dang mi slob pa/_/min zhes bstan bcos las bshad do/_/ji ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa/_/nyer bzung 'khor lor btags pa ni/_/yang dag gzhan du rnam dpyad pas/_/rnam pa kun du
[\[252a.7\]]mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin phung po nas brtsams te/_/sems can du ni btags pa yang /_/yang dag gzhan du dpyad byas pas/_/ci nas kyang ni dmigs mi 'gyur/_/de 'dir thar pa'i cha nas ni/_/brtsams te rtag tu dge ba la/_/nyan thos 'di [#]phyir 'bad na ni/_/rim gyis
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]nyan thos nyid du 'gyur/_/gang zhig rang byung ye shes 'dod/_/rang rgyal byang chub don gnyer bas/_/rtsol ba de yang rang rgyal gyis/_/byang chub kho na des 'thob bo/_/rang don la gzhol 'di dag ni/_/snying rje chen po dang bral bas/_/rang rgyal rgyal ba'i gsung las skyes/_/theg pa chen
[\[252b.2\]]por mi bsngags so/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/theg pa che las gsungs pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu thos nas/_/des ni snod nyid 'gyur ba yin/_/de [#]ni theg pa chen po'i shing /_/ma lus rang gi las kyis [#]bsregs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i nang du ni/_/
[\[252b.3\]]skyes bu dbul po lta bur gnas/_/'di dag srid pas skrag pa yi/_/yid kyis byang chub gnyis thob pa/_/tshe zad par ni dgar 'gyur zhing /_/mya ngan 'das thob [#]'du shes can/_/de la mya ngan 'das yod min/_/'on kyang srid gsum skye ba [#]ni/_/de dag la yang med mod kyi/_/zag
[\[252b.4\]]pa med pa'i dbyings na 'khod/_/mi shes nyon mongs min spong [#]phyir/_/phyis ni sangs rgyas kyis bskul bas/_/byang chub kyi ni tshogs bsags nas/_/de yang 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po yi/_/mtshan gyis [#]yang dag brgyan pa la/_/blo dang ldan
[\[252b.5\]]yang [#]blon po yis/_/rgyal po lta bur mtho bar mthong /_/nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dag gis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rigs byung ba'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan yang /_/thub pa'i dbang po lta bur mthong /_/byang chub sems ni legs bskyed pa'i/_/sdom brtson mchil
[\[252b.6\]]lham khur ba la[#]/_/byang chub sems sogs la gus pas/_/dgra bcom pa yis bzlog par bshad/_/shar [#]ri'i lung las dgra bcom pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas nyid/_/'di dag dkon mchog gsum gzhan min/_/sangs rgyas khongs su gtogs par 'dod/_/ji ltar
[\[252b.7\]]dgra bcom zad ye shes/_/sa bdun sngon [#]du 'gro ba can/_/de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas ye shes/_/sa bcu sngon du 'gro ba yin/_/'di ni gcig pu mi 'gro yi[#]/_/sa bcu po ni sbyong byed de/_/gang phyir pha rol phyin pa bcus/_/sa de rnams la rdzogs par byed/_/'bras bur gnas dang
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]zhugs pa ni/_/'phags pa'i lam gyis rab phye ba'i/_/slob pa rnams kyi sa bdun ni/_/mngon pa'i chos las ji skad bshad/_/de bzhin sde snod rgyas pa las/_/sa bcu'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin/_/thams cad 'phags lam bdag nyid can/_/de las 'phags
[\[253a.2\]]min ji ltar 'gyur/_/nyan thos rnams kyi dbang mdzad nas/_/sde snod gsum du 'dod pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs kyi/_/nges pa der ni yod ma yin/_/'phags pa nub kyi rir bshad dang /_/shar gyi ri pa'i nyan thos kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang byas pa/_/sde
[\[253a.3\]]snod bdun du bshad pa yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang /_/de bzhin rig 'dzin zhes bya dang /_/mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba dang /_/rgyas dang de bzhin skyes pa'i rabs/_/de ltar sde snod bdun po ni/_/lung ni gnyis las bstan pa yin/_/gang la de ni tshad min gyur[#]/_/des ni dgra bcom spangs pa nyid/_/shes bya
[\[253a.4\]]mtha' yas dbang gis na/_/'khor ba na ni skad cig yod/_/gal te re re'i dbye bas ring /_/de bzhin 'di yang srid mtshungs 'gyur/_/bya ba rgya chen byed pa'i phyir/_/srid pa ring snyam [#]mi sems so/_/bsod nams ye shes stobs kyis ni/_/lus sems sdug bsngal gyis mi non/_/de bas rnam pa thams cad du/_/
[\[253a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' smad mi bya/_/khams gsum par gtogs nyon mongs zad/_/byang chub kyi ni snod gyur nyid/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/_/gzugs brnyan mtshungs par mthong bas na/_/nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dag ni/_/stong ni gnyis dang gsum po mthong /_/rnam pa
[\[253a.6\]]kun mkhyen ye shes ni/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par bshad/_/rgyal bas lam gyi rnam pa shes/_/byang chub sems dpa' yin par gsungs/_/rab tu dga' ba thob pa na/_/kun sbyor gsum po legs zad pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags 'gyur zhing /_/rdzogs
[\[253a.7\]]sangs rigs las byung ba yin/_/sa ni gong ma gong ma la/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang /_/nyes zad gang yin sa bcu pa'i/_/mdo nyid las ni shes par bya/_/yon tan dam pa re re zhing /_/mtha' yas de ni mkha' dang mnyam/_/byang chub la sems rtag phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]blo ldan byang chub la skyabs mchi/_/theg chen tshul la brten nas ni/_/skyabs gsum rnam par phye ba las/_/bsod nams gang des 'jig rten rnams/_/dkon mchog gsum la mchog gzhol shog_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad
[\[253b.2\]]pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3972}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Sha DaM a ga sha ra NaM/_bod
[\[253b.3\]]skad du/_skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa bshad/_/cis 'gro dgos dang yul dus dang /_/phan yon bslab bya blang ba rnams/_/rtsa ba sdom du bshad pa yin/_/'jigs dang yon tan dran pas 'gro/_/
[\[253b.4\]]gnas gsum bstan pa'i yul de la/_/'di nas byang chub thob par ro/_/mu stegs spyod las log pa yin/_/gsum du mi skye rten du 'gyur/_/bar chad med pas nad nyung ring /_/'byang zhing sogs pa'i phan yon no/_/skyabs gsum dang po'i bslab bya ni/_/gnod sbyin mi bsten
[\[253b.5\]]phyag mi 'tshal/_/gnyis pa sems can thams cad la/_/'tshe ba spang zhing brtse bar bya/_/gsum pa bdag dang gzhan gyi yul/_/sdig pa can dang 'grogs pa min/_/sku gzugs tshigs su bcad pa dang /_/lhan pa ser po btab pa la/_/dad mos sgo nas brten par
[\[253b.6\]]bdag_/zhal nas gsungs pa mtha' dag la/_/skur pa mi gdab spyi bor blang /_/gang zag dag dang ma dag la/_/dam par blta bar bya ba yin/_/lus srog phyir yang gsum mi spang /_/dus 'dir rkyen rnams ci byung yang /_/mgon skyabs gzhan du btsal ba min/_/che ba'i
[\[253b.7\]]yon tan zas dag gis/_/rtag tu dran cing mchod pa yin/_/rgyun gyi skyabs 'gro brjod bya ba/_/dus drug rgyun gyi bskul ma yin/_/blang ba dang por shes bya ba/_/'jigs pa byung tshe bskul ma yin/_/rgyud la shes bya mang mchis kyang /_/rgyal blon yid ches ma gyur pas/_/skyabs
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]'gro'i cho ga bdag gis bshad/_/legs par bris shig ku mA ra/_/bsod nams 'gro ba yang la bsngo/_/skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa/_slob dpon bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3973}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A pat+ti de sha na bi d+hi/_
[\[254a.2\]]bod skad du/_ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_/bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba byis pa nyid dang /_mi shes pa nyid kyis 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_phrag dog dang /_
[\[254a.3\]]ser sna'i dbang gis/_lus ma bsgoms pa dang /_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang /_shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa nyid kyis/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge slong dang rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa bgyis pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang
[\[254a.4\]]ba de dag thams cad/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams la bzod par gsol gyis bzod par mdzad du gsol/_khyed la ji ltar bzod par gsol ba de bzhin du mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos dang lta ba mthun pa dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dang /_gtsug lag
[\[254a.5\]]khang dang brang khang na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha dang /_lam dang nye ba'i lam na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha dang /_bstan pa 'di la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang /_gzhan gyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang /_pha dang /_ma dang /_gtong ba po dang /_sbyin bdag dang /_ji srid srid pa'i rtse mo'i
[\[254a.6\]]bar gyi sems can te/_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_nag po chen po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la nongs pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de bdag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad
[\[254a.7\]]du bzod par gsol gyis bzod par mdzad du gsol/_de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_/bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ltung ba rigs lnga po dag la/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sbyor
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang mjug rnams su/_'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba dang /_zhe sdang gis kun nas bslang ba dang /_gti mug gis kun nas bslang ba dang /_chad pas kun nas bslang ba dang /_skyed kyis kun nas bslang ba dang /_de'i tshan du gtogs pa dang /_de'i sder gtogs pa
[\[254b.2\]]dang /_de'i rigs su gtogs pa dang /_de'i mtshan nyid dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid dang /_nang du btsos pa dang /_nang du zhag lon pa dang /_ched du byas pa dang /_btang nas za ba dang /_kham 'phror bcad pa dang /_kha bkang nas smra ba dang /_lag nyar blangs pa dang /_byin len ma byas pa dang /_gsog 'jog byas pa dang /_
[\[254b.3\]]dus ma yin pa'i zas te/_mdor na phas pham pa'i chos bzhi dang /_des kun nas bslang ba'i ltung ba sbom po sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang /_mjug gis bsdus pa dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbom po sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_
[\[254b.4\]]mjug dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /_des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug dang /_ltung byed kyi chos bcu dgu dang /_des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_
[\[254b.5\]]des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug dang /_bslab par bya ba'i chos brgya rtsa mang po dang /_des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug dang /_rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun dang /_des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes
[\[254b.6\]]pa sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug ste/_de dag dang /_gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa dang 'gal ba dang /_dge 'dun gyis bcas pa'i nang khrims dral ba dang /_gos pa dang /_gos par bgyis pa de dag thams cad bdag gi tshul khrims kyi phung
[\[254b.7\]]po la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mtho lo bshags so/_/mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/_ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_ltung ba de dag la ltung bar mthong ngam/_kha cig la khums lags/_phyin chad shin tu legs par sdom mam/_chos ji lta ba dang 'dul ba ji lta ba dang ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par sdom lags kyis/_yang 'di
[\[255a.2\]]ltar shes bzhin du phyin chad mi bgyid lags so zhes dang /_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga thams cad yod par smra ba'i paN+Di ta de ba shAn+tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims
[\[255a.3\]]rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3974}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A [#]pat+ti de sha nabi d+hi/_bod skad du/_ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
[\[255a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/btsun pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'khor ba thog ma ma mchis pa nas tha ma da lta la thug gi bar du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas mi
[\[255a.5\]]dge ba bcu bgyis pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_de dang nye ba lnga dang /_so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang 'gal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal ba dang /_gsang sngags kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba la sogs pa mdor na mtho ris dang thar pa'i gegs su gyur cing /_'khor
[\[255a.6\]]ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur pa'i nyes ltung gi tshogs ci mchis pa de dag thams cad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_btsun pa'i spyan sngar mtho lo bshags so/_/mi 'chab bo/_/mthol zhing bshags na bdag
[\[255a.7\]]bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/_ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar mi 'gyur ba lags so zhes lan gsum brjod do/_/de nas mthong sdom dris la thabs yin no/_/legs so zhes brjod do/_/dang por sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas kyi
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]nyon mongs pa mang ba'am/_bag med pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis nyes ltung gi tshogs mang po bdog ste mchi bas/_de dag dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar bshags par 'tshal bas thugs kyis gzung [#]'tshal zhes pa dang mjug ltung ba las bslang ba shin tu bka' drin che lags zhes pa dang /_chos bzhin du
[\[255b.2\]]mdzad pa rjes su yi rang zhes brjod par bya'o/_/ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_bod kyi lo tsA [#]ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa[#]//_//
[\[255b.3\]{D3975}#]@##/_/kha ton dang glegs bam klag [#]pa'i sngon du bya ba'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chos kha ton du bya bar 'dod pa dang glegs bam du bya ba
[\[255b.4\]]klog par 'dod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [#]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/_yid kyis kun du dmigs la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi cho gas[#]/_phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa yan
[\[255b.5\]]lag bdun gyi tshul du mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod do/_/de'i rjes la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag [#]ste/_yang dag pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de ltar bsams pa'i rjes la/_tshig lan gsum brjod par bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi
[\[255b.6\]]tshig gcig gi don gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi yang yin na/_'on kyang bdag ni rang gi las kyi [#]nyes pas shes rab chung zhing blo zhen te[#]/_de lta yin du zin kyang /_gang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab bzung nas des bdag gi kha ton byas te/_chos kyi sgra de sems can gang gi rna lam du grag [#]pa
[\[255b.7\]]de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa thob par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]gsungs pa'i chos tshig gcig gi don gang yin pa de ni/_chos thams cad kyi yang yin na/_'on kyang bdag ni rang gi las kyi [#]nyes pas shes rab chung zhing blo zhen te[#]/_de ltar yin du zin kyang /_gang bdag gis
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]glegs bam du byas pa'i chos klag [#]par bya ste/_chos kyi sgra de sems can gang rnams kyi rna lam du grag [#]pa de dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa thob par gyur cig_/ces lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/kha ton dang glegs bam klag [#]pa'i cho ga_/slob dpon
[\[256a.2\]]mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D3976}]@#/_/tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga bzhugs/[ #]@##/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tsha tsha [#]gdab pa'i cho ga_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/[#]na mo b+ha
[\[256a.3\]]ga ba te/_bai ro tsa na [#]pra b+ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te sa mya g+saM [#]bu b+d+hA ya/_ta d+ya thA/_oM su k+Sh+me [#]sa me sa ma ye sa ma te [#]sa mA ro po a na ba ra Ne[#]/_ta raM b+he/_ya sho/[ #]ma hA te dze[#]/_nir ku le/_nir [#]ba Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_hr-i da ya/_a tiSh+ThA [#]na a d+hi Sh+th-i te swA hA/_gzungs 'di [#]'jim pa'i gong bu'am bye ma'i gong
[\[256a.4\]]bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la mchod rten bya'o/_/mchod rten de la rdul phra rab kyi grangs ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi mchod rten bye ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/rdul phra rab grangs ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa na skye ba dran
[\[256a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/dang por 'jim pa brdung ba bdag gam gzhan yang rung bas byams pa dang snying rjes byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing brdung ngo /_/de nas 'bi 'bi byin gyis brlab [#]pa/_'og min
[\[256a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal [#]bar bsam zhing /_sngags kyi grangs gong ma bzhin du brjod do/_/de nas rten [#]'brel gyi sngags bzlas shing gdab po/_/de nas 'bru 'am me tog la rten [#]'brel
[\[256a.7\]]gyi sngags lan gsum mam bdun bzlas la dbul lo/_/de nas/_bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/_/thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/_/rga nad 'chi ba'i dpa' klong 'khrugs pa yi/_/srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog_/ces smon lam gdab bo/_/
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga_/slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho[#]//_//[#]ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShA na ta thA ga to h+ya ba [#]data/_te ShA ny+ca yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//_//
[\[256b.2\]{D3977}]@#/_/bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa/[#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_gu ru kri [#]ya kra ma/_bod skad du/_bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dang por tshad dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/_slob ma la dad pa dang yid ches pa dang 'dod pa'i dad pa bskyed [#]la/_de
