[\[256b.3\]]nas byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon brjod la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas gnas khang khyad par can du mchod pa'i tshogs khyad par can bshams la/_'phags pa'i tshogs spyan drangs te/_phyag 'tshal [#]ba dang /_zhabs bsil zhing gdan dbul [#]ba dang /_bla na yod pa dang /_bla na med
[\[256b.4\]]pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis legs par mchod cing /_mchod pa'i sprin gyi sngags kyang lan gsum brjod do/_/bstod [#]pa byed pas bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan khyad par can dran pa'i sgo nas gus pas bstod cing /_de dang de 'phel ba'i tshig kyang brjod do/_/de nas bshags
[\[256b.5\]]pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bskul ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_bsngo ba la sogs pa bya ste/_de nas slob ma dad pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag byas la/_gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis legs par bskyed la/_de dag gi rang
[\[256b.6\]]gi ngo bo dang /_dbye ba dang /_khyad par yang brjod do/_/de nas byang chub kyi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rgyu dang /_'bras bu dang /_bslab pa'i go rims [#]dang /_nyams pa dang /_ma nyams pa'i skyon yon
[\[256b.7\]]dang /_tshul ji ltar bslab pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bstan par bya'o/_/de yang bag yod pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pas zin par bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o/_/de dag gi mtshan nyid dang /_go rims [#]dang /_nyams pa dang /_ma nyams pa'i skyon yon la sogs pa yang bslab par
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bya'o/_/de dag byed pa la yang brtson 'grus drag po [#]bskyed la ji [#]snyam pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang /_ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi [#]rang bzhin med par shes par byas la/_bslab pa gsum mam/_shes rab rnam pa gsum la mnyam par
[\[257a.2\]]gzhag [#]pa dang /_spyod lam gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o/_/mthar smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces kyang brjod par bya'o/_/'di ni slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i las kyi go rims so[#]/_/slob mas kyang tshul ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[257a.3\]]'di ni mtshan nyid theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang bslab pa bstan pa'i tshul lam go rims [#]che long tsam bstan pa yin no/_/rgyas par ni gzhan nas shes par bya'o/_/bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas
[\[257a.4\]]mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3978}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tri sam+ba ra kra ma/_bod skad du/_sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa slob pa la/_bsnyen gnas dbog pa dang /_dge bsnyen gyi
[\[257a.5\]]sdom pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang por bya'o/_/bsnyen gnas dbog pa ni/_btsun pa'am/_slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/_ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs
[\[257a.6\]]su mchi'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o/_/de ltar btsun pas bdag la gsum la skyabs su song bar gzung du gsol zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa'am slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/_
[\[257a.7\]]ji srid sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du/_srog chags so cog gsod pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_myos byed 'thung ba dang /_dus ma yin par za ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_kha dog bsgyur ba dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rtsed
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]'jo dang /_mal stan mthon po la sogs pa ldog par bgyid pa/_yon tan brgyad kyis bdag dgra bcom pa rnams kyi tshul du 'jog go zhes bya ba ni bsnyen gnas dbog pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa brjod cing /_bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/_ji srid
[\[257b.2\]]'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/theg pa chen po'i chos mtha' dag la skyabs su mchi'o/_/tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pas bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/tshe dang ldan
[\[257b.3\]]pa brjod cig_/slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las log pa de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus deng nas bzung ste/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs
[\[257b.4\]]te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyid do/_/yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob pa dang rjes su sgrub po/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_ma byin par
[\[257b.5\]]len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos
[\[257b.6\]]pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog pa de bzhin du/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang
[\[257b.7\]]myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par bgyid do/_/yan lag gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]lnga pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su bslab po/_/rjes su sgrub po/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dbog pa'o/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag
[\[258a.2\]]gis/_byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa de bzhin du/_bdag gis kyang deng nas bzung ste/_ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/_sems can ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_sems can ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /_sems can dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs phyin pa dang /_sems can
[\[258a.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/_byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bdag gi de ring skyob pa thams cad kyi/_/spyan sngar 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid dang ni/_/bar du bde la mgron du bos zin gyis/_/lha dang mi la sogs pa dga' bar gyis/_/zhes de ltar
[\[258a.4\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_'jig rten skyong ba brgyad la sogs pa'i lha rnams thams cad yid kyis dmigs te/_dad pa chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ltar kun rdzob kyi rnam pa smon lam gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed do/_/don dam pa
[\[258a.5\]]la ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis bskyed par bya'o/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa/_slob dpon chen po rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tu l+ya dA sa dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[258a.6\]{D3979}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsa tu rAM ga d+harma tsAr+ya/_bod skad du/_chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ston pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni/_snying po byang chub mchis kyi bar/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/skyabs
[\[258a.7\]]gsum skyob pa bla med la/_/rab tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/_/rten gzung bar bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o/_/slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/_/thog med dus nas da lta'i bar/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/_/lus dang
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]ngag dang yid sgo nas/_/sdig pa mi dge ci bgyis pa/_/ma lus 'gyod pas so sor bshags/_/slan chad ci nus bsdam par bgyi/_/rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o/_/slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/_phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs na/_/
[\[258b.2\]]sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/'jig rten pa ni gang gis kyang /_/ma lus dge ba ci bgyid pa/_/de la rang nyid byed pa bas/_/lhag par dga' bas yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba tshegs chung ngus bskyed pa'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o/_/slob
[\[258b.3\]]dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/_ji ltar sngon gyi skyob rnams kyis/_/sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_/byang chub mchog rab thugs bskyed pa/_/de ltar bdag kyang ma rnams phyir/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub nges par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems
[\[258b.4\]]bskyed pa'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o/_/mthar dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo ba'i yan lag kyang bya ste/_bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni/_/sems can thams cad ma lus pa/_/gdul dka'i sems ni rab zhi nas/_/'gro ba'i bla ma thob
[\[258b.5\]]par shog_/ces bya ba'o/_/chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ti ma trA nan+das mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o/_/[{D3980}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sap+ta aM ga
[\[258b.6\]]sad+d+harma tsAr+ya a ba tA ra/_bod skad du/_dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags tshogs ni/_/skyabs mchog bden gnyis yongs bzung bas/_/shes rab snying rje mnyam sbyor la/_/bdag ni gus
[\[258b.7\]]pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag btsal ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o/_/skyabs gsum bla med rin chen la/_/phyi nang kho na nyid don can/_/mchod sprin bsam mi khyab rnams kyis/_/legs par mchod pa'i cho gas mchod/_/mchod pa 'bul ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o/_/'gro rnams bsgral 'dod bsam
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pa yis/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/_/rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/_/skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o/_/bdag gis lus ngag yid sgo nas/_/mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang /_/de
[\[259a.2\]]dag thams cad so sor bshags/_/sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o/_/rdzogs sangs byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rang rgyal rgyal ba'i slob ma dang /_/'jig rten bsod nams gang bgyid la'ang /_/dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o/_/shes rab snying rje dang
[\[259a.3\]]bcas pa'i/_/brtson pas sems can don du bdag_/sangs rgyas mdun du gnas bgyis te/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyid/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o/_/bsod nams tshogs kyi chos 'di dag_/byang chub gsum gyi rgyur gyur pa/_/bdag med gnyis kyi lam
[\[259a.4\]]brten pas/_/mtho ris thar pa sgrub gyur cig_/bdag gi bsod nams gang bgyis pas/_/skye bos rgyal ba thob gyur te/_/gus pas sems can thams cad don/_/rgya chen yang dag byed gyur cig_/bdag ni tshe rabs thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba rnyed gyur cig_/dam pa'i chos ni nyan pa dang /_/dge
[\[259a.5\]]'dun zhabs 'bring byed gyur cig_/thabs mkhas yang dag bshes gnyen ldan/_/chos dang zang zing sbyin byed cing /_/longs spyod sems can thun mong dang /_/pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs shog_/'byor pa phul ba'i bsod nams dang /_/tshul khrims legs par gzung ba dang /_/dam chos yang dag mnyan
[\[259a.6\]]pa yis/_/bdag ni byang chub mchog thob shog_/bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos tshe/_/dga' ldan skyes nas yid dge bas/_/myur du byams mgon bsnyen byas te/_/byang chub lung bstan rnyed par shog_/smon lam gdab pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i
[\[259a.7\]]yan lag bdun pa/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
